title.english: I Might Be A Fake Cultivator

description: It's a cultivation story. One with immortal gods and cultivation arts. But more importantly, it's the story of a boy named An Lin, a mortal who was heavily in debt and was pursued by loan sharks before meeting his savior, a True God. Saved from the loan sharks, An Lin was sent to cultivate at the Immortal Cultivation United University, but it seems like he was trolled by the True God...? Is this really the life he was expecting? Wasn't this just a regular cultivation story? What's that? I might be a fake cultivator?

During troubled times, Weng Shaoying is one of the most famous singers in Dongping. Many people go to Song of Fairyland just to see her perform. However, under her glamorous facade, she has been controlled for more than 10 years. On the other side of Dongping is Bi Xing Tang, one of the most famous gangs there. After her father’s death, Yanchu became the young female leader of Bi Xing Tang, which caused a lot of rumors to spread. On one inevitably fortuitous night, the two happened to meet. At that time, neither of them knew that they would eventually become the most important person in the other’s life. Starting from that night onwards, the gears in Shaoying and Yanchu’s fate will forever be rotating together.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

A young wealthy businessman was suddenly kidnapped by a dark organization that he refused to work with. He was used as an experimental subject of developing new chip-based technology that gives the subject extra-ordinary abilities. Will he be able to escape and take revenge?

Official 4-koma comic for the award-winning game, Genshin Impact. No set schedule.
A relaxing trip in Teyvat ><, let's go together!

Note: Includes chapter 16.5, 16.6.
In this era, people are always reincarnation, but I Lin Fei, depends on being immortal. I have lived for hundreds of million years, just to find my beloved ones that I lost for a million years!!

title.romaji: Quan Min Mo Ri: Wo, Bingdu Jun Wang

description:
When the apocalypse descends, the world transforms into a brutal game of evolution—humanity’s final trial, and the favorite playground of gods and demons. Brian Carter time-travels back to ten days before it all begins. Armed with foreknowledge and no time to waste, he injects himself with the zombie virus and awakens a legendary SSS ability: Virus Monarch! Now, with the power to command infection itself, Brian forges a terrifying new path through the chaos, one where he doesn’t just survive the end of the world, but rules it!

(Source: WebComics)

Acting pretentious is his hobby! Being the ultimate rich player, he’s used to spending “expenses” around others on the down-low, having the most extravagant equipment and armor. In the gaming world, there's nothing that can't be solved with money!

When she opens her eyes, Huang Beiyue, a talented killer known as “ultimate weapon”, finds that she travels through time into another world and possesses a girl’s body, who is the trueborn daughter of princess royal but humiliated by everyone. With such an identity, Huang Beiyue rises from obscurity. Meanwhile, a mysterious guy becomes more and more interested in her…

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Aikugui, Qing Cang Ni de Yanlei
title.native: 爱哭鬼, 请藏起你的眼泪

description: The life of two "normal" high school girls? Su Mu wants to overcome her anxiety to confess to Lin Dai Xue, on the other side Dai Xue keeps making opportunities for Su Mu to confess. Both of them know each other well but neither of them is willing to be truthful to the other.

In a certain corner of the city, there is a seemingly ordinary little shop — Shiguang Photo Studio. The shop's proprietors Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang can enter a photograph and explore its original time and space. One day, Lin Kai, a rising star in the traditional opera scene, came to the studio and asked Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang to find a person in a picture from 10 years ago. There is only one photograph, and there will be only one chance…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Dou Po Cangqiong: Yao Lao Chuanqi
title.native: 斗破苍穹前传之药老传奇

description:
This is the Dou Qi world, where the strong are respected and the weak are despised. The Yao clan is one of the eight ancient clans with a Dou Di’s blood in their veins, and it is a holy land for alchemists. Follow Yao Chen, Xiao Yan’s teacher, as he goes from his low position in the Yao clan to standing at the summit of the Dou Qi continent.

Located on the edge of the Dou Qi continent was the Yao clan descended from an ancient Dou Di. Not only was this place isolated from the Central Plains, it was also a breeding ground for poisonous insects and vicious beasts. But with the Yao clan’s incredible strength and their exquisite alchemy, it became a holy land that was worshiped by alchemists. Born in a weak branch family, orphaned by his father at a young age, treated with indifference by the clan, and banished from the clan for false charges when he tried to display his talent. He experienced all kinds of trials and adventures, in the end gaining the title of the Central Plain’s mainland number one alchemist. But because of his apprentice’s betrayal, not even his bones remained…

How did Yao Chen go from a youngster in a weak branch of the Yao clan manage to reverse his fate to become the mainland’s number one alchemist?
What kind of encounters did he have after being banished from the Yao clan?
From a lowly trash to the top of the mainland, just how many secrets are still hidden in Saint Yao’s story?

Note: Includes 12 extra chapters

Three centuries ago, this man was a powerful emperor, but he ended up being assassinated by his own fiancée the night before their wedding. Three hundred years later, he somehow managed to defy fate and got reincarnated and thus began his journey to cultivate forbidden Supreme Arts and awaken his Divine Meridians! Now, he isn't going to let anyone get in his way.

(Source: WebComics)
Everyone in his Triad gang looked up to him. He was the boss’s favorite pupil, but then in a single night, after he had won so many territorial fights for his gang, he lost everything! Why?

title.english: The Secret Tales of a 30-Year-Old Gay Bachelor

description:
Wei Qiuyu is seen as a calm and reliable executive, but he is keeping his gay sexuality a secret. At the behest of his mother, he gets into a blind date with a woman, but meets Fu Yicheng instead. Though Qiuyu finds Yicheng an annoyance, he can't help but be drawn to him every time they meet.

(Source: INKR)

Note: Includes 4 extra chapters.

title.romaji: Xiang Chen Wei Feichai De Gongjue Xiaojie
title.english: The Bizarre Adventure of Miss Capricious
title.native: 想成为废柴的公爵小姐

description:
I was reborn into a novel "The Mistake of Cleavens" and became a silly, love-deprived young lady. Fame? Power? Love? Those are not enough to attract me, as I happened to be the richest girl in the world! Yes, I'm going to lead a brand new life with all the wealth I got.
But wait! I seem to recall that the ending of this novel is a bad end?! The world collapsed because Lady Cleavens abandoned a cat, which brought the doom of the world!
Alright, even if I need to adopt all the cats in this world, I'll do it as long as I can reverse my fate and save it from its doom!

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Mai Xiang Ke Li Ma Sha

description:
"Humility! Honesty! Compassion! Bravery! Justice! Sacrifice! Pride! Faith!"
He’s a lich, yet he abides by the chivalric code of knights!
He’s a lich, yet he holds fast to faith and light!

"Be fearless no matter how formidable the enemy! Be bold, loyal, and never disappoint the Holy Spirit! Be faithful, upright, and never submit to evil! Protect the weak, and never violate the heavens!"

He stands unfettered at the top of the world, no matter how many curveballs life throws at him. No one—not even the Holy Spirit—could stop him from following the Holy Spirit! This is a story about a lich who becomes a knight and saves the princess.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Wo Jian Qile Yi Di Shuxing

description:
Feng Xia, a completely hardworking game player, travels through time and space. With his power, attributes, and strategies learned from the games he played before, he can beat his enemies and get their Light Masses of Attributes. Besides, he also meets all kinds of beauties along his way... His enemies laugh: "My martial arts are invincible!" Feng Xia just beats them and absorbs their Light Masses. "Indeed. But sorry, it's my martial arts now!"

(Source: WeComics)

The story starts with a deep kiss with a demon-woman, which awakened his SSS-level skill. What's going on here? Scheming loli, cool genius, innocent schoolgirl, and seductive demon as girlfriends... Faced with wave after wave of bad omens and misfortune, Lin Que feels like he's under a lot of pressure, when all he wants to do is to quietly farm monsters and level up until he's the strongest!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Shi Nian Hou, He Siduitou Jiehun Le
title.english: Ten years later, I married my Nemesis
title.native: 十年后，和死对头结婚了

description:
After 18 years together, freshman Han Shen and childhood friend Su Qian have been admitted to the same university. After Han Shen got struck by lightning, he became confused. He claimed to be from ten years in the future, and that he and Su Qian were married! For the boy who claims to be a husband and the girl who isn't sure about her feelings, they find their relationship can't help but change…

(Source: Pocket Comics)

title.romaji: Xiu Xian Gui Lai Zai Xiao Yuan

description:
He used to be the most ruthless emperor in the immortal world, knocking down all his fellow immortals. He had tamed and ridden a Golden Dragon, turned a White Tiger into a cat, and made a phoenix into fried chicken. He had slept with the goddess of the Nine Heavens and stripped in the Heavenly Palace… Now he has returned to the urban life and become an ordinary teacher for chitchat. Girls, get your clothes on, I'm here to teach you some manners!

(Source: WeComics)

Jun Xie was the number one assassin in modern earth. His skills and knowledge in the field of assassination were unparalleled, his accomplishments unprecedented, his reputation terrified the entire underworld. However, during a mission to retrieve a mystical treasure, a mishap occurred… He is now Jun Moxie, a sixteen year old super level debauchee, sole heir to the declining Jun family. A family of valiant heroes, left with an old grandpa, a crippled uncle and a debauchee as the sole heir! Accepting the world’s criticism and cold stares with a smile, his new journey begins! His life will be carved by his own will! Rise to the top! Evil Monarch Jun Xie!

Lu Shuiyin was a poor high school student who also happened to be a game guru. One day, he turned out to be the heir to a legacy worth 500 million, but the legacy was merely game coins. While still in his puzzled state, a girl he loved was kidnapped, and a series of mysterious events took place afterwards. In the end, he found himself dragged into a game of "tomb robbers", and his mission was to engage in a long-lasting battle as "the last tomb keeper".

(Source: Webnovel)

Bai Li Yun Xiao - with a spiritual life in the continent Jiuxiao. After his death he was resurrected, however, he returned 300 years ago, returned to urban adolescence, changed his life, and climbed to the top of the world again. "Whether in heaven or on earth, only I can win"

Jun Xiaoyao transmigrated into a fantastical world and into the body of the scion of a prominent clan, which will give him powerful backers and incredible talent. He is also given the Login System, which provided him with a fully-formed ancient sacred body right from the start. With the help of his System, he will march to the pinnacle of this world!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

In order to save the world, I'm forced to accept the male MC as my disciple! But why is he so different from when I met him in our previous lives? He's so innocent and shy now, like a little puppy. Well, since you're so loyal and obedient, I'll take you in as my disciple! Wait... You traitor! Stop pouncing on me!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

What does this pretty girl want with me? To marry me? That won't do... What about this pretty lady? You wanna marry me too? Tsk tsk, since when did I become so in demand?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

On a fateful and accidental night, Xue Wuxuan was selected out of the millions by the Yanluo system, to be coined as the new King of Hell, also known as Yanluo.

Join him as dives into the mysterious unknown and crosses thousands of planes and realms to become the strongest Yanluo in the universe.

(Source: Webnovels)

title.english: The Martial Emperor's Life After Seclusion

description:
Ever since he transversed into the realm, he turned into an adorable, lovely, androgynous man, who is coveted by many. Fortunately, Ling Ge has a mysterious physique and his strength automatically grows. After touring around Eastern China and finally suppressing the western gods in a single battle, he has been called the Martial Emperor since then. Subsequently, the androgynous martial emperor has been living in seclusion. Nonetheless, he became friends with a young loli, and the androgynous Martial Emperor came out of seclusion again!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.english: The Superb Captain in the City

description:
When Li Yifei retired from active duty, all he wanted to do was to live a quiet life surrounded by beautiful women. But there's always bad guys coming around looking for a beating. As the former top man in the special forces, he'll gladly oblige them. So much for a quiet life, but at least he has the beautiful women by his side!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Mo Ri Hen Ren: Kai Ju Tun Ji Wanyi Wuzi
title.english: The Doomsday Ruthless Man: Hoarding Trillions of Supplies at the Beginning
title.native: 末日狠人：开局囤积万亿物资

description:
After being reborn back to the time before the apocalypse, Su Chenren has become a man of few words. Having already experienced the downfall of doomsday and betrayal by his fiancee, he understand the importance of preparation. With his powers of teleportation and spatial manipulation, he will gather up all the materials needed to survive the apocalypse. This time will be different, he'll be ready for anything!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Guomin Laogong Dai Huijia: Tou Wen 55 Ci
title.native: 国民老公带回家：偷吻55次

description:
"Don't touch me when we're out in public."
"Don't openly say that I am your wife."
"Don't let people know that you and I live together."

Lu Jinnian and An Hao were forced to marry as a result of their parents' arrangements. An Hao thought their marriage would be loveless and inescapable, so she gave Lu Jinnian three don'ts on their wedding night. Lu Jinnian looked at her, expressionless, and blinked his eyes. Can't touch her in public? He'll do it in secret. He can't say that she's his wife? He'll say that he's her husband. And as for the final don't... In an interview, he declared to the entire world: "Every night, I share a bed with An Hao."

(Source: Webnovels)

title.english: National School Prince Is A Girl

description:
Fu Jiu appears to be a normal lad in high school on the surface. But in fact, she (Yes! She!) is the hacker, Z, a villain-terminator in the online world of an alternate world. Having reincarnated into the body of a woman and being forced to disguise herself as a young man, she reigns over the game world, fights for justice, and puts a spell on all the girls around with her innate charm. However, her flirting comes across as gay to the rich Almighty Qin and his inner circle. Over time, the Almighty Qin falls for him… her. Has he turned gay for him… her? Now, that's confusing!

(Source: Webnovel)

A boy named Shi Shan along with his little sister were offered as sacrifice to a demon that has been haunting their village. They were rescued by a martial artist who exorcise demons. He took the siblings in as his disciples and taught them the art of cultivation and about the demons that dwell in this world.

title.english: Take A Good Look at Me Now

description:
Xu Wuzhou opened his eyes to find himself transmigrated into the body of a notoriously delinquent son-in-law. The guy spent his wedding night in a bridesmaid's bed, and wandered into a brothel in search of a meal. Now his beautiful wife has lost all faith in him, and his father-in-law exiled him to the training grounds in disgust. And all Xu Wuzhou got for this trouble was an ancient artifact starving for blood?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Yunxi Qian, the oldest daughter of the prime minister was born with a special ability. Because of this she was deemed 'abnormal' and was raised at Mt. Lin Yun.
Upon turning 16, she took her younger sister's place to marry into the royal family of Ye.
Rumors say Youming Ye is strange, cold and cruel. Just how will Yunxi Qian's fate play out?

The family elders, fighting for the right to exploit the mines, sent someone to crush his dantian, and Xuan became an abandoned son of the Ye family. However, he accidentally entered the Tower of Boundless Hell because of his mother's bleeding ring and was instructed by a mysterious woman to cultivate the Dao of the sword, which no one had ever cultivated before.

With the help of the mysterious woman, could Ye Xuan become the strongest swordsman in the realm of the heavens?

Yu Le took the blame for someone else's mistakes due to a favor that he had to repay, deeply offending the most handsome guy in school, Gu Yan. He's been on Gu Yan's radar ever since he started school. Gu Yan stops Yu Le after school and bothers him every day in order to take "revenge" on him. He originally wanted to teach Yu Le a lesson, but as time passes, "revenge" turns into something else. Gu Yan begins to take a liking to Yu Le and finds it harder and harder to hurt him...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

When Lin Feng was transmigrated into another world, he was gifted with a power system, but he also faced a mountain of pressure. Because the system gave him the main mission to start a new martial arts sect, and build it up to become the most powerful master in the world! Lin Feng got started right away. Hey kid, come join my sect!

(Source: Tencent, translated)
Yuan Ge, a successful manager of an advertising agency, not so great of a husband, recently lost his wife only to let himself smitten on the subway by a young girl half his age...

When an ancient God imprinted a divine mark on Gu Yun and weakened his spiritual power, he was demoted to the rank of a handyman and fell from his pedestal as a genius. Because of him, his father was deposed as patriarch and imprisoned by their rival family, the Feilu clan. However, Gu Yun quickly discovered the secret in his body and began working with the ancient God within him.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Zai Zhan Yi Shi, Qi Chong Xing He

description:
Wu Xinghe was the youngest grandmaster of martial arts in history. Unfortunately, he and his sister met an untimely end after being attacked by an enemy martial arts faction. Now reborn into the frail body of Qin Wushuang, the young man begins his martial arts journey from the beginning, this time resolving to protect his new family with all of his strength.

(Source: Tapas)

The grave of Zhang Chunan's long-dead grandfather was desecrated by a group of mysterious people, but his grandfather's corpse wasn't the only thing they dug up. Secrets and mysteries surrounding the Zhang family began to surface, and Zhang Chunan is apparently more than just an ordinary college student desperate to be rid of his virginity.

One day, Zhang Chulan is attacked by zombies in a graveyard. In the midst of that situation, he saves the life of a girl, throwing the kitchen knife in his hand in order to kill the enemies. The girl tells Chulan, who is relieved, to face his hardships head on and leaves. However, Chulan later sees that girl again at his university. From that moment, Zhang Chulan's destiny begins to move. There will be strangers with special powers appearing one by one, with battles involving those abilities. Each episode will bring a new mystery to light.

First published under the title 异人 (Yi Ren, literally: "Weirdo") and with subtitle King of the Weirdo in February 2015. A collaboration Chinese/Japanese anime television series adaptation titled Hitori no Shita the outcast (一人之下 the outcast) aired in 2016.

title.english: Reborn to be a Supreme Emperor

description:
The son of the supreme being, Qin Shu, is a Son of God, but he was born with a mortal body and mortal fragility. Being despised by everyone in the Heavenly Path, his identity is even about to be taken away and himself demoted to the mortal world, until he activates the Myriad Realm Registration System!

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Bianshen Zhihou, Wo Yu Ta De Kuangxiangqu
title.native: 变身之后，我与她的狂想曲

description: What would you do if you woke up in a new world with no memories? Better yet, waking up in two separate bodies; a male and a female! This is the story of our protagonist, Tyre. Although, it seems as luck isn’t on his side as he travels in search of ‘The Three Sacred Tools of Avalon’ to try and retrieve his memories...

title.romaji: Lian Ti Shiwan Ceng: Wo Yang De Gou Dou Shi Da Di
title.native: 炼体十万层：我养的狗都是大帝

description:
Five thousand years ago, a young man worked tirelessly for cultivation, but because of his special physique, was unable to break through the physical training period and enter the next realm of cultivation. He has been practicing from the ancient era to the modern day. Now living in the big city, Xuan Yuanming sits at body refining level ninety-nine thousand nine hundred and ninety-nine. He set a small goal for himself: first to cultivate his body to level 100,000!

(Source: QQ, translated)

Xia Xi is a shut-in, and she commits suicide after a date with an online "friend" goes horribly wrong. But unexpectedly, she transmigrates into a dating game with countless handsome men to conquer. Watch as this shut-in takes on even the gods themselves!

(Source: Webnovel)

I was once the lord of the cultivators in the immortal realm. But I was reborn into a world where the women worked to earn a living, while the men sat around and looked pretty. Even worse, my body looked like a fat slob! I worked hard to get into shape, but I didn't do it for the benefit of you thirsty women!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

A cosmic storm brought about a wave of mutations for all sorts of species. Giant, poisonous zombie monsters roamed the cities and roared as they waved battle-axes. Exotic beasts fought for territorial supremacy in the jungles. Humans were also awakened to a new ability known as the Cosmic Power... Zhou Zheng transmigrated into this post-apocalyptic world without any Cosmic Power. But he will take advantage of the powers offered by the rogue class in this game system to destroy the darkness and pursue ultimate power!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

When the planet perishes and the gods fall, the collapse of the magical realm leaves humanity without any protectors. Now, "Anomalies" and "Catastrophes" begin to invade the human realm . As the Dark Age descends, a soul from Blue Star (Earth) is unexpectedly transported into this dying realm.

(Source: Webnovel)

An unprecedentedly brilliant cultivator, sabotaged and killed one night, was somehow reborn into a plane of a lower dimension as a loser everyone bullied. Using the cultivation experience of his previous lifetime, he became a force to be reckoned with and embarked on the journey of revenge…

(Source: WebComics)

He transmigrated into a mushroom, the weakest monster in this world, and fought his way to become the mightiest hero.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Failing his heavenly trial, the deadliest poison master is sent to the modern work and given a new body. Determined to pass the trial this time, the poison master has to train harder… but before that, he’s given a daughter to take care of and an ex to deal with. Little does he know that this is just the beginning of his new trial…

 (Source: Mangatoon)

Fifty years ago, he transmigrated into Dragon City, a lone fierce fighter who raised Earth's banner to fight against the tide of fearsome alien monsters. Fifty years later, Meng Chao was reverted back to the time before the invasion, reborn with a system that made him stronger with every contribution he made. In this life, he will smash the monsters, stomp the demons, and tear down the old gods. In this life, he swore he will rewrite his own, his family's, and even the entire humanity's final fate!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

"Why? Obviously, I married a lovely girl, but I have to share my bed with my cold father-in-law?!"

A story of a straight idiot dentist and his arrogant president father-in-law! The life of them is full of accidents. And it seems not to be just a supernatural transformation. There are even more unknown secrets of the past...

"Perhaps our story had begun earlier than we thought."

(Source: Webnovel)

At Linzhen High, Sheng Xu is the resident bad boy, while Zhan Shao is the by-the-book school genius. They’re polar opposites and butt heads every chance they get! But one day, their worlds get turned upside down when they mysteriously switch bodies. While navigating life trapped in an unfamiliar body and learning to work as a team to maintain their respective tough-guy image and perfect GPA, they discover hidden truths and deeper feelings for each other. But can opposites attract when the guy you like is... you?

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes two bonus chapters and two epilogue chapters.

He’s been transported to another world. And has become the adopted son of a powerful family. But the heavens are unjust, as he has been given a weak body and an even weaker cultivation rank. But heaven pitying him has given a magical space. Follow his journey in this new world.

In the land of the Xia Kingdom, every human being is born with what is known as a "resonance", either to a specific element or a powerful, mythical beast. Unfortunately, Li Luo was born with an incredibly rare condition known as an empty resonance! Meanwhile, his parents, the powerful masters of House Loulan, have gone missing for many years, and the other Great Houses are beginning to eye their holdings quite hungrily. Can this useless young master turn the tide?

(Source: Mangatoon)

Note: The original Chinese version is completed with 256 chapters while the English version is completed with 512 chapters.

Ling Jian Chen, the master of the God-Emperor, is reborn as a mortal and he has started an unbeatable life that defeats everyone against him! Genius? Even the God-Emperor is my student. Talking about genius and masters? Even the God-Emperor serves me with respect in order to receive my words of guidance, are you as unbeatable as me? Beauties? Have you ever heard of the most beautiful goddess in the Divine Realm? She has tried everything to stay with me ... Everyone in heaven, listen to my orders, I'm the one and the only in all the eight realms in heaven.

title.romaji: Bing Jiao Meimei Zhi Xiang Rang Wo Qifu Ta
title.native: 病娇妹妹只想让我欺负她

description:
Gu Xing, a novelist, deeply detests manipulative women who play coy, so she intentionally created such a main character for her webnovel, so she can abuse the fictional character in all sorts of ways! However, she never imagined that she would end up transported into her own story, and now she gets to take it out on her personally! But due to her own fetish for pretty girls, she couldn't bring herself to harm the beautiful protagonist she created, and she eventually ends up becoming her protector instead… As she was worrying about her own mixed feelings, the supposedly helpless protagonist pushes the male lead away and insistently confesses her love for Gu Xing instead! What! So I was the one being protected all along!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Ru Ni Suo Jian Zhe Shi Bai He Man

description: When the timid Wu You moves to a new high school, she quickly grows attached to her new deskmate, the gregarious Ye Yin. But there is more than meets the eye with Ye Yin, and as the days pass Wu You's feelings begin to deepen. A love story between two secondary school classmates.

Song Yan and Wen Li are a well-known contract couple in the entertainment industry. Even though they are married, they don't make a big deal out of it and they each do their own thing professionally. Most people are pessimistic about their marriage, yet many fans ship them together, too. The two of them finally started acting like a loving pair in public, but only reluctantly, when they officially announced their participation in a nationally televised reality show about married couples. But as they spend time together in front of the camera, the two of them gradually realized that the bonds of their marriage had already been firmly tied long before.....

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Zhai Le Bai Nian Chumen Yi Wudi
title.english: I Stayed At Home For A Century, When I Emerged I Was Invincible
title.native: 我宅了百年出门已无敌

description:
Chu Xuan travels through time and becomes a young master of a powerful family in a fantasy world. Because of a small mistake, he is banished from the ancestral house and driven to a remote cottage. However, he does not care because he has access to a system that makes him stronger as he spends more time at home. After having been home for a day, he is rewarded with the Indestructible Body Technique. After having been home for a year, he is rewarded with the Jade Void Sutra and a century of cultivation accomplishment. Nobody can make him go out. He will stay here for good!

(Source: Webnovel)

A vet returns to school after his military tours, only to find himself involved in the trouble of many girls. Qian yilan, the most adored goddess on campus, known for her wisdom and pride; Zhen Wei, a gentle and brave campus sweetheart who directly confessed to our MC; Song Daiying, a hot lady trying to charm her way into our MC's heart; Liu Mei, an adorkable yet mysterious student who seems to pretend to be silly; And Ms. Jun, who accidentally shares a flat with our MC.

"Seems like my civilian life is as complicated as my past missions..."

(Source: Mangatoon)

title.romaji: Wo Zai Xiuxian Shijie Chao Jiu Wan Wu
title.native: 我在修仙世界朝九晚五

description:
Hua Qingyuan, dies suddenly due to overworking on a ‘996’ schedule. However, he finds himself transported to a fantasy world to become the top disciple of the Qingyun Sword Sect. Determined not to repeat the mistakes of his past life, he resolves to work no more than eight hours a day and not waste even a minute on extra cultivation. He becomes an anomaly in the sect, relaxing under a tree, enjoying his life after work, even as other disciples practiced day and night. Nevertheless, his unmatched talent in swordsmanship still makes him a formidable presence. So he keeps getting requests for help from his fellow disciples, his master, and even the sect leader himself. But no matter if it's a sneak attack from the demonic sect or a challenge from other young masters, Hua Qingyuan remained resolute: do not bother me outside working hours!!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

One was the demon king, and the other was the God of Spring. As a pair of lovers, they were forced to part in their previous life. When they meet again in this life, the God of Spring is now a mortal swordsman and has lost his past memories. A twist of fate finds them on opposite races of a conflict. When lovers become enemies, can the demon king's love warm the heart of the unapproachable swordsman?

(Source: WebComics)

Note: Chapter count includes 2 seasonal prologues and 9 extras chapters.

Nirvanic Rebirth, the Demon Emperor is reborn! A foolish Prince Consort abruptly transforms into a Demon Emperor, dual cultivating the Demonic Secret Art and Primeval Secret Art, demons frightening the world! Stepping on vile characters, taking sworn brothers under his command, embracing beauties and accomplishing the strongest Demon Dao Path!

The pure of heart Ah Dai was born into a live of thievery. One day, he was taken away by Gliss, a powerful alchemist to make a god instrument. His new fate leads him to save the life of the country's top assassin “King of Hell”. To repay him, Ah Dai is taken away by the assassin to receive intensive training. What will become of Ah Dai? Ah Dai is a very kind and soft-hearted kid. His favourite thing is steamed bun and his favourite girl is Ya Tou. But steamed buns are always in shortage and Ya Tou left him, never coming back. "What is wrong and what is right", even someone as silly as Ah Dai sometimes asks this question, especially when he was forced by a gangster to pickpocket others on the street. One day, he got a money bag full of amethyst coins from a passerby, and the coins started to talk and shine with mysterious light. "Do you want to go with me?" That rather strange handsome passerby asked him. "Can I have steamed buns everyday." "Yes, you can." And our Ah Dai joined this mysterious magician to start his fantasy cultivation journey...and eat steamed buns everyday...

(Source: Mangatoon)

title.romaji: Shen Wei E Yi Nü Pei De Wo Yang Cheng Bingjiao Nüzhu Hen Zhengchang Ba?!
title.native: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？!

description:
Jiang Yang is a game artist out gathering material for the game she was working on when she fell off a cliff and transmigrated into a world of immortal cultivation. She diligently cultivated her way to immortality, and she was about to ascend and return to her own world when a mysterious glitch caused her to transmigrate again, this time into a world of magic (like the start of an otome game). She met the main heroine, who was being bullied by the villainess at the Magic Academy, and that was when Jiang Yang realized that this is the world of the game she was working on? Now her fate is tied to Xin Lu, the heroine of the game. Jiang Yang thought that if she just beat the game, she can finally return home. But as the story progressed, she remembered all the over-the-top plotlines made up by the lousy writers, and she can't stand seeing Xin Lu suffer through it anymore. So she steps in and helps Xin Lu reject the playboy prince, teaches her cultivation techniques to fight off the bullies, and even seduces Xin Lu herself! As they become more intimate with each other, Jiang Yang starts to realize that her fate might intertwine with Xin Lu more than she realized…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Note: Includes one extra chapter.

After transmigrating, Ye Xuan chanced upon the Devouring System. Not only could he devour everything, he could also exchange things for bloodlines, martial arts, divine weapons, medicinal pills, and all sorts of treasures… A ridiculously broken system! “Don’t you dare mess with me. Want to try me? I’ll swallow that precious divine sword of yours!”

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Eugenie Lin, a high school student, unexpectedly crosses paths with the infamous Juan Shen at his tattoo parlor. Little does she know, fate has a plan. As the new school year begins, they find themselves seated side-by-side, revealing a softer side to Juan beneath his tough exterior.

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wulin Zhi Wang De Tui Yin Shenghuo
title.english: The Top Martial Artist's Retired Life

description: Starting today, I retire. But what should I do...... I don't have any talents, and I don't have the brains for business. My only talent is to defeat enemies all over the world. What a pain......

Special forces operative Wang Sheng was transported into the world of Yuanhun. There, he was possessed by a useless spirit: a carp, becoming an infamous trash in the world of Origin Spirits! In this world filled with experts, Wang Sheng used the knowledge he acquires to surmount all difficulties, even finding a way to evolve his useless spirit carp! From a sparrow to a Phoenix, from a carp to a Dragon! In this sinister and vicious world full of disputes, he will make his own path towards success!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Note: Includes three extra chapters.

A collection of BL stories that take place in a world with six genders.

Xiaomi, an omega, has been in love with the popular Jiang Xi, an alpha, since middle school... Even though they both changed over the years as they graduated and started living different lives, Xiaomi's feelings have not changed. It is painful to experience an unrequited love for 10 years, is it not? But what will happen when Xiaomi brings an intoxicated Jiang Xi home to his bed after their university's graduation party, knowing that Jiang Xi will soon be going abroad?

title.romaji: Ni De Weidao You Dian Tian
title.english: Your Scent is a Little Sweet

description:
Due to past psychological trauma, Tang Chao never developed secondary sexual characteristics, so she lived life as a beta working as a magazine model. After an accidental one-night stand with an omega, she found out that she felt strongly attracted to that omega. The next day she met a new colleague Li Zhixu, who seemed to be that omega. But... this Li Zhixu was suppose to be a beta?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Zhou Wei Qing, who was born in the Heavenly Bow Empire without a Power Jewel or Elemental Jewel, was treated as a joke. He is the son of the empire's Admiral Zhou who is a Nine Jeweled Heavenly Jewel Master.
An opportunity arose when he swallowed the Dark Demon Tiger God's Life Bead from another world. From then on, he embarked on a road of adventure, finding true love and finally becoming a Twelve Jeweled Heavenly Jewel Master!

Meng Chuan is the youngest son of his elite clan who has grasped the skills of swordsmanship at 15. Diligent and determined, he vows to reach the level of Divine Demon to avenge his mother's death. But little does Chuan know that his clan is in danger of falling from grace which he must save.

(Source: INKR, edited)

Chu Feng was a murderer. When he was on a mission, he failed and was hunted to a corner, so he jumped down a cliff. After his death, he entered the underworld. He spent 500 years and became the most powerful in the underworld. He became the most powerful demon called Demon King. 500 years in the underworld, his only desire is to return to earth and meet his lover, and manages to destroy the pearl of death in order to return to earth. But on earth, it turns out that there is a little girl who has been waiting for him...

title.romaji: Wo You Yi Zuo Moshi Dixiacheng

description:
A female CEO? Come help me manage the shelter. A female special-forces soldier? Then you can be the chief of security. In these post-apocalyptic times, professions like like CEOs, models, secretaries, electricians, and programmers all became useless. But don’t be afraid. Come to my underground shelter, bring your talents, and you'll be put to good use!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Lingzhi is the long-lost princess of the Spirit Clan, known and feared for their prophetic abilities. To find her missing people, she must climb the social ladder in the human empire, while many resent her rapid rise to power. Her efforts have caught the attention of the mercurial emperor, who is controlled by the empress dowager, as well as a mysterious silver-haired man who haunts Lingzhi’s dreams. Can she learn (and thwart) their cutthroat ways so that she may claim her rightful throne?

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Eyi Shaoye Bu Xiang Yao Pomie Jieju
title.english: Evil Young Master Doesn’t Want a Bad Ending
title.native: 恶役少爷不想要破灭结局

description:
Evil noble young master Roya Arkad regains his memories of his past life at first sight of his godsister. He realizes that this is the world of a galgame he once played, and he is a main antagonist that the protagonist will definitely face in the main plot. How can he evade his bad ending? Roya awakens a system and starts his journey of survival.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Mou Tian Chengwei Wang de Nüer

description:
After an accident, Hana Lee is reborn as Laurel, a commoner girl living in the Leuven Empire. The notorious Emperor selects Laurel as the princess, as she is believed to be the chosen one. A prophecy said the chosen girl would save his only son, Prince Vincent, from a disaster. Laurel is gifted with extraordinary ability, but will she be able to rescue the prince from the catastrophe, as foretold?

(Source: Pocket Comics)

Have you ever seen a servant who is more arrogant than noble? Have you seen a servant who is more arrogant than a monk? Have you seen a servant who is more domineering than an emperor? Have you ever seen a servant who hooked up with her own lady? Have you ever seen a servant who is in trouble with the alluring city?
As a modern man, Xu Feng has always been intoxicated with wind and moon, and has become a dog and horse, but because of an accident, he has reborn into another world, and he has become a servant. Messing with Ms. Xiao's family, ganging up with the rich ladies, scourge thousands. Achieve a generation of family!

title.romaji: Youzai Shou Shi: Zhong Zhong Tian, Sheng Sheng Zai
title.native: 悠哉兽世：种种田，生生崽

description:
As soon as she fell into the world of beastmen, a leopard forcibly took her back to his home. Indeed, Bai Jingjing is at a complete and utter loss. The males in this world are all handsome beyond compare, while the women are all so horrid that even the gods shudder at their sight. As a first-rate girl from the modern world (she's even a quarter Russian) Bai Jingjing finds herself sitting at the center of a harem filled with beautiful men -- at the very peak of existence.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Wangyou: Yinwei Tai Lang, Wo Cheng Le Quan Fu Gongdi!
title.native: 网游:因为太浪,我成了全服公敌!

description:
He thought he'd be beating up on newbies, but he didn't realize he'd selected Ultra-Hard Mode. This is a ridiculously difficult game. If you don’t have the skills, you won’t even be able to get out of the starting village!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Weile Rang Xuejie Guqi Ganjin Wo Jueding Xianchu Wo Ziji
title.english: For Her, I'd Give It My All
title.native: 为了让学姐鼓起干劲，我决定献出我自己

description:
Jiaxia is a new editor for the comic company BliBli. Ever since high school she has admired comic artist Taiji-sensei, who inspired her to pursue a career in the 2D world. Although Taiji-sensei has a bad reputation in the publishing world for being lazy and troublesome, Jiaxia is determined to be her new editor. But will she be able to get Taiji-sensei to finally get motivated to draw a new comic?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Include eight specials and extras chapters.

Dong Ze was an ordinary high school boy born in Huangshi District in Leigu country. He was blessed with a leveling system that allowed him to overcome his humble beginnings and rose up in rank to become the commander of the eastern warzone. He will lead the fight to drive the rune beasts back through the space-time wormhole and restore peace to Earth.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

A top killer from the 21st century accidentally became a loser empress through time travel, and got an extremely handsome husband and a cute genius baby. She gradually figured out that to dominate the imperial harem, she must hone her skills both at cooking and at pleasing the emperor. With her pot and spoon and assisted by a spirit chef system providing her with handy equipment any time, she finally swept the emperor off his feet, took hold of the harem, and reached the pinnacle of her life!

(Source: WebComics)

Adapted from a novel of the same name by Bear, “City of Sanctuary”! “Fantasy”-a popular VR game that sweeps the world. Some people found out that they can enter the game through another way, which makes it possible for them to bring the items and skills they obtained in the game back to reality. But at the same time, dying in the game would mean actually dying in real life. Fang Tian has been in the game world for more than ten years. When he returned to reality, The world he knew has completely changed.

title.romaji: Kui Cheng Shoufu Cong Youxi Kaishi
title.english: Losing Money to Be a Tycoon

description: Finding himself back in time 10 years ago, though technically an almost parallel world in 2009, Pei Qian got a system where he gets money to run his business. The funds for business and personal use are separated. After a set period, he can earn his personal funds according to how much his business funds he has left. The catch? Pei Qian earns more when he makes a loss in his business funds. Happily thinking how easy it would be, with many failed start-ups proving a point, Pei Qian founded his company Tengda and achieved financial freedom through the losses. Unfortunately, fate has other plans for him.

title.romaji: Zheli De Meizi Dou Xiang Gonglüe Wo?!
title.native: 这里的妹子都想攻略我?!

description:
After witnessing a once-in-a-century blood moon event, Zhang Hao loses consciousness and awakens to a world turned upside down. Gender norms and beliefs have been completely reversed, where women are now expected to pay dowries and propose to men. Women have taken on the role of breadwinners, while men are expected to be stay-at-home husbands. In this society, women without cars or houses face social stigma and struggle to find partners. It has become the norm for women to pursue men, while men making the first move on women is considered taboo. "I won't depend on women to support me! I will reclaim my true masculinity as a real man!" Follow Zhang Hao's journey as he navigates an inverted world filled with enticing challenges and temptations, all while striving to hold onto his identity as a man.

(Source: Webnovel)

Ladies and gentleman, place your bets! In the first corner we have the Pea Princess. In life, she was Jasmine, a workaholic, but now she must find a way to defeat her ruthless opponent in the second corner, Princess Vivian~! Will Jasmine be able to fend off her nemesis and protect her only friend, Princess Hélène? Or will their friendship get tangled in a web of lies as well? So much for "rest in peace," HA! The afterlife is nothing but a cutthroat battle of wits rife with sabotage.

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Jiuming! Zhege Mao Tongzhi de Shijie
title.native: 救命！这个猫统治的世界

description:
Nora didn’t want to die. All she wanted, was to save a cat from drowning. When she drowned instead, she woke up in another world: Catsrule, a world ruled by cats! These aren’t your normal kitties though, they walk on two legs and look like us but we’re their pets! It’s not all milk and catnip however, soon Nora is captured and adopted by a cute cat boy who hates humans named Caesar. Can Nora return to her normal life or will she spend nine lives as a cat’s pet?

(Source: Tapas)

Includes three side stories.

title.romaji: Zhengge Xiu Zhen Jie de Meizi Dou Xiang Zhua Wo
title.english: All the Girls in the Cultivation World Want a Piece of Me
title.native: 整个修真界的妹子都想抓我

description:
I, Xia Yi, have an Innate Tao Body that allows me to understand myriad methods and improve any girl's constitution as long as I dual cultivate with them. But what happens when you're someone with an Innate Tao Body and haven't become a powerhouse yet? Naturally, you'll be kidnapped and serve as a cultivation furnace for your kidnapper!

(Source: Manga Bilibili, translated)

The life of an assassin is many things: dangerous, lonely, short... and above all, ill-suited for love. Those were the rules Joaquin agreed to and accepted without question until the fateful day a young man named Davion saved his life. But the life of an assassin is no fairy tale. In an odd twist of fate, Joaquin ended up ripping away everything Davion held dear, and has since taken it upon himself to train the young man on how to get his revenge against everyone involved... including Joaquin himself.

(Source: Tapas)
About a girl accepting her identity amidst constant homophobia.

What I did is just because I love you. You will be "imprisoned" for life by my love. He, appeared like a demon in my dream, is the Law. An imaginary baby tie him, a paranoid but strong and powerful emperor and her, a poor cartoonist. On the bed of love, in the study room of passion and in the kitchen of desires... she has no right to struggle. Just because he is called Ou Gong...

(Source: INKR)

A girl goes to the seaside on her class field trip and accidentally meets a mysterious handsome boy, after talking, she hears a dramatic story about a bird and fish, finally the kind girl decides to help the bird fulfill its last wish.

(Source: Batoto)

title.romaji: Wo Bei Boss Zou Da de

description:
Once a hardcore gamer, 75 is now a full-fledged hero inside his favorite game! After one too many all-nighters, he dies of a heart attack at his computer but finds himself reborn in the middle of a boss fight. Unequipped and lacking the skills to survive on his own, 75 uses his smarts to convince Devo the Demon King to take him under his wing. Now 75 is on an epic quest to help the Demon King stay in power! To get there, 75 has to level up and conquer all his enemies, but if he doesn’t, this might just be his last life...

(Source: Tapas)

When the God of Destruction makes a return to the time when he was betrayed by his loved one and humiliated by his enemies, he is not going to swallow the insults! With the All-heavenly Stone, he was able to refine pills and weapons and set up formations. He strikes down on evil deeds in the city and climb to the top step by step.

(Source: MangaToon)

Swords and winds cover the sun and the moon, mastering the glory of Immortals. There are six billion people in the world, but I am arrogant. The Emperor of the Immortal World is reborn in the bustling city of lights and wines. Beautiful police, delicate stars, glamorous ladies, exotic princesses... From then on, a former urban loser, turned over completely, and embarked on a peerless road that would make the world feel horrified and provoke the beauty of the world. "The world laughs at me, the world laughs at me, you see, after the ages...

title.romaji: E Long Zhuan Sheng, Fu Chou Cong Wu Sui Kaishi!
title.native: 恶龙转生，复仇从五岁开始！

description:
I was originally the apex predator that stood at the top of the world—the legendary red dragon. For thousands of years, my countless brethren have been murdered by humans, and revenge slowly turned into my only reason for living!In the end, however, I failed. On the day of the final battle with the humans, I was slain, and died with vengeance burning in my heart...If there were another life, I would definitely avenge my kind!If there were another life, I would make those filthy humans pay for what they've done!If there were another life... Huh?I got reincarnated as a feeble human child?!

(Source: Webnovel)

A handsome emperor gets too close to an embarrassed queen, resulting in them falling into a pool together. Then they swap their bodies. The way to swap back is unknown. The most important thing is that the emperor is quite angry now!! Before everything comes back to normal, the emperor has to deal with his mean imperial concubines that he never knows and the queen has to mediate between those ministries...

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Bing Bushi Wo Xiang Dang Mishu
title.english: It's Not As If I Wanted to Dress Like a Woman

description:
For a tripled salary, Lin Zicheng, a straight man put on a woman's dress to go to work. He just did not expect Gu Fang, a CEO who never liked women would fall in love at first sight with his cross-dressed self!

Wasn't it rumored that the chief's orientation is questionable, since he never approached women?

"Where's your modesty, chief?!"

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Notes:
- Chapter count includes 7 extras
- Originally published under the title Bing Bushi Wo Xiang Chuan Nü Zhuang (并不是我想穿女装, It's Not Like I Want to Dress Like a Woman), which was later changed to Bing Bushi Wo Xiang Dang Mishu (并不是我想当秘书, It's Not Like I Want to be a Secretary)

Elias Bai, Captain of God's Legion, stood as the world's strongest Awakener until a brutal betrayal claimed his entire squad. Dying as a mere pawn of the ruling elite, he suddenly wakes up twenty years in the past—back in middle school, long before his awakening. With his loved ones still alive, Elias refuses to let history repeat itself. To save his team, exact vengeance on the traitor, and overthrow the corrupt system, he must walk a lonely road to unrivaled power.

(Source: WEBTOON)

Shen Yuan was just making fun of the plot of a trashy novel when he was transferred into the book's world and he found himself the evil villain. To change his doomed fate, he'll have to become friends with the novel's protagonist. But will things turn out as well as he hoped...?

title.romaji: Shen Ciyu Wo Zhezhong Ganga De Chaonengli Jiujing You She Me Yong?
title.english: God Gave Me This Awkward Superpower, What is it for?
title.native: 神赐予我这种尴尬的超能力究竟有什么用？

description:
What a strange dream... "Ding..." habitually picked up the phone to turn off the alarm clock, but the phone turned into a beautiful girl with a puff? I understand... My superpower is... I can turn the first item touched by my right hand into a beautiful girl after waking up every day!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

A bizarre murder case shattered Lan Zhiqing's sweet and peaceful life. Her forgotten past turned into living nightmares, coming for her step by step… Lan Zhiqing realized, to her surprise, that the most dangerous threat just might be the person lying next to her?!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Note: Chapter count includes one prologue and one bonus chapter.

If I want something, the heavens better have it. If I don't want something, it shall not exist! This is a story which originates between the Eighth and Ninth Mountains, a world in which “My fate is to seal the heavens like a demon!”

(Source: Wutopia Comics)

Using the Black Technology System, the protagonist enters a world of knowledge, where he improves his learning efficiency by a factor of one billion! He becomes the smartest human in existence, gets rich using his super-brain... and experiences the loneliness of being a leader.

(Source: Webnovel)

Lord Lide, the laziest ruler in history, will do evil and wicked things to recruit followers! The blonde-haired, strong, and silent lady-knight, the half-demon sorceress, the gender-neutral secretary… he'll take anyone!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Note: The chapter count includes a prologue and an extra chapter.

Duan Yun, an ace warrior who is good at nothing but martial arts, comes back to modern world. He gives wicked playboys and villains what they deserve, and at the same time, gets involved with pretty sisters, a hot policewoman, and an elegant CEO..

(Source: Webnovel)

Liu Shiqing is a playful daughter born to a family of armed escorts. One time while sneaking out on another one of her adventures, she finds herself kidnapped by bandits. Moments before it all seemed to be over, Xian Chan Nu suddenly shows up and swoops her off her feet, saving her and stealing her heart. This is a story of humans and demons, masters and slaves; a tale of revenge and a tale of loyalty only beginning to unfold.

(Source: Bilibili Comics, edited)

Note: Includes one prologue chapter.

A dramatic, hilarious and timid girl caught the eye of a grim looking man. She keeps her cool despite being frightened. On the other hand, this man actually has a completely different side of him! Let's witness as this hilarious love story unfolds between two distinctly different characters.

(Source: Webcomics)

title.english: Dragon Amulet: The Emperor and The Country

description: Vast land, unpredictable future, chaos, dragons and python will rise, who is the dragon, who is the python? or sentient beings, becoming dragons? Courts, martial arts, world beyond the immortals, generations of a thousand, barbarians, demons, monsters, ancient witchcraft, strength of a thousand, entangled by each other, and meet by fate.

A Xue, an unsuccessful artist whose manhua was about to be axed, transmigrated into the world of his own manhua by chance. In his comic, the Pandora Continent was on the verge of destruction due to the growing power of the Demon Lord, which put A Xue in danger as well. Facing imminent doom, A Xue was given a second chance at survival, with the condition that he takes over the hero’s role from the beginning and redo the entire story. If he fails to "create" a more interesting story-line, then A Xue and the entire world will be destroyed…

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Wo De Hougong Quan Shi Fanpai Monü
title.english: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains
title.native: 我的后宫全是反派魔女

description:
I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Gongjue Xiaojie Bu Xiang Bei Chong Huai
title.english: The Daughter of Duke Doesn't Want to Be Spoiled

description:
Yvette Winchworth is worshipped like a deity for her grace and beauty. Little do the people know, she's spoiled to the core and can hardly feed herself much less fight for the throne that's now up for grabs! Desperate to keep her away from conflict, her mother ships her away to a group of mercenaries who can keep her safe. Can this spoiled noble last amongst a group of cold-blooded soldiers?

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Chongsheng Bu Dang Tianwang, Wo Duzi Kejin Shengji
title.native: 重生不当舔王，我独自氪金升级

description:
Han Liee, who didn't do well in the college entrance examination, got frustrated in love, and achieved nothing after graduation, prayed to God that if he could start over again...

With the advent of the consumption system, he actually went back to the year when he was 18! No superior skills? He could upgrade his skills with points! Too average in appearance? He could shape his face with points! After the time travel, he taught a rich guy who picked on him a lesson and captured the hearts of some popular pretty girls... Let's see how Han Liee would rise from the ashes and become a top-tier man after his rebirth.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Ta De Shan, Ta De Hai

description:
Chi Tang and You Yu are both shunned outcasts in Year 1 Class 2 of high school. They are desk-mates, roommates, and each other's salvation, keeping each other warm. Their relationship gradually grow, from just a feeling into something unforgettable, an epic story of young love.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Xiao He, a famous player in an online game, once defeated a female thief in the game. Surprisingly, the female thief is a former top-class e-sports player! What makes her end up like this? The two strangers always come across each other without knowing it. What will happen to them in the digital life?

(Source: Pocket Comics)

Note: Originally considered complete with "final chapter" published in 2021-05-12. An epilogue was published in 2022 and a third season was announced for continuation starting Jan. 2023.

Nothing is impossible with the system in my hands! I want the most beautiful woman! I want to be the most powerful person! I want to have the noblest of statuses! I aim to conquer everything under the sky!

title.english: Seres's Resolve: The Battle for Humanity

description:
I'll never stop fighting tooth and nail to safeguard humanity and all people under heaven. It's time to power up the system once more, ramping up its capabilities to meet this crucial challenge!

(Source: Webnovel)

No one knows there are cultivators deep in the mountains, once only travelers and heavens know! A nameless soldier Leng Fan, comes down from the mountain to the world, to settle his karma, but why......there is so much harem!?

title.english: A Princess's Guide to Saving Dragons

description:
Before the overworked Yumi Clarke took her last breath, she wished to be reborn as a fabulously wealthy person. So imagine her delight when she awoke in a video game as a princess! In true princess fashion, she gets rescued by a handsome stranger. But life in the castle is no ball when her brother is plotting to overthrow the emperor, a tyrant known for waging a war against dragons. Oh, and the stranger? His name’s Qastor Ace… the dragon prince! Can Yumi bring peace to these factions or does she need to learn how to reword her wishes better?

(Source: Tapas)

Troy Qi was a young MMA world champion, crowned the strongest man in the world after a career-defining match. But his reign abruptly ends after he saves the life of troubled high school student Tori He, as she accidentally falls from a rooftop balcony. When Troy awakens, he finds that he died... and his soul has transferred into Tori’s body! Now the world’s strongest fighter must face his greatest battle yet: being a female fighter in high school.

(Source: Tapas)

In the hospital convenience store, the blind Bai Xiaoxiao met a girl who smelled of sweets. Their story unfolds in the hospital filled with the scent of disinfectant, as they become dear and help to heal each other.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Renowned for his illustrious military achievements, Jing Shao is unexpectedly betrayed and falls from grace, finding himself abandoned by all but one: his male spouse, whom he had neglected for over a decade. Given another chance by the universe, he vows to turn over a new leaf and win back the love of his husband. However, this journey of love and redemption is fraught with challenges, teaching Jing Shao the true meaning of commitment and the strength of enduring affection.

(Source: Tapas)

Have you ever had your dreams laughed at?

In a society that values magic above all, Dawn Hill is accepted into the most prestigious magic academy on all five continents. Although she is full of expectations, Dawn is categorized as the school’s “worst student.” Facing ridicule, belittlement, and exclusion, can this stubborn little witch fight back?

(Source: Comikey)

When I woke up, I found that my shut-in self had been transported to another world -- along with my house! I've had a beautiful female neighbor ever since, and she lives in the Spider Cave with her six adorable little sisters. She's pure, and she's determined to get married. Meanwhile, the beautiful lady ghosts from the Lanruo Temple often stop by to eat spicy boiled fish... And sometimes, I even invite the Stone Goddess over to play LoL. Ah... my life is so fulfilling!

(Source: Webnovel)

Liu Mo went through ten years of strenuous cultivation until he formed an infant immortal body, and only then was he ready to leave the mountain and head out into the mortal world. But... "I only just formed an immortal body at 18, but there are people who have already ascended to heaven by age 8. I must not have much talent at cultivation!"

"This world seems awfully scary, there are powerful folks everywhere..."

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Lin Xiu returned from Xiandao, swaying the masters of each road with a proud attitude. With immense medical knowledge of both the spiritual world and the Physical World. Watch as Lin Xiu solve problems for the everyday life, and the supernatural. What? someone is making trouble? Not satisfied? Are you someone important? Screw you then, i step on people like you just for fun, money? power? what does that gotta do with cleaning out the garbage?

It all started with a whale, whose cultivation was all about swallowing things. This was a fantasy world crowded with spiritual monsters. Fan Lingxiao, the chief of Sky Vagabond, grew a little catfish into an all-devouring whale and became a world-famous spirit master. However, the whale somehow failed in a combat, and turned into a cruel zombie whale which swallowed Fan Lingxiao. When he woke up, everything had changed...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Fei Wei Jiu Qing: Shenyi Xiao Jiao Fei

description:
After losing her mother and her own life, Jiuqing gets a chance to make things right! Now she’ll stop at nothing to uncover the truth and to save her beloved mother. No longer playing the part of the dutiful daughter blindly following orders or the mild girl preparing to be an obedient wife, she’s learning medicine, the healing arts, and what it means to fall in love. As she discovers more in a few months than she had in her last lifetime, where will this newfound fire within her lead to?

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes four extra chapters.

One day, countless dungeons suddenly appeared in the world, and humanity ushered in the "dungeon era". Adesalai, the boss of an abyss-level dungeon, was killed by human adventurers via despicable means. Vowing revenge, he was reincarnated as a weak adventurer, but he activated an exclusive Boss System. Using the system's cheating powers to conquer dungeons and becoming its master, he started on the road of revenge.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Nowadays, traveling to Isekai is no longer something special, but what if he's got this perfect timing of landing? He falls right in front of a sect leader who is desperate to find his daughter a fake husband. From traveling to a forced wedding, this is how his path of cultivation starts...

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Wo Zai Mofa Dalu Jian Li Gongye Diguo
title.english: I Dominate a Magical Continent with an Industrial Revolution
title.native: 我在魔法大陆建立工业帝国

description:
After meeting an untimely death due to overwork, Larsen Jin reawakens as Ren Edgar, a spoiled young master, on the magical continent of Eldoria. Gifted with a special game system and a territory to rule over, the new Ren will do what he can to start an industrial revolution and bring an end to the continent’s era of corruption!

(Source: Tappytoon)

The college freshman Zhao Shi met Luo Lili, a cute little devil of an upperclassman, at the new-student welcoming ceremony. Luo Lili happens to be a live-streamer on Bilibili. And from now on, she will tease Zhao Shi and broadcast his "tormented" college life every day.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Season 1:
Ye Zi seems like a delinquent, but he's really a sensitive crybaby scarred by domestic violence. His childhood playmate Gao Hang had lost his parents when he was young. When they met again, Ye Zi wanted to be friends like their childhood days, only to be rejected by Gao Hang. Can they reconcile their emotions, and find the happiness that have been missing from their lives?

Season 2:
The loner Lu Qian poured all his emotions into music. One day, he met up with his online songwriting partner Su Ci. Two people with different backgrounds and opposite personalities grow closer to each other as they spend more time together.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Xiao Yao, a young lady of a wealthy, respectable family in the 21st century, thought her life had ended when she passed away due to a deadly illness. However, she opened her eyes and found herself in the body of a manhua's villainess, Princess Abella.

Despite not having any magic powers nor capabilities, the pompous and vicious Princess caused countless people to suffer from her heinous acts. Her greed for the throne even led her to murder her own father, thus sentencing her to death while the protagonists of the manhua lived happily ever.

With a second chance at life in such a healthy body, Xiao Yao will not sit back idly while the Princess' impending doom befalls her again. This time, she will strive to change the Princess' fate, and along the way, will attempt to discover her hidden secrets and of those around her...

A boy named Hao Qi accesses a hacked game account which pulls him into the world of 'A Hero's Journey'. Although he is a part of the game's world now, he retains the unfair advantages granted by the hacking program, allowing him to breeze through this world of magic, monsters, and martial arts. With cherished friends and intrepid companions, he blazes a trail through the lands.

(Source: Webnovel)

Was it a dream? Young, brilliant Ivy wakes up in her family’s home after weeks in ancient Egypt, transported there by a magical bracelet. She can still see him—Bifitu, the charismatic prince, who became one of Egypt's greatest Pharaohs. And she was Nefertari, whom history would record as his beloved queen. But something had changed. Bifitu is now all but forgotten, the archives noting he had died just two years into his reign. She has to return, to set things right... even if it means her life.

(Source: Tapas)

The 18-year-old He You is an incoming college freshman who just moved to her college city, where she had an unpleasant encounter with a strange guy on her very first day. Upset, she wandered to a fragrant flower shop at a street corner, where she was welcomed in by its beautiful and warm-hearted shopkeeper. Little did she expect that she’d find the same kind of magical flower from her childhood… as well as the unpleasant strange guy! Is he the “magical” boy who helped her in her childhood?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Jue Shi Tian Cai Xi Tong

description:
I'm Xiao Luo, an ordinary wage-earner, but then I got this powerful System. The knowledge and skills that take you years to acquire will be at my command at the price of nothing but virtual points. Come and witness Xiao Luo's journey to grand success and enjoy his thrilling adventure!

(Source: Webnovel)

Three years ago, the operation leader Jiang Ting made an error in judgment, a chain explosion occurred at the scene, and there were heavy casualties in the unit. Three years later, he, supposed to have died in duty, returned to the world, doing everything he could to bring forth the bloody, bizarre truth. Heroic souls resting in death, the ones behind it all closely approaching, sentiments built fighting side by side in blood and fire…

"I used all of my luck in this life, to exchange for you. Thank you for bringing me back to this world, Yan Xie."

title.romaji: Shen Hao Zhi Tian Jiang Xi Tong

description: Three years into his career, Xiao Ge experienced a lot of insults and insults. But the kindness and beauty of his wife made it difficult to give up. Finally, as soon as I awoke the Shenhao system, I began to survive.

After years undercover it can be hard to regain your real identity... Lanshan’s a cop who just emerged from his work infiltrating the Golden Triangle’s big boss for years. Integrating back into regular life as a cop is disorienting, and Lanshan can’t shake loose these strange memories of murder and pain. And now there’s a handsome forensic artist he’s forced to work with... just who is this guy who seems irresistibly intertwined with his life? If he can’t trust his mind, can he trust his body?

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes the prologue chapter.

title.romaji: Huangdao Yu Sheng Zhi Shikong Liulang Ji
title.english: Desert Island Survival with the Ladies
title.native: 荒岛余生之时空流浪纪

description:
A desert island with ancient beasts, modern humans, future technology as well as chaos in space and time. This is the place where the rapid development of desert island civilization takes place, from the stone age, the age of energy to the age of electricity. Living on an uninhabited desert land and starting up a system, Qin Tian tries to survive by starting from scratch. A school belle, a blonde-haired lady, and a ballistic loli - I want all of them. Whether it’s taming the golden eagle, snaring the king of a wolf pack, or making a python retreat, I am in charge of this desert island!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Huang Nü De Sheng Cun Fa Ze

description:
After being killed by her lover, the cultivator Qingchen is horrified to learn she's been reborn in an even crueler world than the last—one where she's destined to be sacrificed by her father to ensure her spoiled brother's safety. Now residing in the powerless body of a child, she has only one course of action: butter up her new father to ensure survival!

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Each official translation splits the chapter count up and does not match the Chinese release.
The Korean translation has 256 chapters, the Thai translation has 227 chapters, and the English translation has 240 chapters.

Modern man Yang Rui transmigrated to a world where it is dominated by immortal cultivators. After he unexpectedly rises to become the Dean of the Celestial Athenaeum – an academy for cultivators, Yang Rui, who possesses the highest martial strength in this world, decides to recruit disciples and bring this Athenaeum to its pinnacle.

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wo De Jiejie Shi Da Mingxing
title.english: My Sister is a Big Star

description:
What? My older sister, who's pretty but lazy and abused me for fun, was born from different parents than me? What? She wants to become a superstar? Fortunately, I have a System to help cheat her way to stardom. What? My parents asked me to help her find a boyfriend? I’m still single, too, why don’t you guys care about me? ! The System suggested that my sister and I are quite compatible, and the System can help pair us up. No way! Being her brother is already bad enough!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Jiang Hao Yi, a high school freshman accidentally becomes the object of affection for the school's most popular girls after mistakenly sharing a chocolate cake that belongs to the god of love with them. With a magical love spell at play, Jiang Hao Yi finds himself juggling the affections of the school belle Zitong Xia, childhood friend Xueli Ouyang, athletic team leader Xuan Tang, and straight-A student Yuan Lin.

(Source: WebComics)

After his death, Chen Mo, a great Ascension Realm cultivator was reborn into his third year of high school. With his strength and memories of the past, he acts first and undoes the regrets he once had. Protecting his loved ones, crushing his enemies, destroying all schemes, and searching for the one who occupies his heart…

(Source: WebComics)

35 years ago, a new continent suddenly appeared in the middle of the Pacific Ocean. The new continent was named Magmell and is filled with unimaginable new species and riches. Magmell is heralded as the future for mankind. However there is a special force field surrounding the continent that deters foreign substances and technology from entering the continent. Thus humans entered the continent without any form of equipment. While some explorers have discovered incredible riches, others were stranded on the continent. The main character Yin You thus started an organisation with the sole purpose to rescue explorers that have been stranded on the continent, these rescuers are named Anglers. Using his Creator ability which allows him to control materials, Yin You explored deep into the heart of Magmell, uncovering the mysteries and cruelty that lie within the continent.

(Source: VoyceMe)

Note: Includes two extra chapters and the one-shot "Koroshiya Domino (殺し屋ドミノ)".

title.romaji: Bei Meinü Shifu Tiaojiao Cheng Sheng Di 99 Zhong Fangfa
title.native: 被美女师傅调教成圣的99种方法

description:
Lu Chen is the only heir to the kingdom of Lu. His ideal is to live an extravagant life, but reality makes him choose another path unwillingly. Five beauty masters descend from heaven, and their goal is to help this foppish prince to become the truly strong, who is expected to be a worthy candidate of the future king of kingdom Lu. Needless to say, this road to the supreme is probably way too much for most men... After all, how can an energetic young man ever hold himself back in front of so many beauties?

(Source: MangaToon)

Zhong Ma, an unlucky, basic college student, was cuckolded and struck by a lighting bolt! He thought he must be dead, but it turned to be a blessing in disguise. Since then, Zhong Ma got an upgrade system of mighty power, leading a successful life! Seeing through ability, teleportation, super fighting skills... just a piece of cake!

(Source: WebComics)

A gift from the heaven! Being possessed by another type of blood! All the celestial are frightened! Thousands of demons withdraw! A youth from the Eastern Continent, a female skull accompanying him, a story about resolving to be strong, and a legend which shakes heaven and moves the earth.

(Source: WebComics)

In a quiet mountain village, an old serpent accidentally swallowed a mysterious cultivator's elixir—and in that moment, its mind awakened. From then on, it embarked on a perilous and exhilarating journey toward immortality. In just ten short years, it defied the ravages of time, racing against fate itself. It hunted demons, vanquished evil spirits, and carved its path against the will of heaven. This is the legendary tale of a serpent's ascension—from the dust of the mortal world to the boundless skies beyond. A saga of transformation, courage, and defiance begins.

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wo De Zong Men Yi Dian Qiang

description:
Wang Feng finds himself transmigrated to the Xian Lan Continent. With the help of the powerful Zongmen System, he can summon all sorts of powerful minions to crush all opposition, leading his sect of immortals to unparalleled glory.

(Source: iQIYI, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Zai Guimi Youxi Zhong Kai Wushuang
title.native: 我在诡秘游戏中开无双

description:
In order the pay for his sister's surgery, Yu Xiaobei chose to enter a mysterious arena, where the final survivor will be given control of a major corporation. Unexpectedly, Yu Xiaobei found out that he was not the only the only challenger in the arena. Faced with treacherous competitors, and caged in with fearsome monsters, he is forced go through rounds of dangerous death games. To his delight, an unexpected gift gave him the confidence to believe that he can achieve his goal!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

The kind-hearted demon Neil dreams of living in the Human world when he's invited by his best friend, a vampire named Ira, to come to All Saints Street. His roommates in room 1031 are angles, mummies, and other "non-humans". Though he lives this tumultuous communal life with his roommates, within Neil lies the sleeping power...of the Demon King. Because of that power, a werewolf and Neil's demon brother also travel to the Human World. Will Neil be able to live a regular life in the Human World!?

It's just an ordinary tale about the ordinary lives of non-ordinary people.

(Source: Official Website)

Lovers have been dying in the cruelest way possible. Victims were sliced up into pieces, as if their bodies had exploded. Andrea and Ian were mere bystanders to this spectacle until a misunderstanding throws them into “Killing My Love” (KML)!

This is a game that uses love to fuel murder. Each team of pairs are given targets that they must kill… or else. All the while, a sadistic gamemaster watches from the shadows.

KML is a game with no end in sight, but one thing’s for sure… this hell is just getting started.

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes a prologue and two CNY bonus chapters.

Xin Yun is a loser in all the lives he was reborn into, always carefree instead of working hard.

Recently reborn, he finds himself in the past and with the chance to change the course of the future.
