Follow Xin Yun's epic journey of self-cultivation to become the true hero of his story.

(Source: INKR)

title.romaji: Dang E Yi Yu Dao Bing Jiao

description:
A yuri story about a yandere commoner × villainess lady. When the arrogant noblewoman He Sha tried to bully the commoner girl Qiao Lin out of jealousy, the yandere Qiao Lin turned the tables and took her first kiss instead. At first, He Sha just wanted to get back at Qiao Lin by playing pranks on her, but eventually it became an excuse to try to attract Qiao Lin's attention… The more the villainess tries to mess with the yandere, the more the yandere returns the favor, which only makes the villainess more tsundere.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Zhanhao is a dedicated cultivator who wishes to reach the top spiritual level before he turns 18. But all cultivators know that the road to leveling up is filled with ups and downs. Zhanhao's challenge comes one day when his father goes missing and he finds himself in "Mystery Land", where he can complete missions to gain special power to break through, but if he fails a mission, the punishment is death.

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wo, Chuang Zao Le Dushi Chuanshuo!

description:
When Cedric Reid finds himself in a parallel universe full of malevolent beings and comes into possession of a mystical notebook that has the power to turn whatever is written in it into reality, he decides to use it to punish the bad and absorb the powers of other supernatural entities. He later joins an elite group of special agents on a continuing mission to rid the world of evil.

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: He Jingling Gongzhu Qian Dinghunyue Le Wo Gai Zenmeban
title.english: What Should I Do If I've Signed a Marriage Contract with the Elven Princess
title.native: 和精灵公主签订婚约了我该怎么办

description:
Nan Yue was only in transit in the Kingdom of Elven. But she found that she signed a marriage contract with Ah Sha, the elven princess. Wait, I am a girl! How could I marry the princess? Wait, why am I wanted by the world after I sign the marriage contract?? To survive, I have to take the princess for a leap of faith:

"As expected of an uptown girl, you are pretty hot!
"Get lost, you perv!"!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes 20 bonus chapters

One is the immortal of heaven, while the other is a good-for-nothing cultivator rookie. When playing an online game encounters cultivation, everything is possible. How could a little rookie climb to the peak of the cultivation world one step at a time? Cute beast or beautiful man? Celestial or divine abilities? Pills or magic treasures? Even if the Great Way was ruthless and filled with dangers, the cute rookie will still break through the heavens!

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Nü Juren Ye Yao Tan Lian'ai

description:
As a lovely girl that is 1.8-meter-tall, Gao Ran falls for the icy president Zhang Yang whose height is 1.69 meters. Owing to self-abasement, however, she comes to grief time and time again. By chance, she is chosen by Zhang Yang as the candidate for the super model, and hence starts her career in the fashion world. Will her journey be smooth and plain?

(Source: Webcomics)

Note: Includes 10 extra chapters.

Su Yuan, a poor student, is accidentally admitted to Ogus Academy in order to release burden for the family. However, it is found that the college is set up to protect half-demons. The weak human begins must team with a half-demon pal (partner) for saving their lives. Su Yuan attracts many pal seekers due to his special smell and suffers various attacks at the same time. Until the day he saved a bloody fox, he found out...

(Source: Pocket Comics)

title.romaji: Dian Bo Ke Ji De Di Fang

description: Electromagnetic waves craft an illusionary world. Electromagnetic wave user Wei Xiaoran slips in and out of this world— saving others, as well as herself!

He is the devil himself in the eyes of villagers, the filial son in the eyes of his godparents, the best puppet craftman in the eyes of his followers, and the weirdo in the eyes of his peers——he is lu xiaoyi, the divine-punished one! "the body of divine punishment...This child is so outstanding, that even the gods are jealous of him." the blind saint said so, "...take his pants off and there is a birthmark like a black bead in his butt cheek..." He is lu xiaoyi, the most special one among ten billions of people..."but everyone has seen my butt now!" he cried...

(Source: MangaToon)

Jiang Chen transmigrates into a world of immortal cultivation, but it turns out he has no talent for cultivation at all, so he is destined to remain a mere mortal. What's that at the door? Oh, it's just the golden-winged roc that Jiang Chen happened to catch…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.english: Fall in the Night with You

description:
The sudden appearance of the amnesiac witch, Nyx, has brought a lot of changes to Ren Xi's life. They look out for each other and help each other grow. The spark of chemistry between them has quietly initiated. What Ren Xi wants is to help Nyx retrieve her lost memories. In the process, they discover an astonishing secret...

(Source: WebComics)

Li Qing, a small maintenance worker, was trying to live a honest life and doing a honest job. but he was inexplicably involved in a big family’s struggle. Whatsmore he had a terrifying secret of his own…

title.romaji: Mo Shou Jian Sheng Yi Jie Zongheng
title.english: Swordmaster of Warcraft: Invasion of the Otherworld

description: Internet-addicted boy Liu Feng accidentally crossed the world of sword and magic. He can’t use magic and doesn't have vindictiveness. He was ridiculed as a “demon martial artist”. He thought that if he awakened the skills of the swordsman profession in the game, he could cheat his finger on the peak of life, but was suspicious of life by local indigenous people. In a crisis-ridden continent, can he really survive and become a strong man who controls his own destiny?

title.romaji: Wo Zhi Xiang Bei Ge Wei Da Si
title.english: I Just Want to Be Killed By Everyone

description:
Yu Le, who died from overwork, reincarnated and obtained the essential golden finger for any main character - the system. However, Yu Le's struggling attribute directly made the slacker system say goodbye, and to reactivate the system, he must live a slacker life. To activate the system's eternal invincibility as soon as possible, Yu Le decided to seek death actively. But why couldn't he die no matter how hard he tried, and instead become stronger and stronger!?

(Source: Webnovel)

A transmigration out of the blue and he had reincarnated as the Eldest Crown Prince of the Eastern Dragon Palace, Ao Fan. He had to inherit the Eastern Dragon Palace and become the next Eastern Dragon King. At the time of the crisis, Ao Fan discovered the existence of the system and activated it which brings him lots of items and points! "Deities killing one another, fighting anyone I meet on the way. I'll defeat anyone who refuses to comply with me!" He swore to lead the Dragon Clan to rise again and contend for hegemony among the divine investitures!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Zheng Yan Hou, Wo De Dizi Cheng Le Nüdi Damotou?!
title.native: 睁眼后，我的弟子成了女帝大魔头？！

description:
After years of seclusion, Ye Shen has reached new heights in his cultivation, and he has achieved the immortal body. However! When he stepped out of his sanctum, he was dumbfounded by what he saw. His former top disciple is now an all-powerful empress of her own demonic sect, commanding scores of demonic cultivators who are about to hold a sacrificial ceremony. The second disciple is an infamously bloodthirsty assassin who will kill anyone for the right price… her hands stained with blood. The third disciple is a master of poisons, brewing up bugs and potions that can turn people into her puppets. Ye Shen, who had been sealed away for a hundred years, is most shocked to discover that… his name has been spread across the entire continent, known as the demonic master who inspires fear and loathing in all.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

By chance, the exorcist Xiaoyu was forced into a living arrangement with Heiyao, the succubus who killed her foster-father. But Heiyao seemed to have lost her memories!? Xiaoyu didn't trust Heiyao, so she decided to stay and keep an eye on her. Heiyao didn't mind, as she tried to tease and seduce Xiaoyu in order to feed her hunger… They might fight all the time, but they both know there are other dangers lurking, with whoever was behind Xiaoyu's father's murder, whoever sealed away Heiyao's memories, and something else…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Neng Kan Dao Cheng Gong Lu

description:
Bai Wu was a loser in life until he suddenly gained the ability to see the success rate of everything around him? Since then, he has made himself into a millionaire? Beautiful women are throwing themselves at him? Knowing the success rate is the key to reaching the pinnacle of life!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Wan Le Ah! Nüdi De Ruanfan Zhangfu Ju Ran Wu Di
title.native: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

description:
The Earthling Xiao Tian was on the verge of death when he was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan of the Great Yan Dynasty to become her consort, and he was offered the "Strongest Supremacy System." But Xiao Tian only wants to be a lazy husband for the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the System, but he didn't expect that the Supremacy System would become the Begging Lapdog System instead!?

(Source: Fanqie Manhua, translated)

title.english: The Divine Path to Immortal Mastery

description:
Yue's body has always been weak and frail but, after being rescued from a ghost by his uncle, the young boy dedicates himself to learning martial arts and ghost fighting techniques to better protect himself and his loved ones. And just as he resolves to do so, a strange internal system awakens within him, telling him he has soul points he can invest towards empowering his fragile body!

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Yu Qiang Ze Qiang, Wo De Xiu Wei Wu Shang Xian
title.native: 遇强则强，我的修为无上限

description:
Ye Lingjun, on the verge of death, awakened the Strength Through Adversity System, which marked the start of his unlimited cultivation ascension. Immortals, saints, and Taoist masters? They all better stand aside! To build a following, he picked up a few disciples. The eldest disciple was once the leader of the demonic sect. He may seem vicious and rebellious, but he soon becomes tamed. The second disciple is a white-haired loli, blessed with the perfect saintly constitution. She could become the strongest of them all, but she loves to cook, and she'd rather serve her master a fancy meal instead!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Niangzi Jing Shi Weilai Baojun Nüdi
title.native: 娘子竟是未来暴君女帝

description:
Zhao Jingyu never thought he'd be reborn, and that his fiancee is the princess who will eventually become an usurper and a tyrannical empress. He did everything he could to try to steer her life away from going down that path of evil. But it turned out that she didn't care about politics in this life at all, she just wanted to spend all her time with him? That's fine, they'll just make some babies, and she'll be too busy taking care of the kids to plan any coups. Sounds like a plan!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

An Invincible Great Immortal failed in his cultivation. When he wakes up, he has time-travelled to a modern city and turned into a loser named Lin Zi Qian who is despised by everyone. He becomes a matrilocal son-in-law of a wealthy family with a beautiful wife who looks down on him. Is it possible that the Great Immortal could turn things around in his new life?

(Source: WebComics)

Note: Includes one extra chapter.

title.romaji: Chengwei wo de Yuangong Ba! Zheli Shi Laoban Yiwai Quanyuan Sangshi de Moshi Paiqian Gongsi!
title.native: 成为我的员工吧！这里是老板以外全员丧尸的末世派遣公司！

description: A failed entrepreneurship! A ten million debt! A betrayal! A girlfriend that ran away! He even landed in a pile of trash/rubbish/garbage when he tried to jump off a building! The unlucky Cao Xiaomeng woke up to find himself surrounded by zombies everywhere! The system activates upon the moment of death! become a post-apocalyptic entrepreneur! The post-apocalyptic dispatch company that hires cute zombie secretaries and mutant beast employees to serve you!

Jeff Fang hates Terrence Lu. He hardly knows him, but Terrence's very existence is a constant reminder of the misfortune Jeff's family had to go through. However as they continue to attend college together, Jeff's feeling towards Terrence starts to change.

(Source: Tapas)

title.english: Soul Land 5: The Rebirth of Tang San
title.native: 斗罗大陆 5 重生唐三

description:
Tang San reincarnated into the world where monsters dominate against humans, treating them as slaves. Witnessing the cruelty of the monsters, he trains to save the humans from eternal demise. Not only he vows to save humans, he has the important quest to find the reincarnated Xiao Wu

(Source: INKR)

Up-and-coming actor Xia Xingcheng just got the break of a lifetime—a film with superstar Yang Youming and a famed director! This drama is deeper than anything he’s ever worked on before. He’s already almost quit and almost been fired. (Note: an unscripted slap is never a good idea). With Yang Youming’s advice, he works hard on getting into character, but how far is too far? As these heartthrob actors grow closer, can Xia Xingcheng separate fact from fiction, or will these emotions he’s tapped into take center stage?

(Source: Tapas, edited)

The story of them happened in such an unexpected place, a mental hospital. To escape from the shadows of childhood, he thought he would hide for the rest of his life. But someone said to him, "I won't pull you out of the shadows, but if you want, I will stay with you in the darkness forever."

(Source: Webnovel)

Note: The author passed away before completing the story, so the artist finished the final chapters alone.

Yeyul is the youngest princess who is unloved and neglected. She lives in fear of getting killed by her father, the tyrant emperor. However, she is about to turn her fate around as she is actually a reincarnated soul, with the knowledge of how the story would unfold. Withstanding mean siblings and untrustworthy servants, Yeyul must now strive to survive on her own within the tyrant’s palace.

(Source: Pocket Comics)

In XX AD, a new generation of arms race is emerging. “Vanguards” are the new type of weapons being used on the battlefield. Liu Li is a Vanguard that is about to retire. In her last 380 days she receives her final mission…

If you accidentally crossed over into another world, what kinds of abilities would you need to reach your peak in life? Would you became an Enchanter? A Hero? Or maybe a Cultivator of Immortal Techniques? Of course not. You would take advantage of your present day knowledge in this other world to do business and earn big bucks!

After the death of her adoptive family at the hands of cultivator bandits, Xie Xi Gu sets out to become a cultivator herself. The world of cultivation is a cutthroat one, biased towards those with innate talent, fortunate families, and a lot of money. What Xie Xi lacks in those three qualities, she makes up for effort...and an absurd amount of strength!

(Source: Custom)

title.romaji: Ta Shuo Wo Shi Hei Lianhua

description:
For three years, Wen Nian'nan had tried hard to make their marriage work. But all he got in return were cold shoulders and physical scars from his spouse, Gu Yansheng. It was not until he discovered his broken wedding ring was a fake that he decided to give up. "Gu Yansheng, I shall walk away from your life as you wish." A few months later, when Yansheng finally learned the truth and tried to win Nian'nan back, he was greeted with an icy smirk. Will Nian'nan forgive him for the excruciating pain he caused?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes prologue and one extra chapter.

title.english: Affection Level ↟ Max ══ What Happens Next ══

description:
After maxing out the affection level of all the collectible characters in the MMORPG, Shangyang, Liu Yuan transmigrated into this fantasy land. This resulted in the birth of the biggest con in Shangyang's history, and also the coming of the unprecedented "Love Sage."

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Kuangnu Chongsheng: Wanku Qi Huang Fei

description:
She was powerful and got unparalleled martial arts in her last life, but she paid her true heart wrongly and resulted in death. After the rebirth, she vowed to destroy the one who hurt her, ruin the one who framed her and...

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Aiqing De Yangzi: Xin Zhi Suo Xiang
title.english: What Love Looks Like: Heart Wants What It Wants

description:
The optimistic actress Lu Yang, who broke up for her dream. In order not to make her sacrifice in vain, she worked hard towards her dream but to no avail. The genius actor, Chi Cheng, who was also struggling towards his dream, was more isolated after falling out of love… The two have become frenemies from enemies because of the same encounter. They encouraged and supported each other on the road of acting. Could they listen to their hearts and believed in love again?

(Source: Webcomics)

Cute and funny story about red panda.
Original Webcomic is published on the author's Weibo.

title.romaji: Kulou Jinhua: Cong Bei Nüshen Zhaohuan Kaishi
title.native: 骷髅进化：从被女神召唤开始

description:
Jiang Cheng is reborn into a game world as a skeleton summoned by a beautiful necromancer player? The kind of skeleton that's worthless even as cannon fodder! Fortunately, he has an infinite evolution system! From now on, this game has got itself a a god-level skeleton, the kind who will wipe out players and make NPCs beg for mercy.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Requiem Street, where evil spirits are attracted to in order to destroy them. A place where spirits and humans co-exist, not all humans can enter Requiem Street. Only those rare-soul users with guardian spirits can enter. Xia Ling was just a normal university intern, but a meeting by chance changes her ordinary life... In this world full of evil spirits, can you cooperate with your guardian spirit in order to survive?

title.english: Saved the Public Enemy by Mistake

description:
The peaceful life of Lu Jiu is brought to an end when a teenage cultivator turns up before his medical hall, badly injured. The young physician saves the boy, not knowing that he's Liu Jianghe, a notorious man whom many want dead. Is it too late to kill him now?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

In an era where reality and a game had become one, Lin Jichen, the greatest mage in Eternia, was stabbed in the back and killed by the people he trusted the most—his lover and the man he considered his brother. Yet destiny had other plans for him. He regressed to the day before Eternia’s launch and gave up the staff for a sword! Join him on a journey to rewrite the future with the blade of a sword!

(Source: WebComics)

Ryan was an average human being. During an accidental event he received a power called “Blessing” Since then, his view of the world has radically changed. It has been a great shock to him. He pursues dreams of justice, confronting the reality of his world in this Shounen fantasy. That is where this manhua will transport you. A new world of danger, action, and fantasy!

title.romaji: Fengaotian Xiaoshuo Li De Huangmao Fanpai Ye Xiang Xingfu
title.native: 凤傲天小说里的黄毛反派也想幸福

description:
Transmigrating into the body of a blonde-haired villain at the start of a yuri novel, Mu En just wanted to survive. But… why does the story seem to be going off track?

The princess is drugged and unclothed — so why hasn't the heroine shown up to save her yet? Why does the heroine’s childhood friend, a noble and pure saint, keep giving me flirtatious looks? Even my obedient personal maid has started looking at me in alarming ways!

Where is the heroine?! Please save me!!

"If you're going steal my women, you better be prepared to take responsibility…" the protagonist told me, with a kind smile on her face and a sharp machete in her hand.

(Source: SFACG, translated)

Surprise! Mu Tian Ran has been set up, his martial arts skills crippled at the hands of his own brother. Not only that, he's been rejected by his own family, who tortured him only to finally disown him and throw him out, all because he has the Bloodline of a Slave. At the lowest point of his life, a mysterious man arrives to mentor him and help him develop his own hidden talents. It turns out that his Bloodline, which was so repugnant to mankind, is actually a gift from the Heavens called the "Heavenly Demon Bloodline," making Mu Tian Ran an extremely rare child said to be favored by the gods themselves. As he grows stronger, Mu Tian Ran begins his journey to wreak vengeance on those who had shamed him in the past.

title.romaji: Quanqiu Yu Shou: Wo Neng Kanjian Jìnhua Luxian
title.native: 全球御兽：我能看见进化路线

description:
After traveling through time, I got the weakest little snowball as my pet, which couldn’t even evolve? Do I really have to be a waste for the rest of my life? Ding! The System lights up! What! I actually saw the hidden evolution route! Who said it was the weakest! Evolve! Ice Queen!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Kaiju Shi Ge Dadi Dou Shi Wo Tudi
title.native: 开局十个大帝都是我徒弟

description:
Gu Xuanchen, king of his time, once trained ten powerful emperor-realm disciples who were dominant in the world. However, when he broke through the shackles sealed in his own body, he unfortunately encountered a calamity of thunder and was destroyed. After being reborn as a son-in-law, he embarked on a journey to return to the peak and strengthen himself by slaying demons and monsters, suppressing evil spirits, saving his clan, and rescuing his disciples. Let\'s see how this almighty emperor is reborn and how he stirs up the world!

(Source: MangaToon)

Legend has it that whoever holds the Power Core rules the world. In the fight to protect the Core, Quilin's mistake led to the extinction of his guild, then he was incarnated to a kung-fu rookie. After reincarnation, Qiulin found himself reborn with the ability of the Power Core to devour everything. With the help of the Core, Qiulin decided to regain the glorious moment of his guild!

(Source: Webcomics)

They say he's the rotten apple of the cultivation world. Such bad manners! So disrespectful! They say he's the worst villain of the southern continent. Cavorting with demons, a liar and a cheat, committing all sorts of crimes! To all those accusations, Fang Xing says, "That's right. I'm the legendary rotten apple. Got a problem with that?"

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Lu Yan is a failing trainee at a talent agency. That is, until superstar influencer Hua Can draws him in women’s clothing. It’s an overnight sensation and his new fans want more. But this totally goes against his bad boy alpha image! So, Lu Yan creates a new social media account in the hopes of showing Hua Can what kind of man he really is. However, Hua Can isn't about to give up on her drawing style, either. After all, "bad boy" is so not part of her headcanon!

(Source: Comikey)

title.romaji: Chongsheng Kongjian: Haomen La Qi Buhaore
title.native: 重生空间：豪门辣妻不好惹

description:
She was the successor to a great healer, yet her reincarnation is a meek shadow of a girl. Call her stupid? Her alchemy and medical skills will stun skeptics! Laugh at her misfortune? She'll deal with her vicious stepmother and sister with a wave of her hand! All she wants after her reincarnation is vengeance and to live her life, but little does she know that she has caught the attention of the most noble man in the country. Her kiss-and-run scheme is thwarted because she's been captured against her will. "All actions have consequences, girl. Did no one teach you that?"

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Shen Yi was a 22-year-old ordinary guy who loved video games and reading comics. He was also easily mistaken for someone else. Then, Shen Yi started to get summoned by weird people ever since he traversed through a different universe. He was called the Lord of Ashes, Master of the Mirror City, Haze of the White Shore, Eldritch Deity, Void Sovereign, and the Ruler of Chaos... Every summoner had their needs. Mysterious groups seemed to summon him nonstop. The church, wizards, investigators, and saints offered various sacrifices. Shen Yi was deeply annoyed, but there was nothing he could do about it. Eventually, he was successfully summoned by cultists. Shen Yi had to face a girl who was presented as a sacrifice, and she had fainted on the altar!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Putao Ningmeng Jiu He Xiao Tiane
title.english: Did the Top Student Get a Cutie Today?

description:
The moment omega, Wan Xing Shu transferred into the class, he became the target of the cunning Alpha, Chu He Zhou. After a series of services from the Alpha, who managed to flirt the omega to the point that his heart beats fast, his weak legs shaking and he wishes to be pushed down by the Alpha. Until a second year Alpha bully called Wan Xing Shu “Brother”, Chu He Zhou was confused. What is his soft and cute omega hiding?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Originally published under the same title as the web novel, Xueba Jintian Liao Dao Xiao Nai Bao Le Ma (学霸今天撩到小奶包了吗).

title.romaji: Lai Zi Shenyuan De Wo Jintian Ye Yao Zhengjiu Renlei
title.native: 来自深渊的我今天也要拯救人类

description:
The Abyss represents annihilation, instinctively swallowing up all life. But one day, a traitor appeared amongst the Abyss, as the girl Helga woke up confused, only to find out that she was actually the feared being known as the "Midnight Abyss." As she experienced life with humans, she became convinced to use her Abyss powers to defend humanity and to save what was good in the world. But the chaotic forces of the Abyss would not let her go so easily...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Zai Hougong Dang Ju Ju
title.english: A Big Shot In The Imperial Palace

description: Wei Yi Yi is one of the most beautiful and talented women of the kingdom. After being called ugly by the Emperor, she decides to take revenge by painting him in the most ugly and ridiculous ways! She didn't plan for the master painter of the palace to notice her and ask for her to become his apprentice...

Xiang Yang, a rebellious and unruly teenager, doesn't care about rules and other people at all. Adults don't know what to do with him, and his classmates are afraid of him. However, he attracts Mingxu's attention. As the class monitor, Mingxu starts to have complex feelings about him. Mingxu cares about him, pity him, but is also mad at him. Maybe there's also affection. By showing his constant gentleness, and if necessary, toughness, Mingxu eventually moved Xiang Yang. What spark will the two tough guys create? Will they make it through the way that is full of laughter and tears and get their salvation in the end?

(Source: Pocket Comics)

Note: The chapter count includes a prologue and two extras.

title.romaji: Guiyi Nan Sha? Baoqian, Wo Cai Shi Zhenzheng Bu Si
title.native: 诡异难杀？抱歉，我才是真正不死

description:
Fang Xiu transmigrated to his other self in a weird world and gained the ability to “reverse death.” What gives him motivation to survive is his dear weird wife. Fang Xiu swore: “My loving and beautiful wife in this weird world must die by my hand."

(Source: Fanqie Manhua, translated)

Having lost something important, the immortal witch could not stop her tears, and accidentally provoked the Prince of Hell when she tried various ways to stop her own tears! Hence, a daily life of pandemonium ensues!

(Source: Bilibili)

title.english: Perfect Secret Love: The Bad New Wife Is a Little Sweet

description:
“How perverted is Si Ye Han's taste? He still wants me like this?” Waking up, she looked at her reflection in the mirror: explosive wig, tattoos, and demon-like makeup. Any normal person’s eyes would burn if they looked at her for more than a second.
Before her rebirth, she was in love with a different guy, so all she wanted to do was escape from Si Ye Han and hated him to his core after being locked up by him.
After her rebirth, she looked differently at him, thinking that maybe he changed for the better?

(Source: WebNovel)

By chance, Wu Mian obtained a mask that forces absolute obedience on other people. But even then, he couldn't muster up the courage to confess to the girl he had a crush on. Until an incident that turned his life completely upside down...

(Source: QQ, translated)

title.romaji: Wo de Nuyou Shi e Long
title.english: My Girl Is A Dragon Princess

description:
How will our junior alchemist cope with the fact that the princess he sets out to rescue is in fact a dragon? A dragon princess, a leggy beauty dressed as a boy, a Lolita-style senior fellow apprentice and a busty junior fellow apprentice…Alchemist Shi Ye from the Eastern Continent thus embarks on his rewarding journey on the Western Continent!

(Source: WeComics)

After being abducted into the spirit world, a young boy awakens his powers of divinity by accessing nirvana. Together with his younger twin sister, they explore this mysterious world, study Taoism, get stronger, assist gods, make friends, solve mysteries, and become the number one demon-slaying god!

The Sword is the victim of a betrayal: the love of his life killed him on their wedding night. However, the will of the heavens is unpredictable. Instead of following his body in death, he finds himself reincarnated in the human world. Let’s look at Mu Yuan, who bears the deep hatred of the blood and his thirst for revenge. Now he is preparing to return to the Spirit Domain, even if it means killing in its path!

(Source: Original Publisher, translated)

A legend has long echoed through the ages: one day, the Demon King will descend upon this world, accompanied by seven terrifying fiends. Together, they will plunge this realm into an abyss of despair and darkness.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Liu Sui Kai Shi Cheng Wei Nüwang
title.english: From Six to Sovereignty: The Girl Who Ruled

description:
I wake up to find myself trapped in the body of an ill-fated 6-year-old minor character. But I'm not about to accept my fate. I will survive, even if it means turning evil!

(Source: WebComics)

All things bright, those who can summon the spirits of all things are called summoners. Since ancient times, the legends about summoners can be found in each history...summon the earth, the skeletons, the souls and the stars...with the passage of time, the lends of the summoners are gradually forgotten by the world... and now, a new era, the strongest summoner wakes up!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wo Zhen Mei Xiang Chongsheng A

description:
Chen Hansheng, a societal elite and eligible bachelor, suddenly finds himself returned back to his youth as a high school graduate. Standing once again at the crossroad of life, Chen Hansheng hesitates to make a decision. Should he pursue the hidden treasure that is Shen Youchu, or the unattainable flower Xiao Rongyu?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

A recurring dreams prelude to a destined encounter. A police officer Lou Ji has a hidden secretive BDSM sexual fantasy with some woman in her dreams....only if this would become a reality. Lou Ji finally met the girl from her dream at the police station. What will become of it?

(Source: Tapas)
The heartwarming story of two different girls brought together over a cat, as they learn about each other, spend time together, and heal one another.

This is the story of an eastern blue dragon and a western black dragon playing together.

(Source: WeComics)

Tianbao Period. Kong Hongjun, a young man who was ignorant of worldly affairs, came to Chang’an with three important tasks and entered the Great Tang’s Exorcism Department. Inside the department, he led a ragtag group of yao-vanquishing experts together with Li Jinglong, commander of the Longwu Army. And this, is the story of how they wrote out the Great Tang’s Yao-vanquishing Records.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Includes prologue and four bonus chapters.

In order to fulfil her mission of bringing peace to her homeland, the Uyghur Princess Amelia travels to Chang'an and marries Emperor Dezong of Tang's ninth prince, Li Qian. While she had been considered very capable in her homeland, the complex and foreign customs of the Tang court are something else entirely; and although she had not expected love in a political marriage, the sheer disinterest and arrogance of her husband is very hard to handle, no matter how capable and handsome he may be. Securing peace between the Uyghur Khaganate and the Tang Empire is not going to be easy, especially with the rebellion taking place in Tang.

Note: 355 mainline chapters + 18 chapters in extras side story 南山篇 + 2 epilogue chapters

They were childhood friends, and she had always been more powerful than him. But when they accidentally traveled (summoned?) to another world, it was finally time for him to become the knight in shining armor! He had to find her first though, since they were separated... Come and witness his fight to be better in a crazy world where monsters roamed and technology was so advanced your amputated limbs be restored to perfection...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Bai Yao had just became an intern as the assistant of the big-headed celebrity, Ji Chen. Even though he had thought that this was already unfortunate enough, never would he have expected that Ji Chen was a vampire! What's more is that, the way to break the blood-sucking taboo was a k...kiss?!

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Shenguan de Mengxiang Shì Qi Shang Qian Gu E Long
title.english: The Priest Dreaming Of A Dragon
title.native: 神官的梦想是骑上千古恶龙

description:
Ten years ago, an evil dragon left a message saying that he would take away the princess after a decade unless he was given ten tons of gold. When the kingdom fails to meet the condition, the dragon swoops in and snatches the beautiful, golden-haired princess—Or priest. The dragon has actually kidnapped Father Ivor, who willingly put himself up to escape the stuffy and celibate life within the church. And as if freedom isn’t sweet enough, Ivor now has himself a handsome and rich dragon-man! All that’s left is to trick his captor into keeping him by his side forever...!

(Source: Tappytoon)

Use it all, break through limits. Innate wisdom, academic pinnacle. Multiple forms, transcending evolution. Reborn, starting from scratch, infinitely evolving.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Sha Si Nanzhu Ran Hou Cheng Wei Nümotou
title.native: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

description:
After killing the male protagonist, the originally innocent supporting lady transformed herself into a villainess. Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned to the start of the game. Having carried over all the skills she acquired in her previous life, she was going to preemptively kill the male lead again. However, her new circumstances seem a bit... strange?

"No, wait, who on Earth are you—?!"

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Zhen Buxiang Xue Jìn Zhou
title.english: My Reluctant Journey into Forbidden Spells

description:
For Nick Foster, the infamous underachiever, this is his third awakening exam. Rated as a one-star again, he’s the laughingstock until he discovers his skills involve “forbidden spells” and “dark power.” Nick isn’t a dark lord, but these forbidden spells are insanely powerful! Now, with dark power surging through the city, Nick must grow stronger before anyone discovers it’s all coming from him.

(Source: Webnovel)

Xiang Xiaoman is the black-belt daughter of a martial arts dojo. In pursuit of her crush, she decided to transfer to his school and become a meek, delicate girl to attract his attention. But she gets into a fight on her first day on campus, and even before she got to meet her crush, her strong fighting skill made her the envy of all the delinquents in school! Will Xiaoman ever be able to repair her reputation and remake herself into his type of girl?

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Quan Min Yu Ling: Wo De Lingchong Shi Nü Jiangshi
title.native: 全民御灵：我的灵宠是女僵尸

description:
After an accident, Ye Ling transmigrated to a fantastical world where everyone had spirit-taming powers. He managed to activate the Spirit Taming System, which allows him to see evolutionary paths invisible to normal people. For every level he gains, he can tame a new spirit-pet. Ye Ling's first spirit-pet turns out to be a zombie, which seems like the weakest pet to everyone else, but Ye Ling can see that his zombie is a super spirit-pet!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Our hero, who is about to become an immortal, unexpectedly returns to the past. But this time, he will not let bullies push him around again and humiliations repeat themselves. What other conspiracies will emerge after his rebirth? He is a puppet in his miserable past life? He manages to acquire the most powerful martial arts secret of all races in his new life?! See how our young hero changes his destiny and becomes an urban immortal emperor!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Quanqiu Jingsong: Kaiju Wan Yi Mingbi
title.english: With My Netherworld Trillions, Game On!
title.native: 全球惊悚：开局万亿冥币

description:
After defying death's grip, Yu Lin awakens the "Divine Tycoon System," which grants him daily cash payouts. But there's a catch: the money is unusable Nether Tokens. Years later, he gets chosen as one of the lucky few to beta-test Global Menace, a horror game where only the best and strongest can survive. While others are frantically appeasing the fierce spirits, Yu Lin recruits loyal ghost followers with his Tycoon spending. Looks like having money is all you need to rule the underworld!

(Source: Tapas)

Confess love to your beautiful master right at the start, you'll be treated like a dog if you fail? Zhang Yi was given the Heavenly Fate System when he transmigrated. With his blessed body, he gets stronger whenever he picks up girls! The cool sect master, the sexy Taoist priestess, the cute kouhai, the yandere princess, and the pure saintess… Faced with so many beauties, Zhang Yi only has one wish: Please let me go! This Heavenly System is going to be the death of me!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Ming Lun Zhi Zhu! Dang Yibian Jiang Lin Renjian
title.english: Lord of Fate: When Mutation Strikes
title.native: 命轮之主! 当异变降临人间

description:
Ever since the emergence of Phantom Star mutated plants and animals on earth into deadly monsters called beast gods, humanity has been on the brink of being wiped out. It was only when explorers who traveled to Phantom Star returned with formidable power that humans were able to start fighting back. Like countless others, Jiang Kai also traveled to Phantom Star in hopes of earning great strength. However, after overcoming brutal conditions and bloodthirsty monsters, he discovers that his profession is a gambler, a rare job that is not granted so easily.

(Source: Tappytoon)

In an attempt for survival, Yu Renjie, the son of the demon lord, was ordered to enter Hero's Academy which only recruits distinguished and upright disciples. The goal is to obtain a Hero's Certificate which can bring legitimacy to the demon clan. This is extremely dangerous. Once the identity of a demon cultist is exposed, countless righteous knights will kill them on the spot. But on the first day of school, Yu Renjie was shocked to find out that his personal information had been leaked. In order to hide his identity, he had no choice but to put on women's clothing. His dangerous and hilarious campus life is about to unfold!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Erin is a 27-year-old product director who's heard it all: hard-to-get, picky, impossible, too ambitious, and worst of all, too old to still be single. Unwilling to compromise for the sake of society’s standards, but desperate to break away from the endless cycle of blind dates her aunt imposes on her, she sets out with a hidden agenda for a contract boyfriend. With the right partner, it’ll be perfect—none of the emotions, drama, or responsibilities of a real relationship… or so she thinks!

(Source: Tapas)

He was born with a deadly defect that deprived him of internal power. In order to win his father's attention, he decided to set himself on the painstaking road of cultivating the external power. However, the mysterious stone transformed from a meteor totally changed his destiny...

(Source: MangaToon)

Chu Tianshu transmigrated to another world to find himself in a wedding ceremony with a princess! Faced with a contemptuous crowd, a scheming mother-in-law, and bullied by his superiors, Chu Tianshu is blessed with powerful cheats. He is destined to cultivate the most powerful techniques, marry the most beautiful woman, defeat the most powerful foes, and gain power over life and death! After reaching the top of the world, he finally felt relieved: I have lived up to the duty of being a transmigrator!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Chuanyue Dao Yishijie De Wo Jing Bei Po Zuo Wangfei?
title.english: Forced to Be a Princess After Reincarnating in Another World
title.native: 穿越到异世界的我竟被迫做王妃

description:
She is a police officer who has been living independently and accidentally crossed into another world on her way to work. What kind of story will she tell in this completely unknown world?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Seven kids at summer camp are unexpectedly transported by 'digi-vices' to a colorful and enigmatic world. Lost and alone, they are befriended by small digital monsters, Digimons. The kids and their Digimon partners quickly become inseparable, and the strange creatures guide their human friends through the wondrous DigiWorld, protecting them from the hordes of evil Digimons. The group soon discovers that some of the giant Digimons they encounter are not evil Digimons but good Digimons gone bad. A dark power is corrupting even the most gentle of Digimons by embedding Black Gears into them, turning them into vicious monsters. Creating chaos and destruction wherever it goes, the evil power threatens all of DigiWorld.

As they try to find their way back home, the seven kids are drawn further and further into the mystery. Through teamwork and trust, they help their newfound Digimon friends digivolve from 'monsters in training' to giant champions that must save the DigiWorld from the powerful evil intent on destroying it.

(Source: Tokyopop)

A gorgeous Omega transmigrated into a normal society, and he collapsed on the street after getting intoxicated by the pheromone he released.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes a prologue and 10 extras.

title.romaji: Zong Shui Houzi Kaishi Cheng Shen

description:
People knelt in prayer and offered up sacrifices on the riverbank.

“We beseech the great Water God for protection…”

But just then, from beneath the water came the voice of a young boy: “Damn it, could you stop sacrificing maidens to me already? I’m really not the Water God!”

(Source: Webnovel)

Nan Zhi's day life life is riddled with success and admiration. After work hours, however, her search for a romantic connection of any kind runs rampant. Bored by every encounter she's had, the entertainment company CEO is shocked when a one-night stand imprints itself on her mind. And she's even more shocked when she learns the subject of her infatuation is her best friend's younger sister.

(Source: Tapas)

Qianxia’s friend, Jiamei, jumped off a building because of harassment at work, and Qianxia made a deal with a devil to take revenge for her. As she investigated her friend’s death, she found a hidden camera, learned about the indifference of Jiamei’s superior, and met an oddly friendly colleague. Slowly, the truth came to the surface. This is a tale of a fight between humans, but also a fight between the supernatural. But are the supernatural the true evil, or is it what lurks in the hearts of men?

(Source: Bilibili)

title.romaji: Jiesuo Moshi de 99 Ge Nü Zhu

description:
After a heroic yet futile attempt to stop a plane crash, martial artist Hao Lanren finds himself reincarnated in a post-apocalyptic world teeming with zombies. Awakening to a unique system that rewards him for killing zombies, Lanren collects gold and equipment, and discovers an unexpected abundance of female companions. Together, they embark on a thrilling journey to save the world and unlock the secrets of their new reality.

(Source: Webnovel)

Dong Chu, the princess of a small southern country, travels thousands of miles alone to a foreign land with a single goal in mind: breaking off her engagement with her fiancé, the Great Lord of the Northern Territory! His name is Lin Zhenying, and he’s horrendously cruel and arrogant. After she arrives, however, her fiancé is overthrown and cursed to remain in the form of a small child. Taking pity on his now considerably weaker state, Dong Chu pledges to help him reclaim his throne and to gain power once more.

(Source: Comikey)

Note: Chapter count includes two season prologues and three extras chapters.

Ten years ago, the frustrated Gu Zhuoyan met Zhuang Fanxin, a bright ray of sunshine. Zhuoyan was healed, and Fanxin was moved- but their mutual interest ended due to the distance between them. Ten years later, Gu Zhuoyan finds himself on a blind date with the one that got away. All the feelings he had long sealed away in the depths of his heart awake once again, but how will he win back the heart of his old flame?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Guiyi Yao Ji Shi: Wo De Bingren Jie Wei Kongbu
title.native: 诡异药剂师：我的病人皆为恐怖

description:
Can you make your way and survive, or will you be swallowed by the darkness? Lin En accidentally transmigrated into a monstrous world and became a rare human doctor. His patients will be touched by his "gentle" treatment and "sincere" service!

“Anesthesia? Maybe next time."
"My knife is quick, it’ll be over soon…"

Welcome to the Bloodsaw Clinic, we are happy to serve you.

(Source: Fanqie Manhua, translated)
Trash? Ugly girl? None exists --- when everyone looks with disdain and ridicule, who can expect that a sick and frail girl's body contains the soul of an absolute immortal.

title.english: Infinite Devouring: From Zero to Hero

description:
Yang Chen, who keeps failing his performance assessments in an immortal cultivation academy, accidentally discovers that he has the Ancient Dragon Soul. In a world where such souls are rare, he quickly becomes an almighty Heaven Master and is ready to venture into the unknown world with his newfound talent.

(Source: Webcomics)

Lin is just an ordinary high school student. But on the day she transfers to a new school, she gets a video game, which sends her to the world of King Arthur. There, she meets a mysterious wizard, who tells her that her mission is to find and gather the Knights of the Round Table.

I was hit by a car... then transmigrated into my favorite game?! It seems I have some major issues! First of all, I don’t remember who I was before the accident. Second, I’m the villainess in this game! Luckily, I transmigrated to a point in the story where I’m still a child, so there is still time to change my fate. I know those close to me will betray me, and I remember what turns me wicked. If I can just lift my mother’s curse and master my powers, maybe I can turn my life around. I just have to save myself before it’s too late!

(Source: Tapas)

To pay off his debt, the diligent corporate slave Lin Xiang has no other way but to join a mysterious virtual game. As he levels up in the game system and expands his territory, the truth behind the game and the oligarchs' true aim gradually dawns on him. Can he finally uncover the ultimate conspiracy?

(Source: INKR, edited)

Ye Yangtian was born into a wealthy family, but he lived a frivolous life. However, although he is a playboy, his heart is full of pure feelings. When prosperity is exhausted, there is only one fool in love left in the world. Unexpectedly, Ye Yang meets the immortal on the way to heaven! All of a sudden, the world is in chaos! Lü Dongbin became a strong reserve of the chairman. Heaven has an extra immortal, but the mortal world is unfolding.

Dressed as a man, she is a lady killer with a perfect smile. Her motto is "Both women and men will fall for you as long as you work hard". Women like her. Men are so obsessed with her that they are willing to be un-straight. The uncrowned king Zong Jize sees her as his bro, but tricks her onto his bed!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Xuanhuan: Wo, Wudi Cong Baijia Kaishi!
title.native: 玄幻：我,无敌从败家开始！

description:
When Ye Feng transmigrated to the Xuantian Continent, he activated the Invincible Spendthrift System! He fed the irreplaceable Ninth Level Cultivation Potion to the dogs. He used the pages of the Ultimate Martial Manual as toilet paper. Such irresponsible behavior managed to even shock the normally stoic lady sect-master!

(Source: Fanqie Manhua, translated)

The imperial doctor travels across the city, with his healing hands, and a needle that can both kill others and save lives!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wo Jiu Xiang Ceng Ni De Qiyun

description:
Michelle, the real daughter, reunited with her birth parents, but they only favored the fake daughter. She pleased her family, hoping to be loved, but all she got was neglect and ridicule. Eventually, she died of a terminal illness. Upon rebirth, she obtains the “Luck” system and decides to stay away from them and her fiancé to complete the system's tasks and live! But her first task is to approach the bad-tempered heir of the Fu family and become his friend?!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Cang Wan Bang Zhi Wan Shou Gui Yuan

description:
When the demonic races from the great beyond invaded the Great Qian once again, mighty heroes such as High Priest Mu Chen, Master Lin Dong, and King Xiao Yan fought fiercely in order to protect millions of lives.

Meanwhile, the Beast Continent was also shrouded in the shadow of war. Ministers plotted and schemed after the Monkey King was assassinated. The Monkey Prince Lu Zhun had been in exile for three years. But now it was time for him to return to the capital Dongchuan. Will he be able to uncover the truth behind his father’s death, and will he be able to take his rightful place on the throne and become the next Emperor of the Beasts?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Leaves fell on the a go board over time. But there was no opponent under the old tree. Studied the board to find the perfect move. Only to find the oceans and mountains grew old in that time.

Waking up from a deep sleep, Ji Yuan found himself a half-blind beggar living in an abandoned temple. A real man relies on his sword, but a con artist has to rely on his mouth. That's the only way for Ji Yuan to survive his terrible circumstances in this world.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

In an accident, an indifferent genius 10 year old boy falls along side a comet into a dreamland. There, he lives with the dwarves who inhabit the planet, using his talent and power to practice and grow his skills. Not only does he master the unparalleled smelting and forging techniques of the dwarves, but he develops a new form of martial arts as well. Just as he settles down and seems to be living a peaceful life, the cruel desires of others appear…

The zombie virus spread throughout the world and caused the end of days. Ye Bei was tricked by his classmate and lost his arm to a zombie. He had to hide away like a cockroach for 50 years to survive. During that time, he managed to build a time machine and returned himself to 50 years ago, before the apocalypse, with the chance to relive his life. Having seen how people acted during the crisis, he swore he'll be more devious, more selfish, and more coldhearted than anyone else. The first thing he'll do, he's going to feed that bitch to the zombies!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Dizi Xiu Lian, Wo Tang Ping!
title.english: My Disciples Cultivate, While I Slack Off!

description:
After getting scammed by predatory con-men, I was broke, near death, and about to become the shortest-lived Master of my sect… when my hidden power awakened and I received the Disciple Rebate System! I can give my disciple a useless potion, and she'll return with a potion of immortal cultivation! Now I'll get my revenge on the immortal emperor and get rich, too! The kind apothecary, the sexy princess, and the powerful swordswoman… all will become my beloved disciples!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Du Bu Tianxia: Tegong Shenyi Xiao Shou Fei
title.english: Queen of Poison: the Legend of a Super Agent, Doctor and Princess
title.native: 毒步天下：特工神医小兽妃

description:
"She is an ace agent, the queen of medicine and poison. Sweet and adorable she looks; resolute and cunning she actually is. She is half an angel and half a devil. When she travels through time and stays in an orphan girl's body, will she rewrite the history? ""I quit the marriage with this coward girl. To my surprise, she is so shrewd and eloquent! How ignorant I am!"" Some lord regrets. ""She is such a hottie!"" Some prince sighs. "

(Source: Webnovel)

After crossing over to another dimension, a young man from Earth gets help from a system that gives him all kinds of information about everything taking place in his new world.With so much knowledge at his fingertips, he seizes the opportunity to rise to the top! He cultivates incredibly powerful abilities and martial arts techniques that defy heaven itself! He also obtains all sorts of treasures, including miraculous medicinal pills and divine weapons that even the gods would fear! With all of this in his hands, the young man from Earth shall reign supreme!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.english: Men's Wear Store and "Her Royal Highness"

description:
Zihao Zhang, a brilliant cross dresser who always knows how to pick the killer skirt to wear, just got dumped ruthlessly. What would happen when he accidentally catches the eyes of Yuze Shao, a super straight guy who always assumes himself to be "unbendable"? Suit? Lolita dress? Hanfu? All pieces of cake for Zihao Zhang!

(Source: WebComics, edited)

title.romaji: Wo Jìng Ran Shì Zuizhong BOSS

description:
When a virtual game turns into reality, humanity is driven to the brink of destruction. Xia Ye always thinks he is a noob, but he is actually the final boss of the game's story, who is so incredibly powerful that even the fearless warriors fear him.

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Mubiao Yi Yi Jifen!  Kaiqi Erci Rensheng de Zhong Jie Youxi!
title.english: Target: 100 Million Points! The Ultimate Game to Start a 2nd Life!
title.native: 目标一亿积分！ 开启二次人生的终阶游戏！

description:
After his friend's tragic death, Xie Yu plunged himself into the world of games. One day, a mobile game called "The Ultimate Game" appeared on his phone. When he learned that the game can grant any wish and even revive the dead, he decided to set 100 million points as his goal. The otaku's second life begins!

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Chuanyue Cheng Le Xiuxian Youxi De Fanpai Dashaoye
title.english: Reincarnated as the Villain in a Cultivation Game
title.native: 穿越成了修仙游戏的反派大少爷

description:
After the sudden death of a high-ranking player, he crossed over into the game and became the villainous young master that had died after being cursed and stabbed. Within the dark coffin, the pretty System gave him a starter pack and bestowed 10,000 Spiritual Power upon him! The same tragic life, but a chance to turn the tables! He kicked away the cover of his coffin, then used the power of words to romance all the beautiful girls! In this script filled with death flags, he will overcome all challenges to spite that damned game designer!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

"I have to spend lavishly! If I didn't, I would be disrespecting my parents' earning power!" Hong Dali may say that, but he actually has other plans. Having transmigrated into this weak and sickly body, he was gifted with the "Squander System." He can improve his physical attributes by wasting money. Say goodbye to crutches, as he spends his way to peak condition! But as long as he's wasting money, everyone will look down on him as a useless prodigal son...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Tao Yu Mo Shi Zhi Shu

description:
Sparked by scientific experiments gone awry, civilization had collapsed in the future world and most regions had regressed to the tribal level. The incident also caused irreversible mutations in people, splitting them into two species: those with mechanical integrations called Machines, and those who had animal genes, Beast Spirits. As a Machine, Black-Eyed Rock roamed the path between the two races, in search of the answers to this world and fighting for everyone’s beliefs!

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Jue Shi Qiangzhe Zhi Xiang Huijia Zhongtian
title.native: 绝世强者只想回家种田

description:
When Chen Fan transmigrated into a world of martial arts, not only was he abandoned by the System, he was also crippled without any martial talent. He was condemned to live life as an ordinary villager of the lowest caste.

But unbeknownst to him, his home was full of divine artifacts. The bath water comes from a holy spring. A dragon prince helps him to plow the fields. The saint priestess waters his vegetables. The empress herself washes his clothes. Eventually, the most powerful people on the continent will gather in his village, and Chen Fan will become the ultimate power broker who controls the world behind the scenes!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

The protagonist, a modern wizard (male), has lived for 168 years. He has always lived alone and strictly adhered to refraining from contact with human beings. Living such a life has naturally resulted in him being single. But one day, a dashing blond man appears at his company and inexplicably launches a passionate pursuit of him. What will he do?

(Source: Pocket Comics)

A young boy named Lin Yan awakened a useless Divine Soul, becoming a laughing stock of everyone he knew. However, no one could've known that his Divine Soul was in fact called the Life-death Coffin, which had the power to overturn the entire world. What's more, a beautiful and powerful women appeared from the coffin and became the boy's teacher. From then onwards, the boy made great progress at an amazing speed, and moved towards his fate of becoming a powerful emperor.

(Source: WebComics)

Since the age of ten, high school girl Yan has been plagued by a dream in which a fox brutally devours her heart,
Her nightmare almost comes true when Ran, a beautiful demon fox, approaches her during a school field trip when she's left alone. Much to her surprise through, instead of harming Yan, Ran insists on returning her the favor for finding his lost tail. And in exchange for this tail, the omnipotent demon fox grants a wish to the girl.

(Source: Pocket Comics)

Ling Lin is a girl with terrible luck, who can't seem to do anything right. Until she went to college, met the beautiful and kind senpai Fang Wan, and fell for her before she knew it. In this vast universe, there is someone out there connected to you, who will make sure you will never be alone.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

A wild food that carries the virus, leading to the advent of the apocalypse, the global human into the zombie crisis, a terminally ill teenager was attacked by zombies, not only incurable disease is cured, there is also the consciousness of normal people! Is this a misfortune? Or lucky?

(Source: Webnovel)

As a hapless modern girl, Xi Yuan travels in time to another world at the end of her life. Unexpectedly, she is stabbed to death on the moment she wakes up. However, owing to this accident, she acquires immortality and captivates the eyes of various exceedingly handsome boys, and that domineering and arrogant princess with golden hair seems also...

(Source: Webcomics)

The first thing that Jiang Feng saw when he opened his eyes, is that his hands are on his class teacher's Breast!! Owwu~ This, this is the time before I cultivate! The Immortal emperor has once again return to the mortal world!

title.romaji: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang

description:
On the outside, Lu Meihe appears to be a strict boss, dubbed "The Cobra" by her subordinates, but she nurses a soft spot for her intern Lin Wenjing. As she has a reputation to maintain, she is confined to expressing her feelings within the pages of her personal notebook... only for Lin Wenjing to discover it! Since then, Lu Meihe realized that despite her mild manners and soft-spoken attitude, Lin Wenjing was really anything but! Since then, Lu Meihe has been getting bullied every day, but it feels like pure bliss! What will she do?!

(Source: Bilibili Comics, edited)

Note: Chapter count includes 4 extras.

Lu Cheng was cursed to transmigrate into a world without a cultivation path towards immortality. He became the person who triggered the apocalypse. On the verge of death, a mysterious power system was activated. Lu Cheng was determined to take advantage of it to change his fate, by overcoming trials and tribulations in order to level up! The trial of the sun, the trial of the moon, the trial of absolute death.... will he be crushed by the ten thousand trials? Or will he defeat them to rise up into the heavens? The path to immortality starts with overcoming these calamities!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.english: My Daddy is the Heavenly God

description:
To find the mother for his loving daughter, the Grand Heavenly Master of the Immortal World decides to descend to earth and marry into the mother's household. As such, he becomes a live-in son-in-law who is detested by everyone. Although the Grand Heavenly Master has lost all his power, there is still no way that the prince from the Demon World, or someone who has a cheat system at hand would be a match for him...

(Source: WebComics)

As September comes, a new semester has begun at Shan Ming Highschool. The school doctor, Song Yue, has also welcomed a new roommate - canteen chef, Xu Xiaodao. Mr. Song thinks Xu is like the "Snail Girl". Every since he starting living here, the dorm has been super clean. Not only does he clean, he also cooks all the meals and does all the laundry! This is truly suspicious! Things get even weirder when Mr Song realises Xu Xiaodao knows a little bit too much about him and is a little bit too clingy. Furthermore, Xu Xiaodao cares for him way too much?? Things are not as simple as they seem...

(Source: BiliBili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes 6 extras.

When the playboy Lin Xiu transmigrated to another world, he gained the power to copy other people's abilities just by making physical contact? That's so cool! So starts his adventure to get touchy-feely with all kinds of people… Wait… please don't hit me so hard, dear sister-in-law! I'm not cheating on my fiancee, I'm just trying to cultivate!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

The strongest female assassin from a special assassination force met her death one day on a mission. To her surprise, she woke up in the body of a 13 year old girl, Mu Rong Liu Yue. Through Liu Yue's past memories, she found out that she was bullied due to the huge birthmark on her face, even though she came from a renowned family.

10,000 years ago in the world of Luofu, the banished immortal was born and the evil emperor was resurrected. Their grievances of tens of thousands years erupted overnight. The head master of Sword Exploration School went deep into the Dark Abyss and never be heard of since then... 10,000 years later, he got reborn again..

(Source: MangaToon)

The "lovely" daily life between an idol and his pro hater!

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Kai Ju Jue Se Qiao Shifu: Xitong Shi Jin Fan Gu
title.english: Becoming the Perfect Son-in-Law: A System with a Rebellious Streak
title.native: 开局绝色俏师父：系统十斤反骨

description:
My name is Xia Chi. I thought I had four lady masters who were all going to help me cultivate all the way towards immortality. I didn't realize that each of them had secret plans of her own, and they each wanted me to become their personal boy toy!?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

It is a comedic horror comic that even the faint of heart can stomach! Knowing that she would die at the hands of a female ghost the next day, Zhu Yang was determined to drink to her heart’s content before then. When she woke up the next day, her mind was in shambles because of her drunkenness and her house was a mess. There was a female ghost hanging out of her TV with only half of her body—dead! Her disreputable friends accused her of inhumanely torturing the female ghost to death. Zhu Yang said, ""No! I did not! Stop spouting nonsense! I am as delicate as a flower and I only know how to scream when met with scary things. To this, the female ghost who had thought that her prey was an easy one but was killed instead, had something to say.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Qi Su dies and reincarnates as a high school student, reborn with the power to see ghosts and spirits around him. Is he the only one who sees them? In order to survive from man-eating spirits, Qi Su accidentally comes across phantom relics which help him to disguise himself as a ghost, so he can begin exploring the mysterious world of Cthulhu.

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes 1 extra chapter.

title.romaji: Zui Qiang Shen Yi Hun Dushi

description:
As a non-standard doctor, he fought in the Amazon Forest as a merc, he annihilated an entire sect and practiced to enhance his cultivation level. Now he finally gets to do his original job—healing. Well…normal healing doesn’t include this intimate interaction with ladies!

(Source: MangaToon)

Two women hidden away deep in a mansion, who save each other through their roller coaster of a relationship!

Bai Yuetao, the wife of a rich businessman, blames herself for her husband's skirt-chasing. After getting all dressed up, only to spend another night alone in their lavish residence, she sees a graceful woman appear in her new mirror. This woman calls herself "Mengdie" and says that she can teach Bai Yuetao how to "hook" her husband's heart, but the price will be— Bai Yuetao's body.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Our protagonist, Shen Jun, is the lead singer and guitarist of the band Triumph of William, who fails to be cool at the very beginning. Another protagonist, Yu Zhixing, a little-known painter, is obsessed with his neighbor Shen Jun, but unfortunately, has nohas no chance to interact with himafraid to interaction with him. As he tries everything to talk to his neighbor, there it is, Shen Jun's cat is outside of his door?! He finally finds an excuse to talk to Shen Jun?

(Source: Webnovel)

Based on the great natural law, the strong is invincible. The antediluvian method of elixir shines the mountains and rivers, the all-conquering treasured sword annihilates the universe and transmigration, and the blood vessel of Shura ruins the supremacy of every realm. Inheriting from the mandate of heaven, and practicing unrivaled skills, Nan Qin overwhelmingly started his own travel towards the strong which is immortal and matchless! "Burn the sky and boil the wine to study the rule of Shura, and then kill those beast all!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Hao Tuer Ni Jiu Rao Le Wei Shi Fa
title.native: 好徒儿你就饶了为师伐

description:
He came from the wilderness carrying the destiny of the human race. He had numerous disciples and brought up twelve emperors for the human race! Heehee, having raised so many boys, now I need a girl disciple to rub my back!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Five years ago, the Ye Family was exterminated, and Ye Chen, the loser of the Ye family, was missing. Five years later, Ye Chen came back with amazing and powerful cultivation power! This time, he would make the heaven tremble with awe and the earth quiver with fear! He would control everything and be the top of the world!

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Shao Shuai Ni Laopo You Paole

description:
The seemingly naïve girl is plotting a revenge. Every coincidence is a precise calculation. Every accident is a well-considered act. It’s romance against fate between Qingzhou Gu and the Young General. What will happen to this ambitious girl who’s so determined to take back the heritage from her mother? The epic revenge and romance is unveiled now!

(Source: MangaToon)

title.english: I Was XXX By My Idol

description:
From Webcomics: 
Broken up with boyfriend, she was walking angrily and sadly on the street and ran into a man. The next day she woke up and found herself in the bed with her dream idol Ji Chen! is it crazy? The following paparazzi pushes her into a dilemma- to become his girlfriend or...

He had been missing for eight years. But no one realized that he had traveled to another world and cultivated for eight thousand years! After returning to earth, he looked for his sister, but no one thought that he would overturn all the major forces on the earth at the same time! He kidnapped the rich girl, but nobody would've expected that he'd wipe out her fiancee, too. He can fight hand-to-hand or brew up potions. Anyone who messes with him... will be doomed to eternal damnation!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

"A tsundere chairwoman, a demure secretary, a black diamond of a South African princess, a unique female bodyguard, and a carrot-eating, somewhat typical, bishounen - how will these people fall in love? Whether it was fate inevitable or the heart's machinations, if you meet with the Godly Expert, you will experience a one-of-a-kind apprentice life."

(Source: QQ, translated)

"Please let me off, CEO!" The seductive bar singer in his embrace, is the bespectacled boy who had a one-sided love with him for years. He wouldn't want to meet this boy again, but this boy became his assistant on the second day?! He felt ridiculed... This boy in disguise, is it to avoid an old flame, or some other reason?

(Source: WebComics)

Note: Includes 7 extras.

title.romaji: Zhege Fanpai Youdian Liangxin, Danshi Bu Duo!
title.native: 这个反派有点良心，但是不多！

description:
Qing Feng accidentally transmigrated to ancient times and became an overlord, the master of the Qing family. He thought that he could finally live a life where he’d have everything just by lying down. Who would know that his twin brother is the “legendary chosen one” and he’s the “destined villain”? To survive, he can only work hard with the help of the system!

[Ding Dong detected that the host smacked the chosen one’s ass. 100 villain points acquired]

[Ding dong, congratulations, host, on triggering the mission, tease the bathing Bi Yu. reward 200 villain points.]

Sometimes being a villain doesn’t seem like a bad idea

Wang Huan, is a veteran assassin who has an important mission and is to eliminate the head of the Lin Group. However, something goes awry and the mission is declared a failure. Moreover his informant turns out to want him dead. An explosion and he should have died... But instead wakes up in a game world where there are insect people. What will happen to him now?

Zhi Banyi has a secret. His heart only beats faster when he listens to a streamer called "Dust Under the Light" speak... So, Zhi Banyi decided to go see a psychiatrist. He never could have imagined that his psychiatrist would be the "female" streamer that made his heart beat every night!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

When Ye Yun was reborn in the Tianwu Continent, he activated the Realm Devouring System, and gained a special reward for a one-million-times attack speed boost. That has made him into an invincible powerhouse! As the saying goes, nothing beats speed. You think I’m just picking my nose and cleaning my ears? In fact, I have just stabbed you 35,000 times, swung my sword 87,000 times, and also hit you with all sorts of physical attacks and other secret martial art techniques… Anyone still think they can stop me?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

A drop of demon blood breaks the way through mountains and rivers. An ancient Confucian classic shows the cycle of the sun and the moon. A book with invincible tactics defeats the honor of the heaven. Yang Qingxuan, as the destined successor to invincible tactics, blazed a trail to defeat countless talents of the world and embarked on the immortal journey of the strong! “I always subdue people by virtue and those who disobey are all dead!

(Source: Webnovel)

The current heiress had her identity changed? I suffered humiliation when I returned to my birth family? My childhood sweetheart betrayed me for my younger sister? And not only did someone harm me, causing me to lose my unborn child, but I was also exiled by my family? Could I be any more unfortunate?
But don't worry. Wait until I've entered that mysterious organization -- I'll become a new person, make a strong return, and start planning my revenge! But then a certain man -- a company president and single father -- asked me to live with him? What in the world is going on?!

(Source: Webnovel)

[Black-bellied top student x Two-faced school grass]

"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Note: "School grass" (校草) is a term for the most handsome boy in school.

The end is here, the waterways have dried up, and the plants are dying. The world is in a panic, as food and survival become people's top concerns. Rice and noodles have become luxuries, and vegetables are priceless! However, at this time, someone posted a shocking video online. Succulent vegetables are dropped into the boiling hot-pot, all vibrantly green! The roasted leg of lamb is sizzling with rich golden color! The fish soup is white as milk with rich goodness! The little girl at the tabled begged, "Brother, I'm so full that I can’t eat anymore!"

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Zhe Zuo Gongyu Quan Shi Yao

description:
Gu Bai, carrying his painting board behind him, has moved into an amazing apartment.

He noticed that the neighbor to his left is a headline queen, and on his right is the infamous acting king. On the upper floor, there is a supermodel living on the left side and a gold medal lawyer on the right side. And across his room, is a powerful big shot who is constantly featured in finance magazines.

The ordinary Gu Bai will soon begin an unusual day.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

At a young age, she was a genius medical doctor who was imprisoned by her grandfather. But just as she managed to escape her shackles she met with misfortune and crossed over to another world. Now she's the overbearing, yet good-for-nothing, eldest daughter within the Duke's family. Everyone ridicules her for having no spirit familiar, and even her fiance takes joy in bullying her! But so what? I've got my accupuncture needles, so even if you're on deaths door and begging me, I might not help you! And that man, don't come near me! I may have saved your life, but I didn't ask you to repay with your body!

In order to break the record of being virgin for entire eight-times-life of a common high school student, the matchmaker god gives him a book about how to be lucky, getting which endowed the boy the most exciting and happiest life in the world!

(Source: MangaToon)

While shopping with his sugar-mommy, Cheng Li was suddenly sent back to the Stone Age. He will lead the primitive humans to fight off monsters, build a civilization, and live like a king. With his System, he has access to modern technology, so they can play with guns even in the Stone Age!

(Source: Bilibili, trnaslated)

Chen Fei, one of the five Great Immortals, was on the verge of death when he burnt up a godly artifact in order to return to when he was 18 years old. His girlfriend's betrayal, his friend's selling out, the bullying from his family... all the regrets on his road towards immortality. This time he will not just take it, he will not run away, and he will not give up. This time, he will be the strongest in the city!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Emperor of the Underground World (Mafia Boss) Shen Ran turned into a house husband? Not to mention doing things like washing and cooking, do I have to clean the toilet for my wife? forget it, my wife is so beautiful, this isn't a threat! But don't even try to dare steal my wife's idea? This really happened when my Shen Ran was a veteran! Don't you dare to touch my wife with your finger!

(Source: QQ, translated)

As the young lord of the Zhaoming Kingdom returned victoriously from the battlefield, he ran into a simple-minded girl with extraordinary strength. This girl's power was such that she could stir up and disturb the balance of power in the entire world. And so, a delicate political equilibrium was broken, and an all-out battle for supremacy will begin!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

He is an absolute bigwig who is decisive, cold, and callous. However, he just can't stop tangling up with her, always eager to give her all his love. On their first encounter, he questioned:"Was that you 6 years ago?" The second time they met, he was holding a paternity test report. "You're still gonna deny he is my son?" After multiple encounters, she asked: "His Excellency the Duke, are we done?" The man broke a charming smile: "Of course not. We are expecting a second baby.”

(Source: Webnovel)

The rich cat master is always in a moody mood. He always shows irritability to the caring wolf butler, but it doesn't seem to be really annoying...

(Source: Chinese Publisher, translated)

The continent of Long Mai is home to thousands of sects where cultivation is the way of life. The strong conquer everything while the weak live like ants. Young Chen Feng was born with a weak energy core, making him unable to cultivate. Nevertheless, he ignores the countless sneers directed at him. Incidentally, he comes across mysterious dragon blood that opens up a new chapter of his life. He finds himself in the embrace of charming fox spirits, a prideful empress, a magical enchantress, and even a deity princess. With unparalleled martial techniques that have manifested from the most potent martial spirit, he stares down from the highest heavens, accompanied by many beauties.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

It has been three hundred years since magic disappeared from the Divine Land. Chen Xing is the last Great Exorcist—a young man with a tenuous grip on magic whose life is destined to end on his twentieth birthday. As whispers about the return of the demonic entity known as Mara echo across the land, Chen Xing is burdened with a daunting task: to seek out his fated counterpart, the Protector Martial God, and together, to save the world.

Enter Xiang Shu, a condemned man with a haunted past. Accused of unspeakable atrocities, Xiang Shu is an enigma—handsome, skilled, and facing execution for crimes he claims he didn’t commit. As their destinies intertwine, Chen Xing and Xiang Shu embark together on a journey where the salvation of everything they know hangs in the balance.

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

Note: Includes one extra chapter.
