title.romaji: Wo Yige Wangyueche Siji You Dian Qian Zenmele?
title.english: How a Ride-hailing Driver Comes to Dominate the World?
title.native: 我一个网约车司机有点钱怎么了？

description:
In a comical turn of events, Yang Chen quits his job after a heated argument with his boss, only to receive a breakup notice from his girlfriend of six years, Zhao Feifei. Left with no other choice, Yang Chen decides to become a ride-hailing driver. After an annoying passenger complained about him, Yang Chen unexpectedly gains access to the “Prize Bad Review System”. With generous rewards from the system after getting bad reviews and his great ambition, Yang Chen worked hard and finally established his dominance in the world.

(Source: Webnovels)

"I'm actually doing this because of you, Miss Gu."

Top actress Qu Xizhi makes an unconventional decision to take on a male lead role so she can work with Gu Xizhi, another actress who shares her name. The talented yet envious Gu Xizhi worries that Qu will once again outshine her in this new drama, but is determined to give her all to the show. Once the filming begins, Gu must shoot numerous intimate scenes with Qu, whose cross-dressing is remarkably convincing. Can Gu keep up the act, or will it lead to something more... real?

(Source: Tappytoon)

title.romaji: Chongsheng Zhi Wo Shi Da Tian Shen
title.english: Reborn To Be A Great God

description:
The Haotian Emperor, also known as "Lin Haotian" was a genius amongst the immortals. The elder immortals felt threatened and conspired to assassinate him. At the last moment, he was able to escape with the last of his strength, breaking through time and space to revert to his youth. This time, he will rewrite his life to truly become the most powerful being in the universe.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

The Golden Horse Award winner for best actor, Yuan Mu, was murdered but his soul was trapped in a young and handsome body. The place of rebirth unexpectedly is the bed of his enemy, Huo Yi! And Huo Yi is his breadwinner?! While dealing with this fickle breadwinner, he is also trying to take down the man who killed him. Spending time with Huo Yi, Yuan Mu seems to have gradually fallen in love with the man he once hated the most?

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Wo Jia Da Shixiong Naozi You Keng

description:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest apprentice of a sect who has a problem with his brain.

Dong Fang Xian Yun is reincarnated as the eldest disciple of the Care-free sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his sibling disciples while avoiding flags left and right.

Included chapters: 10.5

title.romaji: Chongsheng Zhi Zui Qiang Mo Zun Zhuixu

description: Xuan Qiu Tuo finds a heavenly scroll that will return him to the world where he died—a world where his father reigns supreme as the Demon King. The only catch: Xuan Qiu Tuo is brought back in the body of the recently deceased Su Yun Lan. Armed with both the Heavenly Scroll and the Demonic Possession, the secret cultivation technique of the Nine Hells Clan, a new and improved Su Yun Lan is out for the King’s head and the Princess’s hand in marriage.

Wang Sheng was unexpectedly returned to the night before the sudden rebirth of spiritual energy on earth. Not content with being an ordinary nobody like in his previous life, he decided to learn martial cultivation and became an apprentice to a grand-master from his previous life. There were no celebration nor congratulations, just lots of hard work under the eyes of his picky master and emotionless prefect. Little did he realize he was only just getting started on the path of immortal cultivation...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Xiu Lian Cheng Xian De Wo Zhi Xiang Yang Cheng Nü Tu Di
title.english: I Just Had To Pick Up a Female Disciple
title.native: 修炼成仙的我只想养成女徒弟

description:
On my path in cultivation to reach immortality, I had only wanted a female disciple. But this disciple may have something to do with my wife of my previous life!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.english: Come On, I Need A Couple!

description:
Shocking! A clueless boy was seduced to be used as a cultivation vessel by an older woman on top of his ancestral tomb? That actually helped to cure his mysterious disease, and set him on his way towards immortal cultivation. Huh?... Must practice mutual cultivation again within 30 days? Otherwise, he will die?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Wan Zha Chao Huang Zhi Shouxiang Daren

description: Cheating Men Must Die side story. The beginning of intern Su Lüxia journey of abusing scum.

One day, a young man ​occupied a mountain, and crowned himself the king. Henceforward, this place was full of masters and beasts. But wait... What am I looking at? Masters are plowing farmlands, and beasts are guarding the yards? Something's wrong...

(Source: Webnovel)

The Saintess of the Sea Concubine Palace, in her summoning ceremony, summoned the lowest ranked companion as her soul pet- the water elemental. “But how could a Saintess only summon a water spirit? It must be something better, like the powerful water emperor!” “I'm really just a normal rookie! Why'd you pick pick me to be your Saint?”

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Exhausted mentally and physically, Song Liaoliao is ready to leave it all behind. She couldn't have anticipated that the new director is her past sweet– No, her old classmate. It should simply be a reunion of old friends, but Song Liaoliao unexpectedly finds herself slowly falling into Pei Yu's love trap...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Luna has been keeping her powers a secret from other people. One day, she initiates a fire in her house for being distracted, and is there when she comes to know that she's actually a witch. after that, She's summoned by her grandmother and goes to an island to train as a witch... a story about a modern witch and werewolf is about to begin.

Military doctor Wang Yu returns to the city incognito, but he seems destined to lead a life full of chaos, conspiracy, assassinations, and affairs with beautiful women... Being able to kill anyone in the world with martial art skills and to save anyone with medical skills, Wang Yu roams the city as he pleases!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wo De Shifu Mei Dao Daxian Cai Tupo
title.english: My Master Only Breaks Through on the Edge of Death
title.native: 我的师傅每到大限才突破

description:
#Ancient Style##System#Ancient-style parallel world, funny system, cultivating immortality through turtling!
"Mr. Xu, I'm to blame. Your time is running out, and yet I couldn't help you break through."
"Don't worry. I won't die."
"It's all my fault. I should've got you more Foundation Establishment Pills, then you wouldn't..." The pride of the sect knelt on the ground, crying loudly.
Xu Fan looked at his senior disciple and knew that there was no other way to comfort him, so he took out a Foundation Establishment Pill and swallowed it.
In an instant, the surrounding world was filled with a divine light of five colors.

(Source: Webnovel)

Clare's grandpa is on his deathbed, but the greedy relatives are concentrated on fighting each other for his legacy with nasty means. Will they get what they want? Will the Underground Satan, Bruce Warner, who's also the son-in-law in the family, turn the table for Clare?

(Source: WebComics)

The modern cultivation world has become a place of intrigue and calculation. The strong prey on the weak. Everyone feels insecure. The security guard, Hero Ma, started his cultivation by accident after he saved a girl cultivator...

(Source: Webnovel)

Su, born in prison, has always wanted to see the "crow" from the story her mother told her. On the day she was going to be secretly executed, Gill, an artificial intelligence with a database of everything outside the prison, was thrown into prison for a test run. Su develops a special feeling for Gill, not caring whether her words are programmed or self-conscious, and not trying to tell if she has human emotions. Unable to distinguish her own human feelings... in this small cell, the lonely Su got her first doll--she met a "person" who could comfort her soul.

title.english: Trial Marriage Husband: Need to Work Hard

description:
The night before their wedding, her fiancé ran off with his mistress. Out of frustration, she grabbed the man standing in front of the Civil Affairs Office, "President Mo, your bride has not arrived and my groom has run away...May I suggest we get married?"
Before marriage, she said, "Even if we were to share the same bed, nothing would happen between us!" After marriage, he said, "If we don't try, how would we know?"

(Source: Webnovel Comics)

When Qin Lie realized that he could only protect himself with power, he resolutely stepped onto the path to becoming an Immortal. He used blood to write an everlasting legend, demons and deities, a mortal transcending, outside the three realms, all could be seen!

title.native: 美女大小姐的僵尸高手

description:
Yang Cheng, a loser who got cheated on by his girlfriend, drank far too much and got lost in the woods where he was bit by a zombie and turned into a zombie with super power himself! After then he became a pretty, Ye Xuanlin’s bodyguard and found out that she was in great danger! Will he protect her? What should he do now?

(Source: MangaToon)

A dark blade that came from nowhere, and a lovely girl who bumped into Qi Ge's life in this summer changed his destiny. The peaceful life halted. The indoorsy young man opened the gate of a whole new world — Fight this damned fate!

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Wo Shi Ge Jia De NPC

description: Games are now more immersive than they have ever been since fully diving into a game is perfectly possible! But what would you do… If you get spawned as a NPC Blacksmith? SuFei begins his everyday bitter and dull Blacksmith life together with a beautiful female player and his Loli assistant. However, everything ended in that NPC trip….. Don’t come over, I’m really a NPC! Wait, what the heck is your slogan? “ Exterminate the players, the world belongs to the NPCs?"

When a struggling vlogger meets a superstar writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone right since meeting her!

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of losing her vlogger contract, gets involved with the scandal-ridden writer Song Li purely by accident. All of a sudden, they've become a trending topic, touted as a couple, and blowing up her viewer traffic... Is this what it takes to finally make it as a vlogger?

(Source: Dongman, translated)

title.romaji: Chongsheng Hou Wo Yong Jingmian Fan Zhuan Fuchou
title.native: 重生后我用镜面反转复仇

description: 50 years after the game world merging with reality, a top warrior appeared. He devoted his whole life to the world, yet was ultimately killed by the king out of fear and jealousy. Before his death, he awakened the mirror ability and sealed his soul beneath the lake's surface. The king covered up the true history and fabricated a new one, branding the warrior as a traitor in the eyes of the world. Decades later, the warrior awakened in the body of a dying man and began his vengeance using mirror ability.

His name is Qin Ruo and he is a very dangerous person; with handsome but somewhat nasty gaze, he gives rather complicated impressions to others. Owning a third-story villa with a huge swimming pool, he is literally a rich guy but what he only lacks is a hot female companion! "Can I stay here?" she knocked open his door. He ogled her curved body with his eyes almost popping out and welcomed her in...

(Source: MangaToon)

I didn't want to cause any trouble, but the lot of you forced my hand! The life of a modern Taoist priest will shake your imagination! You're in for a treat with these babes and hunky eye candy!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Gu Xinghe is a high school student with few words. After a mysterious bloody red rain, he suddenly found he became the target of a group of monstrous creatures, "the Death Disciples." Whatsmore, his beloved friend Lu Yang fell into a coma on his birthday from the monsters' attack, while Xinghe was saved by a girl with tremendous power. To save his friend, Xinghe joined the "Energy Hunters" academy that the girl attends, and start training to fight the "Death Disciples" and other dark powers.

(Source: Mangatoon)

The fallen emperor Qin Yun, the inheritance of Jiuyang, awakened the world of martial arts, learned the skills of the world. Since then, he has been on the Xiuwu Avenue. A variety of martial arts strong, in order to seek his refining, willing to serve as his younger brother.

Adopted into a strange family to replace their recently deceased daughter, Skye hasn’t had it easy. Her brothers torment her daily and her new adoptive mother is terminally ill. Can Skye survive and finally seize her own happiness?

A relatable story exploring trust, friendship, love and the ever uncertainty of the future.

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Shixiong a Shixiong Shizai Tai Wenjian Le
title.native: 师兄啊师兄实在太稳健了

description:
After being reborn in ancient times before the Fengshen War, Li Changshou became a small-time cultivator.

To survive in the cruel Primordial Times, Li Changshou tried his best not to get involved in any conflicts and never allowing himself to walk into dangerous situations. His plan was to hide away in the mountains and quietly cultivate his way towards immortality. However, everything changed one day when his master brought back a young girl to be a new apprentice under him…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Xiang Ting Ni Shuo Xihuan Wo
title.english: I Want to Hear You Say That You Like Me

description:
Xu Yuan unwittingly discovers that his best friend has fallen in love with him and is now running away from that realization...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Note: Chapter count includes 3 extras.

The Emperor of Thunder, Chen Lei, failed in his ascension, and as fate would have it, he reincarnated back to his teenage days when his family hadn't been destroyed and his parents hadn’t died tragically. Chen Lei is determined to make up for his regrets! With memories of his past life, Chen Lei, with his enormous talents, embarks on his ultimate journey to become invincible—to protect his family, to crush his enemies, and attain all the treasures in the world. When he’s drunk, he’s surrounded by pretty women; when he’s sober, he’s the invincible supreme with the power to control the world!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

The obedient female schoolmaster Qin Qing was accidentally involved in a fight on the first day of transfer. Qin Qing used a plan to save the besieged senior. She did not expect that the senior was the discolored school bully Wen Yufeng. From now on, Qin Qing's peaceful campus life will never return...

(Source: MangaToon)

Hang Xingwang, a struggling office worker, makes the drastic decision to quit his job at a media company, despite having no plan to care for his ailing mother. However, this reckless choice unexpectedly unlocks a mysterious system—one that only he can see—the Divine System. With this system, every action he takes is transformed into a calculated risk, and each decision rewards him with real money. Now, with this powerful opportunity in his hands, how will Xingwang navigate his way from rags to riches?

(Source: Webnovel)

title.english: Breaking Through the Clouds 2: Devouring the Seas

description:
Wu Yu, a newcomer to the Public Security Bureau, is gentle and frail. He doesn’t care about the difficulties posed by Bu ChongHua, his strict boss, and only wants to stay in the background and be paid on time with enough to sustain himself. However, no one knows that he is being targeted by top drug traffickers for a large bounty, or that this courageous young man had previously slaughtered the dragon of the abyss. With a chain of interlocking cases, a series of troubles come one after another. Can these two work together to survive the difficulties?

(Source: INKR)

A young man discovers that his innocent girlfriend turns out to be a plaything of rich people. After he was cheated on that he obtains the strongest cultivation system by chance. From that moment, he starts his counter strike! A "perspective amulet" that can see through all things, a "golden creation pill" that can heal all diseases, dressing in women's style can obtain magical ability? It can be said that once the system is one's hands, one can gain the whole world

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: E Nu Jujue Pao Nan Zhu

description:
Transmigrating as the villainess of a cliché imperial manhua isn't scary, what's scary is that the male leads are all children! Not only do I have to take care of children, but I'm also being courted by one of them and being called "wife"! Ms. Hong would like to say: "Screw you, god!" 凸(｀⌒´メ)凸

Note: Includes two extra chapters.

title.romaji: Kaiju You Jianyu, Wo Nenggou Cheng Jianshen
title.native: 开局有剑域，我能苟成剑神

description:
Zhang Fan transmigrated into another world and finally became a cultivator. But he was betrayed and lost all of his cultivated powers, leaving him on the verge of death, when his System finally came online. Now gods, demons, and immortals are nothing compared to him. The invincible Zhang Fan wanted to draw his sword and conquer the world, but it turns out his powers have a limited range. To gain experience and expand his territory, he must lure his enemies to come to him. Thus, the legend was born about how he overcame countless enemies to gain immortality with his sword.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Fang Zheng, the head of the Ministry of Justice in the Da Xi Dynasty abhorred evil, a stance that antagonised many against him. Surrounded and attacked from all sides by his enemies, Fang Zheng died on Cang Luan mountain. But his soul would resurrect in a weak child, along with the memories of his past life, his passionate desire for justice, and his belief in punishing evil with evil. Fang Zheng will strike down those in his path without mercy until he becomes the most revered and respected on both heaven and earth.

Having a secret crush is just like drinking a bottle of hard liquor. You clearly know that it will make you light-headed, lose your cool, and suffer. Yet, just like a moth to the flames, you endure the pain knowingly. "You stop right after having a sip of it but, as for me… I'm drunk in love."

However, inevitably, you finally sober up after being drunk. This is a story about doing everything possible just to continue having a secret crush and learning to love someone.

title.romaji: Monu Yu Sheng Nu De Shiyong Fangfa
title.native: 魔女与圣女的使用方法

description: My father remarried to a beautiful stepmother and they traveled abroad. My new aunt Qianhe of the same age moved into the house. I thought I was going to start a life that I wouldn’t be ashamed of, but I didn’t expect my aunt to be a demon-slaying immortal, and I Sanqiu to be highly coveted by demons. Attacks continued… but I was surprised to find out that my childhood sweetheart Xiaoyou, who I haven’t seen for many years, turned out to be the strongest assassin of the Deity management organization “Banished Deity Bureau.” And now she has feelings of hostility towards Qianhe, who she sees as her rival in love…..

Dream chaser Nuo En accidentally bumped into the queen of fashion Jun Ling one day, and since then accidentally interlocked their fates. Two individuals from completely different backgrounds began living together after that. However, conspiracy after conspiracy slowly unveil themselves over time; will timid Nuo En alone be enough to save Jun Ling's heart from freezing forever? 
(Source: Bilibili Comics)

What kind of chemistry would happen between a homebody and a teenager with cat ears? Will the recluse's new roommate change his homebound tendencies?

(Source: Webnovel)

Note: Includes 5 extra chapters.

After her boyfriend cheats on her, Luo Yaoyao lets loose, gets drunk at a bar... and makes a move on the king of the underworld after mistaking him for a simple male host. Shoot -- she had better run quick! But could running away really be that easy? Dream on! Two years later, she takes a temporary job at China's number one company. And little does she know that her nightmare is just getting started...

(Source: Webnovel)

The short-lived prodigy, Shi Jiang, just seven years old, is growing up super fast. In order to restore normal life, he broke into the fairy world with a great fairy who was boarding in his body, and then embarked on the legendary road of becoming a fairy tycoon...

(Source: WebComics)

He is her younger brother, although the two have no blood relationship but she always considers him to be her biological brother … can only be brother that’s all. of course he doesn’t want to be like that, but he is also afraid that he will create distance with her more and more far away. If their first meeting in life was not like that, would they have another result? The girl he loves is right in front of his eyes but is like a wind and can’t hold … Can only as younger brother? How must he do to let her know that he can also become a guardian for her whole life?

title.romaji: Wo Duo She Le Modao Zu Shi Ye

description:
A kind young man accidentally transmigrated into the body of the master of the villainous demonic sect, just as the master lost his powers due to the thousand-year limit. Facing betrayal by his own disciples and attacks by other righteous sects, he must complete the missions issued by the Absolute System in order to survive. But those missions — are all about doing good and being helpful!?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

While working at his part-time job, he saw his girlfriend going to a love-hotel with another man! To win his girlfriend back, Yao Bing will set out on the path to revenge by becoming a real estate developer in Hell. Along the way, he'll recruit minions, seduce beauties, and uncover the hidden plot behind his girlfriend's actions. You might have looked down on me before, but now you'll all be bowing down to me!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Shi Shang Zui Qiang Lian Ti Lao Zu

description:
Ye Cangxuan, the grandmaster of Body-strengthening Cultivation died while passing through the Eternal Heavenly Tribulation. When he wakes up again, he becomes mortal and returns to the sect he founded. This time, the invincible grandmaster is set to punish the villains and restore his godly might!

(Source: WebComics)

An accident gave an ordinary boy, Ye Han, the magical power to see through practically anything, and his life has become colorful since then. He has built the strongest business empire, dominated the world of gambling, raised people from the dead with his medical skills and became a divine physician and a billionaire, which made beautiful girls fall for him. However, a shocking plot and secret is going to hit him...

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Tai Gu Shi Xiong: Bie Ren Yu Shou Wo Yu Shouniang
title.native: 太古十凶：别人御兽我御兽娘

description:
When our hero awakens a mysterious system, he gains ten incredibly powerful beast girls as companions! This former loser teams up with his adorable yet fierce beast girl partners, climbing step by step toward the pinnacle of global power. An epic adventure filled with heart-pounding action and unbreakable bonds is about to begin! When our hero awakens a mysterious system, he gains ten incredibly powerful beast girls as companions! This former loser teams up with his adorable yet fierce beast girl partners, climbing step by step toward the pinnacle of global power. An epic adventure filled with heart-pounding action and unbreakable bonds is about to begin!

(Source: WebComics)

title.english: Soul Land - The Legendary Gods' Realm
title.native: 斗罗大陆外传神界传说

description:
Due to the God of Goodness and the God of Evil's reincarnation and changes, the Divine Realm's internal strife has been gradually increasing. The God of Destruction is the head of a faction opposed to Sea Asura God who heads another faction, eventually leading to war. However, it is at this time that the Sea Asura God's wife has become pregnant. Tang San has a premonition that a crisis bigger than the Divine Realm’s internal conflict is about to arrive. What is this crisis? The Legend of the Divine Realm is set after Peerless Tang Sect and in this story, many familiar characters will appear once again.

Note: Chapter count includes four extras chapters.

Nine regions fight for control of the world, and one shot determines everything! A young villager with a desire to get stronger starts on the slow path of cultivation. A life changing mystery! A competition between nine regions! The winner becomes king! What is in store for him?

title.romaji: Wo! Shishang Zui Qiang Jin Zhou Shi

description:
Ye Lin is transported to a world overrun by demons. On the day of his class advancement, he becomes an SSS-rank Forbidden Spell Mage—only to be met with laughter and ridicule. Why? Because casting forbidden spells consumes the user's own life force. It's the most powerful class, but also a guaranteed death sentence. What they don't know is Ye Lin's secret: he's immortal. The class's fatal flaw means absolutely nothing to him. When they witness Ye Lin casually spamming hundreds of forbidden spells at once, everyone completely loses their minds.

"Just how many lives do you HAVE?!"

"Are you seriously using ultimate-level spells as your basic attack?!"

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: He Qin Gongzhu Bu Tai Xing

description: For my country, I was prepared to sacrifice myself, even for marriage. But the one I had to marry happened to be a girl. I had thought I had pranked the goddess pranker, but unexpectedly the goddess had pranked me.

The stupid antics of four dudes living together, their “no pain, no gain” lifestyle in school, and maybe there’ll be some romance in the mix.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

When Lu Yinbing won the Golden Palm Best Actress Award for her performance in "Broken Snow," the popular actress Xia Yitong realized her defeat and broke down in tears on live television. A huge flame war erupted online between their fanbases. Yinbing's fans called Yitong a sore loser, while Yitong's fans claimed that she was just being real. Little did the fans know, behind the scenes the two women were already...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

To fulfill the last wish of his grandpa, Xiong Yu returned to Shangcheng and planned to marry Qiu Hongxin, a beautiful president of a university, but he was refused because the engagement was arranged before they were born and they didn't have feelings for each other. To nurture their relationship, Xiong Yu became a TCM physician in the school hospital. At this point, his good luck in adventures with women just began...

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Ai Yu Sha Yi Zhi Ye

description:
Ten years ago, the beta was at his peak as a hit-man, when he was seriously injured while trying to save an alpha child. Having lost his edge as a killer, he retired to the countryside with a new identity to start a new life. Until an unexpected visitor showed up one day. That boy he saved has grownup to become the leader of his own gang, and now he's come looking for him with crazed intentions.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

What would you do if you got yourself a big-breasted maid? This maid even has silvery hair and red eyes like a goddess. That sounds… kinda awesome… But… wait… wait a minute… how can my maid be the demon lord? That's not how this was suppose to go!? My dear Demon Lord, please change out of those clothes and I will take you home right away.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

A 19-year-old girl named Qing Tian was suddenly transported in time to an unknown dynasty. At first, she thought she could slowly enter the battles of the harem, but she’s surprised to find out that she's actually the Queen! How did this messy story come to be??

Note: Includes prologue and five bonus chapters.

Having suffered humiliation in youth and then moving forward with exceptional martial talent, to inherit the role of the overlord,
to ride the king of demon beasts, break through all obstacles and seize back his family estate, ascend to the pinnacle of the martial arts world and flip the order of heavens!

God’s Identity Card: Lu Lanqiao, a forensic science student, became the most likely suspect in the murder of his elder brother overnight. His brother's last words put him on the run. While trying to find out who killed his brother, Lanqiao met Fu Cheng, the police inspector who was hot on his trail. However, the relationship between the fugitive and the pursuer gradually changed…

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Her father was missing when she was 3 years old; her hand tendon was cut when she was 15; her mother died in a planned car accident when she was 16; she was framed by her relatives when she was 19; she was burnt alive by her newlywed husband and friend when she was 22. Perhaps the god pities her and makes her reborn to the age of 15. She kept a low profile in the previous life but ended up with being betrayed miserably; this time she will not show any weakness and make those who harmed her pay with their lives!

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Zhibo Zheng Huo, Wo Xiang Nügui Qiuhun: Ta Juran Zhen Daying Le?!
title.native: 直播整活，我向女鬼求婚——她居然真答应了？！

description:
Trying to spice up his program, Fang Ning hired a cheap film crew to livestream him spending a night in an ancient princess's tomb. But something unexpected happens during the broadcast. Fang Ning mistook the princess's ghost as a just an actress and proposed marriage to her! Now the ghost is taking it seriously!? Can I get some help from the chat! Urgent!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Born poor in the slums, Sun Ran is a naturally gifted game hacker. He used many alt characters running cheats in various virtual worlds to make money outside the law, until he got caught and banned by the admins, which also cost him a nine-hundred-million fine. To pay for his debts, he worked out a deal with the central computer, to become the upholder of justice. He will face off against the game hackers and cheating players in a fierce battle of wits.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

There are many reasons why Xia Xu and Bai Li should not be together. For one, Xia Xu is a poor half-vampire, while Bai Li is the werewolf CEO of the prestigious White Wolf Group. But things take an unexpected turn when Bai Li’s young nephew, Luo Bo, gets lost while heading to the CEO’s office. Xia Xu takes the helpless wolf cub back home with him, not knowing that the boy’s furious uncle is on his way to completely destroy the vampire’s house in search of him. Now having no place to go, Xia Xu begins to live with the two werewolves until his place gets repaired. And with a playful pup between them, the two men from different worlds begin to grow closer and closer…

(Source: Tappytoon)

Note: Includes six extra chapters.

title.english: The Day l Woke up as the Sacrificial Princess

description:
Despite carrying royal blood, Bryanna lived outside of the palace for most of her life. Upon returning to the palace, she discovers Lilian, the emperor's illegitimate daughter who successfully charmed the emperor with her "adorableness." In the original novel of this story, when the emperor has to offer the life of one of his daughters to the gods, he decides to sacrifice Lilian instead of Bryanna, but Lilian survives and Bryanna dies at the age of 18. However, now there is a new soul in Bryanna's body, and she is determined to go against the original plot.

(Source: Tappytoon)

June, an oriental girl in a foreign country, becomes the queen's dress-up doll to make a living! June wants to escape once she earns enough money, but she gets caught up in a bigger conspiracy struggle for power.

(Source: WebComics)

Note: Chapter count includes 2 bonus chapters.

title.romaji: Luo Xiaohei Zhan Ji: Lanxi Zhen

description:
Lanxi Town tells the story of Laojun, Xuanli, and Qingning during the war. It shows a different world of demons and gods.

(Source: Beijing United Publishing, translated)
After being reborn, Sayi vows to break free of her foster mother’s control.

title.romaji: Tun Xia Yige Xiu Xian Shi Jie

description:
The lord of the four divine worlds, lord Xiao, was betrayed by his brother. He set up a death trap that killed Xiao. After millennia, the soul of the lord found a vessel, bringing Xiao Fan back to life. Spilled divine blood, captured heavenly castle, unclear fate of his beloved wife - all this kindled the all-consuming fire of hatred in his heart. And now he intends to return to his divine abode behind the heads of traitors and take their lives! Possessing the almighty Dantian, he will open heaven and earth, absorb darkness and light, destroy yin and yang!

Note: Includes two extra chapters.

title.romaji: Jue Bu He Huli Zuo Pengyou de Tuzi
title.native: 绝不和狐狸做朋友的兔子

description:
One is a rabbit girl with a congenital defect, and the other is a fox girl that's super popular but has a lonely heart. Despite their differences, they are each other's precious 'The Other Me in This World'. When they meet, a story of mutual healing and mutual growth begins...

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

A silly story about two corporate presidents who have been married for seven years. The submissive one accidentally hit his head too hard, and suddenly became the dominant one in the relationship.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

A young yarn shop owner, Mao Rong, was raised to believe love could touch people’s lives. That all changed when he met Yang Yusheng, a popular but rude artist disgusted by the touch of other people. After accidentally injuring Yang Yusheng’s hand, Mao Rong promises to nurse him back to good health. Cooking, cleaning, Mao Rong does his best to make things right despite Yang Yusheng telling him he’s doing everything wrong. Little does he know Mao Rong’s touch is the first that makes him feel… good.

Can Mao Rong knit Yang Yusheng back together? And why is Yang Yusheng afraid of skin contact? The strings of fate have been tied together!

(Source: Tapas, edited)

Xiaotao likes his college senior Bo, and Bo likes Xiaotao, but neither of them is smooth enough to tell the other how they feel! Luckily, Bo’s sister is a popular BL writer and knows every romance trick in the book. Xiaotao, on the other hand, has an overenthusiastic BL-reading sister in his corner. Each new day means a different strategy to bring the lovebirds together. With such good intentions and expertise on their side, it should be smooth sailing from here… right?!

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes prologue, two special chapters, and a six-chapter epilogue.

Born in a stone, I was treated as a little monster. When I‘ve grown up, I fulfilled my master’s wish – to marry into my wife’s family. From then on, I got a nickname “kept man”. However, nobody knows that I am the most extraordinary swordsman in the world. I don’t care whether they call me monster or Zhui Xu(son-in-law living in the home of his wife’s parents). Just wait and see how I conquer the world!

(Source: WeComics)
A super keyboard, comeback life of a technology nerd. Money! Girls! I want it all! Because I have a magical keyboard!! I am the Super Keyboard Man!!!

Five years ago, their schemes caused the downfall of his father's company. For the sake of his father's medical treatment, he suffered humiliation from his relatives, and he was even heartlessly abandoned by his fiancée and left to die in a river. Five years later, he returned as a general with monstrous authority. His goal? Payback!

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Shuohuang de Xiao Gou Hui Bei Chi Diao de
title.native: 说谎的小狗会被吃掉的

description:
Rio is a transfer student at a high school full of carnivores. Knowing how dangerous carnivores can be, Rio’s older brother advises him to lie about being a wolf when he’s actually a small dog. Even though Rio follows the advice, he’s immediately found out by his classmate, a cunning and flirtatious fox named Ryu. Ryu says he’ll keep Rio’s secret, but there’s a catch. He won’t do it for free...!

(Source: Tappytoon)

The Demon Lord of the starry heavens has been reborn!

I am the demon lord, the gods will be my slaves, and the immortals will be my servants!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Four years ago, she left in despair, heart-broken. Four years later, she came back, with a kid by her side. Before she could settle down, the first thing (or man) she has to deal with is this unreasonable CEO, who cannot be greener when it comes to hitting on a girl… The moment he sees her, his whole linguistic system is reduced to four words 一"I. WANT. YOUR. SON!" Who the heck would use this type of pickup line?

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Yu Xue Shang Hou: Leng Fu Qiang Chong

description:
A reborn and revenge story. This time, let me protect you!

Nan Yun, daughter of a merchant, fell in love with the rebellious General Huo Mingcheng and became his Empress Consort. However, Huo Mingcheng sentenced her to death to please his new lover. The snow in June allowed Nan Yun a second chance in living her life again. She was reborn to revenge, and she’s determined to reverse her tragedy…Under her cold appearance, she was gradually touched by Yan Zechen, and the sincere affection silently grew between them when he’s protecting her in silence. It turned out that they had met each other in the previous life…

(Source: Wecomics)

By chance, Li Yunmu found a supercomputer from humanity’s dark ages. After that, his pathetic life would never be the same! Aptitude? Talent? Who needs those? I have neither aptitude nor talent, but my shadow can keep grinding experience for me in real life even when I'm away. XP, mana, weapon mastery……. all of them could be hacked, so I'm gaining experience even while I'm asleep.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

I, Gu Shaoyang, have the ability to extract and fuse other people's attributes. Extracting the foundational talents from geniuses, I instantly became the most fearsome cultivator in the world. Fusing cheap stones and useless potions, I can create priceless gems and godly elixirs. Now I just want to know: when will I be invincible?!!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Wo De Yi Tian You 48 Xiaoshi

description:
The God of Time – Khronos – gave Zhang Heng an incredible gift.

Time freezes at the end of the day for everyone except Zhang Heng, who gains an additional 24 hours. In exchange, Zhang Heng must act as the agent for the God of Time and participate in a dangerous game each month: Deserted Island Survival [Mission Objective: Survive for 40 days], Tokyo Drift [Mission Objective: Win the underground street racing championship], and so on…

As Zhang Heng stacks up victory after victory, he is also getting closer to the truth of this world.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: You Long Shou Hu De Xiao Zhen

description: Hua Dai found herself with an illness - whenever she touches something she wants/likes, her hands will get stuck to it until she buys it. Due to this illness, she is in great debt. Without choice, she decided to go back to her grandpa's house with this secret key her grandpa gave her in search of treasure, hoping to pay off her debts. As Hua Dai arrived at Bai Lin Village, she found a girl namd "Long" who claimed to be a disciple of her grandpa. With this, Hua Dai started living with this strange girl...

The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?

This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.

This is a story of Little Princess Luo trying to make a friend. Luo Linyuan is born with a silver spoon in his mouth and a pretty face. Yu Han is "straight", and he sleeps only three hours a day. Yu Han doesn't want Luo Linyuan to get close to him, but Luo Linyuan wants otherwise.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes 5 extras.

title.romaji: Luode Dao Yuan Shi Jishi: Lai Yin Shengming
title.english: Rhodes Island's Records Of Originium - Rhine Lab
title.native: 罗德岛源石记事——莱茵生命

description:
Ifrit met an uninvited guest at Rhodes Island: Dalia. Ifrit, Silence, and Saria can see the shadows of their past in Dalia's appearance. This causes them to start recalling their memories of what previously happened...

(Source: Official Site, translated)

Level up in the apocalypse, unlock evolutionary genes, and begin evolving to the extreme! It is the end of the world and no one is safe. Yang Hao was forced out from his shelter to survive on his own but inadvertently discovered the "Attribute Acquisition System" during a moment of crisis. "Attributes Acquired: Strength +1, Speed +1." "Acquired Mutated Attribute: Blood Awakening!" Thus, he proclaimed: "From today onwards, all the food, women, and lands that I desire shall be mine!" Since then, the mountains of corpses including mutants, evolved beasts, and ancient warriors paved a bloody path for him to ascend to the title of King of the Apocalypse!

(Source: INKR)

Note: Chapter count includes a prologue chapter.

An imperial guard got a time travel and arrived in a little girl' home. lonely and desperate for love, she treated him as her boyfriend. but he kept in mind his unfinished task in his world and eagered to go back. he promised to come back to be with her but failed. Will they meet again?
This time, let me travel through time and love you in your world...

(Source: Mangatoon)

Includes 8 side-stories

The story of post-apocalyptic wasteland filled with depravity. Follow the journey of a smuggler, a ruthless and bloodthirsty man, who is widely regarded as a monster due to his demonic blood as he ventures and smuggles goods in order to survive a world where only the fittest survive.

A smart but decadent vagrant encountered a haughty but gentle drama king with visual impairment. Having experienced something special, they started their chaotic days of living together. Could the two not-so-perfect people support and heal each other? The evening breeze would tell you the answer...

(Source: Pocket Comics)

Note: Includes one extra chapter.

When a 600-hundred-year old grandmaster died from failing the lighting test, he was brought back to the modern world. A badass-turned average joe aiming to regain all his badassness, Ye Tian has just started his urban levelling.

(Source: Mangatoon)

I'm an orphan who only ever dreamt of cooking until I fell into the clutches of the Zhao Manor. Due to my perfect looks, I found myself in constant peril, but as fate would have it, this top assassin kidnappe— I mean, employed me to be his personal chef! When he first brought me to his lair, I thought, "What the heck am I doughing here?" But he's a fierce fighter who protects me from danger, and I, Willow Ye, am determined to become a master chef! We make a great pear~ You butter believe it!

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Chapter count includes 1 bonus chapter.

In the world of Mang Huang Ji, to survive, tribes of humans have to fight against the forces of the heavens, the earth, and demons. To live long and free, the three great disasters and nine robberies sent death without regret to the immortals. Then one day, a boy named "Ji Shi" was born to the strongest tribe in Yu Ji. As a direct descendant, he bears the responsibility to protect his people, who grow to respect him. With an iron will, he begins the long journey of an immortal guardian.

One day, the game streamer Bai Xinxin transmigrated into the role of the princess Bai Yueguang in the mystery game "Nightingale and the Rose". But all the characters in this game were out to kill her, and only Lan Sha, the player character, could protect her. Amongst all the jealous yanderes and murderous rivals, Bai Yueguang has to use all her wits to fight off enemies known and unknown, while finding a way to survive with Lan Sha by her side. However, this main character "Lan Sha" also seems a bit...?!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.english: The Top Clan Leader In History

description:
Ye Wen crossed and became the lord of asect! It seems to be good, but this asect art seems to be a little weaker, and people are less... "Senior, the master said, the responsibility of revitalizing the faction will be handed over to you!" The only fellow sister said with a look: " If you can't do it, give me the position of the head!"

(Source: Webnovel)
One of Tang Dynasty’s ordinary soldiers, a small yet courageous boy, Ning Que, received an order to escort a carriage. He bids his farwell to Weicheng, and heads towards Chang An!

Reborn for the sake of a previous life. Reborn for the sake of martial arts. Chu Yang was under attack for the sake of the Jiu Jie Sword. Our hero was trapped and outnumbered by plunderers. Unexpectedly, between life and death, he was brought back 16 years in the past. Is this fate, or a coincidence? Will Chu Yang be able to change the past?

Sesame saves Rice Cake in the park, and they part ways. Rice Cake saves Sesame in the park, and this time, they become friends after Rice Cake's owner takes in Sesame. They become friends, but will that friendship progress to something more? Oh, and they're cats.

Meet the Sun Knight, the dashing leader of the Twelve Holy Knights. With his enchanting blue eyes, shining golden hair and dazzling smile he's the epitome of perfection - the perfect representative of justice and compassion. Now meet the Sun Knight's true self - the cynical, sarcastic man who would rather be anything else than be the overbearing Sun Knight who has to speaks of the Light God in all his waking hours.

What?! Why do I have to do evil things to get stronger? What kind of system is this! I just want to be a nice, ordinary guy!

(Source: AC.QQ, translated)

In Eastern History, humans and spirits exist in this world. Fox spirits have long acted as matchmakers, holding a prestigious position among spirits. In this story, the lives of a fox spirit and a man who have both rejected the idea of true love become intertwined, and their exciting adventure begins.

title.romaji: Mo Shi Zhao Huan Kuang Chao

description:
As the blood moon rises, demons invade the earth. Wen Yu is reborn back to that apocalyptic day, and given the profession of Soul Master, with the power to summon hordes of spiritual beasts. On a post-apocalyptic Earth, he will hunt powerful monsters, experience the darkness of human betrayal, survive a hopeless war, while searching for… a faint ray of hope.

(Source: Kuaikan, tanslated)

Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.

(Source: Chinese Publisher, translated)

The firefly by the water shines into the night, lonely but always heartwearming. Four teenagers meet, each with one with secrets. Trust; betrayal; an exciting youth in a colorful kaleidoscope. “Meeting you was the best thing in my life.“

title.romaji: Ba Qing Eshao: Tiaojiao Xiao Tao Qi

description:
In the hotel, she planned to surprise her boyfriend by showing up for their fifth anniversary, but it turned out to be a nightmare in her life.A stranger happened to step into her room and her life... Several years later, as a mother of two kids, she attended an interview and found the boss resembled her son. This can’t be an illusion!

(Source: Mangatoon, edited)

In the vast human realm, spanning nine heavens and ten earths, happily cultivating in a world full of wonders. When Chu Liang opened his eyes, he discovered that he had become a disciple of the Shushan Sect, bearing the powerful relic Qiyi Pagoda. From then on, he embarked on an adventure he could never have imagined. As the morning mist rises over the thirty-six peaks, he's already slaying dragons eight thousand miles away!

"Please, Young Master, help slay the demons!"

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Framed by her best friend, she was abandoned by her boyfriend and got kicked out of the family by her relatives. By accident, she spent a night with this cold president. "Since you're pregnant, let's get married. I know you don't love me, and you should know that I don't love you either." A story of this loveless contractual marriage has begun...

(Source: Webcomics)

title.english: Half My Tyrant, Half My Baby

description:
The female lead Zhang Xiao was mistaken by Mu Ya, the daughter of Mu family, as her mother. Out of her kindness, she signed the contract with the CEO Mu Chen to be a babysitter of his daughter, thus starting her "babysitting life". Mu Chen, who was originally dedicated to his career, seemed to be gradually moved by Zhang Xiao, "I broke the contract. The penalty is my daughter and me with a payback period of a lifetime. Miss Zhang, would you accept it?"

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Man Ji Chuanyue De Wo Weisheme Shi Mushi Xiaojie A
title.native: 满级穿越的我为什么是牧师小姐啊

description:
A top-level player accidentally transmigrates into the game character "he" was playing, a max-level priestess. She will team up with a dragon-maid to venture into this brand new world! However — why do all these girls keep looking at her in this funny way?!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

A story about a demon's life and death in the depths of hell. The life of the 13th-generation demon lord.

(Source: Yiben Manhua, translated)

title.romaji: Tang Yin Zai Yi Jie II: Zhi Feng Guo Jueqi
title.english: Tomin in The Alien World II
title.native: 唐寅在异界II之风国崛起

description:
Tomin, an assassin who crossed over to a different world, sat on the throne of the Wind Kingdom by virtue of his decisiveness and steadfast heart. Mysterious people showed up one after another. Let's see how Tomin, amidst all the crises and obstacles, can make the Wind Kingdom rise and unify the world!

(Source: Mangatoon)

The story was told through the microscopic perspective of an ordinary family of three. From the sudden isolation at the beginning, the struggle to survive after the zombie outbreak, to breaking out of the house for survival and the oasis. It demonstrated the post-apocalyptic world, the spread of the virus, and zombies on the rampage! How could they save themselves and survive in the face of extinction? What would they go through to survive?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Transmigrating into the world of the book, she became a supporting female role who died distressingly. Ain't got no that for this game! The female lead decided to kill the male lead, destroy the world and get out of here! When she faced this scrawny little boy, she just couldn't do it... What should she do? Raised up this boy as her helper? An excellent idea! But this boy didn't grow up as a righteous man as she expected! Could she restart again?

(Source: Webcomics)

Zhang Xiao just started playing a game called "King Of The Underworld" when he suddenly died and transmigrated into the game. See how he defeats all the plots and conspiracies to become the most powerful man in the Underworld, and conquer all the women along the way!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

When it comes to attracting women, Chu Lin has always had it easy. That is, until Chu Lin’s girlfriend dumps him on the same day he loses his job. Depressed about the future, a drunken Chu stumbles into the loving arms of a stranger—a man named Ziming Liang. Can a failed one-night stand really lead to a true love story?

(Source: Tapas)

A series of full color one shot illustrations of famous Chinese folk tales.

1. Youyuan Jing Meng (游园惊梦)
2. Feng Qiu Huang (凤求凰)
3. Jianjia (蒹葭)
4. A Jing (阿菁)
5. Qiong Tu (茕兔)

Time traveling from 21st to the Nanzhou era, as a ancient immortal, Ye Chen resorted to the ancient force to defeat the troop of State of Di who was trying to kidnap the Fairy Lady of Snow Shadow. He confessed his identify to the Fairy Lady, while there was still a big secret hidden behind his flippant smile and bold behaviour. What would this be? and was it a fate that the two people should meet?

(Source: Mangatoon)

title.romaji: Wo Kao Cai Ji Wan Wu Sheng Ji

description:
Soul aura awakens, fierce beasts roam the earth. Chi Mo transmigrated and awakens the technique of collecting. Collecting High level talent of time, can let time go faster or slower! Collecting great golden sun phoenix bloodline can let the body transform into the sun and scorch the earth! Collecting the talent of swordsmanship, can make one understands the concept of the sword and slice through everything!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Nüzhu Cong Shu Li Pao Chulai Le Zenmeban
title.english: What Do I Do? The Female Lead Has Emerged From The Book
title.native: 女主从书里跑出来了怎么办

description:
Chu Ge is a writer of generic harem webnovels. As he was writing the storyline about how the world's strongest female warrior was going to fall in love, a woman suddenly appeared in his room. She pointed a sword at his neck and told him, "If you dare to write about me falling for that man, I will kill you!"

(Source: Tencent, translated)

It's been three years since she escaped from Ibella's control. She thought she could finally live a peaceful life, free from surveillance and manipulation. But her new life hasn't gone well at all. Her girlfriend cheated on her, work is stressful, and her parents are badgering her to get married. It's almost too much to bear, like she's just gone from one hell to another. And then Ibella reappeared in her life. Will she surrender her body and soul to become a plaything once again?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

She was a top agent of the twenty-first century with divine medical skills. She transmigrated into the prime minister's manor as their third daughter, an ugly woman known far and wide to be a useless loser. Who could have known? When she came back again, she became an one-of-a-kind summoner with astonishing abilities! She thought her life was about to get better. Much to her surprise, an unexpected scheming prince walking into her life...

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Jintian Yiding Yao Dui (Rang) Ni Gaobai
title.native: 今天一定要对（让）你告白

description: The life of two "normal" high school girls? Su Mu wants to overcome her anxiety and confess to Lin Daixue. On the other side Daixue keeps leaving openings for Su Mu to confess. Both of them know each other's feelings but neither of them is willing to be truthful to the other.

title.romaji: Kaiju Shang Jiao Taigu Xianyao, Wo Xia Huai Shengzhu
title.native: 开局上交太古仙药，我吓坏圣主

description:
Bai Yifan has an antique ring that allows him to travel freely between the Earth and the fantasy world, and he has discovered that ordinary "plants and animals" on Earth will evolve into treasures when they are taken to the fantasy world. An apple evolves into a fruit of immortality, an egg will hatch into a phoenix, and a stray dog will become the descendant of dragons. He could even use tobacco to mind-control the enemy to his advantage!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Lü Bu De Rensheng Moni Qi

description:
Take the prettiest women, ride the fastest horse, and wield the sharpest weapon. One rider stopped the 18 armies of the Guandong lords. One man at the gate held back ten thousand. In a world of chaos, all the heroes bowed to him. People say that as long as Lü Bu lived, the world will never know peace. I laugh at those hypocrites, as I see no heroes here but I. Being caught in a life simulator, I lived a thousand incarnations in an instant. Having seeing and done it all, I have been reforged. Can this Lü Bu survive his fated doom at Baimenlou?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

In a moment of carelessness, he agrees to a "kill exchange" with a psycho. Regret and fear, followed by threats, make him realize that he has nowhere to run. He becomes attached, then addicted… and then he falls in love. He falls apart. He goes insane. Mysterious and cunning madman x ruthless straight guy. This will be dark but pure, sweet but cruel. Please enjoy their story that is about to begin...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)
An unattractive office lady in the fashion industry gets the chance to alter her appearance through a beauty app by completing tasks with heavy consequences.

title.romaji: Chongsheng Moxiu, Kaiju Jian Dao Yi Ke Sangshi Xingqiu
title.native: 重生魔修，开局捡到一颗丧尸星球

description:
Chu Xuan transmigrated into a world of cultivation and became a demon cultivator of Wuji Sect. So-called demonic cultivation involves the plundering of the essences of the heaven, earth, and all things. Only by slaughtering thousands of people can one become the Great Demon Lord. However, such killing is not tolerated by the heavenly order, and the Wuji Sect was hunted down and destroyed by the righteous sects. Resigned to his fate, Chu Xuan accidentally found the Blood Mirror, which allowed him to travel to a post-apocalyptic planet full of zombies! He suddenly realizes that this place is the perfect environment for demon cultivation!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

The glutton Xia Meng went out to buy a midnight snack and got into a car accident which transported her into the body of a maid in another world! And so, her life of romance, cuisine, ​and adventure officially began!

Zhao Fugui is a girl who can see everyone's life score, as she struggles every day on the front line of love trying to find the perfect 100-point boy. However, little did she know that there was already someone with 100 points near her, and who's loved her deeply all this time...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Note: Chapter count includes eight bonus chapters.
The unspeakable secrets between a handsome dentist and his patient's classmate.

A talented art student, a drama queen who gets a kick out of spending on what she likes, befriends an outgoing young model who lives a thrifty life. They grow to appreciate and learn from each other, progressing along the way.

(Source: Wecomics)

Death to those that harm my family! Death to the ones that stole my woman! Most of all, death to the ones that dare take me for a fool! After ten thousand lifetimes of perdition, Tan Yun finally recalled his true self-- the moment I awaken, the world shall tremble before me!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes the prologue.

On the cusp of attaining godhood, Daolin Zhang is slain by his enemies. However, it’s not his end since he is reborn, not just as another person, but in an entire new world! Instead of qi, spirit techniques, and martial arts, he awakens as Klay Draconic, a young boy in a realm of elves, dwarves, and sorcery. Klay masters this new type of magic in no time, and his quest for power earns him fame and enemies. Good thing he has a lifetime of experience to stay one step ahead of his foes!

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Bei Xiaohua Fenshou Hou, Wo Zhijie Wudao Tong Shen
title.native: 被校花分手后，我直接武道通神

description:
Fang Yi, transmigrated to this world, has just been dumped by his beautiful schoolmate girlfriend. He initially thought this would be the start of a modern romance, but then the system alerts him that a spiritual energy resurgence will begin in one year, leading to drastic changes in the world and the apocalypse.

“With a system, what the hell am I afraid of?”

(Source: KuaiKan, translated)

Riley has always known his feelings for his step-uncle Blake are unusual. Enchanted by Blake's charms, Riley's infatuation shatters and melds with overwhelming guilt when his parents cold-bloodedly scrape every penny from Blake, leaving him wounded and broken. The pain of betrayal distances them for years until Riley joins Blake's talent agency, swearing to make it big in showbiz to repay everything his family owes.

(Source: Webcomics)

Note: Includes two extra chapters.

A bad boy on the outside with a kind heart underneath. A rich and cold genius with family issues. Two opposite worlds collide and form a bond that lasts. “Untouchable” shows high school love can be much more than just meets the eyes.

(Source: INKR)

This is a story of a man who is cursed to live a life of solitude! Whether the ladies be eight or eighty years old, his cursed ability would affect them. Even the slightest of skin contact would cause any woman to fall into an uncontrollable state of lust and desire. Thus our hero, Sun Lang, journeys through this word in search of a way to lift his curse. He swears upon his life, that before he dies, he will regain the ability to innocently help an old lady cross the road!

(Source: MangaToon)

Fang Haotian is a young boy who is deeply in love with a girl called Ningyu, but her parents are opposed to their relationship. Ningyu is arranged for marriage to another man. Can he become strong enough to take back his beloved Ningyu from this man?

title.romaji: Quan Qiu Gui Yi Shi Dai

description:
Desperate to escape the streets after being discarded by his parents, Flynn finds hope at Willow City Necromancy Academy. There, his hidden spirit talents ignite. Crushing specters and gaining powerful spirit allies, Flynn eclipses his peers. Hailed as a prodigy, Flynn harbors a secret ambition: to become the strongest necromancer fueled by revenge from those who cast him out. As a specter horde marches, can the vengeful prodigy become a hero, or will his fury consume him?

(Source: Tapas)

This is a collection of files regarding the daily lives of Rhodes Island's operators as they relate to food. May the smells of the kitchen warm our hearts and guide us true on the road ahead. The past is gone, it's good for now.

(Source: Official Website)

Notes:
- The Chapter count includes the two volume-bonus chapters "Shio Butter Cake to Amai Kourin" and "Daichi no Plate to Rhodes no Chief Engineer".
- Rhodes Kitchen - Tidbits had a simultaneous release in both Chinese and Japanese. Although both versions got a print release announced on the respective official Arknights social media accounts after the tenth and last regular chapter, the two volumes were released in Japan on May 15th, 2023, ahead of China, where both volumes released on December 9th 2023.

Tian Ling, a persecuted young man from his clan classmate, decided to get rid of him in a tragic way that led to death. At the moment of death his blood awakened the remains of a dragon millions of years ago known as the dragon system, he revived it in order to achieve their revenge in destroying the gods and become the supreme master ... in a training journey to seek to destroy the heavens!

title.romaji: Zenmeban! Wo Chuanyue Cheng Le Zui Ruoxiao Ye Guai
title.english: What To Do! I Have Become The Weakest Little Monster
title.native: 怎么办！我穿越成了最弱小野怪

description:
“Azure" is a popular online game that has been active for ten years running. I'm a veteran who's been playing since launch, and I got a huge prize! After opening the gift... I was transmigrated into the game as the weakest little monster!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Dad remarried suddenly, and Huo Tianlin, a high school student with a fierce appearance, got two more sisters from Japan! However, these two unexpected sisters have amazing secrets! How will Huo Tianlin get along with them? And how will two girls treat Huo Tianlin?
(Source: Manga Toon)

title.romaji: Wo Zhen De Bu Xiang Dang Di Yi

description:
After multiple reincarnations and many trials, Xu Xiaowen discovered that he has been given the No. 1 Buff. No matter what he sets out to do, he always ended up as the number-one at it, but then he'd drop dead afterwards. So in this life Xu Xiaowen wished to live this life as an ordinary, useless guy, and survive until 80! But then the gods made a joke out of it, by making him an omnipotent being!?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Known in his high school as "Calamity", the "Lord of Catastrophe" Lin Xiongchen is a high school kid who's been bogged down by bad luck for most of his life. Because he is known to "attract bad luck to those who get close to him", he is ostracised by his classmates, which leads to him mastering the incredible ability of reflection which helps him evade all forms of danger. In a situation both thanks to fate and sheer coincidence, Lin Xiongchen finds himself possessed by a Demonic Lute one day. However, the curse of bad luck is simply too overwhelming, even for the demon. In order to survive, the Demonic Lute has no choice but to teach Xiongchen ways to turn the wheel of fate around to his benefit.

(Source: Bilibili)

In the Jiulong Continent, warriors are held in high regard, and their "bloodlines" determine their achievements. The most powerful one is absolutely the dragon's bloodline! Jiang Ting was bullied by his sect for his low bloodline grade. With the help of his ancestors, he worked hard to reinforce the bloodline and promote his martial arts. He swore that he would give everyone who looked down on him a slap in the face!

(Source: MangaToon)

William and Mattie were childhood sweethearts. Whenever William got into trouble, Mattie was there to protect him. They grew up together and, together, they were inseparable. Then…the car accident happened. Mattie died. When she came back as William's guardian angel, they were together again. But…it hasn’t exactly been so heavenly. Every time William approaches a girl, Mattie “protects him,” aka sabotages any attempt at romance. Now, William can’t help but wonder if she is his guardian angel or a personal devil.

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Originally serialized in Manhuahui (漫画会) with 56 chapters in total. A 107 chapter long-strip version is available through foreign licenses.

title.english: I Have a New Identity Weekly

description:
He triggered the Ultimate Mega System and gained the ability to take on a new identity every week. One week he is an ordinary-looking student who's actually the president of a global conglomerate. Then he became a doctor who could cure any disease, an unstoppable assassin, a tricky hypnotist, and all sorts of overpowered characters after that.

Su Xun: I just want to live an ordinary life, why is that so hard?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

On a seemingly uneventful day, the sky suddenly cracked, and countless monsters fell from the sky. With his innate Yin-Yang eyes, Yi Tianxing, the hero, survived the "seven-day apocalypse" with his sister and his teammates on Earth difficultly. Then thousands of planets appeared out of nowhere, and they began to merge with the Earth, forming a giant planet. Then the Earth started a new chapter called the Eternal Kingdom.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Bing Feng Mo Ri: Jue Wu Sheng Huan Zhi Lu
title.native: 冰封末日：绝无生还之路

description:
A deadly winter storm. An imminent apocalypse. Terrifying monsters. Impossible choices. This is the ultimate story of survival of a boy who dies and comes back to life.

(Source: WebComics)

From the top of martial art world to the trash after being in the top of martial art world in a young age he died Because of alcohol then he reincarnated into a body that can’t even practice martial arts but with his knowledge he will never give up.

(Source: QQ, translated)

Qiaofeng has always been single, and there are three problems that he cannot overcome: the first, being extremely handsome; the second, being fantastically rich; and the third, owning faultlessly high IQ. Legend has it that Qiaofeng has a very abnormal IQ test paper. And anyone who wants to be his girlfriend must get at least 60 points. However, perfectly avoiding all the correct answers and marking 0 in ten minutes, she actually becomes Qiaofeng's girlfriend... how does this happen...

(Source: WebComics)

Having been dumped by his girlfriend, Yang Yiyun found a precious treasure called the Universe Vessel in his moment of despair. He received the guidance of a Deity and took his first step on the path of cultivation. Medical skill, martial arts, divine techniques… He's skilled in all of them! A proud and cold president of a company, a rich businesswoman, a single mother, a gorgeous policewoman… All of them are at his side! This is the tale of a nobody who cultivates to godhood!

(Source: WebComics)

The modern-day lady-assassin found herself transmigrated into a trashy European-fantasy otome game, where she has to make the Demon Lord fall in love with her in order to save the world. Instead, she trained the villainess Lady Lisa in assassin's skills, hoping that Lisa would eventually kill her and allow her to return to the real world. But all that intimate physical contact and her own earnestness during the training caused Lisa to fall in love with her instead?

Three years ago, he harvested a spirit-boosting fruit, but was snatched away by a disciple guardian. Three years later, that disciple became the shining star prodigy in the sect. On the other hand, he discovered that the spiritual fruit was less than one-ten-thousandth the power of the new skill he acquired by chance. And now, he will rise up like a comet, carving a legendary path across the heavens!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Chen Guang, a bankrupt child of a nouveau riche family, has been drawn into quite the splendid life. His best friend, the prettiest girl in school, an immortal celebrity, a despotic and attractive policewoman, a sexy coach, the rebellious daughter of a rich family, a shy female neighbor, and a childhood sweetheart. One by one, these beautiful women ruthlessly broke into Chen Guang's fate. All of this just because he so happened to pick up a fiberglass cup.

This is a different primitive world with shape-shifting Smilodons and “Kung Fu pandas”. When the night falls, the glowing totem pillars are the only light source for the tribe. As a senior engineer, Cinder Fire is amazed by the primitive people who dominate both the sky and the earth. But he wouldn’t panic, for he’s going to be the strongest primitive. Let the ancestral fire be awoken, for the glory of the tribe!

(Source: Webnovel)

Xiao Nuo, better known as Secretary Xiao, is the dedicated and hardworking secretary of Mo Yanchuan. Mo Yanchuan, better known as President Mo, is the cold and aloof president and heir of Mo Electronics Group.

Constantly being scrutinized and nitpicked at, Secetary Xiao is convinced that President Mo hates his guts. Little does he know, however, that President Mo's feelings towards him are not what he thinks they are at all. In fact, they may be even more than he lets on...

(Source: POCKET COMICS)

title.romaji: Lingqi Fusu, Wo Mei Tian get Yi Ge Xin Jineng
title.english: Lost Powers Restored: Unlocking a New Skill Every Day
title.native: 灵气复苏，我每天get一个新技能

description:
When spiritual power reawakened in the world, Lin Qiu, who had the weakest aura, was chosen by System 9527 to be granted a new skill every day.

“Congratulations, master! You’ve obtained the skill 'Spread Your Seed'"!
Wow, that sounds exciting?

"Congratulations, master! You’ve obtained the skill 'Skill Enhancement'”!
What, I can upgrade and get even stronger?

Watch Lin Qiu game the system and turn his no-good life around!

(Source: Fanqie Manhua, translated)

title.english: The Strongest Male Lead in History

description:
Despite being born with extraordinary powers, Zhao Xiaotian suffered many hardships. After an explosion, he followed the popular trend and transmigrated to another world. But even there dark forces would not let him go. Faced with assassinations, kidnappings, and murder attempts, Zhao Xiaotian was fed up. So he joined the most powerful cultivation sect — Xiaoyaomen. Follow his path of cultivation to the peak of power!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Zhe Hunjun De Hei Yueguang Wo Dang Ding Le
title.native: 这昏君的黑月光我当定了

description:
Duan Weiying transmigrated into the body of a new concubine on a harem mission. Her goal was suppose to beat out all the other girls to become the Emperor's favorite. But she had no interest in some unfaithful playboy Emperor, and she was going to just go through the motions and abuse her cheats to finish her assignment. That was until she found out the Emperor was actually a cool, beautiful Empress, who fell in love with Duan Weiying at first sight. Now both are caught up in each other…

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Mucifer Zhan was kicked out of his family with his mother and sister by his father. Not long after, his mother was framed and forced to commit suicide. Just when Mucifer seemed to have lost all his hope for life, a mysterious man showed up and took him to the army. With hatred burning in his heart, he grew from an ordinary soldier to a ruthless warlord. Now, he's revisiting his home city and vows to retaliate those who wronged him, the hard way!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Ni Que Ai Zhe Yi Ge Ta

description:
Jian Suiying instantly falls in love the first time he sees Li Yu, his half-brother's alluring best friend. Consumed by obsession, Jian stops at nothing to win over this icy heartthrob - but just as he thinks he's succeeded, he discovers that he's been the pawn all along. Will Jian be able to overcome the pain of betrayal? And what about Li Yu? Can these two "188" guys ever find true love amidst the tangled web of desire and deception?

(Source: INKR)

Rebirth and come back, Mu Yunyao believes in three points: firstly, don't be kind to others; secondly, remove out the source of the trouble; thirdly, don't believe the true feelings. So, she is ruthless and unscrupulous. Instead of enduring, she would rather stir the world upside down. But after a encounter, there is always a cold prince following her and wanting to marry her...

(Source: Webcomics)

When he woke up, the whole world changed. Now, it is the end of the world, and the former rich, star, and high officials were all returned to be nobody. A canned meat can be exchanged for a beautiful female star who once hit the country. This is a world talking by fist…

(Source: Mangatoon)

title.romaji: Hei Lian Hua Gong Lüe Shou Ce [Chuan Shu]
title.english: The Girl of the Black Lotus

description:
I just had to be a keyboard warrior…! I read a sucky novel and wrote a scathing online review only to then find myself in the body of the story’s most despicable side character, the third female lead. Not only do I need to destroy the relationship between the main pair, but I’m on a mission to charm this bad-boy demon hunter, known as “The Black Lotus,” to complete my quest. We couldn’t be more different, but I’ll use every tactic I can to claim his love. I’m the one with the book in my hands after all, so this should be easy… right?

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes nine extras chapters.

title.romaji: Xiao Yuan Hu Hua Gao Shou

description:
“Beautiful students, sisters, and teachers all find themselves allured to an ordinary young boy”

Beautiful students, sisters, and teachers all find themselves allured to an ordinary young boy, whose life changed entirely after a mystical pen blessed him with otherworldly powers.

(Source: Comikey)

The moment his heart stops beating, Ye Zhongming goes back to the afternoon ten years ago when the catastrophe began.
Is God showing mercy to him? Or is it another punishment for him? Does he really have to experience the terrible end of the world again?
Ye Zhongming decides to fight to survive, not for anything else, but for his comrades who fought with him and the love who never abandoned him!
What’s more, he wants to find the answers. Why did countless roulettes fall from the sky for no reason? Who turned this beautiful blue planet into a ruin filled with broken bodies and blood?!

(Source: Webnovel)

Su Mu, male singer, gentle as water, is now paired with the dominative president Ning Ye of a large business group. The marking of pheromone puts both men’s life at stake. However, the former boyfriend of Su Mu just came back from Germany, turning from a poor actor to an award-winning one. The love from two different men is overwhelming Su Mu. Is he going to get stuck in the middle?

(Source: Wecomics)

title.romaji: Wo Zui Te Bie De Ta

description:
When Ru Yun Yum sees Hao Yue at a university concert, she is enchanted by her style and admires the girl for being so “cool”. But after night, Hao Yue disappears without a trace. Three years have passed and they meet again, now as roommates. What does the future hold for them?

(Source: yman.ga)

What? Need to have dragon babies with each other so that we can go back to heaven? But we're all male!!!

(Source: Webnovel)

title.native: 少女前线 - 人形之歌

description:
In the year 2030, the Beilan Island Incident causes global land contamination and severely reduces the world population. In response to shortages in manpower, humanity creates Autonomous Dolls: highly advanced androids with superior strength and advanced AI capable of expressing emotions. Furthermore, during World War 3 (2045 to 2051), PMCs (private military companies) develop Tactical Dolls: Autonomous Dolls with the ability to fight. Acquiring great wealth from the war, these companies become the de facto police and military of many nations.

During this era of waning government power, Tactical Dolls of Sangvis Ferri (the world's largest PMC) suddenly kill their human masters and attack nearby human settlements. In response, Grifon & Kryuger PMC and their Tactical Dolls are hired to stop and contain the Sangvis Ferri forces.

title.english: A Star Reborn: The Queen's Return

description:
She was the Queen of Song, but she died during her greatest years. After she was reincarnated, she became a simple trainee. Did she lose her former glory? It doesn't matter—no one can compete with her beautiful singer's voice. She's mocked for her lowly birth? It doesn't matter—her true identity is enough to make the whole world tremble. Does she owe huge debts? It doesn't matter...

A powerful boss whispered to her: "The debt will disappear if you would become my woman." But she is proud: "I'm sorry. I would sell my art, but not my whole self."

This is the story of the Queen of Song, of her return to the peak... and an overbearing chairman.

(Source: WebNovel)

An indescribable force draws Weiyu and Hao together. Like two stars entwined in the same orbit, these two classmates were bound to impact each other’s lives, but Weiyu’s latest prank may cost him his closest friend.

As family expectations mount, the two can't help but question if their friendship is pure or just a consequence of family business. Yet that force still pulls at them...

Are they fated to be more than just friends? Or were they only meant to cross paths in the celestial expanse of life?

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Wo Jiushi Bu An Taolu Chu Pai

description:
When Jiang Beiran's transmigrated into a world of cultivation with a System, he thought he had it made. But the System turned out to be a pain in the ass, full of unreasonable demands! Fine, he will just do things his own way, cultivate on his own and concentrate on survival. Ignore those rumors about a mysterious hero and his sycophants. He doesn't want anything to do with it! However, this world and this System may not turn out to be so simple…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

School delinquent Li Miaoyu wakes up one day to find he has turned into a cute pink cat! ♂
