Underneath him is Peng Yu, his handsome classmate. Unable to escape, Li Miaoyu is forced to become a "house cat". He never would have imagined this seemingly nice "owner" is actually a cat maniac, hanging around him every day with bad intentions!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Note: Chapter count includes seven extras.

A sudden plague ravaged the earth.

A small town has magically escaped from the plague. In this town there is a boy named Danny, who's an orphan born with birthmarks in the shape of 'eyes with tears'.

On a rainy day, a carriage brings a guest in this town, the respected artist Oreno.

And so they met ...

Earned Shueisha Tezuka Award and a Golden Dragon Award.

February 2000: Every personnel of Babylon Labs vanished within a single night. Overseer Otto of Schicksal dispatched a special task force to investigate the incident. No one realized that this mysterious event would quickly escalate to global proportions.

(Source: Honkai Impact 3rd)

Desharow, a student of marine biology, goes on a research voyage with his mentor Rhein to study the merfolk. In the waters off Iceland, they manage to capture a mysterious black-tailed merman. This terrifying and fascinating creature quickly captivates the research-obsessed Desharow. Unbeknownst to him, he has long been marked as prey…

(Source: WebComics)

When Empress Sawol was pregnant with the Emperor's child, she loses all of her loved ones and then is sentenced to death by the Emperor and her little sister, who became the imperial consort. After her death, she magically gets another chance to relive her life. Will Sawol do the right thing when faced with her past mistakes and save herself and her family? And will she be able to take on revenge against the malicious Emperor and her sister?

(Source: Lezhin US)

Note: Chapter count includes a prologue.

Before she was reborn, she was bullied by her step mother and her scoundrel sister together, and even became a her sister’s tool of fame who ended in dying in the hospital bed. After she made her comeback from the hell, she tortured her step mother and punished her evil sister. In her previous life, she was driven anguished and desperate by her indifferent fiance, but after she was reborn, she issued an annulment of her engagement with that man! However, she was directly forced to the corner ——Wanna pull back? It’s too late!

(Source: Webcomics)
Vampires have been defeated by Humans. A story about them wearing collars. Wait - you're mistaken, it's not like that!

title.romaji: Shenyi Qi Nü: Gui Di De Yu Shou Kuang Fei
title.native: 神医弃女：鬼帝的驭兽狂妃

description: The Young Lady of the Ye Clan, once a simpleton, was not fated to die by accident but then restarted her life. She inherited the knowledge of poison and medicine and conquered the amazing ancient animals. The only surprise was The King of Ghost feared by the world, that gentle and warmhearted hostage.

title.english: Full Marks Hidden Marriage: Pick Up a Son, Get a Free Husband

description:
After five years, Ning Xi has returned and is out to take revenge on the sister who turned her parents against her, and the childhood sweetheart who betrayed her for her sister. She aims to fulfil her childhood dream and become a famous actress. However, her sister is still out to get her and she has to avoid all her underhanded schemes. One day, after falling into one of her sisters' schemes, she meets an adorable kid and saves him. This was how Ning Xi found herself staying at the mute little kid's house to help him come out of his shell. Slowly, his father Lu Tingxiao starts falling for her too.

(Source: WeComics)

Note: Season 1 was completed on 2021-11-28. Season 2 started on 2022-10-21.

Cheng Ke quit his job, moved away from his rich family in pursuit of arts. He is a sand painter who creates stunning pieces of art using sand. He becomes Jiang Yu Duo’s tenant who’s a gang leader and takes care of his sister’s apartments. Their worlds collide as they move from mutual rejection to mutual understanding. Through hard work and struggles, they each achieve success and move towards a better future.

Xu Lingxin lost his eyesight because of an accident. However, his partner of seven years, Lu Tianqi, didn't seem to care at all. "Let's break up, then." After leaving Lu Tianqi and finding his way through living alone in the dark, Xu Lingxin thought he was already used to being by himself. So why does Lu Tianqi seem unwilling to let go, as if trying to get him back? Meanwhile, his physician, Dr. Qin, wants to take this chance to get closer... With strong contenders on both sides, what will Xu Lingxin do?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

After falling to her death at the hands of her stepsister, Shu Lan, Meng Ting wakes up in her second year of high school. In this life, all she wants is to help out her loving stepfather, fix her poor eyesight, and avoid Jiang Ren, the delinquent young prince of the country’s most prominent real estate company, who threw her previous life into chaos. But while Shu Lan is the one infatuated with Jiang Ren, it’s Meng Ting who seems to catch this bad boy’s attention...

(Source: Tappytoon)

A 21st century forensic doctor somehow traveled back to ancient China and became a princess. What’s better is her first treatment was rather intimate

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Wo De V Xin Shi Waigua

description:
When Fang Lin bought a new smart phone, he found out the phone app gave him a special social network with the immortals. In a dog eat dog world, Lin is taking a stairway to heaven with this special social network.

(Source: MangaToon)

On the Sky Spirit Continent, martial power is most honored. In this world, the strong wander between earth and sky and are able to terrorize, destroy and shake the world! Lin Chen, a young martial arts master from the modern world, came to this magic world with a mysterious tiny caldron by accident and became an outer disciple of the Celestial Sect in the Yannan Region. Let’s see how he suffered plenty of tribulations and reached the Nine Skies before becoming the best and growing into the Super Swordsman!

(Source: WeComics)

Lu Ye was reborn as a young disciple of a certain sect, but unexpectedly the sect was destroyed and he became a hard-working miner.

After Lu Ye accidentally awakened the talent tree, he became a cultivator, changing destiny and stirring up the situation in the land of Kyushu.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

At the age of 20, she graduated from a top school in the United States with double major. At 23, she bought a new villa for her parents. She, Wei Yujin, had risen from the mud to the peak of fame in the 21st century, and she's going to do the same in ancient China.

(Source: WeComics)

title.romaji: Shuma Baobei 03: Xun Shou Shi Zhi Wang

description:
When three Digimon fans -- Rika, Henry, and our lead Takato -- suddenly find themselves with "real" Digimon, they discover a living creature under your care is far harder to deal with than a few pixels on your TV screen. The kids try to be Digimon 'Tamers,' aka Digimon caretakers, but they all seem to have different opinions on what that should entail. Rika thinks Digimon should fight, Henry thinks they should never fight, and Takato ... seems to be somewhere in the middle.

Being a Tamer isn't just about believing one thing or another. It's about learning and adjusting for the good of everyone else. But they have a long way to go, and their problems are just beginning.

(Source: Toykoypop)

Slaying demons and finding love.

A marriage alliance between two great demon-slaying families brings Mo Yan and Xuan Yuanyu together. Though it was only suppose to be a marriage of convenience for two years, he soon discovers she has come to occupy a place in his heart. Will they be able to stay together amid endless conflict and hidden truths?

(Source: Manta)

title.romaji: Lingqi Fusu: Cong Liyu Jinhua Cheng Shenlong!
title.native: 灵气复苏：从鲤鱼进化成神龙！

description:
The photographer Lin Hao was on assignment at Lintian Old Town when he was killed during an attack by the monster “ET No. 002.” But he found himself reborn as a koi fish, swimming in the Old Town's Dragon Pond. He awakens a powerful Leveling System, which promises him a chance to become a true dragon by following the system's prompts to devour pray and evolve!

(Source: KuaiKan Manhua, translated)

Yogurt is an Alpha, and Cookie is an Omega who just moved to be Yogurt’s neighbor. Out of curiosity, Cookie wanted to find his brother, and was harassed by other Alphas on the street. Luckily Yogurt arrived in time and helped him, which, as a result, made them closer. What will happen next between them?

(Source: WebComics)

After swallowing a "mint" by accident, he became the designated son-in-law of the dragon king, who is also the big boss of a corporate group. His fiancée turned out to be quite hot-tempered. Meanwhile, the dragon elders have their eyes on him, lurking. Their world is turning out to be rather dangerous...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Ning Fan died, but unexpectedly, he traveled to another world and became a teacher with superpowers. He was supposed to be a genius teacher of S level, but something unforeseeable happened to his family. Framed by backstabbers, his family was knocked off the pedestal, so he was assigned to the worst class--D Class. Fortunately, he still had the Genius Teacher System. Let's see how he could conquer students, prove wrong of the villain, take the academy, set up new sects, stand on top of the this world, and finally achieve counterattack under hopeless situation.

(Source: Webcomics)

For the sake of her family, she became his wife. But right after they got married, he told her “I made you my wife, but I will never give you my heart.” A few years later, she returned with a demeanor cold as ice, and she brought along a young child that looked just like him, which got his heart all flustered. Will his new feelings fluster her, too?

(Source: Dongmanshe, translated)

Within the Nine Prefectures, there are many kingdoms. Rumor has it that deep in the desolate lands, masters are as common as the clouds. They have the ability to go against their fates! Outside the Savage Beast Mountain Range, in a small city called Stone City, there is only one person who goes against the will of the heavens and changes his fate.

(Source: Managtoon)

title.romaji: Tianxin V5: BOSS Chong Zhiguo Ji
title.english: Sweetheart V5: The Boss Is Too Kind!

description:
Jing Yiren was a proud and talented 14-year-old princess. One night, she was transmigrated, and she became the 19-year-old wife of Lu Conglomeration's President. This sudden change would test every fiber of her being!

For his part, Lu Ming now has to deal with a wife who is wholly confused by her new station in life. In the face of such problems, he can only get through to her with his actions.

(Source: WebNovel)

She fell into the nasty plot of her sister and was humiliated. After many twists and turns, the misunderstandings passed by, one by one... When all the truth was revealed, when the plot was punctured, what would be their destiny?

title.romaji: Haomen BOSS Jin Shi Nü Gaozhongsheng!
title.english: Reincarnation of the Businesswoman at School

description:
She was originally a puppet of her family, a business spy, and an assassin that the police were pursuing. Then, she was betrayed and fell into the deep sea.

When she opened her eyes once more, she had become a normal high school student in her third year. Because of her disgraceful birth, her relatives ostracized her since she was young, while her classmates bullied her because of her low self-esteem and withdrawn nature. After her reincarnation, she became a domineering person and beat those people when they bullied her again. Others had to gamble or rely on their luck to see if a jade was valuable. However, with a powerful cheat in her hands, the Spiritual Jade Vision, she could easily detect spiritual qi in pieces of jade with one glance!

Life was comfortable, but there were jealous people all around her, and her skin crawled with every move they made!

(Source: Webnovel)

He is a sunny, hilarious, positive and obscure actor. He is a composed, generous and graceful general manager. Because of a strange request, they began a long journey of attracting each other. What should they do? Nonsense, of course becoming lovers.

(Source: Webcomics)

To find her best friend who was caught by ghosts, a girl sneaked into the world of ghosts and provoked the quirky prince of ghosts, there is actually smell of her missing friend on him? ! What’s the relationship between him and the girl? The secret hidden in the world of ghosts is about to be revealed...

(Source: Webcomics)

Note: Includes the prologue and 15 extras chapters.

title.romaji: Wo Keyi Xiugai Wan Wu Shijian Xian
title.native: 我可以修改万物时间线

description:
What should I do with these expired elixirs? Don’t worry, I can revert it back in time, so give me all of your expired elixirs! What should I do if my cultivation process is too slow? Don’t worry, I'll just shift the cultivation time forwards by about five years, so it'll look like I mastered the cultivation technique right away. What if I get hurt? Don't worry, I'll just revert time back to my body's healthy state, before I got hurt. What happens if I transmigrate to a new world as a weakling? Don't worry! I can change the timeline of everything!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Shu Yun, from a famous ballet family, and Tong Yang, a Beijing opera prodigy who was recommended for admission, meet each other by chance. "I'm sure you're the light I've been searching." One is a privileged child with a bright future, while the other is a tarnished diamond with an unknown future. Their lives couldn't be any more different. However, when East meets West, and when Beijing opera meets ballet, their paths start to change.

(Source: Pocket Comics)

A schemer may never know how pure or how devoting that love can be. I may be dominating or calculating; I may lie or cheat. But the only reason behind it all is that I love you more...

(Source: Webnovel)

After Ming Shu finished his training and returned to Dongye City’s Criminal Investigation Bureau, he found that Xiao Yu'an, his old neighbor who was like a big brother to him that left without saying goodbye many years ago, had suddenly become his immediate superior. What was crazier was that they also became housemates and started living together!

While Ming Shu juggled that headache of a situation, mysterious murder cases followed one after another - an unemployed man suddenly going crazy in a book cafe, the most hardworking performer of a Chinese orchestra dying strangely, an escape room game that seemed to be more than a game... Ming Shu, ‘This time, I won’t let you go.’

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

When the red moon rose up into the sky, the world went mad. Except for me!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.english: I’m the Girl With the Hacks!

description:
I finally confessed to a stud and was about to usher in some sweet love in my life, but I got electrocuted and teleported into a world of immortal cultivation?! But thanks to my hacks, I've turned from zero to hero. Not only do I have to bring my senior brothers to fight monsters and level up, I have to deal with all these distractions all day too. It's not easy being a pretty lady! So, which senior should I pick for tonight? I gotta think about it...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Jian Dao Nan Gui Hou Tuodan Le

description:
When the old demon Pixiu went out to take out the trash, he ended up with a male ghost falling into his lap. This male ghost had flawless features and had an incredibly low body temperature, which made him the perfect bolster for Pixiu who struggled with a natural curse of an unbearably hot body. Pixiu swore to the heavens that he would only use this ghost as a bolster, nothing more! Yet nobody believed him. He would go on to declare, "Even though the strings of fate have been tied on me, I will remain single." Pixiu often said that as long as he sorted his trash well, a good wife shouldn't be far as well. This comic is also named: I went dumpster diving for a wife (not).

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Moshi Nüyou: Wo Jia Houyuan Tong Moshi
title.native: 末世女友：我家后院通末世

description:
Song Chao found a ring that allowed him to freely travel between our world and a post-apocalyptic world. In the post-apocalyptic world, food was more valuable than gold, and there wasn't much left in that world except for gold! Song Chao has found the way to make it big! He took a tomato from his refrigerator at home and sold it for ten kilos of gold in the other world! You can even exchange food for beautiful women! You really think you can do whatever you want when you can offer food after the apocalypse? Yep, as long as you can offer food, you really can do whatever you want!

(Source: iQiyi, translated)
A funny but dramatic story about the growing romantic relationship between Li Ziming and Xin Cheng.

Su Shuang Shuang comes home one day to find that someone has moved into the apartment next to hers. When curiosity gets the best of her and she goes in to meet her neighbour, a handsome guys comes out of the shower? And he calls the police?

Comic artist Xiaoge Fang needs a lawyer, some smooth-talking hotshot who can sue his publishers for all they’re worth. That’s what they get for trying to screw him out of royalties, but… easier said than done for someone with an empty bank account. Enter Mo Qian, an attorney with a record almost as perfect as his looks. His offer? In exchange for representation, pretend to be his boyfriend to make his ex jealous. There's no way Xiaoge will accept. He’s not that desperate... right?

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Wo Zhaohuan Chu Le Zhu Tian Shen Mo

description:
Qin Jun was just an overworked corporate slave, until he transmigrated into the body of a deposed prince. But at least he was blessed with the Legend Summoning System. He can summon any character from legend to command! See the mighty Wukong shake the mountain with one strike of his staff, while seeing and hearing all with his powers! The Buddha himself can hold the world in the palm of his hand, and no one can escape! In this fantastical world of gods and demons, see how Qin Jun becomes the most powerful emperor of all!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Ai Shang Ao Jiao Long Wangye
title.english: You Are My Lovely Dragon King

description:
“Can't you see?! Dragons really do exist!”

He's a gorgeous white dragon hiding in plain sight. She's a genius med student who started college at 12. Now, she's a super cynical 18-year-old grad student. One day, a man faints in the town square, and she runs to his rescue. Pointing to the nearest person, she grabs help from our very own white dragon, instructing him as he performs CPR and saves the stranger's life. A random chance meeting becomes a full-on meet-cute when they end up sharing a table with each other at a packed diner that very same day! What happens when the fate of a skeptical genius gets tied up with a mystical dragon?? Will sparks take flight, or will this romance make a crash landing?

(Source: Comikey media)

Fan Li accidentally found a wormhole that could travel through to the medieval world, where there were pastoral songs, but also wars and chaos. You can gather a harem of wives and concubines, or you can fight to dominate the world. But no matter kind of goal you want to achieve, you must start by making money.

(Source: QQ, translated)

Bai Pingting has always been unable to believe the saying "a woman's virture is ignorance". She is a maid of Jing Anwang, but she lives even better than some wealthly women. She is also wiser than most men and she hopes for a higher intellect.

Even if that man is an enemy, both are full of lies and conspiracies. She is not fond of that man. But between a choice the love and loyalty, she will begin to think that she isn't as meaningful as she once thought she was...

title.romaji: Juese Daolü Dou Shuo Wu Huang Tizhi Wudi
title.english: My Furry Harem Is After Me
title.native: 绝色道侣都说吾皇体质无敌

description:
I'm just a regular guy, who has just transmigrated into the body of the Demon Lord. Now I have to breed with all sorts of monster girls to help revitalize their tribes! There's the sexy phoenix girl, the cute ferret girl, the muscular panda girl… this is going to suck me dry, maybe I'm better off going out to conquer the world instead!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

You dare look down upon me? I'm gonna kill you! You dare touch my girls? I'm gonna make you sleep forever. In this continent, strength is the rule, and the most powerful is highly respected. A legendary talent is reborn, and the Taiyi Superb Water can make me powerful enough to shake this world. I'm Saint Ling Feng, but unfortunately, I was reborn as a trash after drinking Taiyi Super Water. But after years of hard cultivation, I finally become the best Alchemy Master with the help of Taiyi Super Water.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Wo De Meng Bao Shi Liaoji

description:
A cunning agent, a bossy president, and heart-melting twins. How will the story unfold? Years ago, An Jiujiu was set up by her step sister and slept with a man. The one night stand ruined her reputation but left her a baby. She thought she could raise the child and live her life in peace. But a mission brings her and Ji Jinchen, the most powerful man of City Jiang, together. To her great surprise, his son looks exactly like hers... Aug & Pudding: Since mom and dad don't know how to date, we are the only two who can help them!

(Source: Mangatoon)

The white lion and the mermaid were once experimental subjects in the research institute. They relied on each other, but they also manipulated each other. Due to a misunderstanding, the mermaid injured the white lion, who vowed to seek revenge at their next encounter. However, when they meet again, the white lion can't help but protect his mermaid instead…

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Shenwei Shoufu De Wo Zhen Buxiang Chongsheng A
title.native: 身为首富的我真不想重生啊

description: Humans that wear clothing with ancient elements, knights that use elemental magic, cultivators that soar through the sky on their swords, a loli squad who fights using nanomachines, undeads who came from a door to another world, Super Saiyans... These all aren't important, what's important is: "Do you want to become rich"? Top of the realms! Strongest in the universe! Earning the name of the richest man alive in Forbes! Taking you on journeys around the realms! Teach you how to be the richest! Teaching you how to achieve financial freedom! Earn an astronomically large sum of money!!

After enduring a long period of resentment and coldness from his partner, Cheng Jin decides to let him go following their bankruptcy. However, destiny intervenes when his lover suddenly loses his memories and falls in love with Cheng Jin once again. Although Cheng Jin is overjoyed, he is also anguished as he anxiously awaits the arrival of the inevitable “limited time” for their love.

(Source: INKR)

A package from Hell, along with a mysterious stamp album, opens up a whole new world. Please sign for your package and embark on a thrilling journey. Mailmen come and go while stamps last forever.

(Source: Webnovel)

An unknown virus broke out worldwide, degenerating humanity. Andy Biya had unfortunately died from the sudden disaster, but he unexpectedly awakened the power of reincarnation and even met Eno Edison, a proud and aloof person who exuded a dangerous aura. Following the fateful experience of birth and death with Eno, the both of them gradually learn the secrets of each other and the world.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Note: Chapter count includes a prologue and 7 extras.

title.romaji: Wo Bei Feng Yin Jiu Yi Ci

description:
Wei Daduo, a genius boy born in the Divine Realm, has always been a headache of the immortals because he can't control his divine power at all! In that case, the Divine Realm would be devastated by Wei Daduo's fart or sneeze one day... That's ridiculous!!! The immortals can't bear it anymore! They want Wei Daduo's power sealed!

Unexpectedly, Wei Daduo seals himself millions of times because he has been dreaming about worldly life and he also plans to start over as an ordinary cultivator in order to fully master his power... So his worldly life begins... with two runaway girls of an unknown sect!

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Wo Cheng Le Fan Pai Da Lao De Xiao Jiao Qi?!
title.native: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻？！

description:
The dainty idol Chen Congong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, I don't mind ending up with such a beautiful man?

Hang on...

Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

(Source: QQ, translated)
A dystopian fantasy. In this futuristic world, humans are ruled over by faeries. The young master Yue Hu encounters the fairy Fei Liai, and gradually uncovers the truth and dark secrets behind them.

Yuan Bao, a sweet hardworking girl and Zhao Qingwen, a genius girl with high coldness, got married because of taekwondo. The two of them are like Mozart who is dazzling talented and Salieri who is inferior to Mozart, attracking and repelling each other, and gradually developed a deep bond from the initial disgust of two things. Just when the feelings are quietly budding, the successive changes have caused them to fall into unpredictable distress...

"It feels TERRIBLE to have a brother!"- we both thought.
Until one day, we both made a wish to turn the other into a sister...

Not only did I wake up in a coffin, I even became a 'man'! did I have a time travel? What’s with this man’s dress? The life in another world is not easy, and I even have to deal with that dark and cunning duke!

(Source: Manga Toon)
If you're a man, then you should be able to reach the 100th level. Mao Li, the main character, begins his ridiculous journey in ascending the tower. Will he be able to reach the 100th level?

title.romaji: Dang Xia Mowang Bi Sha Ji De Wo, Jüran Chengwei Le Xiao Yong Zhe De Zhuanzhi Baomu
title.english: I Blocked the Demon King's Ultimate Attack, and Ended Up Becoming the Little Hero's Full-Time Nanny!
title.native: 挡下魔王必杀技的我，居然成为了小勇者的专职保姆

description:
The eccentric party of the "Strongest Middle-Aged Meat Shield" and the "Weakest DPS Little Hero" partner up to grind their enemies to death! With their strong survivability, they lead a comfortable dream life in another world where everyone is out for themselves!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Xuan Huan: Kai Ju Jiu Ge Xiannü Shifu
title.native: 玄幻：开局九个仙女师傅

description:
When Ye Xiu was reborn, he was given the talent of the Heaven's Eye. Any new skill he learns is maxed out right away!
"What, you spend thousands of years cultivating the Nine-Turn Invincible Sword technique? Sorry, one look and I'm already max-level at it."
"Phoenix Fire? Zhuque Flame? Dragon Soul? All mine with one glance!"
"What? You say you're the strongest in the universe? Sorry, I've got nine immortal ladies teaching me all their techniques."

Of heaven and earth, who is the most powerful? Ye Xiu: "That would be me!"

(Source: Bilibili, trnalsated)

title.romaji: Xie'e Lianjin Shushi Gaobuding Ziji De Shiyanti
title.native: 邪恶炼金术士搞不定自己的实验体

description:
"This high-risk experiment was meant to help me take over the world, not to make a waifu," Yiso glumly said, many years later.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

My King, why was I being put to the sword? If everything could start over, would my knight protect me until the end once again? Even if I was born only to be punished by God, even though I knew that my fate was written in the stars, I still couldn't stop myself from falling deeply in love with the world, the sunlight, the desserts, the King, the dresses, and my beloved knight.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

One day, Liu Hai unexpectedly finds a beat-up book of magic. When she tries to draw a magic circle from the book, she accidentally summons a monster girl named Chi Xiaoliu. Xiaoliu has been imprisoned to provide the source of power for the Kingdom of Chi. She had wanted to escape for a long time and finally succeeded in escaping, just as Liu Hai was drawing the magical circle in the human world… and that's how the two girls met.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Wei Huimie Shijie er Jiaban Ba!
title.english: Working Overtime to Destroy the World!

description:
Limbo is a shut-in girl who doesn't care for anything except her tentacle comics. Aside from that, everything else is meaningless. On her birthday she wished for the "destruction of the world" and was instead met with a demonic female programmer!

The two instantly hit it off, bonding over their common goal of world destruction, the two "project partners" hustle hard everyday to bring the world to an end with hilarious effect.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

The premier sword-god of his generation, reborn! Jian Chen is reincarnated into a fantastic new world, born into a wealthy family with great cultivation talent. However, his rapid progress in cultivation caused jealousy from powerful enemies, and he was forced into exile, setting him on a path to cultivate the chaos body…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

The former prince of the Yanye kingdom, lost in the chaos of war, was adopted by refugees from the enemy country. Shaped by the bloody vengeance of the old country and the warm redemption of his new relatives. The last descendant of the royal family will be reborn in the interweaving of love and hatred. To protect his loved ones, he rekindles his faith and embarks on the path of redemption.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Young Bai accidentally kills someone, from then on he enters the world of killers. A black card appeared in front of the door of pale throne, who can get the ultimate weapon left by the the most successful killer? To kill, to follow the road of killing, is it also the road to finding oneself.

Married for two years, Jian Mo held the title of legal wife and bed warmer for Gu Beichen, and even handled his scandals once in a while. She had to keep him satisfied in bed and at the same time, deal with the mistresses who came up to cause trouble… All of this had become a habit, but one day, she suddenly heard this sentence from him: Jian Mo, let’s get divorced.

(Source: Wutopia Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes eight extras chapters.

title.romaji: Xinxi Su Shuo Women Bu Keneng

description:
Peach-pheromone Luo Zhiyu and tangerine-pheromone Xiao Yan have had an ongoing feud since they were 3 years old. The both of them have a 0% pheromone match, yet they’re always together. When they graduated, they finally realized that they were blinded by their scientism…

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes a prologue and 5 extras.

The overbearing president who is the black wolf king invaded my house, tries to eat me day and night and he also said want to marry me?! The world of beast is too hard to understand! If I really can’t oppose of it, I can also secretly enjoy it right?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

A college freshman, Zhou Xiaoan, accidentally puts on a ring of unknown origin from the Shang Dynasty and spits out a horrible blood zombie from his mouth. A secret in the history of mankind is unveiled…

(Source: WeComics)

Bad luck! My dad kicked me out of the house! Then revenge a playboy whose grandfather was a gangster! That's not all! I go to the noble school to be the maid of four demons...

(Source: MangaToon)

A masterful pill was born at the top of the Peak of Not Returning. It is Yushu who is in the wind, is chic and suave, has a broad mind...I! Yes, it's me! Beat and beat, eat.

(Source: AC.QQ, translated)

"Wanna sign a contract with me to become that destined one?" Devil Jekaterina is summoned and saved by a cultivator girl Yuchi Yue. To Yue surprise, the first thing Jekaterina wants to do when she wakes up is to ask her sign a contract with her with a kiss? "Kissing on the lips is the thing that can only be done between those who likes each other!", Yue shouts and refused. But it seems that Jekaterina doesn't understand what does she mean...

(Source: Webcomics)

His goal is only one, the world champion!

(Source: WeComics)

Fragments tells the independent stories of Li Chang Ge, Ashina Sun, Situ Langlang and Mo Ying. It is aimed to help readers enter the delicate inner world of each character, showing the unknown past and richer personalities of the characters.

The story centers on "Chronos Rulers," those who fight the time-eating demons that appear when people wish they could turn back time. The Chronos Rulers fight a time-manipulation battle against these demons.

(Source: Anime News Network)

An American girl who has educated herself on Japan has moved to the country with the culture she loves so much. She even joins a Japanese high school, which she is late to on her first day. A fellow Japanese classmate shows her a way in and soon the two girls become friends and perhaps even more.

Hundred years ago, a generation of God of War Ye Qingyun was born, crushing the sons of various great figures, making the enemy frightened by the wind, but unexpectedly betrayed by his lover Luo Ling, brother wolf thirteen, and falling into the Devil Abyss! A hundred years later, all walks of life entered the golden age, and wicked characters emerged wildly! Ye Qingyun was reborn as a waste disciple of the Ye Family, a small family in the Eight Desolate Continent! Fate is reversed and fate is changed! In this life, I will not only crush the genius, but also kill all those who bear me! A ruthless sword, a dragon slaying knife, kill everything, unify the gods, dominate all things!

Li Xao Yao left S.W.A.T to become an ordinary security guard, while working, he happened to enter the VIP room and found Lin Wan Er still in the middle of changing, as revenge, she took him on a ride and kicked him out of the car, after hours of walking, Li Xao Yao finally managed to get back home just to be kicked out of the house. He then got an offer from his previous supervisor to become the bodyguard of the Tian Xi group ceo's daughter both in game and in reality. But unknown to Li Xao Yao the girl was actually...

(Source: OSTNT)

She sinned for the beloved man and was jailed for five years. Five years later she came out of jail and he greeted her not his proposal but a betray with her sister. Desperated and helpless, she met the richest man in City A...

(Source: WebComics)

The demon blades came out and broke the quiet life of the world. An ordinary boy got a chance to become a swordsman and eventually save the world.

(Source: MangaToon)

Once upon a time, the Magic Lord started a war with humans, and the Three Great Sages fought against the Magic Lord arduously. One of the Great Sages even sacrificed himself to seal the Magic Lord...

800 years later, when an apprentice sorcerer named Salamander was having the Advancement Test, he accidentally released the hypnotizing gas. Later, it turned out that his pet snake, Fu, can turn itself into a human! Fu took Salamander and ran away from the test.

After hearing the news, the Senior Mage who adopted Salamander couldn’t take it any longer. The Senior Mage seems to have an irresistible reason to break the rules for Salamander and promote him to the Grade 1, Star Class.

(Source: Webnovel)

Slender Man, Mothman, the Butcher, Cecil Hotel, the Slit-Mouthed Woman, Hanako of the Toilet, the Non-existent Stairs of the 13th floor, the Cat-faced Granny, Bus 330, Jack The Ripper… Welcome, travelers, to the world of 999 strange tales - the spirit world.

(Source: Webnovel)

Growing up together, they’ve been the best friends all the time, and this is also the attitude they hold toward their relationship at the very beginning. As a result... none of them declares their love to each other even if there is bidirectional crush between them. Being the most troublesome emotion, secret crush enables one to do everything that only lovers will do, makes he grow complex feelings, and also enjoys the carnival alone... He is afraid that his confession might be laughed at, and he is even more scared that a confession would put an end to their original relationship. Both of them overreach themselves in their first love which is full of ignorance, a superficially breathtaking but actually sweet love story!

(Source: WebComics)

Feng Nian, timid and bashful, had a crush on Gu Shaoqing, the class president. While gradually getting attracted by Feng Nian, Gu Shaoqing, shy and vulnerable, didn't reject Feng Nian or respond to his love after detecting his feelings. With the help of their classmate, Wang Ling, Feng Nian tried to confess his love for Gu Shaoqing. Unexpectedly, Feng Nian's possessive brother, Feng Zewen, tried all possible means to prevent them from being together... Will their story blossom?

(Source: Webnovel)
Chinese mythical beasts living in modern China.

title.romaji: Tu Ran Cheng Xian Le Zen Me Ban
title.english: What Do You Do When You Suddenly Become An Immortal?

description:
When you transmigrate to another world, someone from another world is transmigrating into you. One day Lin Fan found himself swapping bodies with a saintess from another world. Whats more, they can swap back and forth as much as they want! This is the start of their messy, confusing isekai cultivation adventure!

"Excuse me, so what is your name…?"

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Note: Chapter count includes an extra chapter.

As a zombie with memory loss, school life is still a must! While fighting with his instinctive hunger for humans, he also falls in love with his destined one. But it seems like not only does his lover know how he became a zombie, but he was also a schemer behind the scenes. In this SM danmei, the truth of the zombie gradually emerges.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Note: Includes a prologue.

title.romaji: You Bei Nanshen Liao Shang Resou
title.english: I’ve Gone Viral Thanks to My Crush

description:
Yu Bei has had a crush on Gu Yiming for 8 years and he is always there for Gu as his good "bro", only to find out the gossip between Gu and an actress. So, Yu decides to give up the secret love and he swears not to sleep with Gu anymore! But the obtuse straight man Gu Yiming seems to notice something suddenly! What will happen to Yu Bei after all these years?

(Source: Webcomics)

Love is a war. A war where no blood is shed, but can leave you countless scars. An ugly girl who was cheated on receives a mysterious phone call one day. The caller says that she is the 35-year-old herself from the future- she wants to teach her the art of love! Now she is on the road to become a better version of herself, take revenge on her ex, and reclaim everything she once had!

(Source: Copin Comics)

Zhou Mingyu, a college student who possesses the bizarre power called Tiangou became targeted by various powerful forces in the warlock world. To free himself from Tiangou's influence and to find the truth of his father’s death, a mysterious incident that happened more than a hundred years ago in Kunlun Mountain will be unveiled….

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Bing Jiao Shaoye Shi Zhi Lang

description:
He is a dumb and paraplegic child abandoned by his family. Ignoring ridicule of others, she is his wife in their false marriage. After their marriage, she finds that he is a wolf in sheep's clothing. The ones who call him a dog always pay the price. He said, "Do you know the characters of dog? Brave, loyal and...hungry!"

(Source: Webcomics)

Lin Tianhao, who has transmigrated to another world, attends the Job Change Ceremony and ends up taking on a “sewer-tier” job — Summoner. Just as everyone is mocking him, believing his future is doomed, he suddenly awakens a system and gains the skill [Demonic Sacrifice]! Who says the Summoner class is trash? I have the strongest SSS-rank talent!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

To pay the benefit, Charlotte married into Fan family. She believed that her husband is Shine Fan, who were seriously burnt and isolated in special care. But as time went on, she found that Ron Fan, the brother of Shine, are acting strangely towards her...

title.romaji: Yi Ba Shazhudao, Kan Fan Wan Jie Hen He Li Ba?
title.native: 一把杀猪刀，砍翻万界很合理吧？

description:
Ye Chuan—a mental patient—sees all living creatures in the world as pigs. On the day he changes professions, he awakens a life-class occupation: Butcher. His teachers and classmates are gravely disappointed, and even his childhood sweetheart leaves him. However, the Butcher profession grants him extra damage against pigs and halves the damage he receives from them. Since he sees everyone as pigs, he uses a single butcher’s knife to rise up and become a god!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

They mock me for being a bumpkin from the mountain, but I win the hearts of their goddesses with Miao medical practices...

(Source: WeComics)

“I set a goal for myself when I was fifteen: to become the strongest martial artist.”

Jia Fugui is the undefeated master and esteemed leader of the Muye School. But despite his achievements and proven strength, he is extremely insecure about being bald. Follow Jia Fugui and his second in command in their hilarious, yet fierce search for a cure.

(Source: Comikey)

title.romaji: Fen Shou Hou He Qianren De Xiaoshu HE Le
title.english: Live Happily Ever After With My Ex's Uncle
title.native: 分手后和前任的小叔HE了

description:
Sylvia's past life was marked with nothing but relentless torture at the hands of her adoptive sister and husband. Regressed back to the moment she decided to take the fall for her evil sister's crimes, Sylvia is now resolute to reverse all the terrible decisions that left her in such abusive and toxic relationships. And it's at that moment she has a steamy run in with her ex's uncle!

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes one extra chapter.
"The person who is destined to be the perfect lover is secretly a murderous devil?! There are many secrets to the widowed mother. The life of Qiqi is completely changed by a mysterious stalker."

My name is He Xun, a Taoist from China. Due to an accident, my soul traveled in space to Japan. Now I live in the body of a high school student in Japan. Although I still have my cultivation, it is far from the one in full bloom. When I looked into the reason for the accident, I became a classmate with a six-tailed fox spirit. Moreover, currently, she lives in my house...

(Source: Webcomics)

Ye Qian treated like a fool, abandoned by his family, bullied by his classmates, and looked down by the world. Until one day when he awakened the memories of a previous life as a powerful immortal cultivator. With this newfound knowledge and power, he will rise up and have his way with his school, and then go out and take over the city!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Moshi Chongsheng: Wokao Kai Xiangzi Wending Dianfeng
title.english: Rebirth in the Apocalypse: Rising to Power Through Blind Boxes
title.native: 末世重生：我靠开箱子问鼎巅峰

description:
When the apocalypse hit, the protagonist was betrayed and killed by his manipulative girlfriend, only to be miraculously reborn one year before the end times with a powerful system at his fingertips! Getting a head start, he hoards supplies and spends a fortune building an impenetrable safe haven. Using his system to continuously boost his strength, he systematically crushes every enemy from his past life. From worthless nobody to ultimate powerhouse, revenge and redemption go hand in hand as he walks the path to becoming the king of the apocalypse!

(Source: WebComics)

“Forbearing from revenge for years, this time, he must seize what he has lost!”

After witnessing the murder of his parents, Ye Qing Yu kept his promise to guard their graves while cultivating rigorously for the whole of four years. Ye Qing Yu subsequently makes it into Bailu Academy, the most prestigious martial arts academy, with his talents and cultivation. He goes on to prove those who look down on him wrong and take vengeance on his parents' killer.

(Source: Comikey)

Jiang Xiaofan accidentally traveled to a different dimension and ended up as a beggar. He never had a chance to practice martial arts previously, but he accidentally obtained fragments of Dao Yin and inherited its secret moves. This is a journey of our hero in this trouble-filled new world!!

I was a perfectly fine necromancer, so how have I ended up becoming the chief of novice village? But, since it's all set in stone, I'll just build a village that has a harem filled with beautiful young girls! Do you have a problem with that? I didn't think so! Let's begin the parallel world's novice village (harem) from scratch...

(Source: Webnovel)

Inside the luxurious pavilion, human desires flow like water, and morals are extinguished like ashes. The courtesan Qin You receives a lady visitor, who offers her a large sum to buy her freedom. She claims that she can see the future, and she asks Qin You to come with her to help save the world.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Bai Bian Jin Zhi Xi Jiao Ji

description:
Stunt double Yu Bei fell into a merman’s territory by accident. To stay out of trouble, she disguised herself as a princess. The merman prince, who had not seen humankind for a long time, suggested a marriage of state just so he could meet the human emperor and save his kind from exploitation. He then visited earth with Yu Bei but later fell into a trap that Yu Bei set up for him...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

The strongest soldier and a band of ferocious heroes -- fighting for their country, fighting for their people! Only death can stop them, and they will press on until their dying breaths!

(Source: Qidian)

title.english: The Brocaded Tale of The Girl Si

description:
Her unfortunate life began with a marriage of which the two families didn't match. Her first husband detested her for killing his first love; her second husband, despite showing great favor, only regarded her as a substitute? Now that Jiang Si has entered her new present life, she is determined to define destiny all by herself!

(Source: Webnovel)

Lu Mingfei never expected to live an extraordinary life. He was content with his average achievements and took pride in his skill in Starcraft. However, all that is upended when he suddenly receives a scholarship to study in Chicago at a place called Cassell College. It all seems too good to be true, this can only be a scam! Little does he know, that when he does eventually accept the offer, it is but the beginning of the rest of his life, and the college's obscurity will be the least of his concerns once they start telling him about the dragons...

(Source: Webnovel)

Note: Includes 1 extra chapter.

I will conquer your stomach first and then conquer your mouth with my excellent cooking skills. I can always handle both evil husband and nasty mother-in-law. As for those ill-disposed sisters-in-law, just let them be jealous! I’m not going to play with you.

Source: Qidian

Jana’s a talented artist, but she’s also an awkward high school girl. When her first love Conrad transfers to her school, she’s over the moon until this popular genius very publicly denies knowing her. Before she dies from the online shaming, the mysterious creature Dolo has just the thing for her — a capsule to change her destiny! All it requires in exchange is something valuable to her. What will Jana sacrifice to make her dreams come true? Nothing could go wrong… right?

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Wo Yang Cheng Le Bingjiao Fanpai Nüdi
title.native: 我养成了病娇反派女帝

description:
What's it like to be betrayed and executed by your own disciple?! He had to consume all of his cultivation just to be able to reincanate. In this life, he won't play the good guy anymore. Why should he be nice and help the girl? If he's going to be the villain, he's going to be evil all the way! If he's strong enough, then nothing can stop him!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

The cold and aloof company president only had one goal: attack the new singer Yu Nian on Weibo and become his number one anti-fan! A few months later, he announced, "We're together."
Anti-fans: ...?!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.english: A Record Of A Mortal's Journey To Immortality—Immortal World Arc

description:
10,000 years after the time of "A Record of a Mortal's Journey to Immortality," in the Spirit realm, the fox girl Liu Le'er's clan was wiped out by the Blood Saber sect, and she was being hunted down herself. Suffering from multiple injuries, Liu Le'er hid under a rock, just when the three pursuing cultivators were about to cut her down, the rock suddenly burst open, and an ordinary-looking man emerges from inside...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

The high school boy Yin Yongtian suffered from a strong case of OCD. He got on the wrong side of a bully when his OCD caused the bully's proposal to go wrong. He was almost beaten to death, but the trauma activated his Compulsive System! Yin Yongtian wasn't actually all that interested in cultivation, but the System kept tempting him with missions like ”Unanswered Notifications", “Almost Acquired Proficiency," and “Extremely Irregular Hexagonal Panels,” which triggered his compulsion to finish them and become stronger! With skills more than a hundred times more powerful than regular people, he and his friends will venture into the dungeons, and his compulsions will set him on the pathway to becoming the strongest.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Wan Zha Chao Huang Zhi Jian Fei Hen Mang

description:
Cheating Men Must Die Side Story. Su Lüxia receives a mision, smuggling into a small world to abuse scum. Her targets: the bastard Emperor and three evil consorts. However, she encounters agent Jiang Mo of the 'Male Readers Group'. In order to finish the mission given by the male readers system, Jiang Mo arrives in the small world to drive out agent Su Lüxia of the female readers system. Two agents fighting in a small world, a female readers system versus a male readers system, who will be the final victor?

(Source: AC.QQ, translated)

Poor Ah-Jiu led a sickly and miserable existence as the daughter of a concubine but never lost her warm and charismatic heart. Xiao Yang witnessed the tragic destruction of her little village by war but held tight to her hopes for a better tomorrow. Just as Ah-Jiu is at death's door and as Xiao Yang is on the brink of starvation, a divine messenger arrives, promising to transform them into powerful goddesses! A pair of amazing tales about two heroines that are sure to win your heart… and war!

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Mori Jian Shen: Wo Zhenjing Quanqiu!

description: If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent + forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!

Wang Yi’s only an unremarkable loser, but he actually possesses an unparalleled ability that even he did not know about. As long as any spirit monster (demon) touches his blood, they’ll be instantly annihilated! Let's see how this good-for-nothing loser becomes god!

Source: Manga Updates

title.romaji: Wo Qin Ai De Fayi Xiaojie
title.english: Partners in Crime, Partners in Love

description:
When medical examiner Yarra Lin meets detective Kelsey Song, what starts as a fiery clash between them gradually turns into a deep connection and partnership. Together, they bear witness to the lives of a host of ordinary people: an innocent girl who died unjustly, an elderly mother waiting in the mountains for her criminal son to return, a timid rookie cop who risked his life to confront an armed robber... They fight for justice for the living and give a voice to the dead, uncovering countless hidden truths along the way.

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Mami Kuaipao: Daddy Zhui Lai Le

description:
She was pushed to a man with extremely mysterious identity. After she was intimate with him, she had no choice but to run away during pregnancy. A few years later, she showed up with her son, Bao! As a little man, the biggest dream of Bao is to help his mom find a perfect husband who should be the richest man in the world with a height of 1.99 meters and 8 abs for his mother! “Mom, what do you think of this man?” added Bao，pointing his finger at the man who seemed to be a plus size version of himself. “Woman, you’ve escaped for a long time, it’s time to come back and make an apology!” The man appeared aggressively! As a result, Lin Zhi lost not only her son, but also her heart!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Fanpai Dashixiong, Shimei Men Quan Shi Bingjiao
title.english: My Junior Sisters Are Obsessed with Me
title.native: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

description:
Lin Xiao transmigrated into the body of the villainous prefect of the Qinglan Sect! If he follows the original storyline and plays the role of the nasty villain properly, he'll be able to ascend to immortality! So he teases the junior girl, drugs the bathwater of a second girl, and steals the clothes of a third girl, just trying to do his job as the bad guy. Until finally the main character Ye Chen shows up and joins the sect! Now he just has to try to poison Ye Chen, get caught by the girls, and be punished by the main character! However things didn't go the way he expected…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

This is a world where anyone can have the chance to become a god. Choose the path of thunder, one can become a Thunder God. Choose the path of the mountain, one can become a Mountain God. After becoming a god, you can create your own divine kingdom. Lai Cang transmigrated into this world with no money and no talent to take on the path to becoming a god. But after a lucky accident, he found himself with a divine kingdom of his own, despite never completing the path to godhood!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Lian Ai Rang Wo You Le Chao Neng Li

description:
Art student Zhong Shenxiu runs into a problem during a portrait sketching class. She couldn't "truly see" Xu Ke, a top student and the subject of the portrait session… She can't draw her subject if she can't see her clearly. Zhong Shenxiu puts down her pencil and wonders, maybe if she became a better student, she would be able to get closer to her, right? And if she could get closer to her, then she could truly see her, right? Until she gets so close that the distance between them is almost zero — like they're almost face-to-face. Phew! Now she can truly see her clearly! But! This is... a little too close! Help! What should she do now!!!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Due to an unexpected mishap, the Snake Demon King was forced into a bonded contract with a (perverted) prodigal Taoist priest. This is the story about how the Snake Demon King tries to undo the contract and take back his throne, only to lose his heart in the process.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Introverted high schooler Xuting is used to being the target of bullies, but her life takes a dramatic turn when a new, mysteriously handsome repairman intervenes. Captivated by his quiet strength and grateful for his protection, Xuting feels an undeniable pull towards him. Yet, her world shatters when she stumbles upon his terrifying secret: he's a werewolf. Now, caught between burgeoning feelings and monstrous danger, Xuting must navigate a terrifying new reality where her protector might just be her greatest threat.

(Source: WebComics)

I've reincarnated! Different from those cold-blooded murderer fathers, my father is a total slave to his daughter (me) since I am his only princess! With a Princess System, I have hack tools whenever needed! However, I never had expected...

(Source: WebComics)

5000 years ago, the demonic sect led a great army to battle the cultivators. After years of battle, the demons destroyed all the cultivator sects. The world changed drastically after the war. Other professions such as mages, knights, and healers started to appear. This world became a world of magic. 5000 years later, a bolt of lightning reawakened the cultivator Zhong Tianshun, who had been hibernating in the Xuanyuan Forest. He is now the last cultivator in the world.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Yao Dao Zhi Zun: Yao Huang Gui Lai
title.english: Supremacy of The Demon World II

description:
When an ordinary human gains the power of the demons, he will gather the most beautiful women, recruit the cutest pets, on his way to become the most powerful demon lord!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Ye Yun traveled through the martial arts world full of gods, devils and demons, and became the patriarch of the Divine Dragon Sect. After 100,000 years of secluded cultivation, he came out from his fraudulent tomb with god-like techniques, skills, and weapons which stunned his disciples. But one person’s invincibility will not be enough to make the world submit, it takes a strong group of people to make the world tremble! So Ye Yun will lead the Divine Dragon Sect to once again become the strongest sect, able to sweep the heavens and conquer ten thousand realms, rising up to defeat all who stand in their way!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

The short-tempered captain of the criminal brigade, Qian Cuo, and the sophisticated cold-blooded detective, Teng Ruiyu, had been partners in breaking countless queer cases. But two years ago, they were involved in serial crimes related to soothsaying art...

(Source: Webnovel)

After a merciless serial killer attacks his sister, a timid boy downloads an app that grants him superpowers: Mode II. Through the app, Shu Ye can hear the inner thoughts and feelings dwelling deep within people’s hearts. But there’s a catch and, with power…comes those who abuse it.

(Source: Tapas)

Once a haughty princess, now a lowly maid! Humiliated and abused, she refused to give up in the face of a cruel and unforgiving reality. As she climbs her way back up using her unparalleled wits, will she be able to reclaim everything that was once hers?

(Source: Pocket Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes two bonus chapters.

title.romaji: Shuma Baobei 02: Digimon Adventure Zero Two
title.native: 數碼寶貝02 Digimon Adventure Zero Two

description:
Three years after the defeat of Apocalymon, dark powers begin to rise again in the DigiWorld. The 'Digimon Emperor,' a human boy, is on a campaign to enslave all Digimon and a new team of warriors must come together to restore peace.

(Source: Tokyopop)

Qi Leren unfortunately got a black screen when he cleared the first BE ending in "Nightmare Game". On the way on the bus to repair the computer, the bus collided with a sudden truck, and the injured passengers were taken to the hospital. When he woke up, Qi Leren found out that he was lying in the empty infusion hall, and there was no one to be seen in the huge hospital …

(Source: QQ, translated)

Xing Yue came to the strange Red Mansion in search of treasure, but what awaited him was not a priceless treasure, but...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Exiled to a desolate and harsh planet, Ayr spends his days hunting giant monsters as his food source. Then, everything changes when a police officer comes and tells him his exile was revoked. After arriving in Askr he learns that a lot of time has passed while he was gone. 100 years. Everything seems to be different now, but one question remains: For what reason was his exile revoked after this long time?

(Source: INKR)

What would happen if you were your own girlfriend? One night, Luo Yuchen gained the ability to transform into a beautiful girl. As he was adjusting to his newfound power, the mysterious girl who caused all this chaos finally showed up! Now, his day to day life has become a complete mess!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Meng Fei Lai Xi: Tian Jiang Xiongmao Qiu Bao Bao
title.native: 天降萌宝小熊猫：萌妃来袭

description:
Thanks to King of Hell's mistake in work, I died... and was then reborn. As a token of apology, King of Hell promises to make me adored by everyone and loved by a handsome man.

Well, as reincarnated as a cute panda, I am indeed adored by everyone, but that's not what I signed up for! As for the handsome man - ahhhh though I am now in my panda form it is still embarrassing to shower with you!

(Source: MangaToon)

Yang Jian is exiled into the human realm from the Heavens in order to repent. His former partner, The Howling Celestial Hound, has reincarnated into a young girl. Witness how a barbaric Immortal from the Heavens and his partner move 100 demons to tears.

Gu Gu, a shy girl, meets Xing Xing, an extroverted basketball girl. Xing Xing is everything Gu Gu wants to be - have lots of friends and live a happy, carefree life with dreams. Gu Gu is organized; she lists out a long to-do list for herself. But how does that help her get closer to Xing Xing? Wait, maybe Xing Xing is trying to get closer to Gu Gu too...

(Source: Webcomics)

It’s the 21st century already, and yet, there’s still someone referred to as a "Prince"!?

Born to a small European country, his mother is of royalty there. His father on the other hand, heir to prosperous European shipping industry, is a descendant of Queen Victoria.

Since birth, Elian has been groomed to be the crown prince, filled with natural confidence…(Then again, he could have been born this way). To put it bluntly, he’s an arrogant person.

Dania, on the other hand, is a girl whose father has left her for another woman, and she has to work for a living. However, her sister gets married to Elian's father, and she attends the wedding in Greece. There she meets him for the first time...

title.romaji: Wang You: Wo Neng Jinghua Yiqie

description:
Betrayed by his best friend, our protagonist loses everything: billions in wealth, his loved ones, and even his legs. In “Online Game: I Can Evolve Everything,” he gets a second chance at life. Reborn with a burning desire for vengeance, he vows to reclaim everything that was taken from him.

When a revolutionary online game arrives, he finds himself at an advantage. No one understands this game better than he does! By getting into the game early and spending heavily, he can acquire a god-level skill known as "Evolve Everything." Now he prepares to exact his revenge. With his unmatched knowledge and newfound powers, he embarks on a journey to dominate the game and take back his rightful place in the world.

title.romaji: Shengnü Xiaojie Qing Tingzhi Ni De Qiguai Nao Bu!
title.native: 圣女小姐请停止你的奇怪脑补!

description:
"I, Polly the Holy Priestess, will never surrender to you, the Demon Lord. No matter how you humiliate me, whether it’s a drugs, torture, or hypnosis, just bring it on!"

"I, Lucius the Demon Lord, just want change my fate as a villain and prevent my own destruction! So all of you saint, princess, elf, and valkyrie, please stop coming on to me!"

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
A violent and muscular boy who dreams in becoming a national champion, unexpectedly turns into a cute girl, how will she achieve her dreams?

A small and weak bookworm gets into trouble with a domineering and handsome werewolf! "Anyone who messes with me will be punished!" sneered the werewolf. During what was supposed to be an unexciting game of punishment, unexpectedly, the completely ordinary little bookworm transforms into a handsome and alluring incubus! "You're my type, doggy." the incubus smiled wickedly.

title.english: My Young Lady Is a NEET

description:
The daughter of the Li Family has always been mysterious, and it has always been rumored that she's a prim and proper, graceful young lady. In reality, however, she is a shut-in otaku who never puts on make up nor brushes her hair, and even has social anxiety. Upon being met with an engagement from Han Group, the young university student-cum-insurance promoter Gu Yuan has been hired to transform this girl into an upper-class young lady. Can he succeed?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Thousands of years ago, the immortal clan and demon clan were battling for the universe. To defend the peace and justice, the immortal clan created a mysterious legendary fighter, who blew himself up into thousands of pieces, floating in the world. And Lu Xiaofei inherit a piece of the fighter.

(Source: Mangatoon)

He was raped by a woman in a blind date by accident. Who is he? He is a young man from a powerful family in the capital, attractive to young ladies but leading an honest and clean life. Who is she? She is a disfavored daughter in a wealthy family. He said to her, "Marry me and the marriage is your best protection." She said, "Neither will I be used by you, nor will love you." He smiled, "But I love you indeed."

(Source: MangaToon)

Jiang Li, after crossing over, discovered that he possessed no special abilities, so he had no choice but to diligently cultivate. Five hundred years later, he finally became the strongest man in the Nine Provinces. Suddenly, a System appeared, offering to help him to go from a beginning cultivator to becoming the strongest in the Nine Provinces.

Jiang Li stared incredulously at the System's first mission: “Defeat your cousin (sixth-level cultivator).”

“This System is running a little late, isn't it?”

(Source: Tencent Comics, translated)

The main character died in a plane crash accident, he was transported to a strange spatial installation orbiting a strange alien world with a physical body, for over a hundred thousand years he observed the emergence and evolution of life and the formation and fall of civilizations until he woke up in a coffin, the story follows Gawain, the Grand Duke and a founder of the Kingdom of Ansu.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Clark, a vampire who had been sleeping for 800 years, was dug out by the young Taoist Jiang Lai and successfully bound to a contract. Trying to find a way to kill this vampire, Jiang Lai starts living with her and tries various methods, but she ends up falling for Clark's seductive charm. A chance encounter turns out to be an inevitable reunion… In that past life and in this one, the one who hated her is reborn. Love and hate are like the two sides of the moon. "Clark, come to me."

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Born into a family well-versed in Chinese medicine, Han Fei woke up one day and found herself transmigrated into another body, unable to even bend down and see her toes! And then she found out that she was headed for an arranged marriage with the prince in the wheelchair. People made fun of their handicaps. The fatty and the cripple, the ideal couple? But for the sake of his handsome face, Han Fei swore that she's going to lose weight! And have herself a grand wedding!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Note: Includes three extras chapters.

title.romaji: Hu Ru Yi Ye Bing Jiao Lai

description:
Yu Xiang transmigrates into a book and becomes the Marquis's unfavored sister, plagued by a disability and branded an ill-omen. Moreover, she is an imposter, left with no choice but to rely on her elder brother for protection, planning to step aside quietly once his biological sister comes home. However, when his real sister finally returns years later, the Marquis forbids her from leaving…

(Source: WebComics)

Several centuries ago, the Saber Lord defeated the Sword Emperor, causing countless sword cultivators to lose their status. They were bullied and ridiculed, until... the birth of a certain young man, one destined to bring about change! Chu Mu was originally the adopted son of the Chu Family. Yet, after he sacrificed his saber soul to perfect his sword soul, he fell from his glorious throne. They laughed at him, betrayed him, and even his fiancee chose to leave him... But what's wrong with having a "useless" sword soul? With a determined heart, Chu Mu will do the sword soul justice, and become the most powerful being in the universe!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Fanpai: Bei Tou Ting Xinsheng Hou, Nv Zhu Xiang Dang Wo Hougong!?
title.native: 反派：被偷听心声后，女主想当我后宫！？

description:
Tang Yu transmigrated into the world of an urban novel as its rich heir villain. He was just going along with the plot, trying to enjoy life as a rich playboy, when the female characters all heard his private thoughts about the situation! Now all of them have broken character to come on to him! Hey, I'm just trying to make it through the story until the happy ending! Help!

(Source: Fanqie Manhua, translated)

title.romaji: Xie Wang De Qing Cheng Kuang Fei

description: The immortal heavenly emperor's daughter is reborn! Awakening in the body of a girl that's considered as trash, the immortal heavenly emperor's daughter opens her eyes to the perception of a new world. The girl once considered as a piece of trash now begins her counterattack! Along the way, she encounters a variety of beautiful men. The gears of fate start to turn. What will await along the path of cultivation for the wicked consort?

Saal Cooper was the perfect "shadow" of the Cooper family. He was loyal, powerful, and... expendable. Spellbound to be Eren Cooper's human shield, Saal took all the wounds and pain meant for his master, making him an invincible hero. When the family discards him like a broken tool, Saal discovers the horrifying truth behind his lifelong agony. Betrayed and left to die, he reverses the spell with his final breath, reclaiming his stolen power. But death grants him an unexpected gift when he is reborn as his three-year-old self. This time, Saal is determined not to live in the shadows.

(Source: Tappytoon)

Ba Song is the hotshot cop who’s been handed an open-and-shut case: the suicide of a young woman. Except… who commits suicide by stabbing their own body and strangling themself? There's only one man who can help him with this mystery — Bo Shan, the renowned forensic pathologist with a severe and cold personality. What's more, his body produces bioelectricity, allowing him to acutely sense bodily injury with his touch. There's an electric current between them, and each touch sizzles with energy...

(Source: Tapas)

Terminally ill lad, after losing his family in an incident, found out that hidden behind the disease was an extraordinary power. While pursuing the truth behind his family death, he himself, got dragged further down the mysterious dark abyss...

Welcome to Divine Realm Online, where victory means everything. Schemes, battles, betrayals, sacrifices, this is not just a game; the price you have to pay is nowhere near what you can possibly imagine...

Qi is the origin of all life. Qi Gong is the origin of all cultivation. Yang Qi throw away everything for the woman he loves but in the end he was betrayed by the one he loves the most. Hunted by other aristocrats and with no home to return to. Now with his Qi Gong being destroyed he no longer has the capability to use any martial arts. However, the Heaven has yet to turn its back on him...

(Source: MangaUpdates)

Trash? A good-for-nothing who can't awaken his fighting spirit? A disgrace to the Luo family name? The biggest joke in Wuling province? All of this just makes him laugh!
He was spurned by his family, hated by his father, and even strangers made fun of him! Eventually, he was disowned and kicked out of the house! But losing everything caused him to become enlightened! He realized that, on the Fighting Spirit Mainland, only the strong are respected!
When his former talent returned, what others saw as genius was nothing more than a joke to him.
They call him a demon? He responds:
"Hehe, what I, Luo Chen, love to abuse most is evil!"

(Source: Kuaikan Manhua, translated)

As the strongest sorcerer of nine states of China, he was expelled by his family for practicing the ultimate martial manual, Which is regarded as a unforgivable action that against the rule of ancestor. But his mother managed to send him to a new land, where he begins a new journey of cultivation…

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Yuanlai Wo Zao Jiu Wudi Le

description:
Five years after transmigrating into a fantasy world, Ye Changqing thought he could be like other isekai main characters and be blessed with powerful abilities, but it turned out he had no talent for cultivation at all. He made a living by opening a convenience store in the little village near the cultivator's sect. But one day, his store suddenly became a site revered by all the powerful cultivators. Even his watchdog turned out to be a fearsome demon lord. Ever since then, people treated him like a powerful master, a legendary figure in this world…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

A transaction binds her and the noblest yet most awful man together. In the daytime, she’s one of the ordinary girls, but at night she can’t escape his control... He holds her chin, smiling evilly: "The entire Dongling is mine, do you think you can run away?"

(Source: Webcomics)

An adaptation of Mo Ling's novel: Coming of the Villain Boss! It's said the plots of quick-transmigration systems are classified as: normal-hard-hell-goddess. Beating up white lotuses, trampling on scum men, using unpredictable means of revenge...see how a goddess makes them tremble in fear, fleeing in all directions. However this time, why is he not dodging or hiding, instead sticking to me? "Because this time, I want you to fall in love with me."

Xia Yan, a run-of-the-mill university student. His life had become exciting ever since he received the inheritance of a lich from another world.

Unrivalled in the city along with his horde of treasured skeletons, he’s acclaimed as both a death god and a superhero. A campus queen, a pop diva, and a dom chairwoman… all of them live cosily under the illumination of Xia Yan’s soul fire.

Vampires? Werewolves? Angels? Demons? Crush ‘em all!

A bone dragon battles a helicarrier, an undead scourge creates a biohazard. All who mess with the lich get their comeuppance.

title.romaji: Jian Dao Zhi Xiao Hu Li

description:
The little fox went downhill to avoid the calamity. She encounters the rich and handsome professor Tian You. Getting along with each other day by day, the naughty and cute little fox, Xiaojiu, gradually fell in love with Tian You. But the calamity made Xiaojiu show herself in her true form. And the real identity of Tian You was unknown to everyone. Meanwhile, the brother of Xiaojiu, who was a superstar, found her and took her away... Can Xiaojiu and Tian You reunite?

(Source: WebComics)

Yan Jing has always believed that there is nothing she can't do in this world until she meets her imperious boss...

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Chongsheng Nuan Hun Qing Chong Qi
title.english: Your Turn to Chase After Me

description:
Mo Shi Yi is a talented girl, whose dream is making a lot of money daily, marrying a handsome and rich guy, and stepping on the peak of life. But she loved him so much that she began to lose herself, and then, got a tragic end before rebirth... This life, the only things she wants are money and revenge. Who is that man? She doesn't care. However, why did he become so persistent? Chasing after her all the time!

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Women Fanpai Cai Bu Xiang Dang Tajiaoshi
title.native: 我们反派才不想当踏脚石

description:
A webnovel writer transmigrated into the body of Lin Xiao, a wealthy heir. He wasn't injured, he wasn't betrayed, no one looked down at him. Instead, he had a high level of cultivation, full of powerful gear and potions, and he could flaunt his wealth and power. Life should've been great! The only problem is — Lin Xiao is the villain, and the villain's job is to be a stepping stone for the chosen one, the Hero! The unfair oppression of villains in this world made him angry. Let's see how Lin Xiao will overcome the hero's fate, and make villains great again!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Ji Wanqing, an A-lister in the showbiz who doesn't care about family, love or fame but money, finds herself stuck in a dilemma after meeting Sheng Yu, an attractive popular singer. Will Wanqing, a self-proclaimed aromantic, fall for the flirty and sweet Sheng Yu? Ji Wanqing, an A-lister in the showbiz who doesn't care about family, love or fame but money, finds herself stuck in a dilemma after meeting Sheng Yu, an attractive popular singer. Will Wanqing, a self-proclaimed aromantic, fall for the flirty and sweet Sheng Yu?

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wo De Nüyou Shi Long Aotian

description:
In legends, the most powerful person in the world is called Long Aotian... I always thought it was the name of a man, but she was actually the name of a beautiful woman?! She can make people think she's amazing without knowing why with just a cold smile, and bring people to their knees with a single stomp! She can flatten mountains with a flick of her hand! She can tear the skies open with a single finger! She is invincible and unparalleled in the world! However most importantly... She is my girlfriend and listens to everything I say!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Li Mu traveled to a magical world full of demons, ghosts and immortals. All he wanted at first was to be alive until the fox he had saved began to talk…This story is about a modern young man doing justice in a magical world.

(Source: Webnovel)

Ever wondered about the daily lives of good-looking kids whose parents are Otaku?

Yang Wei, a kind and tall boy, is oblivious to the Otaku culture. On the other hand, Tong Qi, the girl who sits next to him at school, grew up knowing it all due to her parents' influence. With Yang Wei's and Ton Qi's parent(s) being geeks, the two see each other in common and discover what's latent to them.

Note: Includes two extra chapters.

During the year 2028, humans are practically wiped out by a plague of mutated viruses. Horrible monsters are wandering on the streets, and now Earth has turned into Hell . The lucky very few survivors hid underground, living in a subway network that is easy to guard, but the protagonist and his team had no choice but to leave the safe dungeon to escape this wasteland…

(Source: Original Publisher, translated)

My boyfriend that was 287km away is now 3km away? Professor Bo Chang Yi, used to be good at understanding others, but is now no longer humane. The happiness in Ting Shuang’s heart vanished in an instant, leaving only fear, if you think about it, it seems that there will be disaster in the near future.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes one extra.

Eight years ago, the innocent, rich heir Jiang Yumian pursued his tutor Qin Heng; eight years later, the roles are reversed. The noveau rich Qin Heng reunites with his first love Yumian by chance. This time, he decides he will hold tight to him and not let go.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

All others want to live forever while he wants to die; all others have to die while he couldn't die but he couldn't live, either. No matter how many time he dies, he'll be reincarnated and start a new life as a different person, but no matter how many times he revives, he won't live longer than one year and he dies again. All this because of the "Cops of death" in the underworld miscalculated his lifespan which contributes to him being tortured! "When could i die!" he howled and they kicked him to reincarnate again but this time, things are more interesting...

(Source: MangaToon)
