The humble house-slave Fang Han traveled the world to build up his own strength, forging his ordinary flesh into an immortal body. Now he will step into the immortal realm and claim his rightful place on top of the throne!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Gongzhu Dianxia Qing Li Wo Yuanyidian A
title.english: Princess, Please Stay Away From Me!
title.native: 公主殿下请离我远一点啊

description:
Women? It’s fine to play with them for a bit, but as for those sacred vows professing eternal love? Heh, I’m sorry. I won’t believe a single word! Especially if they’re coming from the mouth of a beautiful girl… That’s what I used to think. However, after I transmigrated one day and was bedded by a certain loli princess, I… seem to have changed.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Lu Dequan, a poor but hard-working college boy, was suddenly "blessed" with the power of the Flower God, along with all sorts of abilities and powers. However, until he finishes cultivating the Tome Of Romance, he must remain chaste. Any intimate contact with a woman will cause instant death. The only solution is to win the true love of different types of beauties, to help him cultivate the highest level of the Tome. Meanwhile, members of the succubus tribe are acting strangely, trying to tempt him… What adventures will our hero have, now that he controls the ultimate pickup system?!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Zhao Yifan was transported to an alternative reality after a Zombie Apocalypse occurred. There, the surviving humans gathered together and built the "Academy" as a refuge against the zombies. However, despite the top-notch security of the Academy, it was no safer than the zombie-infested outside world. While at the Academy, Zhao Yifan turned into a mutant with the ability to absorb the powers of other zombies after he was bitten by a variant zombie. In order to protect the people he cares about, Zhao Yifan must use the powers at his disposal to find a way to survive!

They call him a demon, yet his sword dominates the heavens and his power shakes the universe, transcending even the immortals! They brand him a Buddha, yet he slaughters wherever he goes, mountains of corpses piled up and rivers of blood streaming, more demonic than demon itself! Cleansing his body with blood and tempering his bones with fire, in the cycle of life and death, he becomes a great demonic lord! The young Lin Feng rises above his hardships, unexpectedly acquiring the Demonic Seed, thus becoming the only Demonic Patriarch in this universe!

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Fanpai Xiang Yao Duo Huo Yi Tian

description:
One day, Linghu Qiang suddenly acquired the "Villain's Revenge" system and began his new life as an isekai villain. His mission is to survive the story, claim his rewards, and return to his original world. But being a villain is no easy task. Sometimes, the protagonist would lock on to him right away and take him out. Other times, some mighty swordmaster would cut him down before he even did anything evil. In short, his success rate… kinda depends on his villainous skills.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Chong Sheng Cheng Wei Wangzi Dianxia De Xiao E Long
title.native: 我重生成为王子殿下的小恶龙

description:
I, Bian Yurong, had lived 18 peaceful years with good grades as a college student and making good money as a game streamer, when I was randomly killed by some criminal. What's worse, I'm reincarnated into my favorite game as its endgame boss, the black dragon! I know how the game goes, so I'm going to take charge of my own fate! But wait, the crown prince who's been taking care of me, something's not right with him?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Cheng Fei Chi: Gentle, introverted, bookish.
Ye Ming: Tsundere, proud, and hotheaded.

A young love never dies- it always falls where it belongs!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

A supreme martial artist is killed by his beloved and is reincarnated 800 years into the future. He’s reborn as Ruochen Zhang, the sickly and lowly ninth son and prince. His doting mother is the exception to a family of treacherous schemers who jockey for power and status, so it surprises everyone when Ruochen emerges as a martial arts prodigy! Determined to protect his mother and avenge her suffering, nothing will stop Ruochen from becoming the greatest martial artist in this world too!

(Source: Tapas)

He was a part of the top 10 players in the beta test for "Sword Dance Online", but when he was put into a vegetative state after the car accident, he became a monster in the game. After endless amounts of time spent getting stronger, he soon struck terror to the noobs of the server and encountered affectionate situations with countless women.

"Teacher, I know your secret crush. It was my dad, wasn't it? If you want me to keep it a secret, then become my lover." That threat threw Ye Qing's life into chaos. When he was 19, Ye Qing had a crush on his private tutor. 18 years later, all those repressed feelings were revealed, and Ye Qing was forced to play a lovers game with his teacher's son. Despite their 18-year age gap, he felt powerless under the younger man's aggressive tactics.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.english: The Cultivator and His Contract Demon

description:
In the world of the Cloud Pact Sanctuary, magic cultivators and contract demons coexist in harmony. After being recruited by the sanctuary’s founder, the young cultivating prodigy, Xie Tong, begins his journey as a superstar among his peers. But things take an unpredictable turn! Xie’s stoic facade crumbles when he meets a weak fox demon named Zhiyi who will do anything to please him... anything but cultivate magic. Can this couple overcome their power differences to form a contract—and more importantly, a deeper bond?

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Zhenshang Jiao Qi Jiaoyi Hunyue Bie Dangzhen
title.english: Arranged Marriage With My Beloved Wife
title.native: 枕上娇妻交易婚约别当真

description:
She was forced to marry a crippled president for the sake of her family. Reluctant to accept the marriage at first, she kept a distance with her nominal husband. But his love and respect slowly unsealed her heart...

(Source: Mangatoon)

Once upon a time, an ungifted Taoist by the name of Qin Que stole the Book of Earth, fled the Wudang Mountain, and used human sacrifices to enhance his power. Grandmaster Xie Luo descends the mountain to pursue this man, but the trail goes cold for many years. Then one day, he finds a clue to finding the traitor while helping investigate an unsolved occult case.

(Source: Tappytoon)

A normal college student is married to a rich hottie, and gets to enable a "life system." Whatever he chooses on the system will come true! Only kids make choices; adults want everything! See how the rich son-in-law counterattack on those who bully him and rise to the crown!

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Chuanyue Weilai Zhi Nanren Buhao Dang
title.english: It's Not Easy to Be a Man After Travelling to the Future
title.native: 穿越未来之男人不好当

description:
After dying from a strange terminal illness, Ling Lan was reborn into a world 10,000 years into the future. Although she dearly wished she could just live a peaceful and uneventful life in her new healthy body, fate had other plans…

Forced to disguise herself as a boy just so she could inherit her deceased father’s premium military benefits, Ling Lan’s journey to adulthood was full of challenges. After much difficulty, she finally turned sixteen when she could drop the charade. But before she could grasp her newfound freedom to get married and start her own family, a twist of fate results in her being thrown into the Federation’s top military boys’ school.

With these twists of fate, Ling Lan had little choice but to walk further and further down a path of no return, one of cold and aloof dominance…

Invincible Sword Domain, Yang Ye was a disciple of the Sword Sect and was born with great fortune and bad luck. He joined the Sword Sect and studied for many years, but his energy was absorbed by the Hong Meng Pagoda.

(Source: AC.QQ, translated)

title.romaji: Quan Wang Dou Shi Wo He Yingdi CP Fen
title.english: I'm Being Shipped With the King of Film!

description: Whaaa?! The demon spirit management just arranged a husband for me again?! This time, the guy's a movie god! OMG~ I'm only a recently matured small fox. Arranging such an old demon to me, what am I to do~

A rich dandy ended up alone on a deserted island and brought a merman back to life accidentally. The merman is no ordinary but the High Priest of the Deserted Isle Tribe! The arrogant boy, somehow, was trapped on the island and forced to hatch eggs... “I have my self-esteem!” “Ancient tribes are horrible... I have no choice but to trust Mr. Merman with my life...”

(Source: Webnovel)

This sequel occurs 10 years after the original Panlong.

Note: Includes 1 extra chapter.

Cloud birds that soar through the blue sky; Terrorblood wolves that roam the wastelands ruthlessly. Dream beasts that dart through the moonlight forests; Ghost kings that dwell on foggy cliffs. Ocean spirit beasts that haunt the depths of the boundless oceans; thousand-eyed treants that stand unyielding on precipitous peaks.

Sword Beetles, Sunset Eagles, Ancient Wood Demons, Chaotic Thunder Sprites, Cursed Demon Fox: Ice… Plants, Beasts, Elementals, Undead, this is the eccentric, variegated, beautiful, and stunning world of soul pets!

Our protagonist, a soul pet trainer, had at first a young, mutated soul pet – a Moonlight Fox. In unending fights, it mutated into the stronger Evil Flamed Six-tailed Demon fox and the even higher leveled Queen Flamed Nine-tailed Firefox!

Under the companionship of this soul pet, he walked on the path to become a king, catching precious and rare soul pets, and never ceasing his endeavor to becoming the very best!

title.romaji: Tao Yan Ni Xi Huan Ni

description:
Lance has been in love with his best friend Danny, since they were kids. However, something from his childhood looms over Danny's heart, preventing him from finding love with boys. They say that you can't wake a person who's pretending to sleep, but with the help of his best girl friend, will Lance be able to open Danny's eyes and live happily ever after?

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Chapter count includes 21 extras.

"An Alpha being in love with another Alpha is taboo!", "Perverts", "You sick people!"...That's what people would say if they knew about the relationship between Ji Wang, a self-restrained Alpha actor, and Qi Boyan, a flamboyant actor and singer, who claims to be an Omega but secretly loves to dominate other Alphas. A mishap tore their relationship apart six years ago. But when fate puts them together again as co-stars in a popular movie, they are forced to face the burning temptation while resolving their past misunderstandings...

(Source: INKR, edited)

title.romaji: Chong Sheng Zhi Shen Dì Gui Lai
title.english: Return of the Reborn God Emperor

description: In his previous life, Lin Xiao accidentally obtained the God’s Resolution Sutra and awakened the ancient ancestor body, an unparalleled overlord body. After all kinds of hardships, he eventually became an immortal and conquered the gods and demons. Now, he’s reborn and returned to his teenage, seventeen years old self…

title.romaji: Yi Zhao Zhi Ban Xiuzhen Jie

description:
He thought he had it made when he transmigrated with a powerful system. But it turned out that to level up his system, he had to get beat up by other people. Just as he was resigned to accept the beatings, a young girl appeared and brashly asked him to become her apprentice. Tempted by the pretty loli, he accepted her offer. Hey, she'll grow up some day. But he didn't know she would grow up quite so quickly...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Duo Sha Wo Ji Ci, Wo Jiu Wu Di Le
title.native: 多杀我几次，我就无敌了

description:
Summoned into a world where the divine and martial arts coexisted, Qiao Mu can revive infinitely while leveling up. The more tragic his death, the stronger he gets when he revives. His enemies are shocked when they realize after defeating a boy, another man up, without end! Rumors started to spread about the legendary Qiao family… Wait, no one told me that every revival makes me older!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

In her last life she devoted everything to her beloved, the third prince. However her devotion was met with the sharp dagger of betrayal, as the man whom she loved carved her heart out.

Years later, she is reincarnated as the bride to be of her enemy’s brother, the fifth prince, a silly prince whom the royal family regards as worthless. In him she sees her past pitiful self and promises to protect this foolish yet kind prince. But is this foolish prince really all that he seems? Can she really protect him and seek revenge for her past life?

Certainly the royal family has nothing to fear of this dimwitted prince and his beloved wife who is seeking revenge… Right?

The suspense author, Xiu Rui, personally got himself involved in tracking a case for writing his materials, but found out that the truth of the case was exactly the same as the content in his novel! And the person who was behind was lurking around him... Sin makes love grow fangs, and discrimination will eventually swallow and destroy trust. The entwined triangle relationship now begins. Who should he believe and who can he believe?

(Source: WebComics)

After her parents divorced, Lu Yang lived at her mother's best friend's house and lived with her daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui, bright and gentle, like the warm winter sun, easily illuminated Lu Yang's life, but also her heart. Lu Yang looked at her, like a sister, like a friend...

Later, Lu Yang didn't want to be her sister, she wanted to be with her. But after discovering that her feelings for Su Gui had deteriorated, Lu Yang did not want to break the harmony of the moment, and even more afraid of losing her "sister" identity, she could only tolerate dependence and move away from Su Gui.

However, after reuniting with Su Gui because of her work, the feelings she had been suppressing grew wildly, like branches of roses, wrapping herself and Su Gui tightly. Is it a long-planned plan or is it fate?

(source: Billibilli, translated)

My beloved, my empress... though it pained me to leave you so soon, I did my best to secure a comfortable future for you and our son. I left for the underworld prepared to wait for you there, so you can imagine my surprise when I return to find you… WITH YOUR OWN PRIVATE HAREM! Just who the hell are all these men?! And why are you touching their—HEY! That’s it! “Until death do us part” be damned! Brace yourself, my beloved. I’ll see to it that you rue the day you decided to revel in my death!

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Chuanyue Cheng Daomei NPC: Wo You Laopo Zhao Zhe
title.english: Reincarnated as an Unlucky NPC: My Wife's Got My Back
title.native: 穿越成倒霉NPC：我有老婆罩着

description:
He Qingyang transmigrates into his favorite game, but he takes over the body of a doomed NPC whose backstory he always skipped over in the game. All he knows that he was harassing the female lead Yu Yiwan, and when she found out, she cut him down with one stroke of her sword. Trying to change his NPC fate, he tries to finish his missions as soon as possible so he could escape. But it turns out his fate is more tied to Yu Yiwan than he realized…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Zui Qiang Mozun De Tuixiu Shenghuo Cong Gonglüe Zhujiao Kaishi
title.english: The Strongest Demon Becomes the Protagonist's Strategist
title.native: 最强魔尊的退休生活从攻略主角开始

description:
Game designer Zhou Yuzai suddenly died while working overtime and transmigrated into the cultivation game he was working on. He became the main antagonist Wei Buwang, who had killed the female lead Jiang Yunbo's entire family. Zhou Yuzai thought he would have it easy in his own game, but Jiang Yunbo's tendency to die in game also reset him back to the start, too. It turned out that even though he was a powerful demon lord, he was still just an NPC compared to the actual main character Jiang Yunbo. So he decided to help Jiang Yunbo get stronger instead, and pick up his own harem along the way!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Notes: Includes one bonus chapter.

title.english: No Way, My Best Actress Wife

description:
I thought this was just about me coming back to the stage. Who’d expect layers after layers of mysteries, lies, and conspiracies?
Love that was once lost, memories that flood back, turns out we’ve loved each other time after time.

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Du Shi Chao Ji Shen Zun

description: Ling Fei Will fight though two worlds will he be able to unravel to secret of both? After an accident he woke up in a mystical cultivation realm. But when earth called him back he had the chance to relive his life on earth. What will he do with this second chance?

Uh-oh, River is in love with his oblivious best friend Sea... Will he confess to him during their grad trip? Perhaps... But little does River know that true danger lurks below still waters, waiting for him.

Freediving deep underwater, he spots a mysterious stranger chained to a ship at the bottom of the ocean. As local lore goes, vampires once roamed the lands until a bloody event changed everything.

Is River hallucinating? And just what is real? Take a deep breath... and dive in.

(Source: Tapas)

In the old days, the streets in the downtown area are now dead silent. Hoarse and frantic weird whispers entangled in the sky, and the indescribable ancient giant shadow of a cosmic being floating in the sea. Unknown disease outbreaks, terrible disasters raging, panic among humans. It's the end of times where humans sought in vain refuge day and night.

The rain is blood-drenched, and the lightning illuminated the sky gathering the crows to feast on corpses, never again, never again, they replied.

"We can see that this weird creature has twelve pairs of ribs just like humans, but it also has a transverse bone piece that humans don't have..." In medical school, He continued to wield to scalpel to save the people. These medical students showed the thoracic structure of the weird creature on the experimental platform. The mysterious and treacherous age has come, the truth has collapsed, the order has collapsed, and mankind can only move forward unyielding through intellectual power while insanity creeps in… closer ever so slightly.

"What will you do?"

Let the madness guide you.

(Source: AC.QQ, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Zai Quan Qiu Shua Fuben
title.english: I Grind Dungeons Around the World

description:
Su Mu wakes up to find himself in a parallel universe, where everyone is forced into a Game Space at age 18 and forced to compete in a series of deadly survival games like Werewolf and Hide-And-Seek! See how Su Mu will fight to emerge victorious!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

In a past life, the mountain goddess took in a quiet child, only to find that the little one didn't want to be her servant, but instead aspired to become her intimate companion! But fate played its cruel hand, turning the once inseparable pair into bitter enemies?

In this life, a cute, water-fearing mermaid happens upon an aloof beauty with no memories of her past. A chance kiss during their first meeting is just the start of their chaotic relationship. However, what had seemed to be a serendipitous meeting turns out to be a long-fated reunion with roots reaching deep into the past...

From lifetimes past to present, an obsessive love flourishes...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

In this world, demons threaten to emerge from corrupted hearts. To protect everyone, each person’s chest is installed with a Heartlock with varying degrees of security. But young Louis can afford only the simplest of Heartlock since he has no money or privilege. After his innermost desires are exposed by his closest friend, he is framed and sent away. Surrounded by the demons of other tormented inmates, can the innocent Louis and his delicate heart survive this new hell?

(Source: Tapas)

Yuwen Jun (Cheng) came to Japan to get married because of childhood arrangement. Instead he got himself into a thrilling journey where kendo masters, detective sisters, young misses of rich families entangled with him. Yuwen Jun was stunned while facing so many unexpected incidents: "I just came to get married..."

Ding Yi, an ordinary delivery guy, saved a beautiful, wounded woman assassin from coma on his way home. How can Ding Yi survive around this elusive and indifferent killer? As the wheel of destiny turns, comes an adventurous and exciting world of assassination.

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Jiuming! Yin Wei Chule BUG, Wo Bei Youxi Mei Shaonu Chan Shangle
title.english: Help! Because Of A BUG, I'm Getting Pestered By The Game's Babes!
title.native: 救命！因为出了BUG，我被游戏美少女缠上了

description:
Game characters come to life because of a bug?! Blossom, the ancient-style girl with an ancient mindset; Cthylla, the mature girl who comes from a mysterious world; Gumi, an idol of the Meow Country, Gumi; II, the mischievous, petite magical girl, and No.7, the AI-powered agent who loves money...

A group of beautiful girls appears and pesters the female game producer. Is this the beginning of a wonderful harem life? No, this is the beginning of a chaotic cohabitation life.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

After she was nearly killed and then rescued, Ruan Ruan lost all her memories. Her savior, Ding Xiao, treated her with all the tenderness in the world; she completely let her guard down in the face of his perfect image. After figuring out the identity of her attacker, Ruan Ruan naively thought they were heading toward a happy ending. However, after discovering Ding Xiao's secret, her world turned upside down! With danger looming on all sides, will she continue to be the prey, or will she become the hunter?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Kai Ju Huo De Shenmai De Wo Wudi Le
title.native: 开局获得神脉的我无敌了

description:
I, Sheng Xiang, was born into a martial family, but I lacked the talent for cultivation, which made me unwanted and unloved by my clan. But things can change. One day, I fell into a cave in the wilderness, and there I found two incredible beauties. When I realized that they're unable to move, lust began to overwhelm my rational thoughts…

(Source: iQiyi, translated)

title.romaji: Shuma Baolong D-CYBER: Chao Jinhua Long Hun Zhan Ji
title.native: 數碼暴龍D-CYBER 超進化龍魂戰記

description:
Ten thousand years ago, a great and powerful Digimon was defeated and sealed away by the Holy Knights as the "Digi Core". Years later, a virus infected the digital world, leaving only those that possessed the D-Antibody (X-Antibody) remaining. The only members of the Holy Knights remaining are Omega of Power (Omnimon X), Duke of Courage (MedievalGallantmon/Gallantmon X), and Magna of Miracles (Magnamon).

At the start of the series, the "God of Death" MetalPhantomon draws Hikaru, Kiyoshi, Masuken, and Teru into the digital world. Originally, Hikaru is left alone with his Digimon (which starts out as a Dorimon), and has to battle his friends Teru and Masuken, who are under MetalPhantomon's control.

(Source: Wiki)

On the first day of high school, Wei made up her mind to confess to her childhood sweetheart who she had a crush on. Due to being overly nervous, she actually confessed to the wrong person… What kind of campus life would await her in the future?

A lowly servant, who always gets bullied and insulted by others, suddenly received a magical training technique. Ever since then, he became a cultivating genius, counterattacked to those who used to offend him, and started a prideful life!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Wo Cai Bushi Edu Nü Pei
title.english: I'm Not An Evil Antagonist Actress

description: A b*tch-looking supporting actress made a pact with a handsome star actor with a creepy addiction for her career. Let’s see how this strong girl will fight and reach her career success!

title.romaji: Xun Zhao Qian Shi Zhi Lu

description:
The story about a special service agency that deals with people’s previous lives. Whoever sows sparingly will reap sparingly and whoever sows generously will reap generously. No one knows. In this line of trade of ours, we offer you a chance to return back to your past life. discover the origin of your troubles, seek redemption, and reshape the course of your current life. For such a service, we do not ask for money. Instead we desire. a single drop of your tear.

(Source: Mangatoon)

Song Huan, president of a major company, sends her younger brother to sign for a package who ends up taking a fancy to the delivery boy.
Can Zou Xiao An continue his job in peace, despite the relentless advances of Song Kai?

Source: MU

This story is about a girl from the year 2011 that time-traveled to the year 3011. In year 3011, machines with consciences have taken over some of the humans and some humans with special powers have appeared. All of them want world domination but the humans want their freedom. She is caught between this conflict and struggles to be with the one she loves.

(Source: INKR, edited)

In a prosperous city, there are many races- which are beyond the understanding of humans- hidden in society. The strength and the prosperity of these races not only depends on their own growth, but also on human belief and worship of them.

However, as more people in modern society believe less in them, the more their numbers and strength diminish. Although there are still some powerful and ancient beings, they can only try their best to hide in corners of the world or pretend to be human.

On the other hand, there are other races with dark purposes who call themselves the "Devil Hunter Association". In order not to be discovered by the demon hunters and not targeted by humans, various races worked hard to integrate into human society.

title.romaji: Di Shao Zhuan Chong Badao Qi

description:
"100 Yuan, your tips. Take care." Take advantage of the Lord of this city, you dare want to take it as nothing happened? No way!

(Source: Webcomics)

In the post-civilization era, Earth witnessed frequent anomalies. Strange fruits appeared in famous mountains and rivers, causing living beings to undergo mutations upon consuming them. Chu Feng, a college student, accidentally ventured into the Bronze Kunlun Mountain during a journey after a breakup. At the moment of Earth's recovery, he unexpectedly awakened the bloodline of the Supreme King, embarking on a path of cultivation to dominate the world!

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Ao Jiao Wangye Tai Nan Zhui

description: This is a story about a murdered lady, who then time travels and is reborn as the second daughter in a wealthy household. She was often bullied in her own household. After time travelling, she acts all frail and weak in the situations she encounter, while intelligently overcoming crisis after crisis. Even without a royal background, she is slowly but surely climbing to the top!

title.romaji: Yuanlai Wo Shi Lianai Youxi Li De Gongjuren
title.english: I'm Just a Side Character in a Dating Simulation
title.native: 原来我是恋爱游戏里的工具人

description:
On that day, a girl wearing strawberry underwear fell from the sky. “This place is actually set in a GAL Game world!” And not only was I, who was raised in a prosperous family and was outstanding in everything not the main character, but I was also instead this world’s villainous and antagonistic Eldest Young Master?! I had decided. I shall forge an alliance with the strawberry girl, and together we shall wage war upon the main character for the one true love! I don’t care for his main character’s aura or his Yasashii Strategy. I shall open up a grand path to becoming the main character! I refuse to be a side character in a dating sim!"

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

A villainous space-time traveler randomly took over the body of a noble who was a role model of justice and obtained a system disguised as a villain's training manual! How was he supposed to choose between good and evil? To carry out justice or to play evil? Or simply both!

(Source: Webnovel)

Revered as the most powerful person in cultivation, Grand Master Yu Yan eventually took on an apprentice after waiting for over 16,000 years. He offered careful instruction and protection to her, but she died in the end. Then, Yu Yan took another one as his apprentice, with great instruction and protection, but she died as well! After that, he took on one another, and finally ... she died! Why it is Yu Yan who is always picking up the same reborned apprentice!

(Source: Webnovel)

In this era of martial arts, those who don't awaken their martial arts are known as primitive humans. Xiao Wudao is an arrogant and disrespectful child. His father is a rich man while his adopted brother is a martial artist. One day, his brother turned on the family and killed everyone. Suddenly, Xiao Wudao found himself awoken one year before that faithful day. Now, he will protect his family and won't redo the mistakes in his past life.

title.romaji: Bai Sui Kai Xitong, Xiaozi Xiansun Gui Man Shan!
title.native: 百岁开系统，孝子贤孙跪满山！

description:
Xiao Chen is a transmigrator who has lived a long, peaceful life and is now lying nearing death at the age of 100, when his System finally activated. Now he can earn rewards if his descendants have children. Not only will he get stronger, his lifespan will be extended, too! So go forth and procreate! All my children, young and old, men and women, get out there and breed!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Will Jiu~ tell me your thoughts? An eccentric psychiatrist to the stars, Will Jiu finds himself saddled with a student intern he doesn't want. Lianne is sassy, rebellious, and used to wrapping people around her finger, but now she's met her match. Forced to come together, these two butt heads as they help clients face their mental health issues. But even as they guide others to breakthroughs and healing, can Will and Lianne ever see eye to eye and diagnose the problems in their own relationship?

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Lang Xiaojie He Ta De Huli Meimei
title.native: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description:
The setting is a modern world populated with beast-people, ruled by the law of the jungle. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi is a wolf-woman who stands at the top of the food chain. She fought her way to the top with her bare hands with a fierce attitude and no respect for the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister dumped a fox cub on her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a gentle guard dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub to become a good student and a good citizen! However, the fox-girl's good-girl appearance hides a dark side.

Little Fox: "Sister, I've been a good girl, can you… do something nice for me?" (Blinking back tears)

Now that the crybaby fox cub is all grown up, her first order of business is to find and capture the gray wolf that abandoned her. She'll chain that wolf to her territory, and never let her escape…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Note: Includes five extras.
Being a gifted doctor, and the best warrior, he married a strong-willed wife. What can he do about her?

Fang Luoan, a half-werewolf, was five years old when his father was killed. He was then adopted by vampire Fang Yanchen. Today, twelve years later, as Fang Luoan is about to reach adulthood, his werewolf attributes are beginning to emerge. His uncontrollable emotions and the abnormal power he has have caused a ton of terrible troubles. But what he never expected is that Fang Yanchen, whom he has been living with, is the foe that killed his father…

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Lu Yi Fan, a dedicated basketball player, has successfully graduated from his delinquent-filled middle school and entered high school believing that he has escaped from the terrors of delinquents. But who would have known that the basketball team in his new school was composed of juvenile delinquents?

title.romaji: Nü Tudi Ge Ge Xiang Sha Wo
title.english: All My Female Disciples Want to Kill Me

description:
With memories from my life in the 21st century, I was transferred into the body of a man named Su Bei in another world and given the "10,000x Disciple Rebate" system. All my disciples are gorgeous women with amazing attributes. Any one of them could be the main character in a novel. But they all hate me so much that they want to kill me. What on earth did the original Su Bei do to his disciples in his previous life?!!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Chongsheng Xiangfeng: Gei Ni Wo De Dujia Chongni
title.english: Rebirth: Giving You My Exclusive Affection
title.native: 重生相逢：给你我的独家宠溺

description:
Yun Xiangxiang was reborn as her seventeen-year-old self. She swore that she would never let herself be bullied in this life. She slapped her cheating fiancé and made a high-profile announcement that she was looking for a partner. However, she was forced to accept a crippled man. Yun Xiangxiang was ridiculed and mocked but that man treated her like the apple of his eye. When people insulted or bullied her, he would make them pay a hundred times over.

One day, Yun Xiangxiang exclaimed in surprise, "You can walk!?".

The man looked at her innocently and said, "I never said that I can’t."

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Zhang De Tai Xiang BOSS, Jieguo Shì Ren Zhen De Xin Le.
title.native: 长的太像BOSS，结果世人真的信了

description:
Su Liang, the King Of The Moon! Master of the Divine Lunar Butterfly, with the power to control time and space, ying and yang, the invincible young man will stand at the pinnacle of this world! So I transmigrated to this world and into this powerful body, sounds like a great start... except it's all bullshit! My familiar is no Lunar Butterfly!! It's just a low-level glow moth that can barely light up a room!!! Now I'm faced with millions of fanatical believers, a battle with the Emperor Cangyue scheduled in three years time, and all of the major sects who see me as a thorn in their eyes... This is… big trouble for a beast-master!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

An ace killer in modern time got a time travel and reborn into a princess, whose husband is a powerful genius in the country. Being obedient and submissive to her husband and friendly to his concubines? No way! if you dare to challenge, just have a try!

(Source: Manga Toon)

title.romaji: Bu Nuli Jiuyao Dang Huang Fu

description:
“If the Aslan family knew other genes had “invaded” their bloodline, they might hurt your twins!”

Magic, mecha, mana, demon foxes, and space travel. There’s a lot that’s unique about Mu Yunshen’s world. Most interestingly... for a select few men, pregnancy is also a possibility. Of course, Mu Yunshen doesn’t know about this last little detail—yet. After he saves the life of young master Aslan and spends the night with him, Mu Yunshen ends up with the shock of his life: twins.

(Source: Comikey)

title.romaji: Yu Siwang Tongxing: Cong Yuren Dixiacheng Kaishi
title.english: Deathwalker Chronicles: From Murloc to Glory
title.native: 与死亡同行：从鱼人地下城开始

description:
After unlocking the hidden class “Deathwalker,” becoming a legendary adventurer should be straightforward… right?

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: SOS! Lian'ai Chu Le Yao Ezi

description:
Like most high school girls, Xiao Fan deals with your typical daily dramas. Taming messy bed head, dodging the mean girls at school or, y'know, finding a naked bug-human hybrid in her living room?! A product of her mother's magic, Yamu is a bug boy and now Xiao Fan's housemate, aka the bane of her existence. He chews on wood, refuses to wear clothes and bugs Xiao Fan to death but why does she get butterflies whenever she's around him...

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes 2 extra chapters.

title.romaji: Zai Bu Si Wo Jiu Tongzhi Mojie Le
title.english: Demon Realm: Can't Wait to Quit!
title.native: 再不死我就统治魔界了

description:
Humanity’s strongest warrior was killed by demons amidst a battle and gained the power to reincarnate, but somehow did so as a demon. Only by dying he can go back to living as a human, so he committed suicide non-stop. But things turned out to be the opposite of what he expected…

(Source: WebComics)

In the modern world, Xu Fei is an ordinary three-no college student: no looks, no money, and no future. But in the other-world, he is a martial artist, a cultivator, and a magician. The other-world martial arts skills make him unbeatable in the modern world, but it's not like an overwhelming super-power. The other-world resembles ancient times, where medicine, economics, and political systems are still primitive. Being able to travel between the two worlds, Xu Fei will use his unique skills to pick up women and become a tycoon in each world!

title.english: The Magic Chef of Fire and Ice: Season 2

description: Season 2 of The Magic Chef of Fire and Ice.

Is reincarnation a coincidence or a necessity? Lu Qi has been reborn into his world where martial arts reign. With his highest level of comprehension, he obtains the most valuable treasures, searches for the heavenly dao, taks in female slaves, wipes out devils! Let’s step into this world where the primordial spirit is indestructible and the Heavenly Dao is eternal!

(Source: Mangatoon)

title.romaji: Luode Dao Yuan Shi Jishi: Hei Gang
title.english: Rhodes Island's Records of Originium - Blacksteel

description: Arknights official comic featuring daily life of Blacksteel members, Vanilla, Jessica, Liskarm and Franka, who joined Rhodes Island for the first time. It also elaborates the relationship between Franka and Liskarm since the former's Infection after the Ironforge Originium leakage incident in Columbia.

The “Battle of the Gods” was a thing of the past, and the name “Lin Zhizun” was buried and forgotten. His daughter bullied, his wife insulted, Lin Feng finally woke up from his slumber: I guarded the 10 million square kilometers of Shenhua territory, but I can’t guard my own home!? The supreme being will return to the top!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

With his back against the wall, Crispin Tadelville, the last surviving alpha of the Tadelville family, disguised himself as an omega to escape death. Now, forced to bide his time as a plaything for the Ethelanian nobles who slayed his people, Crispin waits for the perfect opportunity to exact his revenge. His only obstacle? The prince of the Ethelanian empire he seems to have mistakenly marked.

(Source: Tapas)

Since ancient times, all around the world, there have been myths related to snakes… If they are but an invention of human imagination, how can they be central to all religions? A story parting from an ancient snake-like temple… could actually be true? A girl with a mystical bloodline is about to be awakened and the search of mysterious totem will bring an inevitable change to all…

“I will break free from this curse and change my destiny.”

(Source: MangaToon)

Note: Includes prologue and two extras chapters.

Have you ever been confused about love? In the end what is "true love" like? Our female lead now is standing at a fork in the road. On one side, her close childhood friend is waiting for her reply. On the other side, there stands her college friend whom she cannot just let go. Where does this love triangle lead to?

(Source: Webcomics)

A young girl wakes up in a hotel room and sees a man lying on top of her, but all she can remember is having a drink with her sister. Luckily she manages to escape from more terror, but still ends up pregnant. She passes out after giving birth, and when she wakes up her stepsister and stepmother can no longer be found in the hospital...
Five years later, she moves to Ningguo as an exchange med student, and with her is her 5 year old son who walks into another kid with identical appearance.

In the seclusion of an ancient temple in a deeply hidden, wooded mountain range, two strangers - a young woman and a mysterious young man who hides his face behind a monkey mask - meet as they seek shelter from a storm. In order to make it more comfortable to hold out against the pouring rain in the temple, the woman asks the man to tell her a story ...

(Source: Chinabooks, translated)

Note: Includes 10 extra chapters.

title.romaji: Wo Kao Qian Dao Ni Tian Gai Ming

description:
After our male protagonist transmigrated, he was somehow taken in by the all-women Yunü Sect, and given a job as the doorman. When he jumped to the other world, he was blessed with the Super Sign-In System and given the unprecedented ability of Carnal Cultivation. He had to stimulate women, and their excitement will become his cultivation. The Yunü Sect was threatened by enemies on all sides. To protect his (women) saviors, he will take advantage of the Super Sign-In System to defeat enemies, slay demons, fight off monsters, conquer the wilds, and make himself into a god.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Jian Shen de Shenghuo Cai Buyao Name Wuliao
title.english: The Exhilarating Life of a Sword God
title.native: 剑神的生活才不要那么无聊

description:
After ten years of cultivation, I’ve become a Sword God. Time to head down the mountains and make a name for myself…

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

After witnessing a girl who is exposed to bullying, the guy takes a step to stand up for her. However after getting beaten, he attracts the attention of a strange talking rabbit and tells the guy about a contract with him where he can get the power to defend the girl. Here, he's given his transformation, but not with his own gender. What will this lead him to...

The story of a guy who turned into a cruel girl with strange abilities.

Li Yan, diagnosed with a fatal disease, accidentally found his way into the strange world of Purgatory. Step by step, relying on his fighting skills, he became a powerful figure. And as he traveled through the realms of Purgatory, he was able to uncover the truth behind this world.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Zai Yijie Yang Nanshen: Shenyi Jiu Xiaojie
title.english: Miss Divine Doctor: Conquer The Demon King
title.native: 我在异界养男神：神医九小姐

description:
Jun Jiu, the divine doctor, was killed by her competitor and time travelled to another world. She breaks into a sealed altar, and a mysterious man snatches her chin and forces her... Who's this arrogant demon?!

(Source: Mangatoon)

title.romaji: Zilü De Wo Jianzhi Wu Di Le

description:
This is a world where monsters lurk and thousands of Sects thrive. If you’re not careful, your life will be at risk. However, all of this has nothing to do with Li Dan, because as long as he discipline himself, he can receive corresponding rewards and become perfectly invincible! “Ding: Congratulations to the host for persisting in daily exercise. Here’s a top level cultivation tutorial.” “Ding: new self-discipline task released-- persist in professing your love to the most beautiful woman in the Sect for a month, and you’ll have a mysterious talent.”

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Huli Zong Shi Zai Shuo Huang

description:
Tang Ran is a sunny and cheerful little fox spirit. In order to graduate from youkai school, she transformed into a college student to try to seduce a human. However, what she didn't know was that Su Qingci, the cool lady professor she had her eyes on, was actually…? One lie begets more lies, as each girl tries to seduce the other, that is the way of the "lying" fox.

(Source: Billibilli, translated)

Lin Huanhuan, a regular 20-year-old girl who just joined the workforce, suddenly transmigrated while taking a bath! What’s more, it’s a world filled with handsome men who wear loincloths and can transform into beasts! Romance with another race is bound to be difficult, but luckily, there’s a transmigration system which teaches her how to survive in this strange new world. Study hard to achieve your sweet romance, Huanhuan!

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Kan Shou Monü Men De Dianyuzhang

description:
The Rose Prison of Silver City was known to be the most secure and sturdiest female prison in the entire continent. The most dangerous and vicious female criminals on the continent were thrown in here, and I, Aiden, was the warden in charge of this prison. However, the original "Aiden" was a powerhouse who was adept in using guns, swords, and even black magic. I was nothing but an ordinary person who had transmigrated into his body! Did I know any of the skills mentioned above? Absolutely not.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.native: 數碼寶貝04 無限地帶

description: The spirits of ten legendary warriors, who in ancient times had saved the Digiworld, now present a new power to the Digidestined! To save the Digiworld from evil, Takuya, Koji, Tommy, J.P and Zoe must band together as a team to find their chosen spirits! The journey into the new frontier - the Digimon Frontier - is about to begin!

Season 1:
After a one night stand, Tong Tianai sneaked out the door, but not before leaving behind a provocative message signed only with a lip print. But she didn't know that the man is Qin Jinyang, the CEO of the Qin Group! He swore to find this woman, and the next day, all the major media outlets published a 'Wanted' notice on their front page! As she looked at her phone, Tong Tianai can feel her face turn red. She had messed with the wrong CEO!
(Source: QQ, translated)

Season 2:
When her uncle conspired to take over her father's Boya Corporation, Shen Sixuan was driven out of her home and had to watch her father die from despair. To take back Boya, she will do whatever it takes, including seducing Qin Yichen, the young CEO of the Qin Group. But will the cold and domineering Qin Yichen really help her with her quest?
(Source: iQiyi, translated)

Season 1 contains 157 chapters.
Season 2 contains 249 chapters.

When aliens invaders attacked Earth, humanity fought back valiantly to earn a brief respite. To continue fighting the advanced alien civilization, humanity began injecting genetic modifications to awaken superpowers. As the people evolved, the great age of genes has begun! Gong Xutui was injected with the genetic serum to become one of the evolved, but he didn't know what power his genetic mod had, even as dangerous enemies were approaching...

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Xiao Zheng was forced into signing a marriage and employment contract after a one night stand with the female executive of New Arcana Group. During this time, he encountered many interesting female workers which he named them based on their unique characters…

Ice Goddess… Tyrannosaurus / Overlord Flower… Gentle Boss… Mischievous School Girl…

Through an old camera in the club's storage room, Gu An saw something that should not exist. She was a shooting star from three years ago named "Xinghuo." Why do you stay in the night sky? Why am I the only one who can see you? Gu An, who usually follows the crowd, wants to investigate and take the initiative for the first time in her life. As an observer and "the most important friend," Gu An and Xinghuo set on a journey to find the former club members and fulfill their dreams from three years ago. "It's... been exposed." "But, I'm really happy. Thank you, Gu An."

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

What kind of love is worth bearing in mind for a lifetime. She is the mother of a four-year-old, and he is the overwhelming President. She spares no effort in keeping the secret that she once had saved him, but he keeps pushing her step by step. "Be my girl, I can give you anything you want. But, you can't betray me or leave me." She sneered her reply, "President Ji, you have a fiancee, and being your secret lover is the least thing I want to do, because people criticize and curse the other woman."

(Source: Webcomics App)

In the future, billions of people are immersed in a virtual world game. The ordinary teenager who accidentally entered the virtual game world to save his sister not only became a beautiful girl, but also couldn't exit from the game?! How will he adjust to his new gender and the big events that follow...

(Source: WebComics)

Note: Chapter count includes one extra.

title.romaji: Wu Di Zhi Qian Qing Zhai Tai Duo
title.english: The Revered One Has a History: Me and My Suddenly Appearing Children

description:
After a long and desperate struggle, Master Ling Yunfeng and his group of stalwart followers have finally restored peace to the world. Just as he was about enjoy his hard-earned peace and quiet, he suddenly realized that during the long war, he had a lot of casual affairs, some of which ended up with kids! Now it's time for payback! The Supreme Master, with no experience in romantic relationships or child raising, is now facing an entirely new battlefield! Sometimes, love and family comes at you fast!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

"Awaken from the killing and become the strongest demon king!"

In order to survive, young Fang Cheng was forced to sign a contract with a Slayer Demon. For each demon he hunts down, he can unlock a new ability. Facing this dark age of demonic invasion, Fang Cheng vows to fight back and become the strongest!

(Source. Tencent, translated)

High school dropout Hank Yan has a lot of hobbies. Studying, live streaming his day to day, and beating up bullies as a hero vigilante?! One day, Hank saves a young man named Junior. Shy and suffering from a dark past of abuse, Junior is a lot like Hank. Both barely have parents, if they are alive at all, both are interested in one another. Is it luck that they met or…fate?

(Source: Tapas)

title.english: I Rely On My Harem To Conquer The World

description:
Li Haoran, once a brave youth who fell to his teammates’ betrayal in a brutal battle against strange beasts, awakens to a shocking new life, reborn as Blood Demon King in a hidden village teeming with alluring succubi. Gifted with a twisted system that fuels his power through building a vast harem, Haoran vows to seize this second chance. He will forge himself into an unstoppable demon lord, gather his bewitching companions, and lead his harem to conquer the entire world.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Kaiju Jianren Hei Long boss, Wo Wudile
title.native: 开局兼任黑龙boss，我无敌了

description: When countless of my classmates were addicted to the super popular game “Battle of the Gods”, I was not tempted. This game is highly realistic, based off of powerful historical generals and mythical figures, where they battle against each other! Your potential determines your fate, the winner becomes the king while those who are defeated, eat dust. Analysis failed….. What’s with this situation? Is it a bug? My profile can’t be matched with a character? In that case, congratulations on triggering the game’s hidden story! I accidentally…... Opened it.....

title.english: You Look Like My Son's Mommy

description:
Four years ago, she was framed by her own cousin, and got kicked out of the Bai fam. She knew she has to fight her way back and take revenge on that vicious woman.
Four years later, she received a call from that woman. She swear she will not fall into her traps again. And she managed to escape from her claws. Actually she did much better this time, until a man dragged her into his bed once more...

(Source: MangaToon)

When she left work, Cheng Huan unexpectedly ran into Liao Jia, her senior from high school who worked at the company. Hitching rides from Liao Jia was the perfect opportunity for them to see each other regularly. And for some reason, Cheng Huan was always able to catch a ride from her senior. Before they knew it, they began to realize their feelings for each other — and each ride became a chance for them to build their relationship.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

The new emperor, Qi Nian, acceded to the throne many years ago. He kept refusing the requests by his officials to choose a consort, brushing them off by saying "I am busy with work. The affairs of state are more important." But Qi Nian finally relented as rumors that "the emperor is impotent" began to spread.

Yu Dingdang is a rather dim-witted girl, but born to a prestigious family. This led many to say: "Miss Yu exchanged her brain for her looks". Nobody expected that she would be chosen by the emperor to be his empress consort? Yu Dingdang acted surprised on the outside, "Who? What? Me?" But inside she was thrilled, because she has wanted to become Qi Nian's bride ever since she was little. When she successfully marries her crush, that is when a slapstick comedy breaks out in the palace, when she finds out that the haughty emperor is actually a woman?!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Yue Lao Bu Zhun Wo Lianai

description: Instead of pulling the red strings of fate between the humans, the god of marriage descended to earth to stop someone from dating. The protagonist's marriage is the key for the world's end. This is a comedic romantic cohabitation story between a workaholic god of marriage and a hot-tempered teacher.

title.romaji: Shi Ye Hou Wo Zai Hai Bian Yu Jian Le Renyu Xiaojie
title.english: The Mermaid I Met by Getting Fired
title.native: 失业后我在海边遇见了人鱼小姐

description:
After the pandemic passed, our protagonist lost her job and decided to join a tour group to the seaside to relax. Only to meet a mermaid in the ocean?! The mermaid acted strangely and quickly disappeared. But the next day, she saw the mermaid again, and her jaw dropped in astonishment…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Xie Yanhuan, disguised as Chen's Ninth Princess, was forced to marry Emperor Yan Gui as a surrogate. On the night of the wedding, Xie Yanhuan's true identity is revealed, all hope appears to be lost. Isn't Xie male? Yan is aware of this, but why doesn't Yan seem angry?

(Source: INKR)

Notes:
- Chapter count includes 4 extras
- Originally published under the title Zhuan Chong Guifei Shi Nanren (专宠贵妃是男人)

The mysterious youth, Lin Hao, is hired by a clinic as a doctor. His exceptional medical skills coupled with his strong personality breaks the silence of the clinic. operating on his donkey friends, curing the village chief's cancer all kinds of strange and complicated diseases,this village doctor has become very popular. let's see how Lin Hao would describe this legendary life of his!

(Source: MangaToon)

When doomsday arrives, and the world gets dragged into chaos, zombies and monsters start appearing. The Earth gets turned into a game, humans become the lowest in the food pyramid, the prey for all superior beings. After struggling in the doomsday for three years, Kong Zhe returned back to the day doomsday arrived. He discovers that he has his memories of the past, but as time passes by he realizes that he has more cards to play than expected ....How will he survive in doomsday?

(Source: AC.QQ, translated)

Other people transmigrate with a full set of superpowers. Lu Ming found himself reincarnated into a new world with a buttload of debt while being blackmailed with embarrassing cross-dressing photos. Wasn't being an overworked-to-death programmer bad enough already? But wait, there are all sorts of fantastical professions available here, and his profession is that of a "Cardmaker." Lu Ming realized that making these cards is just like writing a program, so with his skill, he can create unlimited possibilities in this world?!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

This is a 200-year romantic story filled with love and hate. After sleeping for 200 years, the Vampire woke up to find his rival hunter is living with him! Did his memories fail him? This is simply unbelievable!

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Wo Xi Huan Ni De Xin Xi Su

description:
As a good-looking Beta boy from a good family, Duan Jiayan's life has been smooth sailing for many years, until he runs into Lu Xingci in high school. Lu Xingci's family is richer, he's taller, he's a better basketball player, and their grades aren't even close. Even his own friends can't help but praise Lu Xingci sometimes. What's worse, that girl Duan Jiayan had set his sights on admitted that she has had a crush on Lu Xingci for years. Ever since then, Duan Jiayan has disliked Lu Xingci. But during a medical exam, he was told that he is a late-blooming Omega, and because he became an Omega so late, it came with serious side-effects. Any Alpha who comes near him will feel a painful sensation and become violent. And Duan Jiayan is allergic to the pheromones of all Alphas, all except for Lu Xingci.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Zaixia Chan Shi Guan: Miao Wang Zai Shang

description:
A night walking brings an unexpected treasure — a black cat with a huge diamond! But is it a cat? Hogging her bathtub, robbing her food and asking her to warm its bed... She put up with it all for its diamond, but the petty cat actually absconded! After that, she was shocked to know that her new boss has a diamond on his collar, which is exactly the same as the one on the collar of the cat she met at that night...

(Source: Webnovels)

An ordinary young man's bloody journey of ascension from ordinary to extraordinary, and from the trough to the peak. In the 16th generation of the Shangguan family of Shangguan Xu, he is ever-changing and looks like a ghost. He comes and goes without a trace. He discovered the correct method of practicing the family martial arts, and changed his life.

title.romaji: Du Chong Juese Xiao Jiao Qi

description:
Having failed several times in her relationships, she got a flash marriage because of an accident... She thought her husband was just a humble assistant, but he turned out to be the man who’s in charge of a huge enterprise... Behind those countless deceptions and lies, how many secrets is he still hiding?

(Source: Copin Comics)

title.english: There's Something Wrong With this Account

description:
I was transferred to another world after I created an account with a character of full Charisma?! Something must have gone wrong with that account! As an experienced player, I will make my name in the new world. That account is new, but it surely will bring surprises!

(Source: Webnovel)

Olive Fu was not going to have it! Instead of being forced to marry an old man, she takes a leap to determine her own fate. Enthusiastic and strong-willed, she's embarked on a quest to build her jewelry business. But out in the real world, things get messy fast when she bumps into and then hires a handsome stranger (with his own secrets!) to be her assistant. Will she be able to break free from her old life at the risk of becoming entangled in something new?

(Source: Tapas)

He was the high creator of the world who had his memories stripped away in order to live as a mortal. To protect himself, he bought a cheap guard who was dumb, naive, and didn't know any martial arts. But why do the rumors make his little guard sound like a cruel and bloodthirsty monster?

(Source: INKR)

Note: Chapter count includes 17 extras.

Tai Yuan transmigrated into his favorite game and gained the Charisma System, which allowed him raise his charisma by completing missions. Let's see how Tai Yuan will use this ability to charm and seduce his way to the top!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.english: A Mage, but Also a Scientist

description:
This is a world where magic and science both exist. In this world, some people want powerful magic; some people pursue eternal truth. Blair, the protagonist, is a math teacher from a different world. Using both magic and science, he will soon achieve success in a way that no one has thought of before!

A great scholar? The supreme mage? A lady-killer?
I guess a few more titles won't hurt.

(Source: Webnovel)

The abuses suffered as a child will be inflicted again as an adult. Some people will take it out on others, but some people only harm themselves.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

I dedicated eight years to help him rule his empire, only for him to send me to my death by burning!

My last wish before death was to be reborn so I can change my fate, and not make the same stupid mistake again!
However… I was reborn into the body of my sworn enemy?!

My revenge plan is proceeding smoothly, but a prince suddenly appeared and proposed marriage? Does he not know I already have 4 prince consorts?

A very short (poetic) oneshot about breaking free.

(Source: Chinatown KM)

After attaining the title of fencing champion at the Olympics, Chris died in a car accident. At the funeral, Lin Yifei found out about the feelings Chris had never revealed before. As Lin Yifei realizes the regrets Chris had before he died, he unexpectedly returned back to his childhood?! Since he had the chance to relive his life, Lin Yifei chose to accompany Chris on his journey to attaining that prestigious throne once again!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes an extra.
The story of a singer with cold hands and a warm heart and a considerate artist.

title.romaji: Sheng Shi Tian Chong: Yi Shao de Xiao Meng qi
title.native: 盛世甜宠：易少的小萌妻

description: Her boyfriend is getting married, but the bride isn’t her! She then becomes labelled as a third wheel and within a day, she went viral. Thousands of people online are cursing at her. So she decided to accept the Yi family’s third master's mysterious proposal. Since she is now a well-known lady, many women are offended by her and plots to destroy her. Luckily for her, she has Mr Perfect husband who counters every move and tries to protect her.

A born failure is posessed by a dragon. He's bestowed with the will and power of this magical creature. With scales and claws, he can travel on water and breath fire. He summons rains and wins every battle. This is the time when everyone wants to slay the dragon and Li Muyang has always been feeling a lot of pressure. The reason is, he is the last dragon on this continent.

(Source: Wecomics)

Note: The chapter count includes a prologue.

title.english: Those Years In Quest Of Honour Mine

description:
After losing a fight for the throne, Zhong Wan was exiled with his young masters. To survive, he relied on the acquaintance that existed between him and Yu Ziyou when they were young. He had some of Yu's personal belongings to show off, while making hints about an intimate relationship between them. Given the Yu clan’s powerful presence in the imperial court, the pretend relationship allowed Zhong Wan to live more comfortably. And over time, the stories he cooked up began to become more extravagant.

As rumors of their romance spread, it even reached the capital, where Yu Ziyou caught wind of his supposed epic love affair. The tales were so entrancing that Yu Ziyou, who had been hearing them for seven years, started to believe in them. He figured something special really did happen between them way back when…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Chi Sha Du Fei Buhao Re

description:
She was the daughter of the Prime Minister, known for being silly and spoiled. After her engagement was broken off, she rashly killed herself. Mu Qingge transmigrated into her dead body from the 21st century. Relying on her mastery of medicines and poisons, she caused a great disturbance in the Imperial Court.

"You dare to call me a fool? Let me show you what real smarts and true beauty are!"

Note: Includes 3 extra chapters.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

What disease does this patient have, that she still isn't cured after so many visits to the hospital… The answer will shock you!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.english: The Newbie Mage's Secret Dragon Farm

description:
Ling Enping wanted to prove his father's innocence and bring his family back to prominence, but he had no magical abilities to do so, until one day when he accidentally triggered the Dragon Farming System. Suddenly, he became a talented magician, the most powerful mage in the empire took him on as an apprentice, the king made him a duke, and he even became engaged to the princess. But amidst all the accolades lurked many hidden dangers, and even the System that helped awaken his talent was hiding a conspiracy of its own...

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)
A high school girl who moonlights as a mangaka has a chance encounter with the girl she based her main character of off.

title.romaji: Tiancai Ku Bao: Zongcai Chong Qi Tai Qianghan
title.native: 天才酷宝：总裁宠妻太强悍

description:
Five years ago, that woman sneaked into his room when he was drunk. Who'd though that night yielded two fruits, and they each took one.

Five years later, she became a paparazzi, who stole his private information, his heart, and his precious little son!

He has to hunt her down, trap her with his gentleness and love, and let her pay with the rest of her life as the mother of his two sons.

(Source: Manga Toon)

title.english: Lin Yang and the Miracle Ring

description:
My name is Lin Yang, a college student from a poor family. Accidentally, I got a ring. It changes my body into something with unique physical attractions for girls. However, that is not the only thing it brings to me...

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Cong Yi Ba Jian Kaishi Shalu Jinhua
title.native: 从一把剑开始杀戮进化

description:
Ye Fan was reborn as a strange sword with its own upgrade system. The sword is upgraded as the wielder kills with it, and it quickly became known as a powerful cursed weapon that people fought over. Whenever the sword is drawn, a bloody storm will follow. Meanwhile, Ye Fan is just trying to do whatever it takes to transform back into human form…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Darkness’ devouring energy and mysterious space energy.
The two different types of energy appeared in one person.
A glance that can kill? That is the power of space.
Men will be raped by beautiful women?
That is the fate of the protagonist?
In a world with Special powers, Vampires, Witches and Demons, where the forces of Darkness and Light collides.
His women will be his guiding lights and change his fate!

As a result of getting addicted to an MMORPG during exam times, high school 2nd year Xiao Nan is moved back to the normal courses.On the first day of school he goes to his new class, unexpectedly meeting his childhood friend, Su Luo, who he hasn't talked with for 10 years.What will happen between these 2 boys united by a common interest? Includes Ch. 0 - Preview

Murong Zi, a young thief, lost everything dear to her at a young age in a single night.

Grown up and disguised as a man, she follows a thief into a brothel and winds up in a woman's arms.

The beautiful woman is actually a man who just happens to know Murong Zi's secret identity.

(Source: INKR)

Adapted from the first god mystic best-selling masterpiece “Eternal God of Heaven”. As the first God of War in the heavens, he was betrayed by his beloved one because of his great achievements, he died during the wedding night.
One hundred years after that, he was reborn on Nie Tiansheng’s body! Break the sky, go against the heavens, step over all realms!
In this life, I want to create my world! In this life, I want to be the emperor of heaven!

Other people shut themselves in to cultivate while I run my business and strike a deal. People mock my metallic odour, but watching their pride and honour fall as they kneel down trying to haggle is my happiness. My road to success will come using gold, silver, and jade!

title.romaji: Shifu You Zai Liao Wo (Liao Ren)

description: Ten years ago, he lost his parents to demons. In order to get revenge, he’ll need to… listen to his master?! The master combs his hair, tells him what to wear, and in return, requires him to be obedient as his living weapon and more.

When a superstar and a newbie gamer team up, sparks will fly and a legendary gaming duo's story will be forged! The flames of old will never die, will the young will continue to carry the torch! This is a story of how a superstar gamer helps an amateur rise in ranks and how they spark a story of drama and emotion. Despite some friction between the two, they will eventually become the most well known names in the gaming industry!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

The path to immortality is fraught with difficulty! Especially in this cultivation world, utterly altered by a plague! Mortals carry the disease; if immortals come into contact with them, their cultivation will at best decline, and at worst, they will be banished from the mortal realm, forever separated from the immortals. I, having transmigrated here with boundless ambition, am destined to toil in the mortal world, wasting my life. Fortunately, at the moment of my death, I awaken a wondrous treasure, capable of transforming reality into illusion, turning my real life into a fleeting dream, returning me to the moment I transmigrated! Thus, I begin my long and arduous journey of reincarnation!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Zuo Hui is an introverted high school student from a poor family. One day, when secretly working a part time job outside, he is caught by his mother. After the two have a heated dispute, Zuo Hui angrily turns away and leaves. Distracted by thoughts of guilt and regret, he loses footing and falls down a rain-flooded sewer hole. When Zuo Hui awakes he finds himself in a sealed room surrounded by a group of diverse strangers and with a rope around his neck. The more he struggles to take off the rope, the tighter it becomes. Where is this? Who are you people? And who exactly is that self-proclaimed “Yama”?

title.romaji: Yao Zun Fei Yao Dui Wo Fu Ze
title.english: My Covenant with the Monster Lord

description:
Loyal king of demons said, "Now that you've found me, you need to be responsible for me." Lost memories and destined reunion. Yu Yin reincarnated twice and returned to the world he was originally from, but he got "scammed" by some unknown demon king the moment he's back. Moreover, he got bitten by him and formed an agreement! While Yu Yin was in astonishment, the demon king considered everything just normal. "I surely need to be responsible for you, given the relationship between us."

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Wo De Ling Jie Nü You Men
title.english: My Affair With a Ghostly Girlfriend

description:
On a feverish dark night, a black wind swooped down under the pale glow of the dark as Ye Lan, a high school student, gained unimaginable and mysterious powers. Was it a strangely beautiful demon Lolita, an arrogant elder sister, or an innocent, adorable and beautiful sword deity that appeared before him?

Ye Lan couldn't find it in him to cross her, and neither could he avoid her. Join him as he's forced into embarking on a mysterious adventure with her into the dangerous unknown together.

(Source: Webnovel)

In a barren, post-apocalyptic wasteland, a silver-haired, one-armed survivor journeys alone, fueled by an unrelenting spark of hope. Her path leads to a gleaming city that stands as a beacon of prosperity—yet beneath its shimmering façade lies a sinister secret that could shatter everything she believes in.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Mojiao Jiaozhu Gou Zai Wo Shen Bian Kan Wo Tou Tou Xiulian
title.native: 魔教教主苟在我身边看我偷偷修炼

description:
Sold to the Nineth Nether Demon Hall as a child, He Yun grew up safely thanks to his honesty, hard work, and culinary skills. However, in the middle of an ordinary day, in broad daylight, he was forced to "XX" by the sect's leader!

(Source: Tencent Comics, translated)

A slacker high-school student gets pulled into a world where he is named the "Dungeon Master" and can control everything that happens. He can even make it rain money! It's in this world that he meets a young, traumatized girl who's memories have been erased. With her help, he creates a new game world to escape his boring school life. Everything seems to be going fine until they encounter a lethal bug in the game's programming...

Sheng Qianyu, a gifted special force soldier, experienced a time-travel. She didn't expect to wake up as a noble lady in the Prime Minister's mansion! She should have been married to Prince Yu if she wasn't betrayed by her fiance and sister. The wedding night was stained with blood, and her whole family was slaughtered. In the name of Lord Yu's third daughter, she went to the palace to find out the truth behind the slaughter. With her wisdom, Sheng Qianyu not only solved many crises, but also won the Sixth Prince's love.

(Source: Webnovel)

Michael goes to the human world to look for an old friend, and save the world together, but the reincarnated Lucifer can no longer remember him……

(Source: MR)

title.romaji: Tian Sheng Du Nai, Wo Zuzhou Le Quan Shijie!
title.native: 天生毒奶，我诅咒了全世界！

description:
A parallel game world merges with the modern world, and now ferocious monsters and alien races roam the land. In the wilds, there are many dungeons and hidden realms to explore. Humans have awakened news skills and professions, and they must defeat monsters to level up. On the day of the awakening, Lin Luo found himself with the profession of priest, which was the most popular class, but had no damage ability of its own. Just when he was wondering what to do, he discovered that his skills had mutated! His healing abilities now take away health instead? His blessings have turned into curses? But I am supposed to be a priest healer!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Vicent Wayland, a super-rich and incredibly handsome man, meets a tragic end at the hands of the Dragon King’s son-in-law. But fate has other plans—he unexpectedly triggers the Supreme Villain System and gets a second chance at life. Determined to become the ultimate villain, Yin Wudao vows to bring hell to all who stand in his way. From dragon heirs and divine doctors to war gods, Asuras, ancient martial arts masters, and reborn immortals—no one is safe from his wrath. Witness the rise of a legendary villain in “Rise of the Supreme Villain”!

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description:
The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

(Source: Webcomics)

When the gangster boss, Wang Tianxia, announced his plan to give up evil and return to good, he never thought that he would be shot to death. Nevertheless, his soul accidentally attached itself to a student’s body, who was apparently the school's no.1 punching bag… Let’s feast our eyes as we watch how the gangster boss is going to turn his image around as he investigates the mystery of his assassination!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Bao Chong Kuang Qi Zhi Shenyi Wu Xiaojie
title.english: The Crazy Adventures of Mystical Doctor
title.native: 爆宠狂妻之神医五小姐

description:
After the modern female killer travelling crossed, she was reborn as a loser in this new world - Sima Youyue, the fifth young master in the generals' residence. As a result, she began the way of grass counterback, collecting all kinds of magical animals and artifacts, and started the adventures to meet with the actors.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Nü Shi Zunmen Dou Xiang Zhanyou Wo

description:
Xiao Nan died tragically and then isekai-ed to the 21st Continent. Although reborn as useless trash, he awakened the reverse system, and his strength would increase as long as he was hurt. What he didn’t know was that he had a hidden identity-as the chosen son of heaven who was prophesized to revitalize the Sword sect. The elders of all factions in the sect therefore hid their identities and approached Xiao Nan to try to recruit him into their own ranks. Since then, Xiao Nan began to enjoy being nurtured by beautiful female masters, whilst discovering features of the system to become stronger + start a harem.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

The unforeseen destiny of cloned triplets.

Zhaoyan, Xiyan, and Yuejian’s lives take an unexpected turn after they are injected with a serum that controls demon bloodlines. And in this world of vampires and hunters, they must overcome every obstacle that comes their way. How will the serum change their fates? Can they rise up to the challenge?

(Source: Manta)

Heaven is closed, and Hell is full. So here I am, causing trouble on Earth… Chen Yanluo, the kindly (?) king of the underworld, reincarnated on Earth into the body of an ordinary 18-year old boy! He thought he could just live an ordinary life, find himself a girlfriend, maybe have a meal with her folks sometimes. But all sorts of challengers keep showing up, and all kinds of beautiful women keep throwing themselves at him… So never mind! He's going to show all his cards! Steady, ready, go!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

The most dangerous arch-villain learned martial arts from cheap books of useless techniques? But his spiritual aura’s rejuvenating power is overflowing from within. A confrontation between traditional martial arts and supernatural power begins.

(Source: QQ, translated)

She gave birth to their baby named Xiaobai after being framed. When they meet again in five years, the cold-hearted CEO keeps her with him to refute the rumor. After all, he doesn't seem to be all that terrible... The story starts when Xiaobai gets into a fight with a boy from a privileged family. This time, Xiaobai's father shows up on time for his rescue...

(Source: Webcomics)

Fan Yao died of an accident, but he was reborn as trash in a cultivation world. Then he has the Best Beast System, so he embarks on his journey of cultivation. But what he doesn't know that the beast he gets from the Rookie gift can even turn into a beauty! And it's even lovey-dovey to Fan Yao! Is he gonna have his harem?

(Source: WeComics)

Jiang Chengfeng is a confident and arrogant teenager who has atheist views ever since he was a child. Due to an accident in the past, he has the power to defeat evil spirits turning him into an exorcist. Jiang Chengfeng uses his power to defeat every demon and spirit in order to challenge the Lord.

(Source: INKR)

Twelve years after someone close to him is ripped away, Lille Ou has become Dr. Ivan, a man with a flourishing medical career who has seemingly put his tragic past to rest. But the stability of his world is challenged when a gunslinging pretty boy barges into his home demanding first aid and a place to lie low. Despite the danger of it all, Dr. Ivan finds himself drawn to this ruthless fugitive with superhuman strength who miraculously transcends his one weakness: physical touch. As Dr. Ivan sets out to learn more about his mysterious intruder, he's dragged into a futuristic underworld of criminals, gangs, and AI technology. And little does he know that it just might help him uncover the truth about himself and the person he never stopped searching for.

(Source: Tappytoon)

Introducing the defiance of natural order through force! For countless years, immortals have fallen into their doom. On the other hand, Young Master Leng Feng, a worthless person who committed suicide on Xuan Tian continent suddenly awoke as an Almighty God. From then on, an Almighty god has resurrected. All powers were reshuffled, and the glory Xuan Tian continent will rise again!

(Source: AC.QQ, translated)

Qin Shi, an ordinary undergraduate, accidentally goes through the time-space journey and becomes the leader of an evil sect. But this sect is so unreliable that the fund is raised by the leader through marital fraud. Qin Shi wants to resign as this position. This story is about a leader who sticks to core socialist values.
