(Source: wecomics)

A super rich young miss fell in love with her tutor who disappeared into thin air after her confession. She has been searching for him but in vain until she saw him on an advertisement of his role-playing game. To figure out why he left without saying goodbye, she joined the game, but became imprisoned there unless she gave all the scripts a happy ending as the female lead...

(Source: MangaToon, edited)

title.english: Be A Eunuch's Wife To Control The World

description: In her previous life, she was betrayed and died. After transmigrating, her lonely soul fell upon the body of Xiliang Mo who suffered the same fate. She vowed to make those who harmed her pay, one step at a time. Breaking the legs of her insidious sister, forcing her pretentious stepmother to die, betraying her callous father. An unscrupulous husband? Then she'll just abandon and leave him, remarrying. But why does that villainous eunuch prince insist on marrying her? Although you got the looks of a deity, you're still a eunuch! They force her to become a eunuch's wife, then she'll become the number one heinous tyrant wife!

This city is awfully big. Although we may not know each other, we may have brushed past each other on the road at some point. Perhaps we share a love of reading the same book and listening to the same song, or perhaps we’ll talk about love with an expiration date of one day. But on this day, we saw each other’s true selves, and that will forever be engraved on our lives.

Xia XiaoShu used to be a rebellious girl who was once involved in violence incidents at school. After she transferred to a different school, she tried to change her image to "Good Girl" in desire of having a normal school life. However, she was once again targeted by her previous "rival". If she did not fight back, her secrets will be exposed. If she does not fight back, her friends will be harmed... Having to choose between "Good Girl" and "Bad Girl", what will she do?

Qian Xi, a teen boy, worked in a spooky museum displaying inconspicuous-looking collections, but it turns out each piece had a sad story behind it. A ball in a haunted cave, a weird butler robot, and the braised pork rice from a restaurant where a murder took place... How dark can humanity be? Come and hear out what these collections have to say.

(Source: WebComics)

Note: Includes a prologue and two extra chapters.

Han Qingyu lived peacefully for nineteen years, and never thought that one day he would become one of the shining stars in an epic struggle. An accident occurred out of the blue. The boy was given a blade and forced to face a new reality: the invasion of a foreign civilization, the Azure Alliance, the mobile energy source, the solo recon corps, the blade of the exile, the streaming edge technique... He can't afford to be considerate. When full-scale mobilization begins, he will be the "The Young Major" splashed across billboards on cars and high-rises. In the coming war of the heavens, he will strike that decisive blow.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
By chance, Fang Tang came across Ah Shu, someone he noticed long ago. The two became classmates and intimate friends. A pure love school life manhua with a refreshing art style.

Xiaohan was a cute girl before that terrible accident which marks the end of glorious lifetime as a girl. Now she is boy, a handsome girlish boy.

(Source: Webcomics)

Note: Includes two extra chapters.

title.romaji: Nanfang De Niao He Beifang De Niao

description:
When a northern goose meets a southern sparrow.

"Mr. Duck, are you from the north?"

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Fuqin Daren, Wo Cai Bushi Edu Nü Pei
title.native: 父亲大人，我才不是恶毒女配

description:
Casarte gave birth to a pair of twins, which coincided with the return of Casablanca's victory. In order to appease him, the fourth generation of Ghana, at the suggestion of the queen, the great wizard was invited to bless the two baby girls with divination. Through divination, the great wizard predicted that the twins, one good and the other evil, one would bring endless prosperity to the empire, while the other would bring endless misfortune.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

As a top killer in the Killer Employment Center, after being framed by her own aunt, she is caused to be pregnant by a stranger. Out of anger, she burns the house used to imprison her into ashes after she wakes up. Six years later, her baby is accidentally caught by the Dark Empire. In despair, she can only pretend to be a man and sneak into the Dark Empire to be a planted agent, which seems, however, to be the beginning of destiny...

(Source: WebComics)

title.english: I Level Up by Rewarding My Disciples

description:
Master Yu Zangfeng thought he could finally rest after ascending on his crane, but old enemies soon come knocking on his sect’s gate. At the brink of destruction, he awakens the Disciple Rebate System, the more he gives his disciples, the more he gains in return. Rare treasures, forbidden techniques, spirit pills, he pours them all out without hesitation. "Come, my dear disciples — your master never keeps anything to himself!" Can this generous master stay one step ahead of both enemies and his own monstrous pupils?

(Source: Webnovel)

When she met him for the first time, she just wanted to escape from him. From then on, however, she gradually got used to his company. He is the god of death to everyone else, but he will always give the barest hint of a smile to her. Whenever there was a danger, he would always help her like a real god fallen from the heaven, mocking her at the same time. With the lapse of time, her feelings for him was more than just dependence. If she doesn’t love him, she wouldn’t let him stay by her; If not, how would she feel so different…

(Source: Webnovel)

Ordinary physique? No talent for cultivation? Just use your Instant Enlightenment skill! For Xiao Yun, there is nothing that can't be overcome with Instant Enlightenment. If there is a problem, then just find enlightenment again!

(Source: Fanqie Manhua, translated)

Lin Zhao, a high school student, has been receiving mysterious death warning messages, which predicts that he will be killed by himself within 99 days. The mysterious person NI, who appears from nowhere claims that he can help Lin Zhao and knows everything about him, including his future. Since then, Lin Zhao's life has completely changed... Who is this mysterious man NI? Do parallel universes really exist in this world?

(Source: WebComics)

What would you do if everything you worked for, everything you were promised was just suddenly taken away?

I, Heyun Jiang, worked my entire life to lead the multinational company built from the ground up by my late father and his best friend. Cheng Ding, you were given controlling stakes in this company through awful betrayal and broken vows. There’s a fire between us that can’t be denied, but I cannot let you claim what is rightfully mine!

(Source: Tapas)

An Nuo is known to have no superpowers, but in truth his power is to read minds. He wished to escape the research facility, but the top evolver, Jing Ye, hinders his plan. In a world where superpowers reign supreme, will An Nuo survive with the help of Jing Ye?

(Source: INKR)

It's no coindicence how ordinary high school student Lu Qingyu and refined teaching assistant Cheng Jing meet each other. Long-standing enmity from last generation keeps Cheng Jing away from peace. He racks his brains attempting to bring Lu Qingyu, the star, down, but unexpectedly ends up being dazzled by the star's briliant rays. Lu Qingyu, who trusts Cheng Jing whole-heartedly without any doubts, isn't aware of the trap set up especially for him...

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Mami Laixi, Tiancai Meng Bao Ku Diedi
title.native: 妈咪来袭，天才萌宝酷爹地

description:
On a night six years ago, she lost everything, but was blessed to give birth to an adorable boy. Genius patissier Chi Xiayi said, "Mommy will do my best to make you the happiest child in the world." Her lovely son replied, "I will also do my best to make you the happiest mommy in the world." Six years later, she meets the man again, and from then on, the family of three embarks on their adventure together.

(Source: INKR, translated)

Garland Noyce, Vice-captain of Black Rain Force, whose heart was parasitized by Devil Asmodeus when he was little, will be possessed by a devil soon. He's not long for this world. However, this secret is discovered by the notorious pervert Duke Hetzel… A bitter-sweet love story thus begins to unfold.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Wangzi Yu Ta De Hei Yueguang
title.english: The Prince and His Mischievous One

description:
Lenka Normans was betrayed by his childhood friend Jane Grey right after his succession to the throne, making him the most short-lived Emperor. However, God was merciful enough and gave him a chance to go back when he’s six. Reincarnated Lenka decided to stay away from that horrible friend so he could stay alive this time. But… Isn’t that bullied kid Jane Grey? Jeez… He’s looking at this way! Is this too late to run?!

(Source: WebComics)

The knight was originally meant to rescue the princess from the evil villain, however, since the princess had already gotten married with the evil villain, the knight wouldn’t be able to ever accomplish his errand. While being in confusion, he incidentally rescued a vampire. What he didn’t expect was that the vampire would end up being such a bother! The lustrousness of the knight’s blood made it the vampire’s favorite food!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Lin Tian, ​​a genius game designer, was betrayed by his lover Luo Yue and assassinated in the jungle because he knew too much about the company's secrets. When he woke up, he found he has became a low-level monster in the jungle. In order to avenge the past, he starts on a new path as a jungle monster.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

After transmigrating into a world of immortal cultivation, Qin Yun became the master of a minor sect. Blessed with the "Super Master System," Qin Yun told his disciples, "Rational learning is how you face the world without fear." To his students, the master seemed like an exam-loving madman, but in Qin Yun's view, Immortal Cultivation is an academic subject. It's just like going to school to learn a subject. Scientific cultivation is the best way to make something of yourself...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

It’s my fault for walking down the wrong path, but can you please let go of the kind and naive me?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes 10 extras.

He is a vampire prince who is cruel as blood, bloodthirsty as life. She is an ordinary little girl who likes to stay at home. A wrong spell called, she was summoned to the demon realm, became his blood pet...

(Source: Mangatoon)

title.english: Reborn To Be A Movie Queen

description:
Reborn after a betrayal that cost her life and her unborn child, Tianqing seizes her second chance, not just for revenge but to ascend the entertainment industry's heights. Her path crosses with President Tang, an unexpected and overbearing figure in her new life. When he offers her a lavish life in marriage, she boldly rejects him, declaring her own power and independence. This is her journey of empowerment and fame, where she defies expectations and reshapes her destiny.

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Hu x He Yao Shi Lu

description: Ghosts and demons, mystical demon arts, rare treasures. A fantasy world where demons are tamed and tradition is protected.
The daily life of a large family of cute little monsters.

title.romaji: Wang Ye Fu De Zhi Nan Xiao Jiao Fei
title.english: The Male Consort in a Game

description:
"I'm a straight man! Why do I have to get entangled with three men?!"

Lu Xing accidentally got into an interactive love game called Love&Love because of a pop-up ad for a game. In order to go back, he must win three men's favor. They're a reserved prince, a mysterious assassin, and a gentle guard. Which one will he choose at last? A survival battle of a straight man is about to start!

(Source: Webnovel)

How romantic meeting his destined lover in travels! In this story, he picks their shells of memory for her in seaside of Sea of Love, sings for her on the top of minaret in the Flower Citt, and shoots the unique starry night with her. They meet, understand and fall for each other. Miraculous travel ends, their love journey starts. *Note*: Yue in Chinese means moon and Xing stands for stars. That's how the title come from.

(Source: WebComics)

Should a doctor save the body or the soul? Chu Han was the idiot among fellow elite medical students who had even never considered such a question. One day, his life was flipped upside down when he met an alleged genius but insane doctor ghost.

(Source: Webnovel)

The mortal, Ya Xuan, had wandered around in all four directions. A mortal and a demon became companions, marking the start of an endless journey through the vast wilderness. A person who seeks for immortality, the evil spirit who massacres without a care, the cold-hearted god, the magnificent Ying Zhou's prisoner cage… Amidst the vast wilderness, a thrilling anecdote was painted across Ya Xuan's picture scroll. The countless of years revealed more and more secrets. Who actually is Ya Xuan? Why does he not age nor die? Why was the Blood Sea Phantom Sparrow's clan exterminated and condemend by the Nine Heavens? What is Ya Xuan's true goal…?

"You're a bright light, you're the God of Beauty who has come to the human world"

When a reserved and stoic movie fan meets the innocent and awkward Best Actor, Su Yan found what he wanted amidst the bright light, and Xia Tingwan solved the problem of love in Su Yan's profound gaze.

"Tingting, I know. Ever since the first time I watched Whalespeak, I knew that you weren't acting as Xia. I knew that you are Xia himself."

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Chongsheng Gui Qi Zhi Huali de Fuchou
title.native: 重生贵妻之华丽的复仇

description:
Ling Lu helped her boyfriend Xia Chengye build his business over the years, but after he found success, he had her killed in a fake car accident. After she died full of despair, she found herself waking up in the body of the heiress Su Zibao. She decided to take advantage of her new body as Su Zibao to marry the man Pei Yi, and carry out her revenge.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Zhengyi De Wo Bei Xitong Bi Cheng Da Fanpai
title.native: 正义的我被系统逼成大反派

description:
Lin Bei, who transmigrated to become the second-ranked disciple of the Qingyun Sect, wanted to be a good guy. But he was paired with a System that specialized in cultivating super villains. Now Lin Bei has to go against his original intentions by becoming a Big Bad, and he must fight off all the wannabe heroes of the Nine Continents in order to survive!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

While getting a nighttime snack, the illustrator Xin Xin runs into Yin Yin, a rich girl drunk and wasted on the street. Xin Xin takes her home, cleans her up, and even makes her a bowl of hot-and-sour noodle soup when she wakes up hungry... After some back-and-forth, Xin Xin ends up letting the "homeless" Yin Yin stay, as she needs a new roommate anyway. Bit by bit, the beautiful and outgoing Yin Yin chips away the icy facade of the serious and independent Xin Xin...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

My soul transmigrated to a world where only women could wield spiritual power. All the traditional philosophies: Confucianism, Taoism, Mohism, etc., became their way of cultivating spiritual power. I was born as a weak man without spiritual power, but with the help of the System, I will conquer the entire imperial court, all the princesses, and even the empress herself. All of them will serve me as the lord under heaven.

(Source: iQiyi, translated)

The heavenly and demonic saints were reincarnated on Earth as two baby girls, both of whom were adopted by an ordinary young man Qin Lan. As the babies grew up, their magical powers began to manifest themselves and caused massive upheavals in Qin Lan's life. Qin Lan slowly realized that his encounter with the two girls was no accident, but the predestined fate determined in a previous life.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Nian Xia de Xinsi Youdian Ye

description:
It's the year 2035. Caught in a mid-life crisis, Xu Youyuan decides to put down her pride and experience love so she can make a dating game. Except... she gets a bit more than she's bargained for: the troublemaker Shiyue! Shiyue means business in both the real world and the game world, and her one-minded pursuit is quickly overwhelming Xu Youyuan!

This comic is adapted from the novel "Love Patch for the Middle-Aged."

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Originally published under the title "中年恋爱补丁".

After her life took a U turn, she buried her past and became a tough police woman, However, years into her career in uniform, she re-encounters the man from her bitter-sweet memory.

Now a sharp-tongued detective, he meets the girl that he used to share cherished moments with, Together, they will seek justice and rekindle what was once between them.

A story of crime investigation, and about how they become each other's salvation.

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Buhui Zhen Youren Juede Xiu Xian Nan Ba
title.native: 不会真有人觉得修仙难吧

description: A humble rookie seeks the path to immortality — only to accidentally join a sect full of pretentious con artists. His seven senior brothers brim with confidence, taking turns spouting out fabricated divine techniques. But no one expected this newcomer to be a genius. He actually comprehends everything — even their nonsense! In the end, the master falls into despair. Just who is this junior disciple?

In this world, there are Confucianists, Taoists, Buddhists, demons, and priests. When Xu Qi'an, a police academy graduate, woke up from a coma, he found himself imprisoned, and he would be banished to the border in three days. At first, he only wanted to save himself and be a rich guy who could live leisurely in a society without human rights…

Many years later, when Xu Qi'an looked back on his life, his enemies had died, and he had killed many people. Time flew, and heroes passed away. Everything they did, whether good or bad, successful or not, was eventually swept off by time. Yet the world remains unchanged, and the sun still rises and sets as usual.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.english: Have Mercy, Senior! Don’t Pull My Skirt

description:
Due to the circumstances of my life, I, a boy named Lu Zhun, put on a skirt, a wig, stuffed two tangerines in my shirt, and pretended to be a girl to a boy named Mu Junchen. The “moneybag” Mu Junchen was both rich and romantic, so why did he have to fall for an “unconfident female high-school dropout” like me? After all the fights and resistance, he finally pushed me to the end of the road...

(Source: Bilibili Comics, edited)

He Mian, a college student who has social anxiety, clears his favorite game for the 100th time. Gareth, the devil of the game, accidentally transmigrates into the modern world where He Mian is. He Mian is determined to return the devil back to the game as soon as possible. In order to get rid of Gareth's pranks and entanglements, the two must collect magical artifacts from the game which have been scattered across the world.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Note: Includes 12 extra chapters.

title.romaji: Qing Shi Yi Fei Yao Xiu Fu

description:
Died in a medical dispute, warm-hearted supreme surgeon Wen Yi timetravelled to the ancient time and she was reborn as a prince's imperial concubine. Life should be easy and comfortable for a high-class, rich and beautiful noble lady, but Yang Luoyi was an unfavoured one and framed by others which makes her miserable. How would Doctor Wen Yi do the justice for Princess Yang Luoyi, and revenge against the baddies who framed her?

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Feng Le Ba, San Sui Zhangmen Ren?!

description:
The sword-master Jiang Ziqi studied the blade rigorously until his cultivation breached the nine-heavens and he achieved golden immortality. However, when he reached the immortal realm, he was ambushed by a hundred other immortals and forced to fight to his death. Just before dying, he was able to reincarnate his soul into the body of a three-year old, who happened to be the anointed leader of the Wujizong Sect.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

She was forced to replace her elder sister to marry a man. She once hoped she could spend all her life with him only to be hurt always by the man. At last, she gave him freedom and left but the man suddenly realized his true love was her, not the elder sister.

(Source: Webnovel)

An ordinary and impulsive teenager gets x-ray vision after an accident. How will his life change? Money and power are at his fingertips. Let's see how he lives his new life without regard for anything and becomes a legend of the city!

(Source: Webnovel)

The human Race is at war with the Vicious Dalki and when they needed help more than ever, THEY started to come forward. Humans who had hidden in the shadows for hundreds of years, people with abilities. Some chose to share their knowledge to the rest of the world in hopes of winning the war, while others kept their abilities to themselves. Quinn had lost everything to the war, his home, his family and the only thing he had inherited was a crummy old book that he couldn’t even open. But when the book had finally opened, Quinn was granted a system and his whole life was turned around. He completed quest after quest and became more powerful, until one day the system gave him a quest he wasn’t sure he could complete.

"It is time to feed!"

"You must drink huma n blood within 24 hours"

"Your HP will continue to decrease until the task has been completed"

(Source: Webnovel)

Developed by “God's Domain Technologies”, virtual reality has taken the world by storm. The virtual world “Eden's Paradise” is described as a mysterious and flawless universe, and has become the place that every gamer dreams of. Those in reality feel disappointment towards the real world, or want to escape from it, or are possessed by greed, or have dreams, or simply feel boredom — people with all these reasons challenge the trials to enter Eden's Paradise one after the other....
Lin Lu, an otaku, wakes up one day to find a strange beauty in his bed. The handsome stranger claims to be a River God and begs Lin Lu to adopt him.

Due to a mistake in the operation of the internship soul hooker, doctor Xing Aofei was killed in a car accident but was blessed with the opportunity to be reborn and return to his youth to strive for improvement and rewrite his failed life. But unexpectedly, Xing Ao Fei is destined to be a doctor after his rebirth...

(Source: MangaToon)

Song Xiao only wanted to be a man of virtue, but somehow ended up being forced into a marriage with his Highness, plotted by the cunning emperor himself. However, just as the generation of great businesses began to flourish, the emperor died... When Song Xiao opened his eyes again, he finds himself in a college entrance exam... but why does his seatmate look so familiar?!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

"Honey, be a good girl and stay quiet. How are you going to repay me for saving you?" Newly-wed Xia Nuanxin is an out-and-out thief, and meeting Xiao Jueze is the biggest mistake she's ever made. As a result, she has to forcibly submit herself to him.With just a flash of his evil eyes, he carries her away on his shoulder...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

A comedian down on his luck enters a virtual game world, only to realize that the “in-game NPCs” were actually all victims of real-life murder cases! With death lurking around every corner, how will Han Fei survive and pursue justice?

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Jiang Xiao Long had just graduated from university and is a normal worker in the company, but this time he found the keys of his boss, the goddess Gong Mei Ting, and found this "other side" of this female boss that no one knows about. After finding this out, Jiang Xiao Long had many interesting encounters with this female boss and his life started to change.

Note: Includes 1 extra chapter.

As a peerless master from mountains, Lin Yi is superficially a normal student. However, he is actually a cultivator who is burdened with another important task, namely, chasing after the school beauty!

(Source: WebComics)

title.english: It's Never Too Late For Sweetness

description:
On one side, the school tyrant, Chi Yu, wishes to dispel the gossip regarding him being in a same-sex relationship. On the other side, the academic tyrant, Fu Zhian, wishes for the gossip between them to turn into truth. Who will succeed?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

In his previous life, Xia Lin dedicated his whole life to Song Yan, yet he still can’t escape the fate of being Song Yan’s second option. After being reborn, Xia Lin has decided to cut off their twisted relationship and stay away from Song Yan…

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

As punishment for disrespecting God, He Muyan was thrown into a world overseen by a system. Here, He Muyan was reborn infinitely and forced to clear scenarios. On his seventh rebirth, he was reincarnated as an elf and finally came to know the truth. Just as he was about to give up on everything, he met the one man that he would never forget: his ex, Jin Yuanchen.

Why was his ex here? And in the form of a mountain bandit to boot? He even kidnapped him in order to make him a trophy wife (husband?)!

A dramatic bottom who's given up on everything x a carefree, conniving top

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

People become ‘ghouls’ upon dying, and will enter the physical world through a door to cause chaos. Zhang Zha, a mere delivery boy, accidentally entered a haunted house, and resulted in a crisis— a ‘ghoul’ breakout. As such, people from all factions began to make an appearance in the story, while Zhang Zha continues to grow upon experiencing a series of adventures and fights with a mysterious scroll about modern Jianghu slowly unfolding alongside.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Douluo Dalu: Waizhuan Tang Men Yingxiong Chuan
title.english: Soul Land - The Legendary Tangs' Hero
title.native: 斗罗大陆外传唐门英雄传

description: With their God Realm sealed off, only Tang San possesses enough mental strength to communicate with the outside. Just as they were about to lose the battle, they discovered another God Realm far away from their Douluo Realm. The tables turned in the blink of an eye! Who will come out victorious from the Battle of the Gods? As protagonist halos collide, which one will claim a better win over the other? This is a battle that belongs to Tang Sect.

In a small apartment within the magical city of Shanghai, by fate or coincidence, live six girls. Although they have different occupations, personalities, and even nationalities, they support and care for one another. What kind of hilarious, sweet, and heart-warming stories will happen between the three couples?

The most charming Leader Commander of Wei, Wei Yu was severely injured under the sword of the Night King of Chen on the battlefield. He woke up in a body that he did not recognize—charming, fair, and with a delicate-looking face. Under the arrangement of King Wei, he was forced to marry and assassinate the Night King using a fake identity as “Xie Qingyu"". Wei Yu was once a shining star as a general. Little did he know, he had to be sexy and seductive to a man, to assassinate his enemy and complete the mission. However, the most unexpected things were the feelings and his plays toward the Night King had become real...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

The miserable and ugly man, reborn into a sect full of beautiful sisters! He thought he'd spend his whole life with them, but he was faced by countless mountains, bloody battles, rainy winds... The rubbish Tian Chen in the eyes of others, the abandoned son of a martial family, destined to be a good for nothing for a lifetime! in order to prove himself, and get back what he lost, and protect his loved ones, he embarked on a road full of hurdles, stars move and fight, everything is unified, a generation of the best immortal emperor finally arrives, he stands on the top of the continent, trying to become the most dazzling existence in tens of thousands of years!

An average girl gets involved with Wang Fenglie, the aggressive and violent mob king. Let's see how she trains him in a model husband! Just as she's completed his training, he suddenly becomes a demon, loses his memory and enters the Realm of Evil. To retrieve her Devil Husband, what is she going to do alone in the strange new world? The romance of gods and demons begin now!

title.english: My Boyfriend Got Me Falling in Love

description:
A hot shot in the entertainment industry with a rookie actor? A greasy CEO and an internet celebrity falling in love? No, this is about the sweet love between a stunning lady boss and a popular up-and-coming actor!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Ding Hanbai, a young master at a centuries-old jade-carving shop, bullies the timid Ji Zhenzhu at first, not expecting that someone from Jiangnan could break down his defenses and melts his heart. Over time, their admiration grows into a special affection, taking them one step closer to a lifetime together.

(Source: INKR)

There is a classroom in the school. No one except me can see it and I accidently entered it one night…After that I have to study in that class with my ghost classmates and ghost teacher who all died in a fire. Why didn’t they go reincarnation but choose to stay in the school? What’s the secret behind the ghost girl that is pregnant? I have to find out truth…

(Source: Mangatoon)

Qin Cheng, an orphan, was framed and badly beaten up after getting married. However, that happened to trigger the awakening of Qin Cheng's latent powers. From now on, Qin Cheng will set out on a path to become extraordinary…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

To save her mother, Qing Ge went to the Wei manor all alone. To the outside world, she’s an adopted daughter of the Wei clan, in reality, she’s fighting for survival as a spy. Ten years later, her careful plan plays out, as she catches the eye of second-prince Ran Zhao. The lady spy walks a knife's edge, as a conspiracy unfolds… See how she reverses her fortune and rises from the ashes…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Ni Zai Dong Wo Yixia Shishi!
title.english: Try Breaking My Defense, I Dare You!

description:
Bai Wu, an elite special forces soldier, accidentally transmigrates to another world and is cursed with the task of defeating eight devils before returning to his world. The catch? He is now a mage with 99999 defense points and only 1 attack point! In order to lift the curse and return home, Bai Wu resorts to ridiculous tactics of counterattacking all the way until he can complete his quest.

(Source: Tapas)

Jiang Mingyu obtained mysterious powers in an accident, and began his journey to level up his Abyss System by becoming a Player, hoping to make a better life for his family. As a new Player, he faced many challenges, and he found that it was no accident, but an arrangement ordained by fate...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

A young man left his sect's hidden dojo on Lingxu Mountain to go out into the world in search of the mythical kirin beast. He will be stepping into a world of conflict, filled with rampaging demons and youkai. This is the story of his adventures.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Di Wai Gua Jie Ling

description:
A modern-day bum found himself in a bizarre dream and got a mysterious ring. The cheating ring totally changed the game for his miserable life! The distant CEO lady, cute fiancée, sexy spy all started throwing themselves at him! But just when he was about to reach the peak of his life, he found that there was more than one ring in his dream!? For the sake of the mysterious seal, he had to kill the other ring holders...

(Source: WeComics)

When Ai Xiao Xiao, the seventeen-year-old girl discovers her first boyfriend is gay, she is devastated, but soon something more devastating ensues, as her love rival kisses her instead and suddenly transforms into a demon. This arouses the interest of the demon, who is openly the CEO of a powerful company that controls the economic lifeline of the entire nation because he has never been transformed into a demon involuntarily. Who could Ai Xiao Xiao really be? An orphan abandoned since birth in a children's home and adopted at eight, why only she can "awaken" this demonic CEO...

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Tuan Chong Da Lao San Suì Ban
title.english: Our Pampered Sister's Secretly a Big Boss

description:
With the soul across the Millennium, she has become the daughter of the down-and-out film emperor? All right, let those who addict to me thrive! Look at how I, together with my father and brothers, change my fate and become a lucky little one loved by all the group! But…being spoiled, I found that the expression of eyes of one of my brothers on me has changed …

(Source: Webnovel)

A pervert with great martial arts skills, a klutz of a nun, a dojo master with a bombastic imagination, a chivalrous but capricious Taoist, a mentally unstable patient who carelessly exudes internal energy… And so many experts who’re castrated? Hehe—So this is Murim?!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Huashen Mo Shen, Chengwei Mie Shi Jushou!
title.native: 我化身魔神，成为灭世巨兽！

description: The prosperous city and peaceful society were suddenly destroyed by the outbreak of doomsday. Countless polluted monsters flooded the world, and the forbidden area descended. Billions of people died and the sea of ​​blood surged as the doomsday worlds were connected. At this time, Chen Chu, who had grown silently and was comparable to a god or demon, stood up. And behind him, there was a black monster that was 10,000 meters tall, shaped like Godzilla, but even more ferocious and huge.

The one who I loved at first sight, always appears in the most critical time to save me.

You are the only one who treats me well and cares about me… So I like you without regrets no matter what will happen in the future!

The first time when Xinger Jiang saw Tingyue Xiao, he was a short-spoken and sharp-eyed bigwigs in Rong Cheng City. The only thing in her mind is... she must sleep with him! Finally, she achieved what she wished but...

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Biancheng Ke Xi Chushou Guai Hou, Tamen Geng Fengkuangle!
title.native: 变成克系触手怪后，她们更疯狂了!

description:
For unknown reasons, Xiao Zheng would transform into a tentacle monster when he became excited. Even if he longed for love, he would disguise himself as being cold. But suddenly he was summoned by Bai Anan, who was usually serious but secretly loved drawing. He signed an agreement and became Bai Anan’s “familiar”. He was threatened to help her – to draw the Manhua that would top the list!

(Source: Bilibli Comics, translated)

After an accident, Lin Huan transmigrated into the body of another Lin Huan in another world. Here, Lin Huan was the heir of a rich family. But ever since he was born, his family lost money at every business, almost as if they were cursed. They were forced to sell all their possessions and barely have enough money left to eat. When he woke up, Lin Huan realized that they have been taken in by the Su clan, their former competitors.

(Source: iQiyi, translated)

title.romaji: Mowang Yu Yongzhe Yu Sheng Jian Shendian
title.english: The Demon King, The Brave Knight and The Sacred Sword Temple
title.native: 魔王与勇者与圣剑神殿

description:
The continent of RAIEO was once ravaged by the Demon King and the Demon Race, in the darkest of times a Brave Knight carried a Sacred Sword saved the continent. After 300 years of peace, with the Sacred Sword now gone and the Sacred Sword Temple being occupied by the Demon Race, the continent of RAIEO is once again at war. Thus, our protagonist together with his donkey and a mysterious girl embark on a journey to stop the Demon King and the Demon Race.

(Source: OSTNT)

Used, betrayed, and tortured by her husband and sister, she died in despair, wondering why she couldn't have seen though them earlier?
Maybe God heard her question and turned back the clock. She woke up on the morning of her wedding and found herself able to read people's mind.
However, there's this Prince who's immune to her ability. What is he thinking? Will he undermine her revenging plan?
No worries, she's got the rest of her life as his wife to figure this man out...

(Source: MangaToon)

In this remote seaside town, different people meet here with their own confusion and doubt. Facing the deep blue sea, can everyone find their own answers. The deep blue journey of scuba diving and ordinary youth starts here!

(Source: Dongmanmanhua, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Duzi Tun Tian Shi De

description:
Tuntianji speaks of a world full of spirits and demons, ancient cities, and vast expanses, where ancient demons spawned over the endless eons, tearing asunder heaven and earth, unbound by the three dimensions. On the other side were the gods and immortals, who are blessed with heavenly bodies that can roam across space and time, master the yin and the yang, and become all-powerful. Immortal cultivation has been popularized, with tens of thousands of sects full of cultivators, but monsters and demons also roamed the land! Wu Yu, the crown prince of the Eastern Wu kingdom, was in a desperate situation when he discovered the legacy of the Eastern War God, which allowed him to fight back and make a name for himself in this world.

(Source: Kuaikan, translaed)

title.romaji: Wo Die Di Ren She Bengle

description:
‘Waaaait… you look familiar! You look… just like ME!’ Two practically identical boys have joined forces and hatched a plot—for love! Their mission: get their parents together. Summer is a plucky photographer, always working for that scoop. Blakely’s super famous and just the right target to get Summer the big bucks, as long as she can nab that one lucky shot. As their kids push these two singles together, sparks fly, but will it lead to a once-in-a-lifetime love? Or a massive burnout?

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Na Ge Nanren Rang Wo Wufa Jujue
title.native: 那个男人让我无法拒绝

description:
They said a loose tongue spells trouble. Guan Cheng said something during the Latin dance class and got Yu Yunfei's attention. That boy, unexpectedly, decided to break into Guan Cheng's life. "Wait! Why do I feel like I've seen this guy somewhere before?" When a straightforward silly bean was stalked by an attractive bad boy, what should he do?

(Source: Webnovel)

Note: Chapter count includes 4 extras chapters

The world has been plagued by monsters ever since the appearance of an inter-dimensional portal called the “Dark Abyss.” Special mages, known as portal protectors, must fight to keep the Dark Abyss under control. Among them, Baiyu is undoubtedly the strongest, and he full well knows it. But his arrogant personality gets the better of him when he jumps into battle one day unprepared for his hardest opponent yet, which then results in his untimely death. Things aren’t completely over though, as he is reincarnated two years later into the body of a teen boy. And with the special power of the gods bestowed to him in this life, will Baiyu finally be able to save the world from falling into darkness?

(Source: Tappytoon)

In this world, there are many special, unique, and glamorous people. However, there are those who play a supporting role in these relationship dynamics. Lin Mu was one such character, where he played the role of a wallflower.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

This should be the happiest moment of my life.
In my wedding gown, waiting for my groom... didn't even realize I lost consciousness.
Until I woke up... after giving birth to a child?
Where is my child and who is the father?
Years after the fact, will I be able to find out what happened that day?

(Source: MangaToon)

"By writing your wishes on a black piece of paper and writing 666 on the back, you’re able to gain immortality from the vampires."

Last and Loli are the one of the few vampires left standing in their family. With the faithful servant, Selly, they wanted someone new in their family. However, Loli's choice doesn't seem to be in agreement with Last, the leader of the family. Hence, Loli tries to make decisions on her own...

title.romaji: Quan Qiu Yu Gui: Wo De Ti Nei You Yi Zhi Gui
title.native: 全球御鬼：我的体内有亿只鬼

description: Lin Mo was goofing off playing games in the middle of class, when he was unexpectedly transported to another world infested with ghosts and monsters. Although he wasn't given any talents, he accidentally stumbled upon the “Defense-Breaking System.” All he had to do was break through a ghost’s defenses, and BAM! he could force it into a contract of servitude. Now things can get wild! Other people had contracts with two ghost at most. Lin Mo went all out and contracted MILLIONS of ghosts! With a single summon, thousands of ghosts will descend on his enemy! Drowned ghosts, hungry ghosts, drunken ghosts, chainsaw ghosts… Spooky, right?! Boo-tifully terrifying!

title.romaji: Zai Chongman Guaitan De Shijie Li Chengwei Monü
title.native: 在充满怪谈的世界里成为魔女

description:
Day 1: I must be seeing things. Wait, did that cabinet just move? Better check.
Day 3: I see them now! Damn it! Why is this world so full of supernatural beings!?
Day 101: Well, there's nothing to be afraid of! Time to put on my witchy dress and join them!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

The ephemerality of all beings, a thousand faces with all characteristics, complicated feelings, and humans that aren't humans.

Prince Duan Yu, having run away from home many times, is finally about to welcome a huge turning point in his life. Seeing the most beautiful woman in front of him, he brazenly calls out 'Fairy Sister'!

This is the familiar story of 'Demi-Gods and Semi-Devils' by author Jin Yong you know so well, as well as a new story!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

title.english: This Godfather Body Can't Leave the Women

description:
An elite investor was transmigrated into a game and became a demon cult's patriarch! Unable to resist the pleas of the cult's princesses, he embarks on the path to dominate this foreign world!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes three extras chapters.

title.romaji: Xiuxian Xueyuan De Zui Qiang Pingmin
title.english: The Strongest Commoner in the Academy of Immortal Cultivators

description:
In the era of immortal cultivators, spiritual energy and martial arts became daily necessities for all people.
“It’ll be fine is long as I’m around.”
This is the story of a prince with great potential within him and his journey to become a king.On his path to the throne, the prince would save the world many times with the tricks up his sleeves.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Hei Yueguang Nü Zhu Zong Xiang Biaoji Wo
title.native: 黑月光女主总想标记我

description:
A manipulative and calculating Alpha (Disguised as an Omega) × A cold-on-the-outside fearful Omega (Disguised as an Alpha)!

When designer Gu Yu transmigrates into an ABO romance, she becomes the villain who will be killed by the protagonist, Su Yue. In order to survive, she decides to flatter the 'fragile Omega', creating stunning looks and helping her dominate showbiz. But Su Yue is not an Omega… she is an Alpha in disguise! And now, with intoxicating wine pheromones, she demands: 'Ready to be marked and be mine?'"

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

On the day Song Yu moved into her new place, she was bitten by a beautiful lady vampire who was sealed within the strange stone statue in the yard. Verelle was awakened by the mysterious power within Song Yu, and her desire for blood made her instinctively bite Song Yu. Now she will make Song Yu do her bidding, by tempting her with money. This is the start of a cohabitation life between two girls who don't get along with each other.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Su Jia Ao is a normal high school girl, and she's in an unbelievable situation she's never encountered before. A fiancee descended from the sky; his attractiveness can't be stopped, together with that thing; this fiancee is exquisite, kind, gentle, and a highly moral person. Her parents and her neighbours compliment him nonstop. But... What a joke! Who would want to marry someone, who doesn't have man's qualities, as her husband? I'm afraid, even if I come to the Dong Nu Clan, who uses women are superior to men as an ethic, it won't work. For sure, I'll break the chain of these old principles and sing a song of freedom! ...

title.romaji: Wo De Tudi Ju Ran Shi Nüdi

description:
During the sect's recruiting event, Qin Tian, the laziest master in the sect, somehow got himself a disciple in An Miaoling, who is the reincarnation of the empress. After An Miaoling joins the sect, she soon discovers that the so-called useless Qin Tian is merely putting up an act. Now the reincarnated empress is extremely curious about her master's true abilities.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

After graduation, Chu Tianlin became out of work, but accidentally, there was a variation in his mobile We-chat. After that, tremendous changes were found in his life. He could buy any celestial tools as he pleased and choose any way to upgrade! Let’s see how he’ll change his destiny!

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Zhe Ge Yongzhe Shi Jin Qian Zhi Zhang Zhuyizhe
title.native: 這個勇者是金錢至上主義者

description:
Gao Yi was the second richest man in the world, the founder and CEO of the G Group. Just as he was about to take over the top spot as the richest man, the destitute priestess Emma summoned him to another world to be the "Hero of Justice." But they were so poor that they were about to starve to death on the streets, and our hero decided to solve this problem — by selling off his holy sword??

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: (Kuai Chuan) Jue Mei Bailian Zaixian Jiaoxue

description:
He's the top man at Kuaichuan Systems, jumping into different worlds and playing the role of the innocent nice guy to perfection. With his adorable looks and manipulative nature, he made movie stars, corporate presidents, even emperors fall for him, always with the perfect happy ending. But it turned out that it's the same person he's been seducing every time? In this man-versus-man war of love, who will be the final victor?

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

A shameless ruffian accidentally traveled to a parallel dimension and transformed into a Homicide Squad Agent. An encounter with a strange and uncanny system that guides him to solve mysterious cases, thus becoming a top detective with a wild personality!

(Source: Webnovel)

Xiao Hei, a half dog demon half human, attempts to get rich with a life as an exorcist for hire. One day he has a little trouble with a zombie in a warehouse and a girl comes into the picture and helps him defeat it by teaching him something she learned at an exorcist school. She invites him to try to admit to the school and he decides to try to get in, hoping it'll help him get rich faster... but it's hard to get admission, and why does he want so much money anyway?

Mo Lang, a bad boy, and Bai Qi, his genius friend, lived a quiet life in a village in the distant country of Niuzhan. Until one day, a mysterious assassin from the country of Xuanwu appears, who completely subverts their lives, forcing the two youngsters to embark on an adventure that will change the world. The manhua is a prequel to the animated series Scissor Seven, chronicling events from before the original series.

(Source: Tencent, translated)
This is a story about a girl who likes another girl and tries her best to pursue her!

In the Tranquil Sun province of the empire, there exists an unremarkable lordship known as Xue Ying Territory! This is the home of the Dong Bo clan, the clan of our hero Xue Ying! His father, a commoner turned noble; his mother, a noble who abandoned her clan for love, and his brother, an innocent toddler. But peace cannot last forever, Xue Ying’s peaceful life is shattered, and the only way to reclaim it is through power!
Ah, the young and in love. Read to see where Shen Nantang's lighthearted university endeavors take him!

After a catastrophic falling out, professional E-sports competitors Shi Luo and Yu Sui parted ways. Shi Luo knows better than to open himself up to the man who broke his heart but, when that man approaches him with a proposal for a new team, familiar feelings begin to bubble up to the surface.

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Wo Da Zao Le Jiushi Zuzhi

description:
He has the Doomsday Salvation System, which grants him rewards for saving the world from apocalyptic disasters. To do that, he recruits top talents to form a team known as the Guardians of Humanity. He jumps into post-apocalyptic worlds as the final defender of human civilization, as the entire world admires and worships him as a god. Massive natural disasters, waves of genetic mutations, the murmurs of eldritch horrors. No matter the challenge, the massive organization he has built will come to the rescue of humanity in each post-apocalyptic world.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Qi Da Qiji: Wang De Yanlei

description:
Having been through hell lin the past and given a bottle of mysterious perfume, a mute girl that was born with a curse enters a dream and is told to obtain tears from her tyrannical master to complete the redemption of each other. Will her male master shed tears just for a mute maid?

(Source: Pocket Comics)

title.romaji: Wo Zai Yi Jie Xiu Mofa

description:
Xiao En, who was working on a virtual world learning machine, died in an accident, and got isekai-ed to a magical world with the learning machine (AI) that was a slut in the inside but has a pure elder sister appearance. The time in the virtual world learning machine’s space is ten times slower, and with this endless time, it can surely create the greatest new generation of outstanding masters!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Feng Qing could not wrap his head around how he had ended up on the fence of the wall of that big boss despite being the most handsome guy on the street!

A certain imperial prince: Heh heh, you fell into my arms and even thought about escaping after teasing me? You little rogue, you're too gutsy! Let me punish you by making you my princess consort to be disciplined by me!

(Source: WebNovel)

Top-tier idol manager Le Qiu accidentally traveled to another world. To return to her reality as soon as possible and help the farm girl, Ella, save her village, fate led Le Qiu to bring six beautiful girls of different races and personalities together into a girl group. While she spreads the idol culture, she is also… saving the world.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Because of a song, two completely different fates overlap. We always start to think how much we love each other, but gradually, love loses its initial appearance. Could that be possible, most of the time, what we love most is just ourselves?

(Source: Webcomics)

Of all the different universes and world systems, I have only one question, "Can you pay to win?" The modern world has been invaded by various trash game systems. Demon lords, isekai heroes, cheat skills, and straight up overpowered characters all coexist. But of all the possible systems, Chen Qian was stuck with this one: Pay To Win. This is a story of how he got stronger by spending money.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

This is a world where humans, demons and mysterious beasts coexist. Humans cultivate mysterious qi. Demons cultivate corporeal bodies. Mysterious beasts cultivate soul perception. A legend says that in the middle of an endless rainforest, there are extremely powerful existences; they are called demon kings. Some demon kings have a tyrannical corporeal body, some are experts in illusions. Some demon kings are proficient in magic, some can even move mountains. Some demon kings are able to sense things thousands of miles away. These demon kings rarely appear in the human world. Even if they emerge in the human world, they would reincarnate in human form; assimilating with mankind while seeking to breakthrough realms...

The bizarre father and the rebellious daughter, they were not only so broke, but also liked to play tricks on each other. A comic about the hilarious daily life of this single father who had to take up all sorts of strange jobs to make money and the daughter who didn't get along with her fellow classmates. Laugh until you get tired! Highly recommended!

(Source: Webcomics App)

Chen Yang was just an ordinary person. One day, he was given an opportunity: he was offered the ability to control his luck! Love, status, and fortune were suddenly all within his grasp. When a person can control his luck at will, how will his life change? Will he run into beauties as soon as he steps outside his door? Will he trade as much stock as he possibly can? Damn... it's too good to be true... Those who are my friends will all live wonderful lives. Those who are my enemies have already paid the price!!

(Source: Webnovel)

Xiang Xingzi has misandria, and will hiccup whenever a boy touches her. She is surprised to find that she doesn't hiccup when touched by the boy who transfers here after being expelled from his previous school because of doing something bad. She is recognized while disguising herself in men's clothes in her mother's restaurant, and finds that boy is also her neighbor and often gets good grades. She is curious about him.

(Source: Webnovel)

In a world that everyone only wants to kill, where everyone mocks doctors for being cowardice. Then, I'm going to be the most powerful doctor in the future of this crazy world! Medicine dominates the world!

(Source: WebComics)

A sinister ritual, a city hidden away by the gods, a truth buried in darkness; only a baby survived, and 15 years later, the revelation comes again. The next generation, their fates intertwined, set out on a journey to uncover the truth, and the beholder of the abyss perhaps never left.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

His girlfriend cheated on him and he felt the cruelties of life. But he refused to be humiliated. Watch him make his comeback by assuming the identity of a rich heir, as he cultivates martial and medical skills to make his revenge!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

The low-level guide Qin Yun was forcibly marked by the god-level sentinel tyrant Mosheli. The hot-tempered girl-hearted top x the serious and honest bottom started a shameless life as a couple, and conquered the entire universe while they're at it.

(Source: Manga Bilibili, translated)

A love-struck of a peach blossom demon and a human girl! Dan Qing meets a peach blossom demon while gathering herbs in Ghost Forest, but humans and demons are never meant to be together. They overcome hardships together as their complicated and ambiguous relationship leads to a story filled with medical practice, love, friendship, the past, and the present.

(Source: INKR)
"If the skies pressures me, I'll spilt it apart, if the ground opposes me, I'll stomp it apart!" Young God of War Yang Wu

Leaving behind his throne, his wealth, and his women. The Demon King now disguises himself and start raising heroes in his pen?! He even formed a party to level up "newbies"! Aren't this suppose to be the war between Good and Evil?! Caesar mockingly answers: "Rules? I create the rules!"

After transmigrating to another world as a wealthy young master, Su Changqing only wanted to live a low-profile life as a rich second-generation heir and enjoy his days in comfort. However, his plans are suddenly disrupted when his family faces an unexpected crisis, and he accidentally discovers the Emperor's secret - that she is actually a woman.

While he initially feared the female Emperor would stop at nothing to silence him, to his surprise, she instead becomes interested in his mysterious ability to transform his appearance. She wants him to become her male body double. What Su Changqing never expected was that being the female Emperor's male substitute would mean he has to visit the imperial harem on his very first day. His peaceful life completely falls apart from that moment on...

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Popular beautiful hostess Lin Tang has seized a chance to bind a romantic relation system to survice after an unexpect accident and time-travels to a strange world. Let's see what love tactics will she use to make all the handsome guys appointed by the system fall in love for her and go back to the top of her life.
(Source: Webcomics)

title.english: The Other Side of the Mirror

description:
When the people of Jian’s village inexplicably turn on each other, he and his cybernetic arm are powerless to stop the deadly tragedy. He seeks the one responsible, only to run into the mysteriously powerful Xizhan during his own hunt for answers. Somehow, the affectionate stranger convinces the taciturn Jian to band together to find the enigmatic Quicksilver, who may be the key to both their quests. In a world with gods and spirits where nothing is as it seems, will their journey reveal the answers they seek and reflect their true intentions?

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes 3 extra chapters.

Several decades ago, the young boy Bai Ze wandered into the mountains of the immortal realm and formed a bond with a young immortal. Back in the present day, the college student Bai Ze once again comes to the immortal realm, only to find that the handsome immortal of his dreams has become a pitiful figure, forgotten by the mortal realm. In a world where demons and monsters wreak havoc, the source of the trouble turns out to be this pitiful thing. Trying to make things right, Bai Ze forcefully brings the immortal back to the mortal realm with him, looking for his help to restore the peace. After all, who could resist someone so beautiful, powerful, yet pitiful?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

I have been dreaming a girl for fourteen years. Last night she threw herself under a train in my dream, and that was the last time I dreamed about her. While I was looking for her, I found a mysterious contract paper about 'Life Exchange'.

One of the most popular comics in China, which will show you a mysterious world. Find the answer of life and death.

title.english: Reverse Harem Rules of Ugly Woman

description:
This comic is full of charming guys! Ji Guanxue is a doctor in the Bian city, an underground black market. She is surrounded by an aloof official, a loyal guard and a powerful mob boss. And there are even more hot guys awaiting her! In order to save herself and her loved ones from more trouble, she...

(Source: WeComics)

Lu Nanzhi transmigrated into the world of a romance novel as the villainess. Her mission is to make sure the heroine Cheng Wei has a happy ending. The hard-core lesbian figures that she can make Cheng Wei the happiest by seducing the heroine herself. But as she courted the girl, she slowly realized that the other characters seem to be treating her… differently… than how they acted in the original story?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

title.romaji: Beiwei Xitong, Gui Qing Wo Wu Di

description:
When other people transmigrate, they have to work like slaves to complete missions from the System. When Wang Yang transmigrates, he gets a PUA System that does all the work for him! He just has to sit back, and whatever he desires is granted to him by his System. God-like skills, invincible cultivation, beautiful women — anything he wants! Now this is how a transmigration story should be!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Lu Cang, the boss of the Lucang Mountain Gang, fell in love with this stunning beauty at first sight!
In order to help their boss find a wife, the bandits kidnap the "woman" who passed by the mountain.
Happy, they hold a wedding ceremony for their boss...
That night, a painful cry escapes from the bridal chamber!?

(Source: Uei Shiang, translated)

When disaster strikes, was it a premeditated attack, or an unfortunate accident? Open plotting and hidden conspiracies combine to fog the truth… As he finds out his true heritage, the mystery is gradually revealed. He wants to grow stronger, but to do that he must pay a heavy price, and overcome challenges no ordinary man can stand. See how an ordinary boy set out on the road to revenge and shakes the world's foundations!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Freshman Lin Qingji was just about to enjoy his new life in university when he knocked an old school teacher into ground. As a compensation, Qingji had to joined a horrible rock band as a fill-in bass player. He then encountered the last person he wanted to meet in the world, the guitar player who was a campus bully. But Qingji kept confusing him with another boy in his childhood. What would this sullen, defensive and jet-black-hair guy bring to Qingji’s life?

(Source: MangaToon)

Note: Chapter count includes a prologue.

A young girl plays truth or dare with her friends one evening and gets challenged to ask the first male that walks into the bar to give her his belt.
This evening was meant to be her bachelorette party after making a deal with her adoptive mother. The deal they made was that if she agrees to an arranged marriage, she will get to continue her studies. In order to keep her education going, she sacrifices herself, but little did she know the identity of her fiancé...

title.romaji: Man Qi Youdu, Fu Hei Laogong Chong Shangtian
title.native: 蛮妻有毒，腹黑老公宠上天

description:
The man Su Shengxia falls in love with at first sight is her uncle! But this obstacle is just a piece of cake for Su and let's see how she courts that overbearing and cold chief.

(Source: Manga Toon)

Season 1: 121 Chapters
Season 2: 99 Chapters

title.romaji: Hougong Jiu Jiao Gei Fanpai Nüpei
title.english: I Became the Villain of the Otome Game

description:
Lin Ci's otome game released to countless positive reviews. Unfortunately, what should have been cause for celebration becomes anything but when she's transmigrated into her own game as the story's antagonist, Molly. Tasked by god to pair the protagonist with a single male lead, Molly's quest to pull the female lead from the allures of a male harem begins!

(Source: Tapas)

Modern-day Daoist Fang Yi wakes up one day with a superpower—the ability to sense antiques and artifacts! From there, he becomes an artifact-collecting wonder. Countless treasures all become his, and he leads his band of brothers on a journey to the very peak of life!

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Zhou Cheng Yi de Chulian Guoyu Kanke
title.native: 周成一的初恋过于坎坷

description:
Zhou Chengyi is a bossy president. He finally falls in love with a girl when he is 27 years old. However the girl he loves is a straight man who just wears women's clothes. The man is a online celebrity model. Turning from a die-hard fan to a sasaeng fan of him, Zhou Chengyi is confused about what true love is.

(Source: WeComics)

Note: Chapter count includes 5 extras.
After her parents divorced, Cong Cong has been living alone, one day she goes to meet her idol, falls down a flight of stairs and travels through time.

During the Xiande period of the Great Zhou Dynasty, Lord Shen Wei of Jianxing was defeated at the Chashi River in the northeast, which nearly resulted in the loss of six central provinces. His son Shen Zechuan was taken to the capital in disgrace, despised as the son of a loser. Xiao Chiye, the youngest son of the Lord of Libei, rushed to the capital at the news, and nearly beat Shen Zechuan to death. However, the weak-looking Shen Zechuan fought back fiercely, and even bit Xiao Chiye until he bled. It was the start of a fierce feud between the two. Unexpectedly, during their endless conflict, they accidentally discover the real reason for Shen Wei's defeat.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Born into a family of musicians, Gu Si is known as a musical genius, but never recognized by his father because of the lack of emotions in his music. In order to overcome this shortcoming, Gu Si began to study up on Charles, a musician who's known for showing an abundance of emotions in his works. Who would've thought that halfway into the book, he fell asleep and finds himself waking up 200 years back in the past. Is this expressionless man with rusty piano skills standing before my eyes really the legendary Charles?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Sparks fly when the optimistic and righteous athlete, Yunjuan Luo meets the haughty and spoiled star, Aoyue . Once a popular child star, Aoyue's popularity is threatened when his viewers start getting bored of him. In order to save their money-making machine, his talent agency decides to get Aoyue to form a boy-band whose sole purpose is to boost his popularity. Desperate to earn money for his sister's surgery, Yunjuan signs a contract with the same talent agency and ends up as a member of Aoyue's boy-band. Watch what happens when two handsome boys collide!

(Source: Tapas)

After the supernatural disaster at Chiyuan Canyon, Xuan Ji, the newly appointed head of the Aftermath Response Division, encounters a demon who was revived by a sinister ritual. As the past and present collide, flames of an ancient war reignite and threaten to topple thousands of years of peace.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Recycling old magic soldiers, broken armor, and rotten methods! The foremost salvage station head, Tang Fei is on the rise! He is the most talented heir of the Tang family, but because he had to stand vigil he missed five years to build his foundation and became a servant. But the ring left by his Grandpa made him refine waste into treasure! In his hands, waste can be renewed; old can be new, and time and space can be altered. There is no waste in this world, only treasure in the wrong location, follow Tang Fei and see how he refines the waste!

(Source: AC.QQ, translated)
She has a crush on her. So, she makes the first step and leaves her with a cute kiss. Except, they're both clueless about each other's intentions!

title.romaji: Qing Jiao Wo Gui Chai Da Ren

description:
After the long night, terror shall reign! Supernatural monsters descend upon the modern city! Common sense and rules of law are no more! Blood rains down on a peaceful campus, tombs crack open in the cemetery on the outskirts of town, and the slums are haunted by shadowy apparitions… In this dark and desperate world, there is a post office that only emerges at midnight, where a young man dressed in black can navigate these mysterious and terrifying places. The young man in black will become a legend, his stories passed around in secret by word-of-mouth, “He is the Great Lord of the Underworld!”

(Source: Fanqie Manhua, tanslated)

A talented man entered the palace to win the favor of the emperor for his younger sister. How could he do that under the cover of a woman in the cruel and complex harem? And what story would he have with the Emperor and the Prime Minister? Not only does he have to fight for the position, but also fall in love for his sister. Will he achieve his goal? What will happen after the Emperor find out the truth?

(Source: Mangatoon)

Du Ming, a cowardly high school student, gets involved in a super power fight by accident. When the girl with super powers moves in with him, his life goes through a series of crises and misfortunes. What Du Ming gonna do with all this pressure and crisis? (Source: Kuaikan, translated) Note: Chapter count includes a prologue.

Yan Shuangshuang watched her lover die in front of her. An angel appeared and offered her a second chance. But after she was reborn, everything seemed to be a little bit off.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

In the adversity of life, people are not as good as dogs. Once I opened my powerful eyes, I saw the ugliness as well as the beauty of the world! What is the secret behind the female body in the jade coffin, the mysterious bronze book, the ancient alloy…

(Source: MangaToon)

A revenge thriller featuring a femme fatale who uses her medical knowledge to heal or hurt.

She was reborn in the body of a mistreated young noble lady. Surrounded by greedy, calculating relatives? No big deal! Her needles will put them in line! Face marred by scars and fingers broken? A piece of cake! With her medical skills, she'll soon restore her beauty and strength! Arrogant and cold-blooded, he's the most powerful man in the court of the Xia dynasty, yet he will fall in love with her at first sight…

(Source: Webcomics)

title.english: My Contracted Wife is Cold to Me

description:
Her marriage life was enviable, at least it seemed to be. But deep in her heart, she knew it clearly that this man would never love her. The marriage was not built on the foundation of love, but a contract. Soon the contract will be over, yet the man wants more. He's going to get serious about this relationship...

(Source: MangaToon)

Note: Includes a prologue and 12 extras chapters.

title.romaji: Dazao Yi Jie Zui Qiang Shaolin Si

description:
The young Huo Yuanzhen crossed the alien world and became a minor faction—the Shaolin Abbot’s commandment. In order to save his life and complete the task of the "abbot system", Huo Yuanzhen had to start to find ways to make Shaolin believers more and more prosperous. The rise of Shaolin made the surrounding factions panic. They secretly tried to suppress Shaolin, but they were beaten by Huo Yuanzhen. The strength of Shaolin and Shaolin abbot even attracted the sons of the royal family.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Ho Dongdong traveled to another world after a car accident and turned into an Orc elf—A hybrid of an Orc and an elf. It's terrible enough that he is a loser in both worlds, but even worse, he is now a slave... Let's see how this indelicate, wretched, and sly elf King will turn the tide, crush the orcs and humans, and revitalize the elves' empire! And, what stories will happen between those hotties and him?

(Source: Webnovel)

Humans and elves coexisted on the continent. Due to the Demon King’s curse, females will no longer... be born??? In order to save the humans, the elves added a new law to the land. This law allowed humans to continue to reproduce, and that law is...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes a bonus chapter

He comes across a cute girl on the way home in the late night. Out of kindness, he helps "her" get out of trouble and decided to let "her" stay just one night at his house. But "she" doesn't seem to interest him much, by contrast, "she" is kicked out of his bed when "she" is trying to sleep with him...

(Source: Webcomics)

Missy, you are going too far! Are you thinking of sleeping with me when I see you as my sibling? A young boy with huge student loans was backed up against a wall. Fortunately, a man gave him medicine which helped him reconstruct his genes, so that his destiny was changed.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: P.S. Wo Zai Hu Bian Deng Ni
title.english: P.S. Waiting For You By The Lake

description:
The lush forest, clear water, cute boat, and the mysterious boat house… They are all Leo and Alexis’ wonderful childhood memories. During the summer when they were 11 years old, Alexis escaped from Leo because of a foolish reason. Until the summer when they are 18 years old, they meet again at the same place… Everything looks the same but everything has changed. Can Leo, who is filled with pain, and Alexis lick each other’s wounds and heal each other or will they both fall to the bottom of the lake? This is a touching story about two young boys written in a gentle style.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note:
- Originally titled 利奥 (Leo).
- Includes two extra.

Suffering from "Haphephobia", Qin Min refused to have any physical contact with others. Until one day, he became neighbours with Lin Yuxia, a barber who read countless people. Qin kept chanting "Don't touch me!", but still couldn't resist Lin getting into his heart...

(Source: Webnovel)

To me, it was love at first sight. To you, your love grew with time! As corporate slaves in the finance department, they always work overtime and stay up all night together whilst love develops along the way! Liang Xiao: "Senior, you're destined to be loved by me."

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Ace Li is handsome, popular, and at the top of his class. He's been living life on easy mode and it’s all thanks to his cheating “relic.” Ace isn’t the only one with a magical relic that grants him supernatural powers, but these other relic holders have paid a steep and deadly price to the shadowy Mr. Ding. Desperate to settle their debts, they have their eyes locked onto Ace's relic, and they'll do anything to take it.

(Source: Tapas)

“The police are going mad!”

Crazy things are happening throughout the city—a Saiyan is suddenly holding his girlfriend hostage, a missing wife has turned into a happy woman and the reason for all this is… The "Ultimate Love Bazaar" that claims they can solve any love-related problems?!! And the one selling all these love problem-solving items is a very crafty witch that can go through different dimensions?! A cold-faced and serious policeman was just doing his job and… This charming love hotpot is boiling; would you like to have a taste, dear customer?

(Source: Comikey, edited)

title.romaji: Jiao Yang Le Ge Feng Pi Mei Ren Er

description:
Upon being reborn, Bai Man is singularly focused on killing the tyrant Emperor and claiming the throne for herself. In her quest for power, she decides she must first win over the Grand Marshall Zhou Rong. But the first time they meet, Zhou Rong slams Bai Man to the bed and asks her if she remembers the pleasures from last night? Oh no! That cool lady general turns out to be a crazed yandere in private!!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Note: Includes two extra chapters.

This is an adventure story about the comic artist himself. A well-known comic artist, who often falls behind his schedule, got into his own work as a character because of a mysterious phone call. He is a bald-headed supporting character, called Ming. As an artist, how could he just be willing to be a supporting character! But can the creator really change his final destiny?

(Source: MangaToon)

“A poor girl entered an elite academy, and accidentally became the target for the rich people's "love hunt".”

A poor girl entered an elite academy, and accidentally became the target for the rich people's "love hunt". The academy's elegant men become animals like a wolf, lion, bear, and snake in the anonymous chatroom, while treating the girl's heart as a game of gamble... The girl that suddenly discovers the dark truth of the game decides to bare her teeth and break the hearts of these people that attempted to play her, while also trying to uncover the game's mastermind... The revenge of the prey starts now!

(Source: Comikey Media)

title.romaji: Wo Shuo Gou, Xitong Shuo Gou Dai

description:
Ding dong!
"Welcome to the Automatic Cultivation System!"
"Important reminder: During the automatic cultivation process, you will not be able to control your body..."

After obtaining the Automatic Cultivation System, Pei Ling thought that he could just quickly level-up unnoticed until he became all-powerful. But one day...

Ding dong!
"The System has detected a lack of cultivation companions. The System is searching for an appropriate companion for you..."

Before he knew it, Pei Ling found himself watching helplessly as he kicked down the door of the saintess...

(Source: Tencent, translated)

The connection between a girl and another girl, and something that will purify your soul.

Note: Includes 7 bonus chapters.

title.romaji: Wei Wei Yi Xiao Hen Qing Cheng
title.english: Just One Smile is Very Alluring

description: Bei Wei Wei, is the campus goddess, who also excels in her studies. She aspires to be an online game designer, and goes by the alias of Luwei Weiwei who is in top 10 player versus player rankings, in the online role-playing game Dreaming of Jianghu. After she gets dumped by her online husband Zhenshui Wuxiang, she gets a marriage proposal by the number one player of the server Yixiao naihe.

title.english: How to Train Your Demon King

description:
While exploring the wilderness, Yan Wenan discovered a mysterious village being attacked by hundreds of demons. He accidentally got caught in a magical formation that was meant to kill the Demon King, Zhuo Yu, and somehow obtained a portion of the Demon King's soul. Since then, the Demon King has been forced to live a modern life with Yan Wenan and blend into human society.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

In the year 3574 of the Lista calendar, the world started moving toward destruction. In this already decaying world, 500 years later, the black-robed-elf Ariman Campbell takes over an Orc-female beast, Eve, by accident. Their meeting set the wheel of fate in motion, which could lead to a major storm...

(Source: INKR)

title.romaji: Renqi Tong Zhuo Shi Zhi Mao

description:
Neal Fu is the most popular guy in the school. Gather up all the girls that like him and you can fill up a whole football field! But he himself is a cold and unemotional guy. Our heroine Shaina Mu is so lucky yet unlucky. She is the deskmate of Neal Fu, but because of this, she becomes the public enemy of all girls. Some bi*ches set her up even assault her. To her surprise, this popular McDreamy has a secret identity, which is... He’s actually a black cat!!!

(Source: Webcomics)

Xiang Nan, who's an absolute idiot when it comes to love, has had a crush on Hong Xiao for a very long time. In order to increase his eligibility as a boyfriend, he decides to seek help online from the top four male gods of the internet. "Masters, please teach me about love!" What surprises him the most is how all four of them say yes immediately. Number One says, "Overbearing CEO, Contract Lover, which one do you want to be?" Number Two says, "Midnight shower, personal bedroom, which one do you want a peek at?" Number Three says, "Kneeling, squatting, sideways, and prone. Which way do you want to be positioned?" Number Four says, "Chest muscles, abdominal muscles, pelvic muscles, which one do you wanna train first?" Erm...why is this path to knowledge filled with so many obstacles?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Mo Li has always been an only child. Her life is turned completely upside down, however, when a man claiming to be her older brother appears out of nowhere! He tells her he's returned from living in the mountains and that he seems to have a lot of secrets to keep hidden. A very funny story unfolds after two siblings, but complete strangers, begin their chaotic yet hilarious daily activities and get to know each other better!

(Source: INKR)

title.romaji: Jue Shi Bing Wang Chuang Hua Du

description:
Russell, a communication solder, was forced to retire from the army due to family pressure. He joined Heavenly Love Institute as a physical education teacher under the arrangement of his family and courted the four potential marriage partners designated by his family, but unexpectedly, he was involved in various conspiracies...

(Source: WebComics)

title.romaji: Chong Hui Dushi: Zui Qiang Touzi Wang

description:
In his previous life, his wife took all his savings to support her brother, driving him to suicide. When he opened his eyes, Yan Mu had returned to the day he proposed to Fan Yuxue, with the five hundred thousand yuan wedding dowry still in hand!
