He broke it off the the bro-con girlfriend, and spent the money on lottery tickets, real estate, and other investments instead. Now he will re-live his life to become the strongest and wealthiest man in the city!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Xuan Min was a monk who had lost his memories but still possessed some knowledge about Feng Shui and Geomancy. On his first day in Ningyang, he unceremoniously ransacked a haunted house. He exorcised the place and incidentally took Xue Xian, the true dragon nesting in it, with him.

From then on, the story of a partially paralyzed dragon and an aloof monk began as they joined hands and traveled to look for dragon bones and memories together.

(Source: Bilibili)

Demons hide among us in disguise... The third-rate exorcist, Shouta, protects the peace of his school in his clumsy way. One day, he meets the beautiful horned demon girl, Rin, in the mountains. Due to a strange combination of circumstances, the two are bound together by a contract! From then on, the wild-natured Rin and the clumsy Shouta become a pair of quarrelsome lovers... I mean, exorcist partners, fighting and chasing demons away every day! A blood-pumping, exciting action exorcist series with beautiful girls!

Ann is a book lover, and her newest addiction is a novel called Death Of The Evil Duke Gerald. In the story, Duke Gerald is hated due to his cruelty but as Ann dives deeper into the story, she wonders if his demise could’ve been avoided had he not lost the people he loved. She shakes off the thought, realizing that she cannot change the story’s ending… that is until she gets transported into the novel. Ann is informed that she has 90 days to change the duke’s fate and if she fails… she will never be able to return to her world again.

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Chapter count includes the prologue.

In the wake of scientific advancement, the once majestic mythological animals can't be compared to the olden days now. The mythological animal Sibuxiang received orders to descend to the mortal world and to help out other mythological animals in dire straits wandering the human world. In the secular world, he met his old colleague Pixiu in a tight spot, his drinking buddy Tuye down in his luck, and the gold and silver Jue brothers who were demoted to the mortal world... what kind of stories will happen between them?

(Source: AC.QQ, translated)

This is a somewhat silly and sweet boy's love story. The all-round good student, Xu Qingsong (Christoph Sherman) got acquainted with a punk, Zhu Chen (Chet June), because of a fight and fell for him at first sight.

Because of various reasons, Xu Qingsong became the boss of a gang called the Seaflower Crew, and Zhu Chen became his right hand. Together they lead the Seaflower Crew to forcibly occupy... No, wait, to protect the town?

(Source: WebComics, edited)
This is a yuri love story between a human and an android.

Many years back, the secret portal of another world began to appear on earth, and human beings have gained an additional occupation: hunter. Although the upper limit of the level that everyone can achieve is different due to differences in talent, but compared to most ordinary occupations on earth, the income of hunter is objectively more. Especially the income of a high-level hunter. It is very enviable, thus more and more people began to join the team of hunter. But the main protagonist is the unluckiest hunter in history!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

A gentle story about girl learning about the world and people.

Due to the job demands of her parents, who repair old buildings and works of art for a living, nine-year old Mou Yuu has travelled all the way from the city to a rural village. In this village, where the lush greenery of nature has been preserved, Yuu makes new friends and has many adventures with them. Perhaps because of her heritage, or simply because she is in such close contact with nature, she also encounters the supernatural and mysteries that cannot be explained.

title.romaji: Zong You Laoshi Yao Qing Jiazhang

description:
One night, Qi Yan picked up an older woman at a bar and they had a one-night stand together, not realizing she was the mother of one of her students. At the parent-teacher conference, they looked each other in the eye.

"What a coincidence, Ms. Qi."

Fascinated by the reserved but experienced older woman, Qi Yan only became more attracted to her. When she found out the woman was single, that was when she began aggressively pursuing her. It's a long road, so when will the lady fall for her?

(Souce: Kuaikan, translated)

The sword of doom, the tombkeeper of the old world, the master tuner, the final defender of heaven, one of the twenty-four elements of destruction, the boy on Huaihai Road, the sun in the abyss, the ultimate lord of hell: Huai Shi.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

A big fire caused Chen Feng to become blind . While in his despair, he received eyes that have a strange appraisal function, allowing him to identify and appraise treasures, antiques and anything valuable, enabling him to appreciate the Heavens and Earth and also see through everything with his divine eyes.

The story is about a man who starts out being dumped by his girlfriend because he is poor and can't provide her with luxuries. The MC has a family heirloom that gives him the ability to see through things that changes his life as he knows it.

I just finished University, yet I travelled back to high school! I was a guy, but suddenly transformed into a girl!

God gave me another chance, and I've decided to stop being good! I shall change history and conquer the high school! I will become the queen!

Fan Xian, a young man with a mysterious past, left his home in Danzhou in search of adventure. He will be tested by family, wuxia, and temple. But by overcoming these challenges, he will gradually discover the complicated truths of this world…

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Waking up in a hospital, she finds herself targeted by assassins. Suffering from amnesia, she's cornered when a mysterious man claiming to be her husband appears and takes out the final attacker, saving her. Just who is this stranger who knows her so well?

(Source: WebComics, edited)

title.romaji: Qiyue Lianai Juebu Keyi Jia Xi Chengzhen!
title.english: This Contract Romance Must Not Turn Real!
title.native: 契约恋爱绝不可以假戏成真！

description:
After being cheated on by her ex-boyfriend, the rich young miss Xia Zhenzhen was dragged into a marriage meeting by her dear mom. In order to avoid that, she entered a contract romance with a handsome waiter from a bar under her sister’s encouragement! As per their contract, his time for her money, they would be lovey-dovey in the public and strangers in private. They agreed that this contract romance must not turn real, but wait, why is this guy looking at me so angrily?!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)
After the death of his mother, his younger brother keeps bullying him. A short story about family from Tan Jiu.

This is a story about the “weak” defeating the strong.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Includes 2 extra chapters.

title.romaji: Hua He Ciwei Tao Pao Le

description:
A wealthy young woman who’s been spoiled all her life meets a stoic but kind college student. One cold night, fate brings Mira and Ezra together from their two different worlds. They eventually part ways, but happen across each other once again at the regular college Mira’s father compels her to attend in anonymity, hoping that she’ll learn real-world knowledge. Mira and Ezra’s friendship blossoms, but will their differences ultimately tear them apart?

(Source: Tapas)

Note: Includes 8 extra chapters.

A story about a snow princess created by humans.
(Source: Shinnen).

That ordinary high school girl is actually the daughter of the red-haired witch — her life should be like easy like a max-level adventurer! Instead, she was hounded by a handsome but flirtatious bully of a prince from another world in pursuit of her mother's debts. In the name of repayment, he'll tease her and make her heart pound, as the countdown begins...

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are brothers, but not related by blood. Yue Zhishi, who was fostered with the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to Song Yu, who is three years older than him, like a big brother. While Song Yu deliberately keeps him at arms length. Song Yu acts like an indifferent brother to his clingy puppy dog younger brother, but what others don't realize is that it is because he knows his own feelings so he has to restrain himself and keep away... Because Yue Zhishi is Song Yu's only allergen.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Emo Nüpu Zhi Xiang Bei Eyi Qianjin Qifu
title.native: 恶魔女仆只想被恶役千金欺负

description:
Sharan, a pious girl, found a high-paying job as a maid. Her task is to serve a haughty and sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't be an easy one…

(Source: Billibilli, translated)

Having been married for three years, she didn’t know who her husband was. An accidental blind date brought more troubles than she had imagined... The man became her boss the next day, and he seemed to be interested in her and wouldn't let her go!

(Source: Webcomics)

Various short stories from an upcoming Chinese Manhua artist, Benjamin.

Two stories are in black & white, while two other stories are evidence for Benjamin's profound sense for colored illustrations.

title.romaji: Qian Fu You You You Xiang Fu Hun Le

description:
Landon forced Zayden to go from Alpha to Omega. Zayden endured the pain, the rejection, and finally walked away after the divorce. Only when he was gone did Landon realize... he’d made the biggest mistake of his life.

(Source: WebComics)

Chen Jue, an unfavoured bastard son of the Xie clan, has mysteriously risen to become the powerful Governor of Dong Chang, second only to the emperor himself! The world only knows Chen Jue as a savage and ruthless man, however they do not know of the one ray of light in his heart, the Qie Lan assassin Xia Houlian, who has been wanted by Dong Chang for many years! They were once childhood friends, but now they face each other with swords drawn? The spiritual yandere Governor and the loyal ruffian assassin invite you to enjoy a bloody date!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Bie Wuhui, Wo Cai Shi Shouhaizhe!
title.english: Don’t Get Me Wrong, I’m The Real Victim!

description:
An abandoned factory in the middle of the night, an impressive haunted house in an amusement park, and a grim smiling mask above a bloody white coat roaming every dark corner of the city. It has witnessed every single heinous crime, but please don't get me wrong, I'm only a victim.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Furen Mei Tian Dou Zai Xian Da Lian

description:
After losing both her parents and her inheritance, all Gu Mang had left was her younger brother. Finally cut off from even her despicable uncle's charity, a new opportunity to get in good with an affluent CEO gives her the shot she needs to provide for her sibling. And shoving this new connection in the face of her corrupt family is definitely a bonus!

(Source: Tapas)

Everyone dreams of having money to burn, but what if... the money must be burnt before a deadline? System Alert: Please spend 70 million in time. Should you fail this mission, you will have to bid farewell to your *beep*...

(Source: Mangatoon)

As the Girl of Misfortune, she married a down-and-out duke to escape from her miserable fate in the imperial palace. However, the scumbag blamed the decline of his family on her and tortured her to death with his lover. Fortunately, she accidentally got a chance of rebirth. When she woke up, she was back in her childhood. Facing a devoted maid, her indifferent father, and an unknown teenager... How would she change her fate?

(Source: Wecomics)

Ex-boyfriend and the best friend drugged her for revenge but unexpectedly brought a mysterious man enters her world. For revenge, she married the ruthless man and her mysterious birth story was revealed...

(Source: Webcomics)

After three years of trying, Bai Xiaochun sets off to start his journey to immortality. As a disciple in the Stove Room, a single grain of rice helps him towards his quest of eternal life. With his determination to stave off death, will he be able to attain strength and live long?

(Source: INKR)

Before he started The Ravages of Time, Chen Mou penned a two volume series called Unhuman. The volumes are broken up into three seperate stories, each focusing on a different character.

Summary from Manga Updates

title.romaji: Zaogao! Wo He Heifen Huhuan Le
title.english: Plunder My Soul And My Heart

description:
Bai Zhan, the leader of the idol group TREE, finds himself switching body with an unknown girl overnight! What's worse, he finds that girl is his hater as well as the most devoted fan of his group member, Ji Shan. She takes possession of Bai Zhan's body and even moves into the group's apartment! It seems that this stupid and stubborn girl really appreciates this destined chance to stay with her idol and she refuses to cooperate to find the way to switch their bodies back!!! GEE!!! Now, Bai Zhan comes up with a wonderful idea... If I make her my devoted fan, then everything will go as I want!

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Ni de Biaoqing Bao Bi Benren Haokan
title.english: Your Memes Are Better Looking Than You
title.native: 你的表情包比本人好看

description:
Gu Wei. the popular yet controversial lead dancer of a boy band. Jiang Xun, a god-tier professional esports player.One day, after a variety show aired, these two complete and utter strangers became a trending topic together.

Gu Wei’s anti-fans: Do these two people have anything in common? Gu Wei is absolutely shameless, even leaching on the popularity of esports and buying paid posts left and right!
Fans of Jiang Xun’s skills: Our God Xun is as rich as a nation. If he wanted to, he could play around with any nameless celebrity and dump them after getting bored.

However, an expected trending topic emerged not long after.
“Jiang Xun slacks off during livestream to promote a celebrity and fight against anti-fans.”
“Jiang Xun’s younger brother Jiang Ying complains that he’s been forced to defend his nemesis Gu Wei against anti-fans.”
Netizens: ???

Although they have an arranged marriage between them, what Gu Wei fell for first was not Jiang Xun, but Jiang Xun’s memes. The first time Jiang Xun met Gu Wei, he thought he liked him. He could never have imagined that Gu Wei only liked his memes.

Gu Wei: I think your memes are better looking than you.
Jiang Xun: Little kid, you’re a little rebel, aren’t you.

Later, affection gradually grew between the both of them until Gu Wei eventually mustered up the courage to confess to Jiang Xun.

Gu Wei: Jiang Xun, I’ve become a fan of our ship.
Jiang Xun replies ruthlessly: It’s too late, I’m now your solo fan.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

The top peregrine falcon in the ABO world, alpha Lu Shangjin couldn't help but fall in love with his bodyguard, the lop-eared rabbit omega Yan Yi. The two fell in love with each other and were the envy of others. When Lu Shangjin's passion fades, Yan Yi is deeply hurt, but is willing to stay by his beloved's side as his servant. Unexpectedly, this sudden change helps Yan Yi make up his mind and leave. Lu Shangjin suddenly wakes up and begins to overcome all obstacles in order to bring back his beloved rabbit.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

A husky, dark-skinned young man with a tragic past changes upon a handsome, aloof painter in a wheelchair. One struggles to survive while the other harbors a death wish. The two of them end up finding redemption in each other.

(Source: Webnovel)

Note: Chapter count includes an extra.

title.english: How the Empress Breaks the Rules

description:
Ye Zhenzhen was the granddaughter of the Prime Minister, and it was both her responsibility and destiny to wed the Emperor of Daqi Kingdom to strengthen Royal ties with her family. But, having always been the unconventional type, she was never ready to be a typical, docile empress! Sadly for the Emperor, he had no idea what an adventurous life awaited him.

This is a story about how an unwillingly-wed young couple experiences a series of misunderstandings, challenges, and obstacles.

(Source: Pocket Comics)

Yuzi's grandfather is getting old. He can't run his restaurant properly anymore. The clientele is getting scarce.
Yet Yuzi is passionate about cooking. He likes good products and often innovates. But his dishes are not appreciated.
The young man becomes embittered and aggressive, convinced that one day the whole world will jostle to taste his cooking.
One day two strange visitors enter his inn...

Young boy and girl live under the same roof, sharing the confusion and troubles of youth. If you're looking for a shoujo manga that will make your heart flutter with the emotions of young love, this is the one!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Nüzhuang Dalao Jintian Ye Meiyou Bei Qiuhun
title.english: The Drag-Queen Hasn't Gotten a Proposal Yet
title.native: 女装大佬今天也没有被求婚

description:
Jin Chuan is transported into a love game while he is dying in real life. In order to have a second life, he has to date three men at the same time who are his boss, a straight guy who doesn’t like him, his first crush who he thought was a girl back then, and his brother who hates him. During the difficult choices which might either blow his cover as a female or lead to having sex with a man, Jin Chuan gradually finds out that these men's feelings for him are not just about clearing missions in the game...

(Source: Webnovel)

Note: Chapter count includes 12 extras.

A scientist couple has been arrested for conducting illegal studies, allegedly for performing genetic modification on five of their children. Youngest children, Dannis, is the only one who grew up as a normal human, and has become the only family member who has to tend to rest of the members and to try to find a medicine to turn them into normal humans again.

Dog human, plant gene, spider web gene, as well as mind reading, how will these family members who grew up in the laboratory survive in the outside world?!

(Source: MAL News; edited)

He's a boy band idol who appeared to be a cold beauty, struggling to restrain himself to stay in character. He seems like a young and innocent pretty boy on the outside, was actually completely different from that… Despite looking down on each other, and arguing in every possible situation, they were compelled to pair up in order to achieve the popularity that they needed?!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

It's unclear whether the witch doctor Tao Yao is good or evil. When she rings her golden bell, nothing remains of her enemies. She could be the youkai's savior, or she could be their worst nightmare. Beyond the human world is the place where youkai dwell called Taodu. Taodu's witch doctor Tao Yao only treats youkai not humans. Accompanied by the young monk Mo Ya, they travel the world in search of the Hundred Demon Book.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

She was the legendary agent, the nightmare of terrorists. But after she woke up from her death, she realized that the God has granted her a new life in the ancient time. She was reborn into a weak girl's body, but she's determined to be as fierce and capable as she was in her last life. Even death cannot change the way of her, until she met that fateful man, the seventh prince, and her betrothed! The Slaughter Queen might be cold and aloof like a she-wolf, but in his arms, she's always the little wild cat...

(Source: Mangatoon)

The happy and peaceful life of the innocent college girl Song Xiaoan is shattered when she is accidentally kidnapped and taken deep in the mountains. Thankfully there was the undercover agent Zhou Sihan there to help. Xiaoan thought that the policewoman would help her escape to safety. But she discovers that Sihan might be hiding something even more sinister…

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

In the Heavens or on Earth, only I shall be immortal! In the vast Divine Lands, at the western border, upon the recommendation of his best friend, he began walking on a path he had never thought possible. The Cloudlink Sect, as the ‘Final Path’ of the 7 main sects of the Divine Lands, on their sacred disciple acceptance ceremony that happens once every 5 years, took in a single 5th generation disciple who had a beggar-like bearing.
With the gates of cultivation opened wide for him, will this bright and mischievous child be able to mature into a powerful Immortal that rules the world? Please find out in - Only I Shall Be Immortal.

(Source: KuaiKan Manhua, translated)

title.romaji: Wo Zai Lianzong Bei Yinghou Houma Qiangzhi Ai Le
title.native: 我在恋综被影后后妈强制爱了

description:
Ruan Tao wanted to make a name for herself in the entertainment world, but she was blocked by her stepmother right at the start. Her stepmother is a superstar actress well-known in the scene, so Ruan Tao can only play nice while trying to find a way around her wicked stepmother!

Finally, Ruan Tao gets a chance to participate in a reality dating show, along with her stepmother. But aren't these shows supposed to be about young people finding romance with each other? Why is her stepmother holding her hand and being all overprotective all of a sudden?

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Resurrected after a cruel death, Bai Ye seeks revenge for his clan. It just happens that his apprentice in this new life is the key to unlocking the power he needs, and also the object of his lust...

(Source: INKR, edited)

In this world, there exists certain types of men; they do not believe in working hard, or improving themselves. They are self-serving and care only for themselves. These men’s goal in life is to “eat soft rice” and they use any means possible to suck their tall, rich, and handsome lovers dry, self-reliant System: Our goal is to rise up! Our goal is to persevere! We must “eat hard rice” and be self-sufficient! When numerous souls become bound by this system and enter into the bodies of those who only mooch off of their lovers, what will happen?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes an extra.

On the eve of the final battle in the arena of Boundless Fairyland, one of the contestants, Dao Buyi/Dirtless Path was murdered in real life by his opponent, Mo Yisha. Dao Buyi/Dao Wuchen did not survive the murder. He vowed to exact revenge from the Mo Family if he were given the chance to return from the dead. A mysterious light shone on him and he was brought back to 2 years ago, to the day Boundless Fairyland was just released. He thought it was all a dream, but the memories of those 2 years were so vivid, it was as if he had been given a second chance.

(Source: WeComics)

What is the line that separates love from hate? How can a broken heart heal from a loss so deep? When is letting go of your inhibitions worth risking your life?

International graphic novel artist Benjamin uses his trademark painterly style to depict moving portrayals of love and loss that get at the heart of what it means to throw your heart into life, no matter the consequences.

(Source: Tokyopop)

The Zhou Clan is the most powerful clan in the Northern Lands. The main branch of the family is extremely rich and powerful, and its members live carefree and lavish lives, with access to anything they could ever hope for. The other branches spend their lives in servitude to the main branch, in a state of existence close to that of slaves. Zhou Yi is one of the members of the branch family, and his life is one of perpetual work and submission, only wanting to get away from it with his girlfriend Xiao Qing.

After a sequence of tragic events, he will take up a legendary spirit blade and embark on a path to vengeance in order to hunt down those who destroyed his hopes and dreams of a peaceful existence...

title.romaji: Yi Huang Jiu Gong Shier Qi

description:
It's said that 9 devils came to the human world to find their brides, but there were 12 brides! The brides outnumbered them! But they had to complete this task from the immortals! What should they do?

(Source: Webnovel)

Chu Xingchen time travelled to the immortal cultivation world, thinking he could lie down peaceful to enjoy his new life, but he was forcibly bound by the strongest martial god system, and was forced to start the road of his cultivation.

(Source: Mangatoon)

title.romaji: Wo Zai Yijie Kaobei Jue Shi Shen Gong
title.native: 我在异界拷贝绝世神功

description:
Reborn as the Demon Lord, but the only way for him to become the most powerful is is by copying the powers from girls? Wait, why is the process of copying so perverted? Mistress! Grand-Mistress! Great-Grand-Mistress! Please take it easy on your poor disciple! My body can't take it anymore!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

He is unconfident, coward, and eager for love, but always chooses to escape. A human and a devil struggle in an ambiguous relationship to find their own ways to live.

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Suiran Huo De Le Chao Xiyou Zhiye, Que Yao Bei Quan Fu Zhui Sha?!
title.native: 虽然获得了超稀有职业，却要被全服追杀？！

description:
The lawful-good Yuan Ye was ambushed by an NPC with a hidden profession. Now he has to lower his reputation score to become stronger?! By the time he realized what's happening, he's already become the most notorious BOSS-level antagonist in the game!

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

I didn't mean to exploit your popularity and fleece you! An unpopular celebrity, Ran Lin, is barely surviving in the entertainment industry. However, after a huge misunderstanding, he is thrust into the spotlight because of Lu Yiyao, one of the hottest celebrities. For the first time in his life, Ran Lin's name has appeared in the top searches. On the other hand, Lu Yiyao deeply regrets his hug at the airport. One knows that he's in the wrong, while the other is utterly disgusted. Never in their wildest dreams would they expect their fates to be irreversibly intertwined after that variety show...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Diwang Pa Pa: Fei Yao Zuo Yong Tianxia
title.native: 帝王怕怕·妃要坐拥天下

description:
A modern assassin was killed by her best friend during a mission. She ended up transmigrating to the ancient past and became a consort. Yet, her husband was a weak and forsaken prince. Will this consort turn the tide and become an empress?

(Source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Wo Jìng Chengle Yì Shìjie Hougong De Caiji Duixiang
title.native: 我竟成了异世界后宫的采集对象

description:
An AI system accidentally breaks the dimensional barrier between the game world and the real world, causing characters from the game to suddenly appear at Tim Cooper's house. With secret manuals, legendary props, and spirit beasts now in play, the world enters an era of chaos and conquest! Tim doesn't want to get involved in the conflict, but that doesn't stop otherworldly girls from knocking on his door...

(Source: Webnovel)

Gao Ying was so happy he finally got to be a student of Guangzhou Academy of Fine Arts… Maybe a little too happy, arriving there a day early. Like they say, you can’t make an omelette without breaking eggs!

To while away the night, he checked into a hotel in the old town. Little did he know that this would entangle him in a centuries-old conflict between local mystical forces.

(Source: Aloha Comics)

title.romaji: Qian Nüyou Cheng Le Wo De Dingtou Shangsi
title.native: 前女友成了我的顶头上司

description:
Ji Yu is a lowly temp, the kind who gets bullied by her boss every day. Luckily, the department is getting a new boss returning from overseas, who is said to be beautiful and kind to her subordinates. But she didn’t expect that this new boss is actually an ex-girlfriend who has a grudge against her!

Ji Yu was young and reckless in school, so when she fell in love with a timid junior girl, she harassed the younger girl with hugs and kisses even when she refused. Eventually, Ji Yu even forced Le Churan to go out with her. But when she graduated, Ji Yu felt guilty and decided to give the junior girl back her freedom by writing a long breakup letter, deleting her contact info, and going far away.

Nowadays, nobody would believe it if Ji Yu said that she used to bully Le Churan around. When Ji Yu writes, a report, Le Churan says, "This doesn't make sense. Rewrite it." When Ji Yu glanced at someone else, Le Churan threatens her, "I can fire you for having an improper relationship at work."

Gradually, their conversations became a little strange.
"Kiss me and I'll write the report for you," Le Churan said with a serious expression.
"Let's hold hands for an hour and you can have a day off tomorrow."
"Come home with me... and I'll do anything you want me to."

(Source: Billibilli, translated)

His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student. Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Ta Men Shuo Wo Shi Weilai Zhi Wang
title.english: They Say I'm The Future King

description:
As a new era dawns, humanity embarks on an epic adventure where everyone possesses game-like abilities. Cultivating as a warrior or mastering dark arts becomes the foundation of this unfolding story. During a blind date, the protagonist discovers that the new era is on the horizon, and his date, Tang Qingrou, reveals herself to be a reincarnated soul. And she claims I’m the future king!

(Source: WebComics)

The best all-rounder ever! A car accident changes my ordinary life, and after that, I score full marks in every exam, win all lottery prizes, have a genius for all sports, and encounter many beautiful girls... I'm just omnipotent.

(Source: Webnovel)

Staro Lee was confined at the basement for five years, cheated and tortured by her fiance. This monster killed her four brothers and stole her family property. At the brink of death, a voice told her that she was granted another chance to change her fate. Then Staro Lee became Miss Goofy. With the scheme unfolding, a man she never met at the last life showed up, Gison Soong, an aloof CEO with a mysterious curse... No matter what reason that the fate brought this man here, Staro determined to clean everyone who got in the way of her vengeance.

(Source: MangaToon)
The unexpected reunion of a proper girl and a delinquent girl. A love story is developed between the two.

When he transmigrated for the first time, Yan Zhaoge built an arsenal of max-level equipment. So when he transmigrated for a second time, into a world before the development of martial arts, it felt like playing a game on easy mode. But don't be too complacent! There's something wrong with the plot? I am not the protagonist? I'm actually the handsome and rich, but villainous senior who is trying to steal the girl from the protagonist?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

An arrogant CEO who wishes he didn't have to be that way. He would rather spend his time just worshiping his favorite idol.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

After a devastating end in her previous life, Mo Jiaojiao, now reborn as a three-year-old, is determined to alter the fate of Mo Yuan state. She quickly learns that her father is not only a ruthless tyrant, but forced her to adhere to strict royal etiquette. Yet, against all odds, she soon becomes his beloved child, and even forms a unique bond with the hostage prince. Mo Jiaojiao might not know it but a begrudgingly protective emperor slowly realizes how much of a treasure she is to him.

(Source: Tapas)

Ling Yun, a cultivator, failed to overcome his trial, and his soul was cast into the body of Ling Yun, a loser in the current world who was just assassinated in the city. Faced with unknown enemies out to kill him, in a strange world that he knew nothing about, Ling Yun will cultivate his power, draw upon talismans, and refine potions and weapons to fight back against evil!

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

title.romaji: Quan Neng Qianjjn Ran Fan Tian

description:
Reborn as the unwanted daughter of a wealthy family, Ye Zhuo was shunned for being an illegitimate child. So what if I was dealt a bad hand? Watch me win with it anyway! Ye Zhuo gave up her place to the real daughter, and went away with her real mother and uncle. She quickly made them rich overnight. With a billion yuan in hand, she became the CEO of her own tech company, widely renowned as a genius who went straight to the top of society! Soon after, she meets the handsome heir of a corporate conglomerate and they start going out, as he shamelessly spoils her!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Alicia Heart was excited for her first date... until a magical chess piece transported her to another world?! Caught between a clash of warring kingdoms, Alicia finds herself in a realm of magic and conspiracy for the crown. Thankfully, she's not alone: she has her handsome knights to protect and adore her! Can they save her from becoming a sacrifice and stop the resurrection of the Red Queen? Maybe, if they stop messing around long enough...

(Source: Tapas)

Lu Mingfei never expected to live an extraordinary life. He was content with his average achievements and took pride in his skill in Starcraft. However, all that is upended when he suddenly receives a scholarship to study in Chicago at a place called Cassell College. It all seems too good to be true, this can only be a scam! Little does he know, that when he does eventually accept the offer, it is but the beginning of the rest of his life, and the college's obscurity will be the least of his concerns once they start telling him about the dragons...

(Source: Webnovel)

title.romaji: Xiao Yang Xiangdao Cong Bu Zuoyou Weinan
title.native: 小羊向导从不左右为难

description:
The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?

D-class guide Qiao Yang, because of a drunken accident, discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels, his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan, to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status, he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However, during the repeated interaction with the two, he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him…

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Note: Originally serialized under the title “Kao Fa Xiaowo Bianshen Dingji Xiangdao (靠发小我变身顶级向导)”.
A short story filled with the dark truths about adulthood and society. How would you face the reality when you know you are trapped in its cycle and routine?

Five one shots released for Valentine's Day 2011 by Summerzoo Studio.

1. Eternal Moment (将爱 by Xia Da)
Annie's to-do list: "bird and roses tiara...buy lace and fasteners...brooch...break up with Lin Xian." The film director boyfriend, Lin, is a bit too busy to realize Annie's feelings. Whoever wants to continue the relationship will meet one day, and then...?

2. Love in Kilimanjaro (爱在乞力马扎罗 by Zhu Le Tao)
3. 夏天和冬天 (by Yao Fei La)
4. 狼心 (by Yu Yan Shu)
5. Oneshot (by Jiang Xiao Chen)

The day his country perished, the once mighty monarch fell into the hands of the enemy crown prince, who brought him back to the Eastern Palace with the unexpected intention to enslave him since. The fallen monarch thought the life of a prisoner meant nothing but sheer darkness, yet to his surprise, in spite of receiving angry insults from the brooding prince, he enjoys the prince's tolerance and the privileges that come with it. "What did the prince mean when he mentioned the past we share? Umm… Why do I seem to have no recollection of whatever happened at all…?"

(source: Webcomics)

title.romaji: Meng Bao Laixi: Mommy Wo Daddy Ne?
title.native: 萌宝来袭：妈咪我爹地呢？

description:
*Can you imagine waking up to an adorable baby and a bossy husband - who you've never seen - lying next to you?
*Breaking off the contract, betrayal, murder... How could she take her revenge?

Ye Xuange is a former trainee in Linshan Entertainment. Before she can be called a "star", she's been defamed by scandals, sexy photos, boyfriend's betrayal... She may be the most unfortunate heroine ever. But one day, she wakes up to a five-year-old son and a bossy husband she never knew of? Her life will be changed completely!

(Source: WebComics)

title.english: A Single Strike Of Shimmering Frost

description:
The sickly Sect Master Yun Yifeng peddles intelligence, and Prince Xiao requires his service to investigate a theft. Enticing Yun with medicine that can cure his sickness—something Prince Xiao doesn't have—the two embark on a journey to investigate the theft. Something blossoms beyond friendship along the way.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

Note: Chapter count includes an extra.

Everyone on campus knows about the endless unrequited love Myles devotes to Jimmy, even the professors! Sweet Myles has woken up early for the past three years to get breakfast for the impassive Jimmy… all for the price of a smile he never gets. When Jimmy coldly tells him off for the last time, Myles’ endless love... comes to an end. He’s finally DONE with him! But then, something strange happens. Jimmy starts showing up everywhere, demanding his attention! Just what does he want from Myles?!

Now it's time for me to come down the mountain looking for my long lost wife. Will it be a tough journey as my enemies are still lurking in the dark? No worries, I've got the best help in the world— "Dad! Where should I pierce the needle in?"

(Source: MangaToon)

title.romaji: Qing Bie Suibian Dakai Shou Long

description:
Yanzhi Xu is the talented new lawyer at Tai He law firm… and he has a complicated, romantic past with its handsome star lawyer, Zongze Li. Despite a painful breakup, Zongze still has feelings for Yanzhi, who just wants to move on. Yanzhi may have the chance to do just that with Lei Pei, an intern who aims to impress with his legal chops, innocent charm, and hard body. In this battle for love and affection, will Yanzhi’s heart succumb to the advances from a past lover or move on with a hot, young protégé?

(Source: Tapas)

title.romaji: Shen Chong You Gei Wo Kai Gua Le
title.english: My Divine Pet Enables Me To Become The Biggest Winner

description:
Three years ago, three magical spirits fell from the heavens. The king of the eastern Qin received one, and he conquered the six eastern kingdoms into one empire. The warlord of the southern wastes received the second, and he united the nineteen sects to become the leader of the southern plains. Sun Changming received the third, and three years later, nothing in his ordinary life has changed. But it turned out that the little mudfish he picked up three years before was actually the most powerful magical beast of all! Once it evolves, its abilities are so overpowering that nothing will stand in his way!

(Source: Tencent, translated)

The dome of the heavens expands without limits in a sea of clouds. The hearts of men are forever drawn upward. The way of the heavens is unfathomable, and men cannot even hope to grasp it. Who in the world never thought of living forever? Star crossed lovers torn between the struggles of the righteous and demon paths. A man and an ancient sword. How is he going to face the world?

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

When the news of the famous up-and-coming idol receiving a zero-point on his test and faking his college diploma is exposed, he is forced to go back to university and retake his classes. However, the person assigned to be his tutor actually turned out to be a broke country bumpkin! This is the story of two people from completely different backgrounds colliding and encountering unexpected events in everyday life which eventually turns into sparks of romance. Is it possible for there to be a happy ending between two people belonging to different worlds?

(Source: WebComics)

title.english: My First Love Is a Boy

description:
Sha En is a cute boy who secretly likes to wear girls' clothing when no one is looking. His secret is discovered by Xia Zuo, a loner who likes to make lolita dresses. A light-hearted romance between two boys who share the same love for cute dresses.

(Source: INKR)

It is said that an inexpensive name makes an easier life, but the inexpensive name and life of Wang Xiao Er, because his leg were crippled, was looked down on by friends and relatives. By complete accident, he picked up a mobile phone with a magical game inside, which allowed Wang Xiao Er to change his fate. What, the things in this game can become real? Wang Xiao Er, with a face full of smiles, said, “Aiyo, hey, then don’t blame me for being greedy. Jiang Shan, beauties, I want them all!”

(Source: Manhuatai, translated)

I was a top-notch agent in my last life and a member of the Chinese Dragon Group. I chose to destroy mu enemies all my myself despite the cost being my own life. After rebirth, I found myself already married to someone, some handsome prince who was said to have turned into a demon! Bit wait! I have NEVER dated anyone neither in my last life, nor this life, how could I become a married women so soon?! My new body is fragile and weak, yet I won't allow it to be a problem on my way of cultivation. Most importantly, where is my husband? ...Anyway, in this fantasy world, I will live this life the way I like!

(Source: Manga Toon)

Because of having the same names as two stationery brands, Aurora Seasons and Monty Blanc were teased for being a couple in junior high school. After eight years they met each other again in a vet clinic as boss and staff! When the female employee with the heart of glass meets the male boss with the wicked tongue, as well as the rumored partner of the past, how should they behave in this awkward and embarrassing atmosphere?

(Source: WebComics)

My grandfather is a supreme cultivator. My other grandfather is a top-level alchemist. My father is the current patriarch of our clan of immortals. My mother is the daughter of the supreme sword-master. My second uncle is the Supreme Elder of the Taoist academy. And my third uncle rules the Western Desert!

Luo Qianfan tells the system, "Even though I'm the heir of the most powerful immortal clan in history, I'm really not interested in cultivation."

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Zhen Hetu always thought that he was a hapless traveler in this world. He had been practicing for ten years, yet, he was still only at the lowest Meditation Phase (8585520/????). He had no idea when he could break through this phase at all! But the 999th time of purple heavenly thunder strike was hanging above his head. Even the big shots of this cultivation world would shudder when facing this! It was not until he took his junior sister out on an adventure that he found himself so…powerful.

(Source: Webnovel)

In order to adapt to the development of society, Gods held the first East-West Gods Conference in Heaven. The Matchmaker, whose traditional image is an old man with white beard and hair, and the Cupid, whose appearance had been a naked child, both turn out to be handsome young men this time (girls just can’t help loving them), which is a refreshing concept. Don't you look forward to seeing how Matchmaker and Cupid will interact as eastern and western Gods of Love?

(Source: Webnovel)

Spotted by a vampire? By a handsome vampire? What should our lead do? Become his food or...? A romance with a vampire adonis is on! Now the question is to go after him or wait for his confession.

(Source: Webcomics App)

title.romaji: Junzhu Wen Zhu! Renshe Buneng Beng!
title.english: Princess, Don't Ruin Your Public Persona!

description:
Gee! What would you do if you wake up and find yourself become a new born baby overnight? I guess I have to re-live my childhood again. Fortunately, i am reborn in the noble family of the Grand Secretary. I guess I should seize this chance and establish my own career! My family dote on me, my friends support me, and my princes charming fancy me. Wait... How am I supposed to choose from the emperor and the crown princes? And I am not interested in being the d*mn empress! All I want is money money money!

(Source: Mangatoon)

In the midst of the blue and purple neon lights, under the gray, metallic sky, it is the frontier of all data, the aftermath of a scientific revolution, also the border of fiction and reality. Metal and flesh, past and future. Here, the virtual world and the physical world exist side by side. It seems like the wall of time is right in front of your eyes.

As darkness gradually descends, you must realize, my friend, that we can't survive the darkness with kindness. We must light a fire.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

Following an accident, Su Xinyu, a 35-yeard old surgeon transmigrated to a baby's body in ancient times, becoming the seventh daughter of Tao Liuping. She hence became the infant Xiangzhi'er, but kept her adult's mind secret as she grew, seeking a way to survive in the patriarchy. It was fortunate that her mother was a strong woman, who knew the ways of the world and thought differently. She promised to raise her daughters well and protect them from bullying, not to mention that Xiangzhi's sisters all earned their keep, and were as tough as they were smart. Xiangzhi herself became good friends with the young boy Rock, brought to her by a mysterious old man—and yet, she failed to notice that her little quirks that surpass ordinary children were noticed by an old woman from the village who held hidden depths...

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Zhen Qianjin Ta Shi Quanneng Dalao
title.english: The True Heiress Is an All-Powerful Bigshot

description:
Once a powerful boss, Ying Zijin wakes up and finds herself in the body of the long-lost daughter of the Ying family. After returning to her wealthy family, not only is she forced to be a blood donor for her aunt, but she is also ridiculed for being useless compared to the illegitimate substitute girl. Her father doesn't care about her, and her mother agrees with her aunt in thinking that she is not a suitable heiress. However, this former boss-lady is not someone you can bully so easily?

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

It isn't difficult to face a situation like a sudden-pass-to-another-world because it has been a stereotype start for a fantastic journey. But waking up as the top girl at a brothel and finding herself trapped in the body of the General's daughter in another world is freaking unacceptable! Let alone there is an engagement with a playboy prince granted by the emperor waiting for her. What is it? A revenge? Or... Let's see how two haters fall for each other? "I like you it's my business" said the prince.

(Source: Webcomics, edited)

title.romaji: Fei Bao Li Bu He Zuo
title.english: Absolute Obedience 〜If You Don't Obey me〜

description: Jang Jiheon, a businessman, falls in love at first sight with Geon during a snooker game. Jiheon's unbearable desires forces Gon to spend a night with him. Geon desperately runs away when Jiheon is revealed to be a violent and oppressive man. And one day, after three years, the two reunites in an unexpected way...

"I have my eyes on him, only him."

Ming ZiQi's attention was drawn to Xiao Luo on his first day as a supervisor in practice. But as a simple murder case becomes something much more, it is time to seek out the truth?

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Note: Chapter count includes a prologue.

Obsessive playboy x Gentle cutie.

Ever since he was little, Li Chengxiu has faced all the difficulties life could offer, when he just wanted to be loved. Shao Qun is the heir of a wealthy family. His boisterous and unruly personality was at its worst during his high school years. From curiosity to bullying, then becoming attraction. It was the wrong time for these awkward feelings, only destined to hurt each other. They thought they'd left it behind and moved on. But when they meet again, will their encounter be the beginning of happiness or the continuation of pain?

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Chu Yu woke up to find herself in the body of a murdered princess almost half a millennium ago. She soon finds out that whoever wanted her dead was in her mansion. Knowing the history, she also realizes that the owner of her body will soon perish in a historical rebellion.
Now she must defend herself in the depth of a forbidden city while preventing what is to come in her historical timeline.
A palace epic filled with tactical battles and a hint of affection.

title.romaji: Yiqie Cong Wo Chengwei Luding Kaishi
title.english: Everything Started When I Became a Furnace
title.native: 一切从我成为炉鼎开始

description:
Ye Yan has been abused as a cultivation body for a thousand incarnations. In this life, he was suppose to be the prime disciple of the leader of the Yunyan Sect, but it turned out they were just keeping him as a cultivation tool. Just as he was about to be sacrificed for cultivation, he awakened a System, and was given a newbie pack that contained a magical potion to massively boost his cultivation, a pill to help him form an immortal body, and directly raised his spiritual power by two stages. The System announced his first mission — escape from this sect immediately.

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

A story between the handsome yet loving pilot Zhou Jingze and a gentle yet dependable doctor, Xu Sui. Summer has always been warm, so is the boy I love. Stay tune to see the undying love of the "infatuated playboy" Zhou Jingze.

title.romaji: Wo Di Ming Yun Zhi Shu

description:
When a comic can depict and change the future, when the characters in the comic became real ones, the comic world and the real world interwove together! Yvette Luo, an ordinary college girl is about go through an unprecedented experience and embark on adventure... the cartoonist who hides her light under a bushel, the cartoon characters with super power, the arbitrary young master, the mysterious female killer, who uphold justice? And who are the evil ones? It’s the show time for a legendary comic!

(Source: WebComics)

Note: Includes one extra chapter.

In the Kingdom of Xia, the grand-general's daughter Situ Xiu is a strange girl who is weak, timid, and stutters, too! One day, her twin brother the young general got mad and suddenly left home… Not knowing the situation, the emperor ordered her brother to lead a military expedition to defend the border! Miss Situ must grit her teeth and pretend to be her brother. Now she is forced to face off against Can Yu, Sha Kingdom's mightiest general, the one they call the War God's reincarnation…

(Source: Kuaikan, translated)

Note: Chapter count includes a prologue and an extra chapter.

title.romaji: Zhuansheng Zhanan Wo Dai Qi Nü Zheng Changsheng
title.native: 转生渣男我带妻女证长生

description:
A Grand Immortal Venerable, grievously wounded, is forced to descend from the heavens and reincarnate into the body of a mortal scumbag named Jiang Tianchen.

This ten-thousand-year-old virgin suddenly finds himself with a wife and daughter who are being targeted by vicious underworld forces. When they threaten to defile his wife and kidnap his daughter, he doesn't hesitate—he crushes them instantly.

His new philosophy? If the enemy is ruthless, I'll be even more ruthless. For every one that comes, I'll drain them completely dry and turn them all into cultivation resources for myself, my wife, and my daughter.

(Source: Tencent, translated)

Considering herself to be a badass villain, Xiao Yixin doesn’t have the slightest interest in seeking redemption—not even when she’s in hell being sentenced.

“You are sentenced to be a good person in your next life. Now go and serve your term.”

This is how she ends up on the good men’s side and get her “good man”.

“Please don’t be mistaken! I…I…quenched the fire in your body just to complete my mission! There’s nothing unprofessional between us!”

(Source: MangaToon)

The scar on my lower abdomen is an old wound that has been difficult to heal over the years.

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

title.romaji: Xiuzhen Nai Ba Re Bu Qi
title.english: Don't Mess With The Cultivation Babysitter

description:
When Kain finds out he's pregnant, his dreams of becoming the next overlord is thrown in the fire...

(Source: Toomics)

In a world populated by beastmen, the down-and-out actress, Shen Youqing, happens to be a chinchilla-girl. During an audition, she was nearly sexually assaulted by the assistant director. But she's saved in the nick of time by someone she hadn’t seen in years: Shi Ruolin, who was her first love, arranged marriage partner, fiancée, and mortal enemy. Shen Youqing was looking for a chance to escape, not even bothering to thank her savior, but Shi Ruolin makes her an unexpected offer. Facing dire straits, Shen Youqing gives in to temptation and agrees to endure the humiliation of becoming the pet of the cold-blooded snake, in exchange for a large sum of money. As they spend more time together, they manage to resolve their long-standing misunderstandings, and their mutual feelings grow until they finally agree to spend the rest of their lives together.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)

During a trip to the mountains, Yan Qi accidentally picked up a white-haired monk who traveled from ancient times and brought him home. Ever since she brought this odd freeloader home, Yan Qi's ordinary college life has become more and more eventful.

(Source: Manman Manhua, translated)

Since ancient times, witches fought demons to save the world. However everything changed 100 years ago. The clan of witches secluded themselves in the mountains with a shield enchantment. Only the talented ones are able to freely enter and exit. And among them predicted that the clan of witches would destroyed by the one with silver hair. Daughter of the clan's patriarch, a head of silver hair, born to change the skies...
